GE07mbh_14_u:000.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_14_u:000.000-0002_02: puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca
GE07mbh_14_u:001.002c: papāta tīre gaṅgāyā vyādhaviddha iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.003a: taṃ sīdamānaṃ jagrāha bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇena coditaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.003c: maivam ity abravīc cainaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.004a: tam ārtaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau niśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.006a: rājā ca dhṛtarāṣṭras tam upāsīno mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.008a: tāṃ bhuṅkṣva bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ suhṛdbhiś ca janeśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:001.008c: na śocitavyaṃ paśyāmi tvayā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:001.009a: śocitavyaṃ mayā caiva gāndhāryā ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:001.011a: uktavān eṣa māṃ pūrvaṃ dharmātmā divyadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.012a: svasti ced icchase rājan kulasyātmana eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:001.012c: vadhyatām eṣa duṣṭātmā mando rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.013a: karṇaś ca śakuniś caiva mainaṃ paśyatu karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:001.014c: sa pālayiṣyati vaśī dharmeṇa pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:001.015b-0004_01: vināśam upayāsyanti tava putrā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:001.018a: aśrutvā hy asya vīrasya vākyāni madhurāṇy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:001.018c: phalaṃ prāpya mahad duḥkhaṃ nimagnaḥ śokasāgare
GE07mbh_14_u:001.019a: vṛddhau hi te svaḥ pitarau paśyāvāṃ duḥkhitau nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:002.001a: evam uktas tu rājñā sa dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_14_u:002.001c: tūṣṇīṃ babhūva medhāvī tam uvācātha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.003c: devāṃs tarpaya somena svadhayā ca pitṝn api
GE07mbh_14_u:002.004c: viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te kartavyam api te kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:002.005a: śrutāś ca rājadharmās te bhīṣmād bhāgīrathīsutāt
GE07mbh_14_u:002.006a: nemām arhasi mūḍhānāṃ vṛttiṃ tvam anuvartitum
GE07mbh_14_u:002.007a: yuktaṃ hi yaśasā kṣatraṃ svargaṃ prāptum asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:002.007c: na hi kaś cana śūrāṇāṃ nihato 'tra parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.008a: tyaja śokaṃ mahārāja bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:002.008c: na śakyās te punar draṣṭuṃ tvayā hy asmin raṇe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.010a: govinda mayi yā prītis tava sā viditā mama
GE07mbh_14_u:002.010c: sauhṛdena tathā premṇā sadā mām anukampase
GE07mbh_14_u:002.011a: priyaṃ tu me syāt sumahat kṛtaṃ cakragadādhara
GE07mbh_14_u:002.012a: yadi mām anujānīyād bhavān gantuṃ tapovanam
GE07mbh_14_u:002.012b-0006_01: kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyāmi iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.012c: na hi śāntiṃ prapaśyāmi ghātayitvā pitāmaham
GE07mbh_14_u:002.013a: karmaṇā yena mucyeyam asmāt krūrād ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:002.013c: karmaṇas tad vidhatsveha yena śudhyati me manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.014a: tam evaṃvādinaṃ vyāsas tataḥ provāca dharmavit
GE07mbh_14_u:002.015a: akṛtā te matis tāta punar bālyena muhyase
GE07mbh_14_u:002.015c: kim ākāśe vayaṃ sarve pralapāma muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.016a: viditāḥ kṣatradharmās te yeṣāṃ yuddhena jīvikā
GE07mbh_14_u:002.017a: mokṣadharmāś ca nikhilā yāthātathyena te śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.017b-0007_01: yathā vai kāmajāṃ māyāṃ parityaktuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:002.017c: asakṛc caiva saṃdehāś chinnās te kāmajā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:002.018c: maivaṃ bhava na te yuktam idam ajñānam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:002.019c: yuddhadharmāś ca te sarve dānadharmāś ca te śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:002.020c: parimuhyasi bhūyas tvam ajñānād iva bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:003.001a: yudhiṣṭhira tava prajñā na samyag iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:003.001c: na hi kaś cit svayaṃ martyaḥ svavaśaḥ kurute kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:003.002a: īśvareṇa niyukto 'yaṃ sādhv asādhu ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:003.002c: karoti puruṣaḥ karma tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_14_u:003.003c: śṛṇu tatra yathā pāpam apakṛṣyeta bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:003.004a: tapobhiḥ kratubhiś caiva dānena ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:003.004b-0008_01: pūyante tu narā rājaṃs tasmād yajñāḥ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:003.004c: taranti nityaṃ puruṣā ye sma pāpāni kurvate
GE07mbh_14_u:003.005a: yajñena tapasā caiva dānena ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:003.006a: asurāś ca surāś caiva puṇyahetor makhakriyām
GE07mbh_14_u:003.007a: yajñair eva mahātmāno babhūvur adhikāḥ surāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:003.008c: naramedhaṃ ca nṛpate tvam āhara yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:003.010a: yathā ca bharato rājā dauḥṣantiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:003.011c: abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit taṃ tvaṃ śrotum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:003.012c: dānam alpaṃ na śakyāmi dātuṃ vittaṃ ca nāsti me
GE07mbh_14_u:003.013a: na ca bālān imān dīnān utsahe vasu yācitum
GE07mbh_14_u:003.018a: na ca pratinidhiṃ kartuṃ cikīrṣāmi tapodhana
GE07mbh_14_u:003.018c: atra me bhagavan samyak sācivyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:003.019a: evam uktas tu pārthena kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:003.020a: vidyate draviṇaṃ pārtha girau himavati sthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:003.020e: tad ānayasva kaunteya paryāptaṃ tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:003.021a: kathaṃ yajñe maruttasya draviṇaṃ tat samācitam
GE07mbh_14_u:003.021c: kasmiṃś ca kāle sa nṛpo babhūva vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:003.022a: yadi śuśrūṣase pārtha śṛṇu kāraṃdhamaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_14_u:003.022c: yasmin kāle mahāvīryaḥ sa rājāsīn mahādhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.002a: āsīt kṛtayuge pūrvaṃ manur daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.002c: tasya putro maheṣvāsaḥ prajātir iti viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.003a: prajāter abhavat putraḥ kṣupa ity abhiviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.003c: kṣupasya putras tv ikṣvākur mahīpālo 'bhavat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.004c: tāṃs tu sarvān mahīpālān ikṣvākur akarot prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.005a: teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhas tu viṃśo 'bhūt pratimānaṃ dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_14_u:004.005c: viṃśasya putraḥ kalyāṇo viviṃśo nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:004.006a: viviṃśasya sutā rājan babhūvur daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:004.007c: teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ khanīnetraḥ sa tān sarvān apīḍayat
GE07mbh_14_u:004.008a: khanīnetras tu vikrānto jitvā rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_14_u:004.008c: nāśaknod rakṣituṃ rājyaṃ nānvarajyanta taṃ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.009a: tam apāsya ca tad rāṣṭraṃ tasya putraṃ suvarcasam
GE07mbh_14_u:004.010a: sa pitur vikriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyān nirasanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:004.013a: sa pīḍyamāno bahubhiḥ kṣīṇakośas tv avāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.013c: ārtim ārchat parāṃ rājā saha bhṛtyaiḥ pureṇa ca
GE07mbh_14_u:004.014c: samyagvṛtto hi rājā sa dharmanityo yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:004.015a: yadā tu paramām ārtiṃ gato 'sau sapuro nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.015c: tataḥ pradadhmau sa karaṃ prādurāsīt tato balam
GE07mbh_14_u:004.016a: tatas tān ajayat sarvān prātisīmān narādhipān
GE07mbh_14_u:004.016c: etasmāt kāraṇād rājan viśrutaḥ sa karaṃdhamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.017c: indrād anavaraḥ śrīmān devair api sudurjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.018a: tasya sarve mahīpālā vartante sma vaśe tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:004.018c: sa hi samrāḍ abhūt teṣāṃ vṛttena ca balena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:004.021a: karmaṇā manasā vācā damena praśamena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:004.021c: manāṃsy ārādhayām āsa prajānāṃ sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.022a: ya īje hayamedhānāṃ śatena vidhivat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.022c: yājayām āsa yaṃ vidvān svayam evāṅgirāḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.025c: kāñcanaḥ sumahān pādas tatra karma cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:004.026a: tataḥ kuṇḍāni pātrīś ca piṭharāṇy āsanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:004.026c: cakruḥ suvarṇakartāro yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:004.027a: tasyaiva ca samīpe sa yajñavāṭo babhūva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:004.027c: īje tatra sa dharmātmā vidhivat pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.001a: kathaṃvīryaḥ samabhavat sa rājā vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.001c: kathaṃ ca jātarūpeṇa samayujyata sa dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:005.002a: kva ca tat sāṃprataṃ dravyaṃ bhagavann avatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_14_u:005.002c: kathaṃ ca śakyam asmābhis tad avāptuṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_14_u:005.003a: asurāś caiva devāś ca dakṣasyāsan prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.005a: tāv api spardhinau rājan pṛthag āstāṃ parasparam
GE07mbh_14_u:005.005c: bṛhaspatiś ca saṃvartaṃ bādhate sma punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.006a: sa bādhyamānaḥ satataṃ bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:005.007a: vāsavo 'py asurān sarvān nirjitya ca nihatya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:005.007c: indratvaṃ prāpya lokeṣu tato vavre purohitam
GE07mbh_14_u:005.008a: yājyas tv aṅgirasaḥ pūrvam āsīd rājā karaṃdhamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.008c: vīryeṇāpratimo loke vṛttena ca balena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:005.009a: vāhanaṃ yasya yodhāś ca dravyāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:005.009b-0012_01: śayanāni ca mukhyāni mahārhāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.010a: sa guṇaiḥ pārthivān sarvān vaśe cakre narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.010c: saṃjīvya kālam iṣṭaṃ ca saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.011a: babhūva tasya putras tu yayātir iva dharmavit
GE07mbh_14_u:005.011c: avikṣin nāma śatrukṣit sa vaśe kṛtavān mahīm
GE07mbh_14_u:005.011e: vikrameṇa guṇaiś caiva pitevāsīt sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.013a: spardhate satataṃ sa sma devarājena pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.014a: śuciḥ sa guṇavān āsīn maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.014c: yatamāno 'pi yaṃ śakro na viśeṣayati sma ha
GE07mbh_14_u:005.016a: bṛhaspate maruttasya mā sma kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:005.016c: daivaṃ karmātha vā pitryaṃ kartāsi mama cet priyam
GE07mbh_14_u:005.017a: ahaṃ hi triṣu lokeṣu surāṇāṃ ca bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_14_u:005.017c: indratvaṃ prāptavān eko maruttas tu mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.018a: kathaṃ hy amartyaṃ brahmaṃs tvaṃ yājayitvā surādhipam
GE07mbh_14_u:005.019a: māṃ vā vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te maruttaṃ vā mahīpatim
GE07mbh_14_u:005.019c: parityajya maruttaṃ vā yathājoṣaṃ bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_14_u:005.020a: evam uktaḥ sa kauravya devarājñā bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.021a: tvaṃ bhūtānām adhipatis tvayi lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:005.021c: namucer viśvarūpasya nihantā tvaṃ balasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:005.022a: tvam ājahartha devānām eko vīra śriyaṃ parām
GE07mbh_14_u:005.022c: tvaṃ bibharṣi bhuvaṃ dyāṃ ca sadaiva balasūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:005.024a: samāśvasihi deveśa nāhaṃ martyāya karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:005.024c: grahīṣyāmi sruvaṃ yajñe śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_14_u:005.025c: bhāsaṃ ca na raviḥ kuryān matsatyaṃ vicaled yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:005.026c: praśasyainaṃ viveśātha svam eva bhavanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:006.001c: bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādaṃ maruttasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:006.002c: śrutvā marutto nṛpatir manyum āhārayat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:006.004a: bhagavan yan mayā pūrvam abhigamya tapodhana
GE07mbh_14_u:006.005a: tam ahaṃ yaṣṭum icchāmi saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhṛtāś ca me
GE07mbh_14_u:006.005c: yājyo 'smi bhavataḥ sādho tat prāpnuhi vidhatsva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:006.006a: na kāmaye yājayituṃ tvām ahaṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:006.006c: vṛto 'smi devarājena pratijñātaṃ ca tasya me
GE07mbh_14_u:006.007a: pitryam asmi tava kṣetraṃ bahu manye ca te bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:006.007c: na cāsmy ayājyatāṃ prāpto bhajamānaṃ bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_14_u:006.008c: marutta gaccha vā mā vā nivṛtto 'smy adya yājanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:006.009a: na tvāṃ yājayitāsmy adya vṛṇu tvaṃ yam ihecchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:006.009c: upādhyāyaṃ mahābāho yas te yajñaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:006.010a: evam uktas tu nṛpatir marutto vrīḍito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:006.010c: pratyāgacchac ca saṃvigno dadarśa pathi nāradam
GE07mbh_14_u:006.012c: kva gato 'si kuto vedam aprītisthānam āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:006.013a: śrotavyaṃ cen mayā rājan brūhi me pārthivarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:006.014a: evam ukto maruttas tu nāradena maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:006.015c: yajñārtham ṛtvijaṃ draṣṭuṃ sa ca māṃ nābhyanandata
GE07mbh_14_u:006.016a: pratyākhyātaś ca tenāhaṃ jīvituṃ nādya kāmaye
GE07mbh_14_u:006.016c: parityaktaś ca guruṇā dūṣitaś cāsmi nārada
GE07mbh_14_u:006.017a: evam uktas tu rājñā sa nāradaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:006.018a: rājann aṅgirasaḥ putraḥ saṃvarto nāma dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:006.018c: caṅkramīti diśaḥ sarvā digvāsā mohayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:006.019a: taṃ gaccha yadi yājyaṃ tvāṃ na vāñchati bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:006.020c: paśyeyaṃ kva nu saṃvartaṃ śaṃsa me vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:006.021a: kathaṃ ca tasmai varteyaṃ kathaṃ māṃ na parityajet
GE07mbh_14_u:006.021c: pratyākhyātaś ca tenāpi nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE07mbh_14_u:006.023a: tasyā dvāraṃ samāsādya nyasethāḥ kuṇapaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:006.023c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yo nivarteta sa saṃvarto mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:006.024a: taṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nugacchethā yatra gacchet sa vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:006.024c: tam ekānte samāsādya prāñjaliḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajeḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:006.025a: pṛcchet tvāṃ yadi kenāhaṃ tavākhyāta iti sma ha
GE07mbh_14_u:006.025c: brūyās tvaṃ nāradeneti saṃtapta iva śatruhan
GE07mbh_14_u:006.026c: śaṃsethā vahnim ārūḍhaṃ mām api tvam aśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_14_u:006.027a: sa tatheti pratiśrutya pūjayitvā ca nāradam
GE07mbh_14_u:006.028a: tatra gatvā yathoktaṃ sa puryā dvāre mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:006.028c: kuṇapaṃ sthāpayām āsa nāradasya vacaḥ smaran
GE07mbh_14_u:006.029a: yaugapadyena vipraś ca sa purīdvāram āviśat
GE07mbh_14_u:006.029c: tataḥ sa kuṇapaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā sa nyavartata
GE07mbh_14_u:006.030a: sa taṃ nivṛttam ālakṣya prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE07mbh_14_u:006.031a: sa enaṃ vijane dṛṣṭvā pāṃsubhiḥ kardamena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:006.031c: śleṣmaṇā cāpi rājānaṃ ṣṭhīvanaiś ca samākirat
GE07mbh_14_u:006.032c: anvagād eva tam ṛṣiṃ prāñjaliḥ saṃprasādayan
GE07mbh_14_u:007.001a: katham asmi tvayā jñātaḥ kena vā kathito 'smi te
GE07mbh_14_u:007.001c: etad ācakṣva me tattvam icchase cet priyaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:007.002a: satyaṃ te bruvataḥ sarve saṃpatsyante manorathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.002c: mithyā tu bruvato mūrdhā saptadhā te phaliṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:007.003a: nāradena bhavān mahyam ākhyāto hy aṭatā pathi
GE07mbh_14_u:007.003c: guruputro mameti tvaṃ tato me prītir uttamā
GE07mbh_14_u:007.004a: satyam etad bhavān āha sa māṃ jānāti satriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.004c: kathayasvaitad ekaṃ me kva nu saṃprati nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.006a: śrutvā tu pārthivasyaitat saṃvartaḥ parayā mudā
GE07mbh_14_u:007.006c: etāvad aham apy enaṃ kuryām iti tadābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:007.007a: tato maruttam unmatto vācā nirbhartsayann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:007.007c: rūkṣayā brāhmaṇo rājan punaḥ punar athābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:007.009a: bhrātā mama samarthaś ca vāsavena ca satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.009c: vartate yājane caiva tena karmāṇi kāraya
GE07mbh_14_u:007.010a: gṛhaṃ svaṃ caiva yājyāś ca sarvā gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.010c: pūrvajena mamākṣiptaṃ śarīraṃ varjitaṃ tv idam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.011a: nāhaṃ tenānanujñātas tvām āvikṣita karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:007.011c: yājayeyaṃ kathaṃ cid vai sa hi pūjyatamo mama
GE07mbh_14_u:007.012a: sa tvaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ gaccha tam anujñāpya cāvraja
GE07mbh_14_u:007.012c: tato 'haṃ yājayiṣye tvāṃ yadi yaṣṭum ihecchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:007.013a: bṛhaspatiṃ gataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ saṃvarta tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:007.013c: na māṃ kāmayate yājyam asau vāsavavāritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.014a: amaraṃ yājyam āsādya mām ṛṣe mā sma mānuṣam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.014d-0015_01: śakreṇa pratiṣiddho 'haṃ maruttaṃ mā sma yājayeḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.014d-0016_01: na māṃ rocayate rājyam ayājyaṃ mām amānuṣam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.015a: spardhate ca mayā vipra sadā vai sa hi pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.015c: evam astv iti cāpy ukto bhrātrā te balavṛtrahā
GE07mbh_14_u:007.016a: sa mām abhigataṃ premṇā yājyavan na bubhūṣati
GE07mbh_14_u:007.018a: na hi me vartate buddhir gantuṃ brahman bṛhaspatim
GE07mbh_14_u:007.019a: cikīrṣasi yathākāmaṃ sarvam etat tvayi dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.019c: yadi sarvān abhiprāyān kartāsi mama pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:007.021a: sthairyam atra kathaṃ te syāt sa tvaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_14_u:007.021c: kupitas tvāṃ na hīdānīṃ bhasma kuryāṃ sabāndhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.022a: yāvat tapet sahasrāṃśus tiṣṭheraṃś cāpi parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.022c: tāval lokān na labheyaṃ tyajeyaṃ saṃgataṃ yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:007.023a: mā cāpi śubhabuddhitvaṃ labheyam iha karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:007.023c: samyag jñāne vaiṣaye vā tyajeyaṃ saṃgataṃ yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:007.024a: āvikṣita śubhā buddhir dhīyatāṃ tava karmasu
GE07mbh_14_u:007.024c: yājanaṃ hi mamāpy evaṃ vartate tvayi pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:007.025a: saṃvidhāsye ca te rājann akṣayaṃ dravyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.026a: na tu me vartate buddhir dhane yājyeṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.026c: vipriyaṃ tu cikīrṣāmi bhrātuś cendrasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:007.027a: gamayiṣyāmi cendreṇa samatām api te dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:007.027c: priyaṃ ca te kariṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:008.001a: girer himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe muñjavān nāma parvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.001c: tapyate yatra bhagavāṃs tapo nityam umāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.004a: tatra rudrāś ca sādhyāś ca viśve 'tha vasavas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:008.004c: yamaś ca varuṇaś caiva kuberaś ca sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.005a: bhūtāni ca piśācāś ca nāsatyāv aśvināv api
GE07mbh_14_u:008.006a: ādityā marutaś caiva yātudhānāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.008a: na rūpaṃ dṛśyate tasya saṃsthānaṃ vā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:008.008c: nirdeṣṭuṃ prāṇibhiḥ kaiś cit prākṛtair māṃsalocanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.009a: noṣṇaṃ na śiśiraṃ tatra na vāyur na ca bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.009c: na jarā kṣutpipāse vā na mṛtyur na bhayaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:008.010a: tasya śailasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:008.011d-0018_01: tatra gatvā tvam anvāsya mahāyogeśvaraṃ śivam
GE07mbh_14_u:008.011d-0018_02: kuru praṇāmaṃ rājarṣe bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.012a: tasmai bhagavate kṛtvā namaḥ śarvāya vedhase
GE07mbh_14_u:008.012b-0019_01: ebhis tvaṃ nāmabhir devaṃ sarvavidyādhipaṃ stuhi
GE07mbh_14_u:008.013c: tryakṣṇe pūṣṇo dantabhide vāmanāya śivāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:008.019a: paśūnāṃ pataye caiva bhūtānāṃ pataye tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:008.027a: īśānaṃ śaṃkaraṃ sarvaṃ śivaṃ viśveśvaraṃ bhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:008.028c: ugraṃ sthāṇuṃ śivaṃ ghoraṃ śarvaṃ gaurīśam īśvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:008.029a: śitikaṇṭham ajaṃ śukraṃ pṛthuṃ pṛthuharaṃ haram
GE07mbh_14_u:008.030d-0024_04: praṇamya prāñjaliḥ śarvaṃ prayāmi śaraṇaṃ haram
GE07mbh_14_u:008.030d-0024_07: yasya nityaṃ viduḥ sthānaṃ mokṣam adhyātmacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.030d-0024_11: asṛjad yas tu bhūtādīn sapta lokān sanātanān
GE07mbh_14_u:008.030d-0024_12: sthitaḥ satyopari sthāṇus taṃ prapadye sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:008.030d-0024_13: bhaktānāṃ sulabhaṃ taṃ hi durlabhaṃ dūrapātinām
GE07mbh_14_u:008.030d-0024_14: adūrastham ajaṃ devaṃ prakṛteḥ parataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:008.031a: evaṃ kṛtvā namas tasmai mahādevāya raṃhase
GE07mbh_14_u:008.031d-0025_01: labhante gāṇapatyaṃ ca tadekāgrā hi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.031d-0025_02: kiṃ punaḥ svarṇabhāṇḍāni tasmāt tvaṃ gaccha mā ciram
GE07mbh_14_u:008.031d-0025_03: mahattaraṃ hi te lābhaṃ hastyaśvoṣṭrādibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:008.031e: suvarṇam āhariṣyantas tatra gacchantu te narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.032a: ity uktaḥ sa vacas tasya cakre kāraṃdhamātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.032e: sauvarṇāni ca bhāṇḍāni saṃcakrus tatra śilpinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.033a: bṛhaspatis tu tāṃ śrutvā maruttasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:008.033c: samṛddhim ati devebhyaḥ saṃtāpam akarod bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:008.034a: sa tapyamāno vaivarṇyaṃ kṛśatvaṃ cāgamat param
GE07mbh_14_u:008.034c: bhaviṣyati hi me śatruḥ saṃvarto vasumān iti
GE07mbh_14_u:009.001a: kaccit sukhaṃ svapiṣi tvaṃ bṛhaspate; kaccin manojñāḥ paricārakās te
GE07mbh_14_u:009.001c: kaccid devānāṃ sukhakāmo 'si vipra; kaccid devās tvāṃ paripālayanti
GE07mbh_14_u:009.002a: sukhaṃ śaye 'haṃ śayane mahendra; tathā manojñāḥ paricārakā me
GE07mbh_14_u:009.002c: tathā devānāṃ sukhakāmo 'smi śakra; devāś ca māṃ subhṛśaṃ pālayanti
GE07mbh_14_u:009.003a: kuto duḥkhaṃ mānasaṃ dehajaṃ vā; pāṇḍur vivarṇaś ca kutas tvam adya
GE07mbh_14_u:009.003c: ācakṣva me tad dvija yāvad etān; nihanmi sarvāṃs tava duḥkhakartṝn
GE07mbh_14_u:009.004c: taṃ saṃvarto yājayiteti me śrutaṃ; tad icchāmi na sa taṃ yājayeta
GE07mbh_14_u:009.005a: sarvān kāmān anujāto 'si vipra; yas tvaṃ devānāṃ mantrayase purodhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.005c: ubhau ca te janmamṛtyū vyatītau; kiṃ saṃvartas tava kartādya vipra
GE07mbh_14_u:009.006a: devaiḥ saha tvam asurān saṃpraṇudya; jighāṃsase 'dyāpy uta sānubandhān
GE07mbh_14_u:009.006c: yaṃ yaṃ samṛddhaṃ paśyasi tatra tatra; duḥkhaṃ sapatneṣu samṛddhabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.007a: ato 'smi devendra vivarṇarūpaḥ; sapatno me vardhate tan niśamya
GE07mbh_14_u:009.007c: sarvopāyair maghavan saṃniyaccha; saṃvartaṃ vā pārthivaṃ vā maruttam
GE07mbh_14_u:009.008a: ehi gaccha prahito jātavedo; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:009.008c: ayaṃ vai tvā yājayitā bṛhaspatis; tathāmaraṃ caiva kariṣyatīti
GE07mbh_14_u:009.009a: ayaṃ gacchāmi tava śakrādya dūto; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.009c: vācaṃ satyāṃ puruhūtasya kartuṃ; bṛhaspateś cāpacitiṃ cikīrṣuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.010a: tataḥ prāyād dhūmaketur mahātmā; vanaspatīn vīrudhaś cāvamṛdnan
GE07mbh_14_u:009.010c: kāmād dhimānte parivartamānaḥ; kāṣṭhātigo mātariśveva nardan
GE07mbh_14_u:009.011a: āścaryam adya paśyāmi rūpiṇaṃ vahnim āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:009.011c: āsanaṃ salilaṃ pādyaṃ gāṃ copānaya vai mune
GE07mbh_14_u:009.012c: indreṇa tu samādiṣṭaṃ viddhi māṃ dūtam āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:009.013a: kaccic chrīmān devarājaḥ sukhī ca; kaccic cāsmān prīyate dhūmaketo
GE07mbh_14_u:009.013c: kaccid devāś cāsya vaśe yathāvat; tad brūhi tvaṃ mama kārtsnyena deva
GE07mbh_14_u:009.014a: śakro bhṛśaṃ susukhī pārthivendra; prītiṃ cecchaty ajarāṃ vai tvayā saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.014c: devāś ca sarve vaśagās tasya rājan; saṃdeśaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu me devarājñaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.015a: yadarthaṃ māṃ prāhiṇot tvatsakāśaṃ; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:009.015c: ayaṃ gurur yājayitā nṛpa tvāṃ; martyaṃ santam amaraṃ tvāṃ karotu
GE07mbh_14_u:009.016a: saṃvarto 'yaṃ yājayitā dvijo me; bṛhaspater añjalir eṣa tasya
GE07mbh_14_u:009.016c: nāsau devaṃ yājayitvā mahendraṃ; martyaṃ santaṃ yājayann adya śobhet
GE07mbh_14_u:009.017a: ye vai lokā devaloke mahāntaḥ; saṃprāpsyase tān devarājaprasādāt
GE07mbh_14_u:009.017c: tvāṃ ced asau yājayed vai bṛhaspatir; nūnaṃ svargaṃ tvaṃ jayeḥ kīrtiyuktaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.018a: tathā lokā mānuṣā ye ca divyāḥ; prajāpateś cāpi ye vai mahāntaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.018c: te te jitā devarājyaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ; bṛhaspatiś ced yājayet tvāṃ narendra
GE07mbh_14_u:009.019a: māsmān evaṃ tvaṃ punar āgāḥ kathaṃ cid; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:009.019c: mā tvāṃ dhakṣye cakṣuṣā dāruṇena; saṃkruddho 'haṃ pāvaka tan nibodha
GE07mbh_14_u:009.020a: tato devān agamad dhūmaketur; dāhād bhīto vyathito 'śvatthaparṇavat
GE07mbh_14_u:009.020c: taṃ vai dṛṣṭvā prāha śakro mahātmā; bṛhaspateḥ saṃnidhau havyavāham
GE07mbh_14_u:009.021a: yat tvaṃ gataḥ prahito jātavedo; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:009.021c: tat kiṃ prāha sa nṛpo yakṣyamāṇaḥ; kaccid vacaḥ pratigṛhṇāti tac ca
GE07mbh_14_u:009.022a: na te vācaṃ rocayate marutto; bṛhaspater añjaliṃ prāhiṇot saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.022c: saṃvarto māṃ yājayitety abhīkṣṇaṃ; punaḥ punaḥ sa mayā procyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.023a: uvācedaṃ mānuṣā ye ca divyāḥ; prajāpater ye ca lokā mahāntaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.023c: tāṃś cel labheyaṃ saṃvidaṃ tena kṛtvā; tathāpi neccheyam iti pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.024a: punar bhavān pārthivaṃ taṃ sametya; vākyaṃ madīyaṃ prāpaya svārthayuktam
GE07mbh_14_u:009.024c: punar yady ukto na kariṣyate vacas; tato vajraṃ saṃprahartāsmi tasmai
GE07mbh_14_u:009.025a: gandharvarāḍ yātv ayaṃ tatra dūto; bibhemy ahaṃ vāsava tatra gantum
GE07mbh_14_u:009.025c: saṃrabdho mām abravīt tīkṣṇaroṣaḥ; saṃvarto vākyaṃ caritabrahmacaryaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.026a: yady āgaccheḥ punar evaṃ kathaṃ cid; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:009.026c: daheyaṃ tvāṃ cakṣuṣā dāruṇena; saṃkruddha ity etad avaihi śakra
GE07mbh_14_u:009.027a: tvam evānyān dahase jātavedo; na hi tvad anyo vidyate bhasmakartā
GE07mbh_14_u:009.027c: tvatsaṃsparśāt sarvaloko bibhety; aśraddheyaṃ vadase havyavāha
GE07mbh_14_u:009.028a: divaṃ devendra pṛthivīṃ caiva sarvāṃ; saṃveṣṭayes tvaṃ svabalenaiva śakra
GE07mbh_14_u:009.028c: evaṃvidhasyeha satas tavāsau; kathaṃ vṛtras tridivaṃ prāg jahāra
GE07mbh_14_u:009.029a: na caṇḍikā jaṅgamā no kareṇur; na vārisomaṃ prapibāmi vahne
GE07mbh_14_u:009.029c: na durbale vai visṛjāmi vajraṃ; ko me 'sukhāya praharen manuṣyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.030a: pravrājayeyaṃ kālakeyān pṛthivyām; apākarṣaṃ dānavān antarikṣāt
GE07mbh_14_u:009.030c: divaḥ prahrādam avasānam ānayaṃ; ko me 'sukhāya prahareta martyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.031a: yatra śaryātiṃ cyavano yājayiṣyan; sahāśvibhyāṃ somam agṛhṇad ekaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.031c: taṃ tvaṃ kruddhaḥ pratyaṣedhīḥ purastāc; charyātiyajñaṃ smara taṃ mahendra
GE07mbh_14_u:009.032a: vajraṃ gṛhītvā ca puraṃdara tvaṃ; saṃprāhārṣīś cyavanasyātighoram
GE07mbh_14_u:009.032c: sa te vipraḥ saha vajreṇa bāhum; apāgṛhṇāt tapasā jātamanyuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.033a: tato roṣāt sarvato ghorarūpaṃ; sapatnaṃ te janayām āsa bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.033c: madaṃ nāmāsuraṃ viśvarūpaṃ; yaṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā cakṣuṣī saṃnyamīlaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.034a: hanur ekā jagatīsthā tathaikā; divaṃ gatā mahato dānavasya
GE07mbh_14_u:009.034c: sahasraṃ dantānāṃ śatayojanānāṃ; sutīkṣṇānāṃ ghorarūpaṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_14_u:009.035a: vṛttāḥ sthūlā rajatastambhavarṇā; daṃṣṭrāś catasro dve śate yojanānām
GE07mbh_14_u:009.035c: sa tvāṃ dantān vidaśann abhyadhāvaj; jighāṃsayā śūlam udyamya ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:009.036a: apaśyas tvaṃ taṃ tadā ghorarūpaṃ; sarve tv anye dadṛśur darśanīyam
GE07mbh_14_u:009.036c: yasmād bhītaḥ prāñjalis tvaṃ maharṣim; āgacchethāḥ śaraṇaṃ dānavaghna
GE07mbh_14_u:009.037a: kṣatrād evaṃ brahmabalaṃ garīyo; na brahmataḥ kiṃ cid anyad garīyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:009.037c: so 'haṃ jānan brahmatejo yathāvan; na saṃvartaṃ gantum icchāmi śakra
GE07mbh_14_u:010.001a: evam etad brahmabalaṃ garīyo; na brahmataḥ kiṃ cid anyad garīyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.001c: āvikṣitasya tu balaṃ na mṛṣye; vajram asmai prahariṣyāmi ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:010.002a: dhṛtarāṣṭra prahito gaccha maruttaṃ; saṃvartena sahitaṃ taṃ vadasva
GE07mbh_14_u:010.002c: bṛhaspatiṃ tvam upaśikṣasva rājan; vajraṃ vā te prahariṣyāmi ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:010.003a: tato gatvā dhṛtarāṣṭro narendraṃ; provācedaṃ vacanaṃ vāsavasya
GE07mbh_14_u:010.003c: gandharvaṃ māṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ nibodha; tvām āgataṃ vaktukāmaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_14_u:010.004a: aindraṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu me rājasiṃha; yat prāha lokādhipatir mahātmā
GE07mbh_14_u:010.004c: bṛhaspatiṃ yājakaṃ tvaṃ vṛṇīṣva; vajraṃ vā te prahariṣyāmi ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:010.004e: vacaś ced etan na kariṣyase me; prāhaitad etāvad acintyakarmā
GE07mbh_14_u:010.005a: tvaṃ caivaitad vettha puraṃdaraś ca; viśvedevā vasavaś cāśvinau ca
GE07mbh_14_u:010.005c: mitradrohe niṣkṛtir vai yathaiva; nāstīti lokeṣu sadaiva vādaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.006a: bṛhaspatir yājayitā mahendraṃ; devaśreṣṭhaṃ vajrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_14_u:010.006c: saṃvarto māṃ yājayitādya rājan; na te vākyaṃ tasya vā rocayāmi
GE07mbh_14_u:010.007a: ghoro nādaḥ śrūyate vāsavasya; nabhastale garjato
GE07mbh_14_u:010.007c: vyaktaṃ vajraṃ mokṣyate te mahendraḥ; kṣemaṃ rājaṃś cintyatām eṣa kālaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.008a: ity evam ukto dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa rājā; śrutvā nādaṃ nadato vāsavasya
GE07mbh_14_u:010.008c: taponityaṃ dharmavidāṃ variṣṭhaṃ; saṃvartaṃ taṃ jñāpayām āsa kāryam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.009a: imam aśmānaṃ plavamānam ārād; adhvā dūraṃ tena na dṛśyate 'dya
GE07mbh_14_u:010.009c: prapadye 'haṃ śarma viprendra tvattaḥ; prayaccha tasmād abhayaṃ vipramukhya
GE07mbh_14_u:010.010a: ayam āyāti vai vajrī diśo vidyotayan daśa
GE07mbh_14_u:010.010c: amānuṣeṇa ghoreṇa sadasyās trāsitā hi naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.011a: bhayaṃ śakrād vyetu te rājasiṃha; praṇotsye 'haṃ bhayam etat sughoram
GE07mbh_14_u:010.011c: saṃstambhinyā vidyayā kṣipram eva; mā bhais tvam asmād bhava cāpi pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.012a: ahaṃ saṃstambhayiṣyāmi mā bhais tvaṃ śakrato nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:010.012c: sarveṣām eva devānāṃ kṣapitāny āyudhāni me
GE07mbh_14_u:010.013a: diśo vajraṃ vrajatāṃ vāyur etu; varṣaṃ bhūtvā nipatatu kānaneṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:010.013c: āpaḥ plavantv antarikṣe vṛthā ca; saudāminī dṛśyatāṃ mā bibhas tvam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.014a: atho vahnis trātu vā sarvatas te; kāmaṃ varṣaṃ varṣatu vāsavo vā
GE07mbh_14_u:010.014c: vajraṃ tathā sthāpayatāṃ ca vāyur; mahāghoraṃ plavamānaṃ jalaughaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.015a: ghoraḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate vai mahāsvano; vajrasyaiṣa sahito mārutena
GE07mbh_14_u:010.015c: ātmā hi me pravyathate muhur muhur; na me svāsthyaṃ jāyate cādya vipra
GE07mbh_14_u:010.016a: vajrād ugrād vyetu bhayaṃ tavādya; vāto bhūtvā hanmi narendra vajram
GE07mbh_14_u:010.016c: bhayaṃ tyaktvā varam anyaṃ vṛṇīṣva; kaṃ te kāmaṃ tapasā sādhayāmi
GE07mbh_14_u:010.017a: indraḥ sākṣāt sahasābhyetu vipra; havir yajñe pratigṛhṇātu caiva
GE07mbh_14_u:010.017c: svaṃ svaṃ dhiṣṇyaṃ caiva juṣantu devāḥ; sutaṃ somaṃ pratigṛhṇantu caiva
GE07mbh_14_u:010.018a: ayam indro haribhir āyāti rājan; devaiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaḥ somapīthī
GE07mbh_14_u:010.018c: mantrāhūto yajñam imaṃ mayādya; paśyasvainaṃ mantravisrastakāyam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.019a: tato devaiḥ sahito devarājo; rathe yuktvā tān harīn vājimukhyān
GE07mbh_14_u:010.019c: āyād yajñam adhi rājñaḥ pipāsur; āvikṣitasyāprameyasya somam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.020a: tam āyāntaṃ sahitaṃ devasaṃghaiḥ; pratyudyayau sapurodhā maruttaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.020c: cakre pūjāṃ devarājāya cāgryāṃ; yathāśāstraṃ vidhivat prīyamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.021a: svāgataṃ te puruhūteha vidvan; yajño 'dyāyaṃ saṃnihite tvayīndra
GE07mbh_14_u:010.021c: śośubhyate balavṛtraghna bhūyaḥ; pibasva somaṃ sutam udyataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:010.022a: śivena māṃ paśya namaś ca te 'stu; prāpto yajñaḥ saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ me
GE07mbh_14_u:010.022c: ayaṃ yajñaṃ kurute me surendra; bṛhaspater avaro janmanā yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.023a: jānāmi te gurum enaṃ tapodhanaṃ; bṛhaspater anujaṃ tigmatejasam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.023c: yasyāhvānād āgato 'haṃ narendra; prītir me 'dya tvayi manuḥ pranaṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.024a: yadi prītas tvam asi vai devarāja; tasmāt svayaṃ śādhi yajñe vidhānam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.024c: svayaṃ sarvān kuru mārgān surendra; jānātv ayaṃ sarvalokaś ca deva
GE07mbh_14_u:010.025a: evam uktas tv āṅgirasena śakraḥ; samādideśa svayam eva devān
GE07mbh_14_u:010.025c: sabhāḥ kriyantām āvasathāś ca mukhyāḥ; sahasraśaś citrabhaumāḥ samṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.026a: kḷptasthūṇāḥ kurutārohaṇāni; gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ ca śīghram
GE07mbh_14_u:010.026c: yeṣu nṛtyerann apsarasaḥ sahasraśaḥ; svargoddeśaḥ kriyatāṃ yajñavāṭaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.027a: ity uktās te cakrur āśu pratītā; divaukasaḥ śakravākyān narendra
GE07mbh_14_u:010.027c: tato vākyaṃ prāha rājānam indraḥ; prīto rājan pūjayāno maruttam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.028a: eṣa tvayāham iha rājan sametya; ye cāpy anye tava pūrve narendrāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.028c: sarvāś cānyā devatāḥ prīyamāṇā; havis tubhyaṃ pratigṛhṇantu rājan
GE07mbh_14_u:010.029a: āgneyaṃ vai lohitam ālabhantāṃ; vaiśvadevaṃ bahurūpaṃ virājan
GE07mbh_14_u:010.029c: nīlaṃ cokṣāṇaṃ medhyam abhyālabhantāṃ; calac chiśnaṃ matpradiṣṭaṃ dvijendrāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.030a: tato yajño vavṛdhe tasya rājño; yatra devāḥ svayam annāni jahruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.030c: yasmiñ śakro brāhmaṇaiḥ pūjyamānaḥ; sadasyo 'bhūd dharimān devarājaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.031a: tataḥ saṃvartaś cityagato mahātmā; yathā vahniḥ prajvalito dvitīyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.031c: havīṃṣy uccair āhvayan devasaṃghāñ; juhāvāgnau mantravat supratītaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.032a: tataḥ pītvā balabhit somam agryaṃ; ye cāpy anye somapā vai divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.032c: sarve 'nujñātāḥ prayayuḥ pārthivena; yathājoṣaṃ tarpitāḥ prītimantaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.033a: tato rājā jātarūpasya rāśīn; pade pade kārayām āsa hṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.033c: dvijātibhyo visṛjan bhūri vittaṃ; rarāja vitteśa ivārihantā
GE07mbh_14_u:010.034a: tato vittaṃ vividhaṃ saṃnidhāya; yathotsāhaṃ kārayitvā ca kośam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.034c: anujñāto guruṇā saṃnivṛtya; śaśāsa gām akhilāṃ sāgarāntām
GE07mbh_14_u:010.035a: evaṃguṇaḥ saṃbabhūveha rājā; yasya kratau tat suvarṇaṃ prabhūtam
GE07mbh_14_u:010.035c: tat tvaṃ samādāya narendra vittaṃ; yajasva devāṃs tarpayāno vidhānaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:010.036a: tato rājā pāṇḍavo hṛṣṭarūpaḥ; śrutvā vākyaṃ satyavatyāḥ sutasya
GE07mbh_14_u:010.036c: manaś cakre tena vittena yaṣṭuṃ; tato 'mātyair mantrayām āsa bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:011.004a: sarvaṃ jihmaṃ mṛtyupadam ārjavaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:011.005a: naiva te niṣṭhitaṃ karma naiva te śatravo jitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:011.006c: indrasya saha vṛtreṇa yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_14_u:011.007a: vṛtreṇa pṛthivī vyāptā purā kila narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:011.007c: dṛṣṭvā sa pṛthivīṃ vyāptāṃ gandhasya viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:011.008c: vṛtrasya sa tataḥ kruddho vajraṃ ghoram avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_14_u:011.010a: vyāptāsv athāpsu vṛtreṇa rase ca viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:011.011c: viveśa sahasā jyotir jagrāha viṣayaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:011.012a: vyāpte jyotiṣi vṛtreṇa rūpe 'tha viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:011.013c: viveśa sahasā vāyuṃ jagrāha viṣayaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:011.014a: vyāpte vāyau tu vṛtreṇa sparśe 'tha viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:011.016a: ākāśe vṛtrabhūte ca śabde ca viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:011.017c: viveśa sahasā śakraṃ jagrāha viṣayaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:011.020c: ṛṣibhiś ca mama proktaṃ tan nibodha narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:012.001a: dvividho jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīro mānasas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:012.002a: śarīre jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīro nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:012.002c: mānaso jāyate vyādhir manasy eveti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:012.003a: śītoṣṇe caiva vāyuś ca guṇā rājañ śarīrajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:012.003c: teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ cet tad āhuḥ svasthalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:012.003e: uṣṇena bādhyate śītaṃ śītenoṣṇaṃ ca bādhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:012.003f-0029_01: ubhābhyāṃ badhyate vāyur vidhānam idam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:012.004a: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś ceti trayas tv ātmaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:012.004c: teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ cet tad āhuḥ svasthalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:012.005a: harṣeṇa bādhyate śoko harṣaḥ śokena bādhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:012.005b-0030_01: ubhābhyāṃ vadhyate moho vidhānam idam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:012.005c: kaś cid duḥkhe vartamānaḥ sukhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:012.005e: kaś cit sukhe vartamāno duḥkhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:012.006a: sa tvaṃ na duḥkhī duḥkhasya na sukhī susukhasya vā
GE07mbh_14_u:012.006c: smartum icchasi kaunteya diṣṭaṃ hi balavattaram
GE07mbh_14_u:012.007a: atha vā te svabhāvo 'yaṃ yena pārthāvakṛṣyase
GE07mbh_14_u:012.007e: miṣatāṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ na tat saṃsmartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:012.008a: pravrājanaṃ ca nagarād ajinaiś ca vivāsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:012.008c: mahāraṇyanivāsaś ca na tasya smartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:012.009c: saindhavāc ca parikleśo na tasya smartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:012.010c: yājñasenyās tadā pārtha na tasya smartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:012.011a: yac ca te droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ yuddham āsīd ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:012.011c: manasaikena yoddhavyaṃ tat te yuddham upasthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:012.012c: yatra naiva śaraiḥ kāryaṃ na bhṛtyair na ca bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:012.012e: ātmanaikena yoddhavyaṃ tat te yuddham upasthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:012.013a: tasminn anirjite yuddhe kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:012.013c: etaj jñātvā tu kaunteya kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:012.014a: etāṃ buddhiṃ viniścitya bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:013.001a: na bāhyaṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:013.001c: śārīraṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_14_u:013.002c: yo dharmo yat sukhaṃ caiva dviṣatām astu tat tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:013.003a: dvyakṣaras tu bhaven mṛtyus tryakṣaraṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:013.003c: mameti dvyakṣaro mṛtyur na mameti ca śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:013.004a: brahma mṛtyuś ca tau rājann ātmany eva vyavasthitau
GE07mbh_14_u:013.006c: mamatvaṃ yasya naiva syāt kiṃ tayā sa kariṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:013.007a: atha vā vasataḥ pārtha vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.007c: mamatā yasya dravyeṣu mṛtyor āsye sa vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:013.008c: yan na paśyati tad bhūtaṃ mucyate sa mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:013.009a: kāmātmānaṃ na praśaṃsanti loke; na cākāmāt kā cid asti pravṛttiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.009c: dānaṃ hi vedādhyayanaṃ tapaś ca; kāmena karmāṇi ca vaidikāni
GE07mbh_14_u:013.010a: vrataṃ yajñān niyamān dhyānayogān; kāmena yo nārabhate viditvā
GE07mbh_14_u:013.010c: yad yad dhy ayaṃ kāmayate sa dharmo; na yo dharmo niyamas tasya mūlam
GE07mbh_14_u:013.012a: nāhaṃ śakyo 'nupāyena hantuṃ bhūtena kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:013.012c: yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ jñātvā praharaṇe balam
GE07mbh_14_u:013.012e: tasya tasmin praharaṇe punaḥ prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:013.013a: yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.013c: jaṅgameṣv iva karmātmā punaḥ prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:013.014a: yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ vedair vedāntasādhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.014c: sthāvareṣv iva śāntātmā tasya prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:013.015a: yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ dhṛtyā satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.015c: bhāvo bhavāmi tasyāhaṃ sa ca māṃ nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:013.016a: yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ tapasā saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.016c: tatas tapasi tasyātha punaḥ prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:013.017a: yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ mokṣam āsthāya paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.017c: tasya mokṣaratisthasya nṛtyāmi ca hasāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:013.018a: tasmāt tvam api taṃ kāmaṃ yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.018c: dharmaṃ kuru mahārāja tatra te sa bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:013.019c: anyaiś ca vividhair yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.020a: mā te vyathāstu nihatān bandhūn vīkṣya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.020c: na śakyās te punar draṣṭuṃ ye hatāsmin raṇājire
GE07mbh_14_u:013.021a: sa tvam iṣṭvā mahāyajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:013.021c: loke kīrtiṃ parāṃ prāpya gatim agryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:014.001a: evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair munibhis tais tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.004c: vyajahāc chokajaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtāpaṃ caiva mānasam
GE07mbh_14_u:014.005a: arcayām āsa devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.005c: kṛtvātha pretakāryāṇi bandhūnāṃ sa punar nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.006c: vyāsaṃ ca nāradaṃ caiva tāṃś cānyān abravīn nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.007c: na sūkṣmam api me kiṃ cid vyalīkam iha vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:014.008a: arthaś ca sumahān prāpto yena yakṣyāmi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.009b-0032_01: tathā vidhatsva viprarṣe tvayyāyattaḥ sa me kratuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.009c: bahvāścaryo hi deśaḥ sa śrūyate dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:014.010a: tathā bhagavatā citraṃ kalyāṇaṃ bahu bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_14_u:014.011a: nābhāgadheyaḥ puruṣaḥ kaś cid evaṃvidhān gurūn
GE07mbh_14_u:014.012a: evam uktās tu te rājñā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.013c: evaṃ nātimahān kālaḥ sa teṣām abhyavartata
GE07mbh_14_u:014.016a: tato dattvā bahu dhanaṃ viprebhyaḥ pāṇḍavarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017c: anvaśād vai sa dharmātmā pṛthivīṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0001: yathā manur mahārāja rāmo dāśarathir yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0003: nādharmyam abhavat tatra sarvo dharmarucir janaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0007: vavarṣa bhagavān devaḥ kāle deśe yathepsitam
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0008: nirāmayaṃ jagad abhūt kṣutpipāse na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0009: ādhir nāsti manuṣyāṇāṃ vyasane nābhavan matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0015: āmuṣmikaṃ bhayaṃ nāsti aihikaṃ kṛtam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0017: babhūva sukham evātra tad viśiṣṭataraṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0020: pumāṃsaḥ puṇyaśīlāḍhyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ dharmam anuvratāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0021: sukhinaḥ sūkṣmam apy eno nākurvanta kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0022: sarve narāś ca nāryaś ca satataṃ priyavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0028: icchā na jāyate 'nyatra varṇeṣu ca na saṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0031: anyonyam api cānyeṣu na bādhante vayāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0037: atīva madhuraḥ śabdaḥ sparśaś cātisukho rasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0038: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭikṣamaṃ ramyaṃ manojñaṃ gandham udbabhau
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0044: tathāvidho 'pi rājarṣis tad vṛttam abhavad bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0049: teṣu śāsatsu pṛthivīm ṛtavaḥ svaguṇair babhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0052: kāmadhug dhenuvad bhogān phalati sma sahasradhā
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0053: manvādibhiḥ kṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ maryādā mānaveṣu yāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0054: anatikramya tāḥ sarvāḥ kuleṣu samayāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0058: rājavṛttir hi sā śaśvad dharmiṣṭhābhūn mahītale
GE07mbh_14_u:014.017d-001_0060: evaṃ bhāratavarṣaṃ svaṃ rājā svargaṃ surendravat
GE07mbh_14_u:015.001a: vijite pāṇḍaveyais tu praśānte ca dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:015.002a: vijite pāṇḍaveyais tu praśānte ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:015.003a: vijahrāte mudā yuktau divi deveśvarāv iva
GE07mbh_14_u:015.003c: tau vaneṣu vicitreṣu parvatānāṃ ca sānuṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:015.005c: praviśya tāṃ sabhāṃ ramyāṃ vijahrāte ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:015.006a: tatra yuddhakathāś citrāḥ parikleśāṃś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:015.007a: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca vaṃśāṃs tāv āhatus tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:015.008c: niścayajñaḥ sa pārthāya kathayām āsa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.009c: kathābhiḥ śamayām āsa pārthaṃ śaurir janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.010a: sa tam āśvāsya vidhivad vidhānajño mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.011a: tataḥ kathānte govindo guḍākeśam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:015.011c: sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā hetuyuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.014a: dharmeṇa rājñā dharmajña prāptaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_14_u:015.014c: dharmeṇa nihataḥ saṃkhye sa ca rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.016c: bhuṅkte dharmasuto rājā tvayā guptaḥ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:015.017a: rame cāhaṃ tvayā sārdham araṇyeṣv api pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:015.017c: kim u yatra jano 'yaṃ vai pṛthā cāmitrakarśana
GE07mbh_14_u:015.018a: yatra dharmasuto rājā yatra bhīmo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.018c: yatra mādravatīputrau ratis tatra parā mama
GE07mbh_14_u:015.020a: kālo mahāṃs tv atīto me śūraputram apaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.021a: so 'haṃ gantum abhīpsāmi purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:015.022a: ukto bahuvidhaṃ rājā tatra tatra yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.022c: sa ha bhīṣmeṇa yady uktam asmābhiḥ śokakārite
GE07mbh_14_u:015.023a: śiṣṭo yudhiṣṭhiro 'smābhiḥ śāstā sann api pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.023c: tena tac ca vacaḥ samyag gṛhītaṃ sumahātmanā
GE07mbh_14_u:015.024c: satyaṃ dharmo matiś cāgryā sthitiś ca satataṃ sthirā
GE07mbh_14_u:015.025a: tad gatvā taṃ mahātmānaṃ yadi te rocate 'rjuna
GE07mbh_14_u:015.026a: na hi tasyāpriyaṃ kuryāṃ prāṇatyāge 'py upasthite
GE07mbh_14_u:015.026c: kuto gantuṃ mahābāho purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:015.027a: sarvaṃ tv idam ahaṃ pārtha tvatprītihitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_14_u:015.027c: bravīmi satyaṃ kauravya na mithyaitat kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:015.028a: prayojanaṃ ca nirvṛttam iha vāse mamārjuna
GE07mbh_14_u:015.029a: pṛthivī ca vaśe tāta dharmaputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.030a: dharmeṇa rājā dharmajñaḥ pātu sarvāṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_14_u:015.031a: tan mayā saha gatvādya rājānaṃ kuruvardhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:015.032a: idaṃ śarīraṃ vasu yac ca me gṛhe; niveditaṃ pārtha sadā yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_14_u:015.032c: priyaś ca mānyaś ca hi me yudhiṣṭhiraḥ; sadā kurūṇām adhipo mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.033a: prayojanaṃ cāpi nivāsakāraṇe; na vidyate me tvad ṛte mahābhuja
GE07mbh_14_u:015.033c: sthitā hi pṛthvī tava pārtha śāsane; guroḥ suvṛttasya yudhiṣṭhirasya ha
GE07mbh_14_u:015.034a: itīdam uktaṃ sa tadā mahātmanā; janārdanenāmitavikramo 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:015.034c: tatheti kṛcchrād iva vācam īrayaj; janārdanaṃ saṃpratipūjya pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:016.001c: keśavārjunayoḥ kā nu kathā samabhavad dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:016.002a: kṛṣṇena sahitaḥ pārthaḥ svarājyaṃ prāpya kevalam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.002c: tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ ramyāyāṃ vijahāra mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.003a: tataḥ kaṃ cit sabhoddeśaṃ svargoddeśasamaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:016.004c: nirīkṣya tāṃ sabhāṃ ramyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:016.005c: māhātmyaṃ devakīmātas tac ca te rūpam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:016.006a: yat tu tad bhavatā proktaṃ tadā keśava sauhṛdāt
GE07mbh_14_u:016.006c: tat sarvaṃ puruṣavyāghra naṣṭaṃ me naṣṭacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.007a: mama kautūhalaṃ tv asti teṣv artheṣu punaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:016.007c: bhavāṃś ca dvārakāṃ gantā nacirād iva mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:016.008a: evam uktas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ phalgunaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_14_u:016.009a: śrāvitas tvaṃ mayā guhyaṃ jñāpitaś ca sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.009c: dharmaṃ svarūpiṇaṃ pārtha sarvalokāṃś ca śāśvatān
GE07mbh_14_u:016.010a: abuddhvā yan na gṛhṇīthās tan me sumahad apriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.010b-0034_01: na ca sādya punar bhūyaḥ smṛtir me saṃbhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:016.010d-0035_01: na ca śakyaḥ punar vaktum aśeṣeṇa dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:016.011a: sa hi dharmaḥ suparyāpto brahmaṇaḥ padavedane
GE07mbh_14_u:016.011c: na śakyaṃ tan mayā bhūyas tathā vaktum aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.012a: paraṃ hi brahma kathitaṃ yogayuktena tan mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:016.012c: itihāsaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tasminn arthe purātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.013a: yathā tāṃ buddhim āsthāya gatim agryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:016.013c: śṛṇu dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha gadataḥ sarvam eva me
GE07mbh_14_u:016.014a: āgacchad brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cit svargalokād ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:016.014d-0036_01: paripṛṣṭaś ca sa tadā yad āha dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.015a: asmābhiḥ paripṛṣṭaś ca yad āha bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:016.018a: kaś cid vipras tapoyuktaḥ kāśyapo dharmavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.018c: āsasāda dvijaṃ kaṃ cid dharmāṇām āgatāgamam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.021c: dīpyamānaṃ śriyā brāhmyā kramamāṇaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.023a: saṃbhāṣamāṇam ekānte samāsīnaṃ ca taiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:016.023c: yadṛcchayā ca gacchantam asaktaṃ pavanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:016.024a: taṃ samāsādya medhāvī sa tadā dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.025a: vismitaś cādbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāśyapas taṃ dvijottamam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.027a: tasmai tuṣṭaḥ sa śiṣyāya prasanno 'thābravīd guruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.027c: siddhiṃ parām abhiprekṣya śṛṇu tan me janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:016.028a: vividhaiḥ karmabhis tāta puṇyayogaiś ca kevalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.028c: gacchantīha gatiṃ martyā devaloke 'pi ca sthitim
GE07mbh_14_u:016.029a: na kva cit sukham atyantaṃ na kva cic chāśvatī sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.029c: sthānāc ca mahato bhraṃśo duḥkhalabdhāt punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.030a: aśubhā gatayaḥ prāptāḥ kaṣṭā me pāpasevanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:016.031a: punaḥ punaś ca maraṇaṃ janma caiva punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.031c: āhārā vividhā bhuktāḥ pītā nānāvidhāḥ stanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.032a: mātaro vividhā dṛṣṭāḥ pitaraś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.032c: sukhāni ca vicitrāṇi duḥkhāni ca mayānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:016.033a: priyair vivāso bahuśaḥ saṃvāsaś cāpriyaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:016.033c: dhananāśaś ca saṃprāpto labdhvā duḥkhena tad dhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.034a: avamānāḥ sukaṣṭāś ca parataḥ svajanāt tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:016.035a: prāptā vimānanāś cogrā vadhabandhāś ca dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.035c: patanaṃ niraye caiva yātanāś ca yamakṣaye
GE07mbh_14_u:016.036a: jarā rogāś ca satataṃ vāsanāni ca bhūriśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.037a: tataḥ kadā cin nirvedān nikārān nikṛtena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:016.037e: tataḥ siddhir iyaṃ prāptā prasādād ātmano mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:016.038a: nāhaṃ punar ihāgantā lokān ālokayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:016.038c: ā siddher ā prajāsargād ātmano me gatiḥ śubhā
GE07mbh_14_u:016.039c: itaḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi tataḥ parataraṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.039e: brahmaṇaḥ padam avyagraṃ mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.040c: prīto 'smi te mahāprājña brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_14_u:016.041a: yadīpsur upapannas tvaṃ tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.041c: abhijāne ca tad ahaṃ yadarthaṃ mā tvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:016.041e: acirāt tu gamiṣyāmi yenāhaṃ tvām acūcudam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.042c: paripṛccha yāvad bhavate bhāṣeyaṃ yat tavepsitam
GE07mbh_14_u:016.043a: bahu manye ca te buddhiṃ bhṛśaṃ saṃpūjayāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:016.043c: yenāhaṃ bhavatā buddho medhāvī hy asi kāśyapa
GE07mbh_14_u:017.001c: papraccha tāṃś ca sarvān sa prāha dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.002c: kathaṃ kaṣṭāc ca saṃsārāt saṃsaran parimucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:017.003a: ātmānaṃ vā kathaṃ yuktvā tac charīraṃ vimuñcati
GE07mbh_14_u:017.003c: śarīrataś ca nirmuktaḥ katham anyat prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:017.004a: kathaṃ śubhāśubhe cāyaṃ karmaṇī svakṛte naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.005a: evaṃ saṃcoditaḥ siddhaḥ praśnāṃs tān pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_14_u:017.005c: ānupūrvyeṇa vārṣṇeya yathā tan me vacaḥ śṛṇu siddhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.005d-0038_01: asminn evāśubhaphalā āyuṣyās tu kriyāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.008a: sattvaṃ balaṃ ca kālaṃ cāpy aviditvātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:017.009c: atyartham api vā bhuṅkte na vā bhuṅkte kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:017.010a: duṣṭānnaṃ viṣamānnaṃ ca so 'nyonyena virodhi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:017.010c: guru vāpi samaṃ bhuṅkte nātijīrṇe 'pi vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.014a: tasya taiḥ kāraṇair jantoḥ śarīrāc cyavate yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:017.015c: śarīram anuparyeti sarvān prāṇān ruṇaddhi vai
GE07mbh_14_u:017.016c: bhinatti jīvasthānāni tāni marmāṇi viddhi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:017.017a: tataḥ savedanaḥ sadyo jīvaḥ pracyavate kṣaran
GE07mbh_14_u:017.019c: tādṛśīm eva labhate vedanāṃ mānavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.020a: bhinnasaṃdhir atha kledam adbhiḥ sa labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.021a: yaḥ sa pañcasu bhūteṣu prāṇāpāne vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.021c: sa gacchaty ūrdhvago vāyuḥ kṛcchrān muktvā śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:017.022a: śarīraṃ ca jahāty eva nirucchvāsaś ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:017.023a: brahmaṇā saṃparityakto mṛta ity ucyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.023e: tair eva na vijānāti prāṇam āhārasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:017.024a: tatraiva kurute kāye yaḥ sa jīvaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.024c: teṣāṃ yad yad bhaved yuktaṃ saṃnipāte kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:017.024e: tat tan marma vijānīhi śāstradṛṣṭaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:017.025a: teṣu marmasu bhinneṣu tataḥ sa samudīrayan
GE07mbh_14_u:017.025c: āviśya hṛdayaṃ jantoḥ sattvaṃ cāśu ruṇaddhi vai
GE07mbh_14_u:017.025e: tataḥ sa cetano jantur nābhijānāti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:017.027a: tataḥ sa taṃ mahocchvāsaṃ bhṛśam ucchvasya dāruṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:017.027c: niṣkrāman kampayaty āśu tac charīram acetanam
GE07mbh_14_u:017.028a: sa jīvaḥ pracyutaḥ kāyāt karmabhiḥ svaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.028c: aṅkitaḥ svaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pāpair vāpy upapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:017.029c: itaraṃ kṛtapuṇyaṃ vā taṃ vijānanti lakṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.031a: paśyanty evaṃvidhāḥ siddhā jīvaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:017.032c: karmabhūmir iyaṃ bhūmir yatra tiṣṭhanti jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.034c: avāk sa niraye pāpo mānavaḥ pacyate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:017.034d-0039_01: arvāg gatir iyaṃ kaṣṭā yatra pacyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.034e: tasmāt sudurlabho mokṣa ātmā rakṣyo bhṛśaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.035a: ūrdhvaṃ tu jantavo gatvā yeṣu sthāneṣv avasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.035e: tac chrutvā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ budhyethāḥ karmaniścayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:017.036c: yac ca vibhrājate loke svabhāsā sūryamaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_14_u:017.037a: karmakṣayāc ca te sarve cyavante vai punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.038a: na tatrāpy asti saṃtoṣo dṛṣṭvā dīptatarāṃ śriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:017.038c: ity etā gatayaḥ sarvāḥ pṛthaktve samudīritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:017.039a: upapattiṃ tu garbhasya vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:018.001a: śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca neha nāśo 'sti karmaṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:018.001c: prāpya prāpya tu pacyante kṣetraṃ kṣetraṃ tathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:018.002a: yathā prasūyamānas tu phalī dadyāt phalaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_14_u:018.002c: tathā syād vipulaṃ puṇyaṃ śuddhena manasā kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:018.003a: pāpaṃ cāpi tathaiva syāt pāpena manasā kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:018.003c: purodhāya mano hīha karmaṇy ātmā pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:018.004c: naro garbhaṃ praviśati tac cāpi śṛṇu cottaram
GE07mbh_14_u:018.005c: kṣetraṃ karmajam āpnoti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:018.006a: saukṣmyād avyaktabhāvāc ca na sa kva cana sajjate
GE07mbh_14_u:018.006c: saṃprāpya brahmaṇaḥ kāyaṃ tasmāt tad brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:018.006e: tad bījaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tena jīvanti jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.009c: tathā tvam api jānīhi garbhe jīvopapādanam
GE07mbh_14_u:018.010a: yathā ca dīpaḥ śaraṇaṃ dīpyamānaḥ prakāśayet
GE07mbh_14_u:018.011a: yad yac ca kurute karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:018.012a: tatas tat kṣīyate caiva punaś cānyat pracīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:018.013a: tatra dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi sukhī bhavati yena vai
GE07mbh_14_u:018.013d-0040_01: śubhapradāni yāny āhus tāni kuryāc ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_14_u:018.015c: vyalīkānām akaraṇaṃ bhūtānāṃ yatra sā bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:018.017a: pravartanaṃ śubhānāṃ ca tat satāṃ vṛttam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:018.017b-0041_02: ubhayārtho bhavaty eva svargārtho mokṣadas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:018.017c: tato dharmaḥ prabhavati yaḥ prajāḥ pāti śāśvatīḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.018a: evaṃ satsu sadā paśyet tatra hy eṣā dhruvā sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.018c: ācāro dharmam ācaṣṭe yasmin santo vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.019a: teṣu tad dharmanikṣiptaṃ yaḥ sa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.019c: yas taṃ samabhipadyeta na sa durgatim āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_14_u:018.020c: yas tu yogī ca muktaś ca sa etebhyo viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:018.021c: saṃsāratāraṇaṃ hy asya kālena mahatā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:018.022a: evaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karma sarvo jantur niṣevate
GE07mbh_14_u:018.022c: sarvaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ yena nikṛto 'yam ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.023c: ity evaṃ saṃśayo loke tac ca vakṣyāmy ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:018.025a: tataḥ pradhānam asṛjac cetanā sā śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:018.025c: yayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ yāṃ loke paramāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.026a: iha tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ paraṃ tv amṛtam akṣaram
GE07mbh_14_u:018.026c: trayāṇāṃ mithunaṃ sarvam ekaikasya pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:018.027c: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni ity eṣā paurvikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:018.028c: bhūteṣu parivṛttiṃ ca punarāvṛttim eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:018.029a: yathātra kaś cin medhāvī dṛṣṭātmā pūrvajanmani
GE07mbh_14_u:018.029c: yat pravakṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ yathāvad upapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:018.030a: sukhaduḥkhe sadā samyag anitye yaḥ prapaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:018.031a: yac ca kiṃ cit sukhaṃ tac ca sarvaṃ duḥkham iti smaran
GE07mbh_14_u:018.033a: nirvidyate tataḥ kṛtsnaṃ mārgamāṇaḥ paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:019.001a: yaḥ syād ekāyane līnas tūṣṇīṃ kiṃ cid acintayan
GE07mbh_14_u:019.001c: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ parityajya sa nirārambhako bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:019.003a: ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaś caren niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.003b-0042_01: nityam eva yathānyāyaṃ yaś caren niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.003c: amānī nirabhīmānaḥ sarvato mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.004a: jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ cobhe sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:019.004c: lābhālābhe priyadveṣye yaḥ samaḥ sa ca mucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:019.005a: na kasya cit spṛhayate nāvajānāti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:019.005c: nirdvaṃdvo vītarāgātmā sarvato mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.006a: anamitro 'tha nirbandhur anapatyaś ca yaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:019.007a: naiva dharmī na cādharmī pūrvopacitahā ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.008a: akarmā cāvikāṅkṣaś ca paśyañ jagad aśāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:019.011c: aguṇaṃ guṇabhoktāraṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:019.012d-0043_02: upaśāmyendriyagrāmaṃ yaś caren mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.013c: param āpnoti saṃśāntam acalaṃ divyam akṣaram
GE07mbh_14_u:019.014c: yaj jñātvā siddham ātmānaṃ loke paśyanti yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.015a: tasyopadeśaṃ paśyāmi yathāvat tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_14_u:019.015c: yair dvāraiś cārayan nityaṃ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:019.016a: indriyāṇi tu saṃhṛtya mana ātmani dhārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:019.016c: tīvraṃ taptvā tapaḥ pūrvaṃ tato yoktum upakramet
GE07mbh_14_u:019.017c: manīṣī manasā vipraḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:019.018a: sa cec chaknoty ayaṃ sādhur yoktum ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:019.018c: tata ekāntaśīlaḥ sa paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:019.020a: yathā hi puruṣaḥ svapne dṛṣṭvā paśyaty asāv iti
GE07mbh_14_u:019.021a: iṣīkāṃ vā yathā muñjāt kaś cin nirhṛtya darśayet
GE07mbh_14_u:019.021c: yogī niṣkṛṣṭam ātmānaṃ tathā saṃpaśyate tanau
GE07mbh_14_u:019.022a: muñjaṃ śarīraṃ tasyāhur iṣīkām ātmani śritām
GE07mbh_14_u:019.023a: yadā hi yuktam ātmānaṃ samyak paśyati dehabhṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:019.023c: tadāsya neśate kaś cit trailokyasyāpi yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.024b-0044_01: samyag yuktvā sa ātmānam ātmany evāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_14_u:019.024c: vinivṛtya jarāmṛtyū na hṛṣyati na śocati
GE07mbh_14_u:019.025a: devānām api devatvaṃ yuktaḥ kārayate vaśī
GE07mbh_14_u:019.025c: brahma cāvyayam āpnoti hitvā deham aśāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:019.026a: vinaśyatsv api lokeṣu na bhayaṃ tasya jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:019.026c: kliśyamāneṣu bhūteṣu na sa kliśyati kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:019.028a: nainaṃ śastrāṇi vidhyante na mṛtyuś cāsya vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:019.028c: nātaḥ sukhataraṃ kiṃ cil loke kva cana vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:019.029a: samyag yuktvā yadātmānam ātmany eva prapaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:019.029b-0047_01: dehān yatheṣṭam abhyeti hitvemāṃ mānuṣīṃ tanum
GE07mbh_14_u:019.029c: tadaiva na spṛhayate sākṣād api śatakratoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.030a: nirvedas tu na gantavyo yuñjānena kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:019.030c: yogam ekāntaśīlas tu yathā yuñjīta tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:019.031a: dṛṣṭapūrvāṃ diśaṃ cintya yasmin saṃnivaset pure
GE07mbh_14_u:019.031c: purasyābhyantare tasya manaś cāryaṃ na bāhyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.033c: tasmin kāye manaś cāryaṃ na kathaṃ cana bāhyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.035a: dantāṃs tālu ca jihvāṃ ca galaṃ grīvāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:019.036a: ity uktaḥ sa mayā śiṣyo medhāvī madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:019.037a: bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ katham idam annaṃ koṣṭhe vipacyate
GE07mbh_14_u:019.037c: kathaṃ rasatvaṃ vrajati śoṇitaṃ jāyate katham
GE07mbh_14_u:019.037e: tathā māṃsaṃ ca medaś ca snāyvasthīni ca poṣati
GE07mbh_14_u:019.038c: vardhante vardhamānasya vardhate ca kathaṃ balam
GE07mbh_14_u:019.038e: nirojasāṃ niṣkramaṇaṃ malānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:019.039a: kuto vāyaṃ praśvasiti ucchvasity api vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.039c: kaṃ ca deśam adhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhaty ātmāyam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:019.040a: jīvaḥ kāyaṃ vahati cec ceṣṭayānaḥ kalevaram
GE07mbh_14_u:019.040c: kiṃvarṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ caiva niveśayati vai manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.042a: yathā svakoṣṭhe prakṣipya koṣṭhaṃ bhāṇḍamanā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:019.042c: tathā svakāye prakṣipya mano dvārair aniścalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.043a: evaṃ satatam udyuktaḥ prītātmā nacirād iva
GE07mbh_14_u:019.043c: āsādayati tad brahma yad dṛṣṭvā syāt pradhānavit
GE07mbh_14_u:019.044a: na tv asau cakṣuṣā grāhyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.046a: sa tad utsṛjya dehaṃ svaṃ dhārayan brahma kevalam
GE07mbh_14_u:019.046d-0049_01: tad evam āśrayaṃ kṛtvā mokṣaṃ yāti tato mayi
GE07mbh_14_u:019.048a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā kṛṣṇa mayā śiṣyo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.049a: ity uktvā sa tadā vākyaṃ māṃ pārtha dvijapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.050a: kaccid etat tvayā pārtha śrutam ekāgracetasā
GE07mbh_14_u:019.050c: tadāpi hi rathasthas tvaṃ śrutavān etad eva hi
GE07mbh_14_u:019.051a: naitat pārtha suvijñeyaṃ vyāmiśreṇeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.052c: kaccin nedaṃ śrutaṃ pārtha martyenānyena kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:019.053a: na hy etac chrotum arho 'nyo manuṣyas tvām ṛte 'nagha
GE07mbh_14_u:019.054c: na caitad iṣṭaṃ devānāṃ martyai rūpanivartanam
GE07mbh_14_u:019.055a: parā hi sā gatiḥ pārtha yat tad brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:019.055c: yatrāmṛtatvaṃ prāpnoti tyaktvā duḥkhaṃ sadā sukhī
GE07mbh_14_u:019.056a: evaṃ hi dharmam āsthāya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.056c: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:019.057a: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ pārtha kṣatriyā vā bahuśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.058a: hetumac caitad uddiṣṭam upāyāś cāsya sādhane
GE07mbh_14_u:019.058c: siddheḥ phalaṃ ca mokṣaś ca duḥkhasya ca vinirṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:019.058e: ataḥ paraṃ sukhaṃ tv anyat kiṃ nu syād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:019.059a: śrutavāñ śraddadhānaś ca parākrāntaś ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:019.059e: etair upāyaiḥ sa kṣipraṃ parāṃ gatim avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_14_u:019.060a: etāvad eva vaktavyaṃ nāto bhūyo 'sti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:020.001c: daṃpatyoḥ pārtha saṃvādam abhayaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.002c: dṛṣṭvā vivikta āsīnaṃ bhāryā bhartāram abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:020.003a: kaṃ nu lokaṃ gamiṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ patim āśritā
GE07mbh_14_u:020.004a: bhāryāḥ patikṛtāṃl lokān āpnuvantīti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:020.004c: tvām ahaṃ patim āsādya kāṃ gamiṣyāmi vai gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:020.005a: evam uktaḥ sa śāntātmā tām uvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:020.006a: grāhyaṃ dṛśyaṃ ca śrāvyaṃ ca yad idaṃ karma vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:020.006c: etad eva vyavasyanti karma karmeti karmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.007c: naiṣkarmyaṃ na ca loke 'smin maurtam ity upalabhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:020.008a: karmaṇā manasā vācā śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:020.009c: ātmastham ātmanā tena dṛṣṭam āyatanaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:020.010a: yatra tad brahma nirdvaṃdvaṃ yatra somaḥ sahāgninā
GE07mbh_14_u:020.010c: vyavāyaṃ kurute nityaṃ dhīro bhūtāni dhārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:020.011a: yatra brahmādayo yuktās tad akṣaram upāsate
GE07mbh_14_u:020.012a: ghrāṇena na tad āghreyaṃ na tad ādyaṃ ca jihvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:020.012c: sparśena ca na tat spṛśyaṃ manasā tv eva gamyate
GE07mbh_14_u:020.013a: cakṣuṣā na viṣahyaṃ ca yat kiṃ cic chravaṇāt param
GE07mbh_14_u:020.014a: yataḥ pravartate tantraṃ yatra ca pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:020.014c: prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaś ca vyānaś codāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:020.015a: tata eva pravartante tam eva praviśanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:020.016a: tasmin supte pralīyete samāno vyāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:020.016e: tasmāc chayānaṃ puruṣaṃ prāṇāpānau na muñcataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.017a: prāṇān āyamyate yena tam udānaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:020.019a: ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca cakṣuś ca tvak ca śrotraṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_14_u:020.019c: mano buddhiś ca saptaitā jihvā vaiśvānarārciṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.020a: ghreyaṃ peyaṃ ca dṛśyaṃ ca spṛśyaṃ śravyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:020.020c: mantavyam atha boddhavyaṃ tāḥ sapta samidho mama
GE07mbh_14_u:020.021a: ghrātā bhakṣayitā draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.021c: mantā boddhā ca saptaite bhavanti paramartvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.022a: ghreye peye ca dṛśye ca spṛśye śravye tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:020.022b-0050_01: mantavye 'py atha boddhavye subhage paśya sarvadā
GE07mbh_14_u:020.022c: havīṃṣy agniṣu hotāraḥ saptadhā sapta saptasu
GE07mbh_14_u:020.022f-0051_01: karaṇaṃ karma kartā ca mokṣam ity eva vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.023a: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_14_u:020.023c: mano buddhiś ca saptaite yonir ity eva śabditāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.024a: havirbhūtā guṇāḥ sarve praviśanty agnijaṃ mukham
GE07mbh_14_u:020.024c: antarvāsam uṣitvā ca jāyante svāsu yoniṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:020.025a: tataḥ saṃjāyate gandhas tataḥ saṃjāyate rasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:020.026a: tataḥ saṃjāyate śabdaḥ saṃśayas tatra jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:020.026c: tataḥ saṃjāyate niṣṭhā janmaitat saptadhā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001b-0052_01: indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃvādaṃ manasaś caiva bhāmini
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0053_01: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caraṇau karau
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0053_02: upasthaḥ pāyur etāni hotṝṇi daśa bhāmini
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0053_03: śabdasparśau rūparasau gandho vākyaṃ kriyā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0053_05: diśo vāyū raviś candraḥ pṛthvyagnī viṣṇur eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0053_06: indraḥ prajāpatir mitram agnayo daśa bhāmini
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0053_08: viṣayā nāma samidho hūyante tu daśāgniṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0054_01: cittaṃ sruvaṃ ca vittaṃ ca pavitraṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0054_02: suvibhaktam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad āsīd iti śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0054_03: tato viviktā cintāsīt sā cittaṃ paryavekṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0055_01: śrutvā cittaṃ srug ity eva manaś cittaṃ tad ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0055_03: nagneva yoṣā savrīḍā sā vāsaḥ paryavekṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0055_04: tasmāt saṃjajñire varṇāḥ svarā mantrās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:021.001d-0055_05: etac ca naḥ sarasvatyāḥ prajāpatir athābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:021.002a: sarvam evātra vijñeyaṃ cittaṃ jñānam avekṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:021.003c: tataś cāhavanīyas tu tasmin saṃkṣipyate haviḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:021.004c: rūpaṃ bhavati vai vyaktaṃ tad anudravate manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:021.005a: kasmād vāg abhavat pūrvaṃ kasmāt paścān mano 'bhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:021.007a: tām apānaḥ patir bhūtvā tasmāt preṣyaty apānatām
GE07mbh_14_u:021.007c: tāṃ matiṃ manasaḥ prāhur manas tasmād avekṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:021.008a: praśnaṃ tu vāṅmanasor māṃ yasmāt tvam anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:021.008c: tasmāt te vartayiṣyāmi tayor eva samāhvayam
GE07mbh_14_u:021.009c: āvayoḥ śreṣṭham ācakṣva chindhi nau saṃśayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:021.010a: mana ity eva bhagavāṃs tadā prāha sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_14_u:021.010c: ahaṃ vai kāmadhuk tubhyam iti taṃ prāha vāg atha
GE07mbh_14_u:021.011a: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva viddhy ubhe manasī mama
GE07mbh_14_u:021.011c: sthāvaraṃ matsakāśe vai jaṅgamaṃ viṣaye tava
GE07mbh_14_u:021.012a: yas tu te viṣayaṃ gacchen mantro varṇaḥ svaro 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:021.012c: tan mano jaṅgamaṃ nāma tasmād asi garīyasī
GE07mbh_14_u:021.013a: yasmād asi ca mā vocaḥ svayam abhyetya śobhane
GE07mbh_14_u:021.013c: tasmād ucchvāsam āsādya na vakṣyasi sarasvati
GE07mbh_14_u:021.014a: prāṇāpānāntare devī vāg vai nityaṃ sma tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:021.015a: tataḥ prāṇaḥ prādurabhūd vācam āpyāyayan punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:021.015c: tasmād ucchvāsam āsādya na vāg vadati karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:021.016c: tayor api ca ghoṣiṇyor nirghoṣaiva garīyasī
GE07mbh_14_u:021.017a: gaur iva prasravaty eṣā rasam uttamaśālinī
GE07mbh_14_u:021.017c: satataṃ syandate hy eṣā śāśvataṃ brahmavādinī
GE07mbh_14_u:021.019c: kiṃ nu pūrvaṃ tato devī vyājahāra sarasvatī
GE07mbh_14_u:021.020a: prāṇena yā saṃbhavate śarīre; prāṇād apānaṃ pratipadyate ca
GE07mbh_14_u:021.020c: udānabhūtā ca visṛjya dehaṃ; vyānena sarvaṃ divam āvṛṇoti
GE07mbh_14_u:021.021a: tataḥ samāne pratitiṣṭhatīha; ity eva pūrvaṃ prajajalpa cāpi
GE07mbh_14_u:021.021c: tasmān manaḥ sthāvaratvād viśiṣṭaṃ; tathā devī jaṅgamatvād viśiṣṭā
GE07mbh_14_u:022.002a: ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuś ca jihvā ca tvak śrotraṃ caiva pañcamam
GE07mbh_14_u:022.002c: mano buddhiś ca saptaite hotāraḥ pṛthag āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:022.003c: etān vai saptahotṝṃs tvaṃ svabhāvād viddhi śobhane
GE07mbh_14_u:022.004c: kathaṃsvabhāvā bhagavann etad ācakṣva me vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:022.005c: parasparaguṇān ete na vijānanti karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:022.006a: jihvā cakṣus tathā śrotraṃ tvaṅ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.006c: na gandhān adhigacchanti ghrāṇas tān adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:022.007a: ghrāṇaṃ cakṣus tathā śrotraṃ tvaṅ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.007c: na rasān adhigacchanti jihvā tān adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:022.008a: ghrāṇaṃ jihvā tathā śrotraṃ tvaṅ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.008c: na rūpāṇy adhigacchanti cakṣus tāny adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:022.009a: ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca cakṣuś ca śrotraṃ buddhir manas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:022.009c: na sparśān adhigacchanti tvak ca tān adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:022.010a: ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca cakṣuś ca tvaṅ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.010c: na śabdān adhigacchanti śrotraṃ tān adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:022.010d-0056_01: ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuś ca śrotraṃ ca tvag jihvā buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.011a: ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca cakṣuś ca tvak śrotraṃ buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.012a: ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca cakṣuś ca tvak śrotraṃ mana eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.012c: na niṣṭhām adhigacchanti buddhis tām adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:022.013c: indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃvādaṃ manasaś caiva bhāmini
GE07mbh_14_u:022.014a: na ghrāti mām ṛte ghrāṇaṃ rasaṃ jihvā na budhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:022.014c: rūpaṃ cakṣur na gṛhṇāti tvak sparśaṃ nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:022.015a: na śrotraṃ budhyate śabdaṃ mayā hīnaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:022.016c: indriyāṇi na bhāsante mayā hīnāni nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:022.018a: evam etad bhavet satyaṃ yathaitan manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_14_u:022.018c: ṛte 'smān asmadarthāṃs tu bhogān bhuṅkte bhavān yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:022.019c: bhogān bhuṅkṣe rasān bhuṅkṣe yathaitan manyate tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:022.020a: atha vāsmāsu līneṣu tiṣṭhatsu viṣayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.021a: atha cen manyase siddhim asmadartheṣu nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:022.021c: ghrāṇena rūpam ādatsva rasam ādatsva cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:022.022a: śrotreṇa gandham ādatsva niṣṭhām ādatsva jihvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:022.022c: tvacā ca śabdam ādatsva buddhyā sparśam athāpi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.023c: bhogān apūrvān ādatsva nocchiṣṭaṃ bhoktum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:022.024a: yathā hi śiṣyaḥ śāstāraṃ śrutyartham abhidhāvati
GE07mbh_14_u:022.025c: anāgatān atītāṃś ca svapne jāgaraṇe tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:022.027a: bahūn api hi saṃkalpān matvā svapnān upāsya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:022.028a: agāram advāram iva praviśya; saṃkalpabhogo viṣayān avindan
GE07mbh_14_u:022.028c: prāṇakṣaye śāntim upaiti nityaṃ; dārukṣaye 'gnir jvalito yathaiva
GE07mbh_14_u:022.029a: kāmaṃ tu naḥ sveṣu guṇeṣu saṅgaḥ; kāmaṃ ca nānyonyaguṇopalabdhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:022.029c: asmān ṛte nāsti tavopalabdhis; tvām apy ṛte 'smān na bhajeta harṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.002a: prāṇāpānāv udānaś ca samāno vyāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:023.002c: pañcahotṝn athaitān vai paraṃ bhāvaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.003a: svabhāvāt sapta hotāra iti te pūrvikā matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.003c: yathā vai pañca hotāraḥ paro bhāvas tathocyatām
GE07mbh_14_u:023.004a: prāṇena saṃbhṛto vāyur apāno jāyate tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.004c: apāne saṃbhṛto vāyus tato vyānaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:023.006c: yo no jyeṣṭhas tam ācakṣva sa naḥ śreṣṭho bhaviṣyati brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:023.007a: yasmin pralīne pralayaṃ vrajanti; sarve prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ śarīre
GE07mbh_14_u:023.007c: yasmin pracīrṇe ca punaś caranti; sa vai śreṣṭho gacchata yatra kāmaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.008a: mayi pralīne pralayaṃ vrajanti; sarve prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ śarīre
GE07mbh_14_u:023.008c: mayi pracīrṇe ca punaś caranti; śreṣṭho hy ahaṃ paśyata māṃ pralīnam
GE07mbh_14_u:023.009a: prāṇaḥ pralīyata tataḥ punaś ca pracacāra ha
GE07mbh_14_u:023.009c: samānaś cāpy udānaś ca vaco 'brūtāṃ tataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:023.010a: na tvaṃ sarvam idaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasīha yathā vayam
GE07mbh_14_u:023.010c: na tvaṃ śreṣṭho 'si naḥ prāṇa apāno hi vaśe tava
GE07mbh_14_u:023.011a: mayi pralīne pralayaṃ vrajanti; sarve prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ śarīre
GE07mbh_14_u:023.011c: mayi pracīrṇe ca punaś caranti; śreṣṭho hy ahaṃ paśyata māṃ pralīnam
GE07mbh_14_u:023.011d-0057_01: śreṣṭho 'ham asmi sarveṣāṃ śrūyatāṃ yena hetunā
GE07mbh_14_u:023.012a: vyānaś ca tam udānaś ca bhāṣamāṇam athocatuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.012c: apāna na tvaṃ śreṣṭho 'si prāṇo hi vaśagas tava
GE07mbh_14_u:023.013a: apānaḥ pracacārātha vyānas taṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:023.013c: śreṣṭho 'ham asmi sarveṣāṃ śrūyatāṃ yena hetunā
GE07mbh_14_u:023.014a: mayi pralīne pralayaṃ vrajanti; sarve prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ śarīre
GE07mbh_14_u:023.014c: mayi pracīrṇe ca punaś caranti; śreṣṭho hy ahaṃ paśyata māṃ pralīnam
GE07mbh_14_u:023.015a: prālīyata tato vyānaḥ punaś ca pracacāra ha
GE07mbh_14_u:023.015c: prāṇāpānāv udānaś ca samānaś ca tam abruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:023.015e: na tvaṃ śreṣṭho 'si no vyāna samāno hi vaśe tava
GE07mbh_14_u:023.016a: pracacāra punar vyānaḥ samānaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:023.016c: śreṣṭho 'ham asmi sarveṣāṃ śrūyatāṃ yena hetunā
GE07mbh_14_u:023.017a: mayi pralīne pralayaṃ vrajanti; sarve prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ śarīre
GE07mbh_14_u:023.017c: mayi pracīrṇe ca punaś caranti; śreṣṭho hy ahaṃ paśyata māṃ pralīnam
GE07mbh_14_u:023.018a: tataḥ samānaḥ prālilye punaś ca pracacāra ha
GE07mbh_14_u:023.018b-0058_01: tato vyānaḥ samānaṃ tu prāṇāpānau tathocatuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.018c: prāṇāpānāv udānaś ca vyānaś caiva tam abruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:023.018e: samāna na tvaṃ śreṣṭho 'si vyāna eva vaśe tava
GE07mbh_14_u:023.018f-0059_01: śreṣṭho 'ham asmi sarveṣāṃ śrūyatāṃ kena hetunā
GE07mbh_14_u:023.019a: samānaḥ pracacārātha udānas tam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:023.019c: śreṣṭho 'ham asmi sarveṣāṃ śrūyatāṃ yena hetunā
GE07mbh_14_u:023.020a: mayi pralīne pralayaṃ vrajanti; sarve prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ śarīre
GE07mbh_14_u:023.020c: mayi pracīrṇe ca punaś caranti; śreṣṭho hy ahaṃ paśyata māṃ pralīnam
GE07mbh_14_u:023.021a: tataḥ prālīyatodānaḥ punaś ca pracacāra ha
GE07mbh_14_u:023.021c: prāṇāpānau samānaś ca vyānaś caiva tam abruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:023.021e: udāna na tvaṃ śreṣṭho 'si vyāna eva vaśe tava
GE07mbh_14_u:023.022a: tatas tān abravīd brahmā samavetān prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.022c: sarve śreṣṭhā na vā śreṣṭhāḥ sarve cānyonyadharmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.023a: ekaḥ sthiraś cāsthiraś ca viśeṣāt pañca vāyavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:023.024c: svasti vrajata bhadraṃ vo dhārayadhvaṃ parasparam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.001c: nāradasya ca saṃvādam ṛṣer devamatasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:024.002a: jantoḥ saṃjāyamānasya kiṃ nu pūrvaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.002c: prāṇo 'pānaḥ samāno vā vyāno vodāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:024.003a: yenāyaṃ sṛjyate jantus tato 'nyaḥ pūrvam eti tam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.003c: prāṇadvaṃdvaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ tiryagaṃ cordhvagaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:024.004a: kenāyaṃ sṛjyate jantuḥ kaś cānyaḥ pūrvam eti tam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.004c: prāṇadvaṃdvaṃ ca me brūhi tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca niścayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:024.005a: saṃkalpāj jāyate harṣaḥ śabdād api ca jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.005c: rasāt saṃjāyate cāpi rūpād api ca jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.006a: sparśāt saṃjāyate cāpi gandhād api ca jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.007a: kāmāt saṃjāyate śukraṃ kāmāt saṃjāyate rasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.009a: prāṇāpānāv idaṃ dvaṃdvam avāk cordhvaṃ ca gacchataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.009c: vyānaḥ samānaś caivobhau tiryag dvaṃdvatvam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.010a: agnir vai devatāḥ sarvā iti vedasya śāsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.011a: tasya dhūmas tamorūpaṃ rajo bhasma suretasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.011c: sattvaṃ saṃjāyate tasya yatra prakṣipyate haviḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.012a: āghārau samāno vyānaś ca iti yajñavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.012e: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.013a: nirdvaṃdvam iti yat tv etat tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:024.014a: ahorātram idaṃ dvaṃdvaṃ tayor madhye hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.014c: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.015a: ubhe caivāyane dvaṃdvaṃ tayor madhye hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.015c: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.016a: ubhe satyānṛte dvaṃdvaṃ tayor madhye hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.016c: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.017a: ubhe śubhāśubhe dvaṃdvaṃ tayor madhye hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.017c: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.018a: sac cāsac caiva tad dvaṃdvaṃ tayor madhye hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.018c: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.019a: prathamaṃ samāno vyāno vyasyate karma tena tat
GE07mbh_14_u:024.019c: tṛtīyaṃ tu samānena punar eva vyavasyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020a: śāntyarthaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca śāntir brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020c: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0003: vyaktaḥ sattvaguṇe hy eṣa puruṣo vyaktir īśate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0004: etad vipra vijānīṣva hanta bhūyo bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0007: upāyajño hi medhāvī sukham atyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0008: yathādhvānam apātheyaḥ prapanno mānavaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0009: kleśena yāti mahatā vinaśyaty antarāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0010: tathā karmasu vijñeyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati mānava
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0012: yathā ca dīrgham adhvānaṃ padbhyām eva prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0017: rathena rathinaṃ paśyec caitanyena ca cetanam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0019: kṣīṇe rathapathe prājño ratham utsṛjya gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0023: bāhubhyām eva saṃmohād vadhaṃ gacchaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0024: nāvayā ca yathā prājño vinā prajñātaritrayā
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0026: tīrṇo gacchet paraṃ pāraṃ nāvam utsṛjya nirmamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0028: mohāt saṃmoham āpanno mā vināśaṃ yathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0030: nāvaṃ na śakyam āruhya sthale 'pi paribhāvitum
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0031: tathaiva sthalam āruhya nāpsu yātuṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0032: evaṃ karma kṛtaṃ cittaṃ viṣamasthaṃ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0033: yathā karma kṛtaṃ loke tathā tad upapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0034: yatraiva gandho na raso na rūpasparśaśabdavat
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0035: manyate 'tha mano buddhyā tat pradhānaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0036: yat tat pradhānam avyaktam avyaktasya guṇo mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0039: bījadharmā mahān ātmā vasavaś ceti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0040: bījadharmāt tv ahaṃkāraḥ prasavatve punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0042: bījadharmiṇam ity āhuḥ prasavaṃ naiva kurvate
GE07mbh_14_u:024.020d-002_0044: etad rūpam udānasya paramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.002c: śṛṇu me gadato bhadre rahasyam idam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:025.003a: karaṇaṃ karma kartā ca mokṣa ity eva bhāmini
GE07mbh_14_u:025.003c: catvāra ete hotāro yair idaṃ jagad āvṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:025.004a: hotṝṇāṃ sādhanaṃ caiva śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.004c: ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca cakṣuś ca tvak ca śrotraṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_14_u:025.004e: mano buddhiś ca saptaite vijñeyā guṇahetavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.005a: gandho rasaś ca rūpaṃ ca śabdaḥ sparśaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.006a: ghrātā bhakṣayitā draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.006c: mantā boddhā ca saptaite vijñeyāḥ kartṛhetavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.008a: viduṣāṃ budhyamānānāṃ svaṃ svaṃ sthānaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:025.008c: guṇās te devatābhūtāḥ satataṃ bhuñjate haviḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.010a: abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaṃ caiva madyapānaṃ ca hanti tam
GE07mbh_14_u:025.010c: sa cānnaṃ hanti tac cānnaṃ sa hatvā hanyate budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.011a: attā hy annam idaṃ vidvān punar janayatīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.011c: sa cānnāj jāyate tasmin sūkṣmo nāma vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.012a: manasā gamyate yac ca yac ca vācā nirudyate
GE07mbh_14_u:025.012c: śrotreṇa śrūyate yac ca cakṣuṣā yac ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:025.013a: sparśena spṛśyate yac ca ghrāṇena ghrāyate ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:025.016a: ṛcaś cāpy atra śaṃsanti nārāyaṇavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:025.016c: nārāyaṇāya devāya yad abadhnan paśūn purā
GE07mbh_14_u:025.017a: tatra sāmāni gāyanti tāni cāhur nidarśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:025.017c: devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ bhīru sarvātmānaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_14_u:026.001a: ekaḥ śāstā na dvitīyo 'sti śāstā; yathā niyukto 'smi tathā carāmi
GE07mbh_14_u:026.001c: hṛdy eṣa tiṣṭhan puruṣaḥ śāsti śāstā; tenaiva yuktaḥ pravaṇād ivodakam
GE07mbh_14_u:026.002a: eko gurur nāsti tato dvitīyo; yo hṛcchayas tam aham anubravīmi
GE07mbh_14_u:026.002c: tenānuśiṣṭā guruṇā sadaiva; parābhūtā dānavāḥ sarva eva
GE07mbh_14_u:026.003a: eko bandhur nāsti tato dvitīyo; yo hṛcchayas tam aham anubravīmi
GE07mbh_14_u:026.003c: tenānuśiṣṭā bāndhavā bandhumantaḥ; saptarṣayaḥ sapta divi prabhānti
GE07mbh_14_u:026.004a: ekaḥ śrotā nāsti tato dvitīyo; yo hṛcchayas tam aham anubravīmi
GE07mbh_14_u:026.004c: tasmin gurau guruvāsaṃ niruṣya; śakro gataḥ sarvalokāmaratvam
GE07mbh_14_u:026.005a: eko dveṣṭā nāsti tato dvitīyo; yo hṛcchayas tam aham anubravīmi
GE07mbh_14_u:026.005c: tenānuśiṣṭā guruṇā sadaiva; lokadviṣṭāḥ pannagāḥ sarva eva
GE07mbh_14_u:026.007a: devarṣayaś ca nāgāś ca asurāś ca prajāpatim
GE07mbh_14_u:026.007c: paryapṛcchann upāsīnāḥ śreyo naḥ procyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:026.008c: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma te śrutvā prādravan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:026.009c: sarpāṇāṃ daśane bhāvaḥ pravṛttaḥ pūrvam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:026.010c: dānaṃ devā vyavasitā damam eva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:026.012a: śṛṇoty ayaṃ procyamānaṃ gṛhṇāti ca yathātatham
GE07mbh_14_u:026.013a: tasya cānumate karma tataḥ paścāt pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:026.013c: gurur boddhā ca śatruś ca dveṣṭā ca hṛdi saṃśritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:026.014a: pāpena vicaraṃl loke pāpacārī bhavaty ayam
GE07mbh_14_u:026.014c: śubhena vicaraṃl loke śubhacārī bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_14_u:026.015a: kāmacārī tu kāmena ya indriyasukhe rataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:026.016c: brahmabhūtaś caraṃl loke brahmacārī bhavaty ayam
GE07mbh_14_u:026.017c: āpo brahma gurur brahma sa brahmaṇi samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:026.018a: etad etādṛśaṃ sūkṣmaṃ brahmacaryaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.002c: tad atītya mahādurgaṃ praviṣṭo 'smi mahad vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.003a: kva tad vanaṃ mahāprājña ke vṛkṣāḥ saritaś ca kāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.003c: girayaḥ parvatāś caiva kiyaty adhvani tad vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.004a: na tad asti pṛthagbhāve kiṃ cid anyat tataḥ samam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.004c: na tad asty apṛthagbhāve kiṃ cid dūrataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.005a: tasmād dhrasvataraṃ nāsti na tato 'sti bṛhattaram
GE07mbh_14_u:027.005c: nāsti tasmād duḥkhataraṃ nāsty anyat tatsamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_14_u:027.006a: na tat praviśya śocanti na prahṛṣyanti ca dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.006c: na ca bibhyati keṣāṃ cit tebhyo bibhyati ke ca na
GE07mbh_14_u:027.007a: tasmin vane sapta mahādrumāś ca; phalāni saptātithayaś ca sapta
GE07mbh_14_u:027.007c: saptāśramāḥ sapta samādhayaś ca; dīkṣāś ca saptaitad araṇyarūpam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.008a: pañcavarṇāni divyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:027.008c: sṛjantaḥ pādapās tatra vyāpya tiṣṭhanti tad vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.009a: suvarṇāni dvivarṇāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:027.009c: sṛjantaḥ pādapās tatra vyāpya tiṣṭhanti tad vanam
