GE07mbh_14_u:027.010a: caturvarṇāni divyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:027.010c: sṛjantaḥ pādapās tatra vyāpya tiṣṭhanti tad vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.011a: śaṃkarāṇi trivarṇāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:027.011c: sṛjantaḥ pādapās tatra vyāpya tiṣṭhanti tad vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.012a: surabhīṇy ekavarṇāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:027.012c: sṛjantaḥ pādapās tatra vyāpya tiṣṭhanti tad vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.013a: bahūny avyaktavarṇāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:027.013c: visṛjantau mahāvṛkṣau tad vanaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.013d-0062_01: visṛjanto mahāvṛkṣā vyāpya tiṣṭhanti tad vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.014a: eko hy agniḥ sumanā brāhmaṇo 'tra; pañcendriyāṇi samidhaś cātra santi
GE07mbh_14_u:027.014c: tebhyo mokṣāḥ sapta bhavanti dīkṣā; guṇāḥ phalāny atithayaḥ phalāśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.015c: arciteṣu pralīneṣu teṣv anyad rocate vanam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.017a: ye 'dhigacchanti tat santas teṣāṃ nāsti bhayaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.017c: ūrdhvaṃ cāvāk ca tiryak ca tasya nānto 'dhigamyate
GE07mbh_14_u:027.018a: sapta striyas tatra vasanti sadyo; avāṅmukhā bhānumatyo janitryaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.018c: ūrdhvaṃ rasānāṃ dadate prajābhyaḥ; sarvān yathā sarvam anityatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_14_u:027.020a: yaśo varco bhagaś caiva vijayaḥ siddhitejasī
GE07mbh_14_u:027.021a: girayaḥ parvatāś caiva santi tatra samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.021c: nadyaś ca sarito vāri vahantyo brahmasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:027.022c: svātmatṛptā yato yānti sākṣād dāntāḥ pitāmaham
GE07mbh_14_u:027.024a: ṛcam apy atra śaṃsanti vidyāraṇyavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:027.025a: etad etādṛśaṃ divyam araṇyaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:028.001a: gandhān na jighrāmi rasān na vedmi; rūpaṃ na paśyāmi na ca spṛśāmi
GE07mbh_14_u:028.001c: na cāpi śabdān vividhāñ śṛṇomi; na cāpi saṃkalpam upaimi kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_14_u:028.002a: arthān iṣṭān kāmayate svabhāvaḥ; sarvān dveṣyān pradviṣate svabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:028.002c: kāmadveṣāv udbhavataḥ svabhāvāt; prāṇāpānau jantudehān niveśya
GE07mbh_14_u:028.003a: tebhyaś cānyāṃs teṣv anityāṃś ca bhāvān; bhūtātmānaṃ lakṣayeyaṃ śarīre
GE07mbh_14_u:028.003c: tasmiṃs tiṣṭhan nāsmi śakyaḥ kathaṃ cit; kāmakrodhābhyāṃ jarayā mṛtyunā ca
GE07mbh_14_u:028.004a: akāmayānasya ca sarvakāmān; avidviṣāṇasya ca sarvadoṣān
GE07mbh_14_u:028.004c: na me svabhāveṣu bhavanti lepās; toyasya bindor iva puṣkareṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:028.005a: nityasya caitasya bhavanti nityā; nirīkṣamāṇasya bahūn svabhāvān
GE07mbh_14_u:028.005c: na sajjate karmasu bhogajālaṃ; divīva sūryasya mayūkhajālam
GE07mbh_14_u:028.007c: yatir adhvaryum āsīno hiṃseyam iti kutsayan
GE07mbh_14_u:028.008a: tam adhvaryuḥ pratyuvāca nāyaṃ chāgo vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:028.008c: śreyasā yokṣyate jantur yadi śrutir iyaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:028.009a: yo hy asya pārthivo bhāgaḥ pṛthivīṃ sa gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:028.009c: yad asya vārijaṃ kiṃ cid apas tat pratipadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:028.010a: sūryaṃ cakṣur diśaḥ śrotre prāṇo 'sya divam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:028.010c: āgame vartamānasya na me doṣo 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_14_u:028.011a: prāṇair viyoge chāgasya yadi śreyaḥ prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:028.011c: chāgārthe vartate yajño bhavataḥ kiṃ prayojanam
GE07mbh_14_u:028.012a: anu tvā manyatāṃ mātā pitā bhrātā sakhāpi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:028.013a: ya evam anumanyeraṃs tān bhavān praṣṭum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:028.013c: teṣām anumataṃ śrutvā śakyā kartuṃ vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:028.014a: prāṇā apy asya chāgasya prāpitās te svayoniṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:028.014c: śarīraṃ kevalaṃ śiṣṭaṃ niśceṣṭam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:028.016c: yad ahiṃsraṃ bhavet karma tat kāryam iti vidmahe
GE07mbh_14_u:028.017a: ahiṃseti pratijñeyaṃ yadi vakṣyāmy ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:028.019a: bhūmer gandhaguṇān bhuṅkṣe pibasy āpomayān rasān
GE07mbh_14_u:028.019c: jyotiṣāṃ paśyase rūpaṃ spṛśasy anilajān guṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:028.020a: śṛṇoṣy ākāśajaṃ śabdaṃ manasā manyase matim
GE07mbh_14_u:028.020c: sarvāṇy etāni bhūtāni prāṇā iti ca manyase
GE07mbh_14_u:028.021a: prāṇādāne ca nityo 'si hiṃsāyāṃ vartate bhavān
GE07mbh_14_u:028.021c: nāsti ceṣṭā vinā hiṃsāṃ kiṃ vā tvaṃ manyase dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:028.022a: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva dvaidhībhāvo 'yam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:028.022c: akṣaraṃ tatra sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ kṣara ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:028.023a: prāṇo jihvā manaḥ sattvaṃ svabhāvo rajasā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:028.024c: samantāt parimuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:028.025a: sadbhir eveha saṃvāsaḥ kāryo matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:028.025c: bhavato hi mataṃ śrutvā pratibhāti matir mama
GE07mbh_14_u:028.026c: mataṃ mantuṃ kratuṃ kartuṃ nāparādho 'sti me dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:028.027a: upapattyā yatis tūṣṇīṃ vartamānas tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:028.028a: evam etādṛśaṃ mokṣaṃ susūkṣmaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.003a: sa kadā cit samudrānte vicaran baladarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.003c: avākirac charaśataiḥ samudram iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:029.004a: taṃ samudro namaskṛtya kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:029.004c: mā muñca vīra nārācān brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_14_u:029.005c: vadhyante rājaśārdūla tebhyo dehy abhayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:029.006a: matsamo yadi saṃgrāme śarāsanadharaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:029.006c: vidyate taṃ mamācakṣva yaḥ samāsīta māṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_14_u:029.007a: maharṣir jamadagnis te yadi rājan pariśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.007c: tasya putras tavātithyaṃ yathāvat kartum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:029.008a: tataḥ sa rājā prayayau krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.008c: sa tam āśramam āgamya rāmam evānvapadyata
GE07mbh_14_u:029.009c: āyāsaṃ janayām āsa rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.011a: tataḥ paraśum ādāya sa taṃ bāhusahasriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:029.011c: ciccheda sahasā rāmo bāhuśākham iva drumam
GE07mbh_14_u:029.012a: taṃ hataṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sametāḥ sarvabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.012c: asīn ādāya śaktīś ca bhārgavaṃ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:029.013a: rāmo 'pi dhanur ādāya ratham āruhya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.014a: tatas tu kṣatriyāḥ ke cij jamadagniṃ nihatya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:029.016a: ta ete dramiḍāḥ kāśāḥ puṇḍrāś ca śabaraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:029.017a: tatas tu hatavīrāsu kṣatriyāsu punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.019a: rāma rāma nivartasva kaṃ guṇaṃ tāta paśyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:029.019c: kṣatrabandhūn imān prāṇair viprayojya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:029.021a: pitur vadham amṛṣyaṃs tu rāmaḥ provāca tān ṛṣīn
GE07mbh_14_u:029.021c: nārhantīha bhavanto māṃ nivārayitum ity uta
GE07mbh_14_u:029.022a: nārhase kṣatrabandhūṃs tvaṃ nihantuṃ jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:029.022c: na hi yuktaṃ tvayā hantuṃ brāhmaṇena satā nṛpān
GE07mbh_14_u:030.001c: śrutvā ca tat tathā kāryaṃ bhavatā dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:030.003a: sa sāgarāntāṃ dhanuṣā vinirjitya mahīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:030.003c: kṛtvā suduṣkaraṃ karma manaḥ sūkṣme samādadhe
GE07mbh_14_u:030.004a: sthitasya vṛkṣamūle 'tha tasya cintā babhūva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:030.004c: utsṛjya sumahad rājyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ prati mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:030.005a: manaso me balaṃ jātaṃ mano jitvā dhruvo jayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:030.006a: yad idaṃ cāpalān mūrteḥ sarvam etac cikīrṣati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.006c: manaḥ prati sutīkṣṇāgrān ahaṃ mokṣyāmi sāyakān
GE07mbh_14_u:030.007a: neme bāṇās tariṣyanti mām alarka kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:030.008a: anyān bāṇān samīkṣasva yais tvaṃ māṃ sūdayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.008c: tac chrutvā sa vicintyātha tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:030.008d-0064_01: indriyārtheṣu sarveṣu buddhis teṣv iha gṛdhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.008d-0064_02: tasmād buddhiṃ prati śarān atimokṣyāmy ahaṃ śitān
GE07mbh_14_u:030.009a: āghrāya subahūn gandhāṃs tān eva pratigṛdhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.009c: tasmād ghrāṇaṃ prati śarān pratimokṣyāmy ahaṃ śitān
GE07mbh_14_u:030.010a: neme bāṇās tariṣyanti mām alarka kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:030.011a: anyān bāṇān samīkṣasva yais tvaṃ māṃ sūdayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.011c: tac chrutvā sa vicintyātha tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:030.012a: iyaṃ svādūn rasān bhuktvā tān eva pratigṛdhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.012c: tasmāj jihvāṃ prati śarān pratimokṣyāmy ahaṃ śitān jihvovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:030.013a: neme bāṇās tariṣyanti mām alarka kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:030.014a: anyān bāṇān samīkṣasva yais tvaṃ māṃ sūdayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.014c: tac chrutvā sa vicintyātha tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:030.015a: spṛṣṭvā tvag vividhān sparśāṃs tān eva pratigṛdhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.016a: neme bāṇās tariṣyanti mām alarka kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:030.017a: anyān bāṇān samīkṣasva yais tvaṃ māṃ sūdayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.017c: tac chrutvā sa vicintyātha tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:030.018a: śrutvā vai vividhāñ śabdāṃs tān eva pratigṛdhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.018c: tasmāc chrotraṃ prati śarān pratimokṣyāmy ahaṃ śitān
GE07mbh_14_u:030.019a: neme bāṇās tariṣyanti mām alarka kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:030.019c: tavaiva marma bhetsyanti tato hāsyasi jīvitam
GE07mbh_14_u:030.020a: anyān bāṇān samīkṣasva yais tvaṃ māṃ sūdayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.020c: tac chrutvā sa vicintyātha tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:030.021a: dṛṣṭvā vai vividhān bhāvāṃs tān eva pratigṛdhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.021c: tasmāc cakṣuḥ prati śarān pratimokṣyāmy ahaṃ śitān
GE07mbh_14_u:030.022a: neme bāṇās tariṣyanti mām alarka kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:030.023a: anyān bāṇān samīkṣasva yais tvaṃ māṃ sūdayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.023c: tac chrutvā sa vicintyātha tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:030.024a: iyaṃ niṣṭhā bahuvidhā prajñayā tv adhyavasyati
GE07mbh_14_u:030.024c: tasmād buddhiṃ prati śarān pratimokṣyāmy ahaṃ śitān
GE07mbh_14_u:030.025a: neme bāṇās tariṣyanti mām alarka kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:030.025d-0065_01: anyān bāṇān samīkṣasva yais tvaṃ māṃ sūdayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.026c: nādhyagacchat paraṃ śaktyā bāṇam eteṣu saptasu
GE07mbh_14_u:030.027a: sa vicintya ciraṃ kālam alarko dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:030.027c: nādhyagacchat paraṃ śreyo yogān matimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:030.028a: sa ekāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā niścalo yogam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:030.029a: vismitaś cāpi rājarṣir imāṃ gāthāṃ jagāda ha
GE07mbh_14_u:030.029c: aho kaṣṭaṃ yad asmābhiḥ pūrvaṃ rājyam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:030.029e: iti paścān mayā jñātaṃ yogān nāsti paraṃ sukham
GE07mbh_14_u:030.030a: iti tvam api jānīhi rāma mā kṣatriyāñ jahi
GE07mbh_14_u:030.031a: ity uktaḥ sa tapo ghoraṃ jāmadagnyaḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:030.031c: āsthitaḥ sumahābhāgo yayau siddhiṃ ca durgamām
GE07mbh_14_u:030.031d-0067_01: ity uktaḥ pitṛbhiḥ so 'tha tapo ghoraṃ samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:030.031d-0067_02: jāmadagnyo mahābhāgaḥ siddhiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.001a: trayo vai ripavo loke nava vai guṇataḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.001c: harṣaḥ stambho 'bhimānaś ca trayas te sāttvikā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.002a: śokaḥ krodho 'tisaṃrambho rājasās te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.002c: svapnas tandrī ca mohaś ca trayas te tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.004c: ambarīṣeṇa yā gītā rājñā rājyaṃ praśāsatā
GE07mbh_14_u:031.005c: jagrāha tarasā rājyam ambarīṣa iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.006a: sa nigṛhya mahādoṣān sādhūn samabhipūjya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:031.006c: jagāma mahatīṃ siddhiṃ gāthāṃ cemāṃ jagāda ha
GE07mbh_14_u:031.007a: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ me jitā doṣā nihatāḥ sarvaśatravaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.007c: eko doṣo 'vaśiṣṭas tu vadhyaḥ sa na hato mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:031.008a: yena yukto jantur ayaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ nādhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:031.008c: tṛṣṇārta iva nimnāni dhāvamāno na budhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:031.009a: akāryam api yeneha prayuktaḥ sevate naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.009c: taṃ lobham asibhis tīkṣṇair nikṛntantaṃ nikṛntata
GE07mbh_14_u:031.010a: lobhād dhi jāyate tṛṣṇā tataś cintā prasajyate
GE07mbh_14_u:031.010c: sa lipsamāno labhate bhūyiṣṭhaṃ rājasān guṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:031.010d-0068_01: tad avāptau tu labhate bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tāmasān guṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:031.010d-0069_01: etair doṣaiḥ punar dehī badhyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:031.010d-0069_02: bhuktvā vai rājasān bhogāñ jāyate karma cehate
GE07mbh_14_u:031.011a: sa tair guṇaiḥ saṃhatadehabandhanaḥ; punaḥ punar jāyati karma cehate
GE07mbh_14_u:031.011c: janmakṣaye bhinnavikīrṇadehaḥ; punar mṛtyuṃ gacchati janmani sve
GE07mbh_14_u:031.012a: tasmād enaṃ samyag avekṣya lobhaṃ; nigṛhya dhṛtyātmani rājyam icchet
GE07mbh_14_u:031.012c: etad rājyaṃ nānyad astīti vidyād; yas tv atra rājā vijito mamaikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:032.001c: brāhmaṇasya ca saṃvādaṃ janakasya ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_14_u:032.002a: brāhmaṇaṃ janako rājā sannaṃ kasmiṃś cid āgame
GE07mbh_14_u:032.002c: viṣaye me na vastavyam iti śiṣṭyartham abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:032.003c: ācakṣva viṣayaṃ rājan yāvāṃs tava vaśe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:032.004a: so 'nyasya viṣaye rājño vastum icchāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:032.004c: vacas te kartum icchāmi yathāśāstraṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:032.005a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā rājā brāhmaṇena yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.005c: muhur uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya na sa taṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_14_u:032.007a: samāśvāsya tato rājā vyapete kaśmale tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.007c: tato muhūrtād iva taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:032.009a: nādhyagacchaṃ yadā pṛthvyāṃ mithilā mārgitā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.009c: nādhyagacchaṃ yadā tasyāṃ svaprajā mārgitā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.010a: nādhyagacchaṃ yadā tāsu tadā me kaśmalo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:032.010c: tato me kaśmalasyānte matiḥ punar upasthitā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.011a: tayā na viṣayaṃ manye sarvo vā viṣayo mama
GE07mbh_14_u:032.011c: ātmāpi cāyaṃ na mama sarvā vā pṛthivī mama
GE07mbh_14_u:032.011d-0070_01: yathā mama tathānyeṣām iti manye dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:032.011e: uṣyatāṃ yāvad utsāho bhujyatāṃ yāvad iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:032.012c: brūhi kāṃ buddhim āsthāya mamatvaṃ varjitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.013a: kāṃ vā buddhiṃ viniścitya sarvo vai viṣayas tava
GE07mbh_14_u:032.013c: nāvaiṣi viṣayaṃ yena sarvo vā viṣayas tava
GE07mbh_14_u:032.014c: nādhyagaccham ahaṃ yasmān mamedam iti yad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:032.015a: kasyedam iti kasya svam iti vedavacas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.015c: nādhyagaccham ahaṃ buddhyā mamedam iti yad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:032.016a: etāṃ buddhiṃ viniścitya mamatvaṃ varjitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.016c: śṛṇu buddhiṃ tu yāṃ jñātvā sarvatra viṣayo mama
GE07mbh_14_u:032.017a: nāham ātmārtham icchāmi gandhān ghrāṇagatān api
GE07mbh_14_u:032.017c: tasmān me nirjitā bhūmir vaśe tiṣṭhati nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.018a: nāham ātmārtham icchāmi rasān āsye 'pi vartataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:032.018c: āpo me nirjitās tasmād vaśe tiṣṭhanti nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.019a: nāham ātmārtham icchāmi rūpaṃ jyotiś ca cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.019c: tasmān me nirjitaṃ jyotir vaśe tiṣṭhati nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.020a: nāham ātmārtham icchāmi sparśāṃs tvaci gatāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:032.020c: tasmān me nirjito vāyur vaśe tiṣṭhati nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.021a: nāham ātmārtham icchāmi śabdāñ śrotragatān api
GE07mbh_14_u:032.021c: tasmān me nirjitāḥ śabdā vaśe tiṣṭhanti nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.022a: nāham ātmārtham icchāmi mano nityaṃ manontare
GE07mbh_14_u:032.022c: mano me nirjitaṃ tasmād vaśe tiṣṭhati nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:032.023a: devebhyaś ca pitṛbhyaś ca bhūtebhyo 'tithibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:032.023c: ityarthaṃ sarva eveme samārambhā bhavanti vai
GE07mbh_14_u:032.024a: tataḥ prahasya janakaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:032.024c: tvajjijñāsārtham adyeha viddhi māṃ dharmam āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:033.001a: nāhaṃ tathā bhīru carāmi loke; tathā tvaṃ māṃ tarkayase svabuddhyā
GE07mbh_14_u:033.001c: vipro 'smi mukto 'smi vanecaro 'smi; gṛhasthadharmā brahmacārī tathāsmi
GE07mbh_14_u:033.002a: nāham asmi yathā māṃ tvaṃ paśyase cakṣuṣā śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:033.002c: mayā vyāptam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cij jagatīgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:033.003a: ye ke cij jantavo loke jaṅgamāḥ sthāvarāś ca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:033.003c: teṣāṃ mām antakaṃ viddhi dārūṇām iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_14_u:033.004a: rājyaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sarvasyām atha vāpi triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_14_u:033.004c: tathā buddhir iyaṃ vetti buddhir eva dhanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:033.005a: ekaḥ panthā brāhmaṇānāṃ yena gacchanti tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:033.005e: liṅgair bahubhir avyagrair ekā buddhir upāsyate
GE07mbh_14_u:033.006c: te bhāvam ekam āyānti saritaḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:033.007a: buddhyāyaṃ gamyate mārgaḥ śarīreṇa na gamyate
GE07mbh_14_u:033.008a: tasmāt te subhage nāsti paralokakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_14_u:034.001c: bahu cālpaṃ ca saṃkṣiptaṃ viplutaṃ ca mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:034.002a: upāyaṃ tu mama brūhi yenaiṣā labhyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:034.002c: tan manye kāraṇatamaṃ yata eṣā pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:034.004a: yad idaṃ brahmaṇo liṅgaṃ kṣetrajñam iti saṃjñitam
GE07mbh_14_u:034.004c: grahītuṃ yena tac chakyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya tat kva nu
GE07mbh_14_u:034.005a: aliṅgo nirguṇaś caiva kāraṇaṃ nāsya vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:034.005c: upāyam eva vakṣyāmi yena gṛhyeta vā na vā
GE07mbh_14_u:034.006a: samyag apy upadiṣṭaś ca bhramarair iva lakṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:034.007a: idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti na mokṣeṣūpadiśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:034.007c: paśyataḥ śṛṇvato buddhir ātmano yeṣu jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:034.009c: yataḥ paraṃ na vidyeta tato 'bhyāse bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:034.010a: tatas tu tasyā brāhmaṇyā matiḥ kṣetrajñasaṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_14_u:034.011a: kva nu sā brāhmaṇī kṛṣṇa kva cāsau brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:034.011c: yābhyāṃ siddhir iyaṃ prāptā tāv ubhau vada me 'cyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:034.012a: mano me brāhmaṇaṃ viddhi buddhiṃ me viddhi brāhmaṇīm
GE07mbh_14_u:034.012c: kṣetrajña iti yaś coktaḥ so 'ham eva dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:035.001a: brahma yat paramaṃ vedyaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:035.001c: bhavato hi prasādena sūkṣme me ramate matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.003a: kaś cid brāhmaṇam āsīnam ācāryaṃ saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_14_u:035.003c: śiṣyaḥ papraccha medhāvī kiṃ svic chreyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_14_u:035.004c: yāce tvāṃ śirasā vipra yad brūyāṃ tad vicakṣva me
GE07mbh_14_u:035.005a: tam evaṃvādinaṃ pārtha śiṣyaṃ gurur uvāca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:035.005c: kathayasva pravakṣyāmi yatra te saṃśayo dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:035.006a: ity uktaḥ sa kuruśreṣṭha guruṇā guruvatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.006c: prāñjaliḥ paripapraccha yat tac chṛṇu mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:035.007a: kutaś cāhaṃ kutaś ca tvaṃ tat satyaṃ brūhi yat param
GE07mbh_14_u:035.007c: kuto jātāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:035.008a: kena jīvanti bhūtāni teṣām āyuḥ kim ātmakam
GE07mbh_14_u:035.008c: kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ tapo vipra ke guṇāḥ sadbhir īritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.008e: ke panthānaḥ śivāḥ santi kiṃ sukhaṃ kiṃ ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:035.009a: etān me bhagavan praśnān yāthātathyena sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:035.009c: vaktum arhasi viprarṣe yathāvad iha tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.009d-0071_01: tvad anyaḥ kaś ca na praśnān etān vaktum ihārhati
GE07mbh_14_u:035.009d-0071_02: brūhi dharmavidāṃ śreṣṭha paraṃ kautūhalaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:035.009d-0071_04: sarvasaṃśayasaṃchettā tvad anyo na ca vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:035.011a: tān praśnān abravīt pārtha medhāvī sa dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.012d-003_0001: jñānaṃ tv eva paraṃ vidmaḥ saṃnyāsaṃ tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:035.012d-003_0002: yas tu veda nirābādhaṃ jñānatattvaṃ viniścayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:035.012d-003_0004: yo vidvān sahavāsaṃ ca vivāsaṃ caiva paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:035.012d-003_0006: yo na kāmayate kiṃ cin na kiṃ cid abhimanyate
GE07mbh_14_u:035.012d-003_0015: etaj jñātvā ca tattvena jñānena parāmāsinā
GE07mbh_14_u:035.014a: pravakṣye 'haṃ mahāprājña padam uttamam adya te
GE07mbh_14_u:035.014c: buddhvā yad iha saṃsiddhā bhavantīha manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.016a: vasiṣṭhaḥ kāśyapaś caiva viśvāmitro 'trir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:035.017a: ṛṣim āṅgirasaṃ vṛddhaṃ puraskṛtya tu te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.019a: kathaṃ karma kriyāt sādhu kathaṃ mucyeta kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_14_u:035.019c: ke no mārgāḥ śivāś ca syuḥ kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:035.021a: ity uktaḥ sa muniśreṣṭhair yad āha prapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.021c: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu śiṣya yathāgamam brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:035.022a: satyād bhūtāni jātāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:035.022c: tapasā tāni jīvanti iti tad vitta suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.023a: svāṃ yoniṃ punar āgamya vartante svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:035.024a: brahma satyaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ caiva prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.024c: satyād bhūtāni jātāni bhūtaṃ satyamayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:035.027a: cāturvidyaṃ tathā varṇāṃś caturaś cāśramān pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:035.027c: dharmam ekaṃ catuṣpādaṃ nityam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.028a: panthānaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi śivaṃ kṣemakaraṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.029a: gadatas taṃ mamādyeha panthānaṃ durvidaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:035.030c: gārhasthyaṃ tu dvitīyaṃ syād vānaprastham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:035.030e: tataḥ paraṃ tu vijñeyam adhyātmaṃ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:035.031a: jyotir ākāśam ādityo vāyur indraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.031c: nopaiti yāvad adhyātmaṃ tāvad etān na paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:035.033a: sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ gārhasthyaṃ tad vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:035.033c: śraddhālakṣaṇam ity evaṃ dharmaṃ dhīrāḥ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:035.034a: ity ete devayānā vaḥ panthānaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.035a: eteṣāṃ pṛthag adhyāste yo dharmaṃ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.037a: mahān ātmā tathāvyaktam ahaṃkāras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:035.037c: indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca mahābhūtāni pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:035.038a: viśeṣāḥ pañcabhūtānām ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.039a: tattvānām atha yo veda sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayau
GE07mbh_14_u:035.039c: sa dhīraḥ sarvabhūteṣu na moham adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:035.040a: tattvāni yo vedayate yathātathaṃ; guṇāṃś ca sarvān akhilāś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:035.040c: vidhūtapāpmā pravimucya bandhanaṃ; sa sarvalokān amalān samaśnute brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:036.001a: tad avyaktam anudriktaṃ sarvavyāpi dhruvaṃ sthiram
GE07mbh_14_u:036.002c: buddhisvāmikam ity etat param ekādaśaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:036.003a: trīṇi srotāṃsi yāny asminn āpyāyante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.004a: tamo rajas tathā sattvaṃ guṇān etān pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:036.006a: tamaso mithunaṃ sattvaṃ sattvasya mithunaṃ rajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.006c: rajasaś cāpi sattvaṃ syāt sattvasya mithunaṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.007a: niyamyate tamo yatra rajas tatra pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:036.007c: niyamyate rajo yatra sattvaṃ tatra pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:036.008d-0074_01: tāmasaṃ rūpam etat tu dṛśyate cāpi saṃgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:036.010c: sāttvikaṃ rūpam evaṃ tu lāghavaṃ sādhusaṃmitam
GE07mbh_14_u:036.012c: svapnaḥ stambho bhayaṃ lobhaḥ śokaḥ sukṛtadūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:036.016a: sarva ete guṇā viprās tāmasāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.016c: ye cānye niyatā bhāvā loke 'smin mohasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.017a: tatra tatra niyamyante sarve te tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.018a: atyāgaś cābhimānaś ca moho manyus tathākṣamā
GE07mbh_14_u:036.018c: matsaraś caiva bhūteṣu tāmasaṃ vṛttam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:036.019a: vṛthārambhāś ca ye ke cid vṛthādānāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:036.019c: vṛthābhakṣaṇam ity etat tāmasaṃ vṛttam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:036.021a: evaṃvidhās tu ye ke cil loke 'smin pāpakarmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.021c: manuṣyā bhinnamaryādāḥ sarve te tāmasā janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.023a: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni paśavo vāhanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:036.024a: aṇḍajā jantavo ye ca sarve cāpi catuṣpadāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.024c: unmattā badhirā mūkā ye cānye pāparogiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.025c: avāksrotasa ity ete magnās tamasi tāmasāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.026a: teṣām utkarṣam udrekaṃ vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:036.026c: yathā te sukṛtāṃl lokāṃl labhante puṇyakarmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.027a: anyathā pratipannās tu vivṛddhā ye ca karmasu
GE07mbh_14_u:036.028c: svargaṃ gacchanti devānām ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.029a: anyathā pratipannās tu vivṛddhāḥ sveṣu karmasu
GE07mbh_14_u:036.031a: śūdrayonim atikramya ye cānye tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.032a: abhiṣaṅgas tu kāmeṣu mahāmoha iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.032c: ṛṣayo munayo devā muhyanty atra sukhepsavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.033c: maraṇaṃ tv andhatāmisraṃ tāmisraṃ krodha ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:036.034a: bhāvato guṇataś caiva yonitaś caiva tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:036.034c: sarvam etat tamo viprāḥ kīrtitaṃ vo yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:036.035a: ko nv etad budhyate sādhu ko nv etat sādhu paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:036.036a: tamoguṇā vo bahudhā prakīrtitā; yathāvad uktaṃ ca tamaḥ parāvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:036.036c: naro hi yo veda guṇān imān sadā; sa tāmasaiḥ sarvaguṇaiḥ pramucyate brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:037.003a: balaṃ śauryaṃ mado roṣo vyāyāmakalahāv api
GE07mbh_14_u:037.006c: nindā stutiḥ praśaṃsā ca pratāpaḥ paritarpaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:037.007a: paricaryā ca śuśrūṣā sevā tṛṣṇā vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:037.008a: saṃskārā ye ca loke 'smin pravartante pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:037.008c: nṛṣu nārīṣu bhūteṣu dravyeṣu śaraṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_14_u:037.009a: saṃtāpo 'pratyayaś caiva vratāni niyamāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:037.009c: pradānam āśīryuktaṃ ca satataṃ me bhavatv iti
GE07mbh_14_u:037.011a: idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syāt sneho guṇasamudbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:037.011c: abhidrohas tathā māyā nikṛtir māna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:037.012c: stambho dambho 'tha rāgaś ca bhaktiḥ prītiḥ pramodanam
GE07mbh_14_u:037.013a: dyūtaṃ ca janavādaś ca saṃbandhāḥ strīkṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:037.013c: nṛttavāditragītāni prasaṅgā ye ca ke cana
GE07mbh_14_u:037.013e: sarva ete guṇā viprā rājasāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:037.014c: trivarganiratā nityaṃ dharmo 'rthaḥ kāma ity api
GE07mbh_14_u:037.016a: asmiṃl loke pramodante jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:037.016c: pretyabhāvikam īhanta iha laukikam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:037.016e: dadati pratigṛhṇanti japanty atha ca juhvati
GE07mbh_14_u:037.017a: rajoguṇā vo bahudhānukīrtitā; yathāvad uktaṃ guṇavṛttam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:037.017c: naro hi yo veda guṇān imān sadā; sa rājasaiḥ sarvaguṇair vimucyate brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:038.001a: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tṛtīyaṃ guṇam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:038.002a: ānandaḥ prītir udrekaḥ prākāśyaṃ sukham eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:038.003a: kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:038.003c: akrodhaś cānasūyā ca śaucaṃ dākṣyaṃ parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.004a: mudhā jñānaṃ mudhā vṛttaṃ mudhā sevā mudhā śramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.004c: evaṃ yo yuktadharmaḥ syāt so 'mutrānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:038.005c: akāmahata ity eṣa satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.006a: viśrambho hrīs titikṣā ca tyāgaḥ śaucam atandritā
GE07mbh_14_u:038.007a: harṣas tuṣṭir vismayaś ca vinayaḥ sādhuvṛttatā
GE07mbh_14_u:038.007c: śāntikarma viśuddhiś ca śubhā buddhir vimocanam
GE07mbh_14_u:038.008a: upekṣā brahmacaryaṃ ca parityāgaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.009a: mudhā dānaṃ mudhā yajño mudhādhītaṃ mudhā vratam
GE07mbh_14_u:038.009c: mudhā pratigrahaś caiva mudhā dharmo mudhā tapaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.010a: evaṃvṛttās tu ye ke cil loke 'smin sattvasaṃśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.011a: hitvā sarvāṇi pāpāni niḥśokā hy ajarāmarāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.011c: divaṃ prāpya tu te dhīrāḥ kurvate vai tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.012a: īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca laghutvaṃ manasaś ca te
GE07mbh_14_u:038.013a: ūrdhvasrotasa ity ete devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.013c: vikurvate prakṛtyā vai divaṃ prāptās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.013e: yad yad icchanti tat sarvaṃ bhajante vibhajanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:038.014a: ity etat sāttvikaṃ vṛttaṃ kathitaṃ vo dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:038.014c: etad vijñāya vidhival labhate yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:038.015a: prakīrtitāḥ sattvaguṇā viśeṣato; yathāvad uktaṃ guṇavṛttam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:038.015c: naras tu yo veda guṇān imān sadā; guṇān sa bhuṅkte na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:039.001a: naiva śakyā guṇā vaktuṃ pṛthaktveneha sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.001c: avicchinnāni dṛśyante rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:039.003a: yāvat sattvaṃ tamas tāvad vartate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.003c: yāvat tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca rajas tāvad ihocyate
GE07mbh_14_u:039.005c: vartate tad yathānyūnaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.006c: alpaṃ tatra rajo jñeyaṃ sattvaṃ cālpataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.007a: udriktaṃ ca rajo yatra madhyasrotogataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:039.007c: alpaṃ tatra tamo jñeyaṃ sattvaṃ cālpataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.008a: udriktaṃ ca yadā sattvam ūrdhvasrotogataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:039.008c: alpaṃ tatra rajo jñeyaṃ tamaś cālpataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.009c: na hi sattvāt paro bhāvaḥ kaś cid anyo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:039.010a: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.011a: tamaḥ śūdre rajaḥ kṣatre brāhmaṇe sattvam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:039.011c: ity evaṃ triṣu varṇeṣu vivartante guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.012a: dūrād api hi dṛśyante sahitāḥ saṃghacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.012c: tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva pṛthaktvaṃ nānuśuśruma
GE07mbh_14_u:039.013a: dṛṣṭvā cādityam udyantaṃ kucorāṇāṃ bhayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:039.014a: ādityaḥ sattvam uddiṣṭaṃ kucorās tu yathā tamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.015a: prākāśyaṃ sattvam āditye saṃtāpo rājaso guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.015c: upaplavas tu vijñeyas tāmasas tasya parvasu
GE07mbh_14_u:039.016a: evaṃ jyotiḥṣu sarveṣu vivartante guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.016c: paryāyeṇa ca vartante tatra tatra tathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:039.017c: rājasās tu vivartante snehabhāvas tu sāttvikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.018a: ahas tridhā tu vijñeyaṃ tridhā rātrir vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:039.019a: tridhā dānāni dīyante tridhā yajñaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:039.019c: tridhā lokās tridhā vedās tridhā vidyās tridhā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.020a: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dharmo 'rthaḥ kāma ity api
GE07mbh_14_u:039.020c: prāṇāpānāv udānaś cāpy eta eva trayo guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.021a: yat kiṃ cid iha vai loke sarvam eṣv eva tat triṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:039.021c: trayo guṇāḥ pravartante avyaktā nityam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:039.021e: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva guṇasargaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.022a: tamo 'vyaktaṃ śivaṃ nityam ajaṃ yoniḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.023a: anudriktam anūnaṃ ca hy akampam acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:039.023c: sad asac caiva tat sarvam avyaktaṃ triguṇaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:039.024a: avyaktanāmāni guṇāṃś ca tattvato; yo veda sarvāṇi gatīś ca kevalāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:039.024c: vimuktadehaḥ pravibhāgatattvavit; sa mucyate sarvaguṇair nirāmayaḥ brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:040.001a: avyaktāt pūrvam utpanno mahān ātmā mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:040.001c: ādir guṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prathamaḥ sarga ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:040.002a: mahān ātmā matir viṣṇur viśvaḥ śaṃbhuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:040.002c: buddhiḥ prajñopalabdhiś ca tathā khyātir dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:040.003c: taṃ jānan brāhmaṇo vidvān na pramohaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:040.004c: sarvataḥśrutimāṃl loke sarvaṃ vyāpya sa tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:040.005c: aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:040.006a: tatra buddhimatāṃ lokāḥ saṃnyāsaniratāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:040.007a: jñānavantaś ca ye ke cid alubdhā jitamanyavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:040.007e: vimuktāḥ sarva evaite mahattvam upayānti vai
GE07mbh_14_u:040.008a: ātmano mahato veda yaḥ puṇyāṃ gatim uttamām
GE07mbh_14_u:040.008c: sa dhīraḥ sarvalokeṣu na moham adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:040.009a: evaṃ hi yo veda guhāśayaṃ prabhuṃ; naraḥ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ viśvarūpam
GE07mbh_14_u:040.009c: hiraṇmayaṃ buddhimatāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ; sa buddhimān buddhim atītya tiṣṭhati brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:041.001a: ya utpanno mahān pūrvam ahaṃkāraḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:041.001c: aham ity eva saṃbhūto dvitīyaḥ sarga ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:041.002a: ahaṃkāraś ca bhūtādir vaikārika iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:041.003a: devānāṃ prabhavo devo manasaś ca trilokakṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:041.003c: aham ity eva tat sarvam abhimantā sa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:041.005a: ahaṃkāreṇāharato guṇān imān; bhūtādir evaṃ sṛjate sa bhūtakṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:041.005c: vaikārikaḥ sarvam idaṃ viceṣṭate; svatejasā rañjayate jagat tathā brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:042.001c: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_14_u:042.004a: yady asmāj jāyate bhūtaṃ tatra tat pravilīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.005c: smṛtimantas tadā dhīrā na līyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:042.006a: śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.008c: prāṇāpānāv udānaś ca samāno vyāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:042.009a: antarātmeti cāpy ete niyatāḥ pañca vāyavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.009c: vāṅmanobuddhir ity ebhiḥ sārdham aṣṭātmakaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:042.010c: viśuddhaṃ ca mano yasya buddhiś cāvyabhicāriṇī
GE07mbh_14_u:042.011a: aṣṭau yasyāgnayo hy ete na dahante manaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:042.011c: sa tad brahma śubhaṃ yāti yasmād bhūyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.012a: ekādaśa ca yāny āhur indriyāṇi viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.013a: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
GE07mbh_14_u:042.013c: pādau pāyur upasthaṃ ca hastau vāg daśamī bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:042.014a: indriyagrāma ity eṣa mana ekādaśaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:042.014c: etaṃ grāmaṃ jayet pūrvaṃ tato brahma prakāśate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.016c: ubhayatra mano jñeyaṃ buddhir dvādaśamī bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:042.017c: manyante kṛtam ity eva viditvaitāni paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.017d-0078_01: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvaṃ vividham indriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:042.018c: sthalam āpas tathākāśaṃ janma cāpi caturvidham
GE07mbh_14_u:042.019c: caturdhā janma ity etad bhūtagrāmasya lakṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.020a: acarāṇy api bhūtāni khecarāṇi tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:042.021a: saṃsvedāḥ kṛmayaḥ proktā jantavaś ca tathāvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.021c: janma dvitīyam ity etaj jaghanyataram ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.022a: bhittvā tu pṛthivīṃ yāni jāyante kālaparyayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:042.023c: jarāyujāni bhūtāni vitta tāny api sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.024c: tapaḥ karma ca yat puṇyam ity eṣa viduṣāṃ nayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.025a: dvividhaṃ karma vijñeyam ijyā dānaṃ ca yan makhe
GE07mbh_14_u:042.026a: etad yo veda vidhivat sa muktaḥ syād dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.027a: ākāśaṃ prathamaṃ bhūtaṃ śrotram adhyātmam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.028a: dvitīyaṃ māruto bhūtaṃ tvag adhyātmaṃ ca viśrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:042.029a: tṛtīyaṃ jyotir ity āhuś cakṣur adhyātmam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.030a: caturtham āpo vijñeyaṃ jihvā cādhyātmam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.031a: pṛthivī pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ ghrāṇaś cādhyātmam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.032c: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvaṃ trividham indriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:042.033a: pādāv adhyātmam ity āhur brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.034a: avāggatir apānaś ca pāyur adhyātmam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.035c: adhibhūtaṃ tathā śukraṃ daivataṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.036a: hastāv adhyātmam ity āhur adhyātmaviduṣo janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.040a: yathāvad adhyātmavidhir eṣa vaḥ kīrtito mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:042.040c: jñānam asya hi dharmajñāḥ prāptaṃ buddhimatām iha
GE07mbh_14_u:042.042a: kṣīṇe manasi sarvasmin na janmasukham iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.044c: etad brāhmaṇato vṛttam āhur ekapadaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_14_u:042.045a: vidvān kūrma ivāṅgāni kāmān saṃhṛtya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.045c: virajāḥ sarvato mukto yo naraḥ sa sukhī sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:042.049b-0081_01: etad eva hi loke 'smin mano hṛdi samāśritam
GE07mbh_14_u:042.049c: svayaṃyonis tadā sūkṣmāt sūkṣmam āpnoty anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:042.050a: agnī rūpaṃ payaḥ sroto vāyuḥ sparśanam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:042.050c: mahī paṅkadharaṃ ghoram ākāśaṃ śravaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:042.053c: etad eva hi loke 'smin kālacakraṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.054c: visṛjet saṃkṣipec caiva bodhayet sāmaraṃ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:042.055c: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena sa tāṃs tyajati dustyajān
GE07mbh_14_u:042.056a: yasyaite nirjitā loke triguṇāḥ pañca dhātavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.056c: vyomni tasya paraṃ sthānam anantam atha lakṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:042.057c: nadīṃ durgahradāṃ tīrṇaḥ kāmakrodhāv ubhau jayet
GE07mbh_14_u:042.058a: sa sarvadoṣanirmuktas tataḥ paśyati yat param
GE07mbh_14_u:042.058c: mano manasi saṃdhāya paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:042.059c: ekadhā bahudhā caiva vikurvāṇas tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.060a: dhruvaṃ paśyati rūpāṇi dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:042.060c: sa vai viṣṇuś ca mitraś ca varuṇo 'gniḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.061a: sa hi dhātā vidhātā ca sa prabhuḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:042.062a: taṃ viprasaṃghāś ca surāsurāś ca; yakṣāḥ piśācāḥ pitaro vayāṃsi
GE07mbh_14_u:042.062c: rakṣogaṇā bhūtagaṇāś ca sarve; maharṣayaś caiva sadā stuvanti brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:043.001a: manuṣyāṇāṃ tu rājanyaḥ kṣatriyo madhyamo guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.002a: aviḥ paśūnāṃ sarveṣām ākhuś ca bilavāsinām
GE07mbh_14_u:043.002c: gavāṃ govṛṣabhaś caiva strīṇāṃ puruṣa eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:043.003a: nyagrodho jambuvṛkṣaś ca pippalaḥ śālmalis tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:043.003e: ete drumāṇāṃ rājāno loke 'smin nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.004a: himavān pāriyātraś ca sahyo vindhyas trikūṭavān
GE07mbh_14_u:043.004c: śveto nīlaś ca bhāsaś ca kāṣṭhavāṃś caiva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.005a: śubhaskandho mahendraś ca mālyavān parvatas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:043.006a: sūryo grahāṇām adhipo nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca candramāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.006c: yamaḥ pitṝṇām adhipaḥ saritām atha sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.007a: ambhasāṃ varuṇo rājā sattvānāṃ mitra ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.008c: oṣadhīnāṃ patiḥ somo viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.009c: dakṣiṇānāṃ tathā yajño vedānām ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:043.010a: diśām udīcī viprāṇāṃ somo rājā pratāpavān
GE07mbh_14_u:043.010e: eṣa bhūtādikaḥ sargaḥ prajānāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.011a: sarveṣām eva bhūtānām ahaṃ brahmamayo mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:043.011c: bhūtaṃ parataraṃ matto viṣṇor vāpi na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.012c: īśvaraṃ taṃ vijānīmaḥ sa vibhuḥ sa prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.015a: umāṃ devīṃ vijānīta nārīṇām uttamāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_14_u:043.015c: ratīnāṃ vasumatyas tu strīṇām apsarasas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:043.017a: rājñāṃ hi viṣaye yeṣām avasīdanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.018a: rājñāṃ tu viṣaye yeṣāṃ sādhavaḥ parirakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.018c: te 'smiṃl loke pramodante pretya cānantyam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:043.021a: jyotiṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ rūpam āpaś ca rasalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.022c: manaso lakṣaṇaṃ cintā tathoktā buddhir anvayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:043.023c: buddhir hi vyavasāyena lakṣyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.025a: tasmāj jñānaṃ puraskṛtya saṃnyased iha buddhimān
GE07mbh_14_u:043.026c: guṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ samyag vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:043.027a: pārthivo yas tu gandho vai ghrāṇeneha sa gṛhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.027c: ghrāṇasthaś ca tathā vāyur gandhajñāne vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.028a: apāṃ dhāturaso nityaṃ jihvayā sa tu gṛhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.028c: jihvāsthaś ca tathā somo rasajñāne vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.029a: jyotiṣaś ca guṇo rūpaṃ cakṣuṣā tac ca gṛhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.030a: vāyavyas tu tathā sparśas tvacā prajñāyate ca saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.030c: tvaksthaś caiva tathā vāyuḥ sparśajñāne vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.031a: ākāśasya guṇo ghoṣaḥ śrotreṇa sa tu gṛhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.031c: śrotrasthāś ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ śabdajñāne prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.032a: manasas tu guṇaś cintā prajñayā sa tu gṛhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.033a: buddhir adhyavasāyena dhyānena ca mahāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:043.033c: niścitya grahaṇaṃ nityam avyaktaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.035c: sadā paśyāmy ahaṃ līnaṃ vijānāmi śṛṇomi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:043.036a: puruṣas tad vijānīte tasmāt kṣetrajña ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:043.037c: na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ sṛjyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:043.038a: na satyaṃ veda vai kaś cit kṣetrajñas tv eva vindati
GE07mbh_14_u:043.038c: guṇānāṃ guṇabhūtānāṃ yat paraṃ parato mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:043.039a: tasmād guṇāṃś ca tattvaṃ ca parityajyeha tattvavit
GE07mbh_14_u:043.039c: kṣīṇadoṣo guṇān hitvā kṣetrajñaṃ praviśaty atha
GE07mbh_14_u:043.040c: acalaś cāniketaś ca kṣetrajñaḥ sa paro vibhuḥ brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:044.002a: ahaḥ pūrvaṃ tato rātrir māsāḥ śuklādayaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.003a: bhūmir ādis tu gandhānāṃ rasānām āpa eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:044.003c: rūpāṇāṃ jyotir ādis tu sparśādir vāyur ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:044.004a: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bhūtānām ādim uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:044.004c: ādityo jyotiṣām ādir agnir bhūtādir iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:044.005c: oṃkāraḥ sarvavedānāṃ vacasāṃ prāṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:044.005e: yady asmin niyataṃ loke sarvaṃ sāvitram ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:044.006a: gāyatrī chandasām ādiḥ paśūnām aja ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:044.007a: śyenaḥ patatriṇām ādir yajñānāṃ hutam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:044.007c: parisarpiṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sarpo dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.008a: kṛtam ādir yugānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.009c: dravāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ peyānām āpa uttamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.010c: brahmakṣetraṃ sadā puṇyaṃ plakṣaḥ prathamajaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.011a: ahaṃ prajāpatīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.011c: mama viṣṇur acintyātmā svayaṃbhūr iti sa smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.012c: diśāṃ ca pradiśāṃ cordhvā digjātā prathamaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:044.013a: tathā tripathagā gaṅgā nadīnām agrajā smṛtā
GE07mbh_14_u:044.015a: ādir viśvasya jagato viṣṇur brahmamayo mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:044.015c: bhūtaṃ parataraṃ tasmāt trailokye neha vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:044.016a: āśramāṇāṃ ca gārhasthyaṃ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:044.016c: lokānām ādir avyaktaṃ sarvasyāntas tad eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:044.017c: sukhasyāntaḥ sadā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyāntaḥ sadā sukham
GE07mbh_14_u:044.019a: sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ vināśāntaṃ jātasya maraṇaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:044.020a: iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ tapo 'dhītaṃ vratāni niyamāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:044.020c: sarvam etad vināśāntaṃ jñānasyānto na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:045.010c: visṛjet saṃkṣipec cāpi bodhayet sāmaraṃ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:045.011c: yas tu veda naro nityaṃ na sa bhūteṣu muhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:045.014a: yaḥ kaś cid iha loke ca hy āgamaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:045.016c: pañcabhiś ca mahāyajñaiḥ śraddadhāno yajeta ha
GE07mbh_14_u:045.018c: na ca vāgaṅgacapala iti śiṣṭasya gocaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:045.019c: niyato damadānābhyāṃ sadā śiṣṭaiś ca saṃviśet
GE07mbh_14_u:045.020c: vaiṇavīṃ dhārayed yaṣṭiṃ sodakaṃ ca kamaṇḍalum
GE07mbh_14_u:045.020d-0084_03: ekaṃ śaucavidhānārtham ity etat tritayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:045.021c: dānaṃ pratigrahaṃ caiva ṣaḍguṇāṃ vṛttim ācaret
GE07mbh_14_u:045.022a: trīṇi karmāṇi yānīha brāhmaṇānāṃ tu jīvikā
GE07mbh_14_u:045.023a: avaśeṣāṇi cānyāni trīṇi karmāṇi yāni tu
GE07mbh_14_u:045.023c: dānam adhyayanaṃ yajño dharmayuktāni tāni tu
GE07mbh_14_u:045.024a: teṣv apramādaṃ kurvīta triṣu karmasu dharmavit
GE07mbh_14_u:045.025a: sarvam etad yathāśakti vipro nirvartayañ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:045.025c: evaṃ yukto jayet svargaṃ gṛhasthaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:046.004a: dvikālam agniṃ juhvānaḥ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.004c: dhārayīta sadā daṇḍaṃ bailvaṃ pālāśam eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:046.005a: kṣaumaṃ kārpāsikaṃ vāpi mṛgājinam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:046.005c: sarvaṃ kāṣāyaraktaṃ syād vāso vāpi dvijasya ha
GE07mbh_14_u:046.006a: mekhalā ca bhaven mauñjī jaṭī nityodakas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:046.008a: evaṃ yukto jayet svargam ūrdhvaretāḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.008c: na saṃsarati jātīṣu paramaṃ sthānam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.009c: grāmān niṣkramya cāraṇyaṃ muniḥ pravrajito vaset
GE07mbh_14_u:046.010c: araṇyagocaro nityaṃ na grāmaṃ praviśet punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.011a: arcayann atithīn kāle dadyāc cāpi pratiśrayam
GE07mbh_14_u:046.012a: pravṛttam udakaṃ vāyuṃ sarvaṃ vāneyam ā tṛṇāt
GE07mbh_14_u:046.013c: yadbhakṣaḥ syāt tato dadyād bhikṣāṃ nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.015a: dānto maitraḥ kṣamāyuktaḥ keśaśmaśru ca dhārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:046.016c: evaṃ yukto jayet svargaṃ vānaprastho jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.017a: gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.017c: ya icchen mokṣam āsthātum uttamāṃ vṛttim āśrayet
GE07mbh_14_u:046.019c: joṣayeta sadā bhojyaṃ grāsam āgatam aspṛhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.021a: grāsād ācchādanāc cānyan na gṛhṇīyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:046.022a: parebhyo na pratigrāhyaṃ na ca deyaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:046.022c: dainyabhāvāc ca bhūtānāṃ saṃvibhajya sadā budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.023c: na kiṃ cid viṣayaṃ bhuktvā spṛhayet tasya vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.025a: na śilpajīvikāṃ jīved dvirannaṃ nota kāmayet
GE07mbh_14_u:046.025c: na dveṣṭā nopadeṣṭā ca bhaveta nirupaskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.026c: kṛtvā vahniṃ cared bhaikṣyaṃ vidhūme bhuktavajjane
GE07mbh_14_u:046.027c: lābhe na ca prahṛṣyeta nālābhe vimanā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:046.028a: mātrāśī kālam ākāṅkṣaṃś cared bhaikṣyaṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.029c: nāsvādayīta bhuñjāno rasāṃś ca madhurāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:046.030c: na cānyam anubhikṣeta bhikṣamāṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:046.031a: na saṃnikāśayed dharmaṃ vivikte virajāś caret
GE07mbh_14_u:046.031c: śūnyāgāram araṇyaṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ nadīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:046.031e: pratiśrayārthaṃ seveta pārvatīṃ vā punar guhām
GE07mbh_14_u:046.032a: grāmaikarātriko grīṣme varṣāsv ekatra vā vaset
GE07mbh_14_u:046.032c: adhvā sūryeṇa nirdiṣṭaḥ kīṭavac ca caren mahīm
GE07mbh_14_u:046.033a: dayārthaṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ samīkṣya pṛthivīṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:046.033c: saṃcayāṃś ca na kurvīta snehavāsaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:046.034a: pūtena cāmbhasā nityaṃ kāryaṃ kurvīta mokṣavit
GE07mbh_14_u:046.034c: upaspṛśed uddhṛtābhir adbhiś ca puruṣaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:046.035a: ahiṃsā brahmacaryaṃ ca satyam ārjavam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:046.035c: akrodhaś cānasūyā ca damo nityam apaiśunam
GE07mbh_14_u:046.036a: aṣṭāsv eteṣu yuktaḥ syād vrateṣu niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.036c: apāpam aśaṭhaṃ vṛttam ajihmaṃ nityam ācaret
GE07mbh_14_u:046.037c: lokasaṃgrahadharmaṃ ca naiva kuryān na kārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:046.038c: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca
GE07mbh_14_u:046.039a: paraṃ nodvejayet kaṃ cin na ca kasya cid udvijet
GE07mbh_14_u:046.040a: anāgataṃ ca na dhyāyen nātītam anucintayet
GE07mbh_14_u:046.041a: na cakṣuṣā na manasā na vācā dūṣayet kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:046.041c: na pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā kiṃ cid duṣṭaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_14_u:046.044c: sarvajñaḥ sarvato mukto mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.046c: atvagasthy atha vāmajjam amāṃsam api caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:046.047a: niścintam avyayaṃ nityaṃ hṛdistham api nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:046.047c: sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ ye paśyanti na te mṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.048a: na tatra kramate buddhir nendriyāṇi na devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.048c: vedā yajñāś ca lokāś ca na tapo na parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.050c: yathainam avamanyeran pare satatam eva hi
GE07mbh_14_u:046.051c: yo hy evaṃ vṛttasaṃpannaḥ sa muniḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:046.053a: sarvam etat prasaṃkhyāya samyak saṃtyajya nirmalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:046.055c: kṣīṇakośo nirātaṅkaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:047.001a: saṃnyāsaṃ tapa ity āhur vṛddhā niścitadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:047.001c: brāhmaṇā brahmayonisthā jñānaṃ brahma paraṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:047.002c: nirdvaṃdvaṃ nirguṇaṃ nityam acintyaṃ guhyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:047.003a: jñānena tapasā caiva dhīrāḥ paśyanti tat padam
GE07mbh_14_u:047.005a: tapaḥ pradīpa ity āhur ācāro dharmasādhakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:047.005c: jñānaṃ tv eva paraṃ vidma saṃnyāsas tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:047.006a: yas tu veda nirābādhaṃ jñānaṃ tattvaviniścayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:047.007a: yo vidvān sahavāsaṃ ca vivāsaṃ caiva paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:047.008a: yo na kāmayate kiṃ cin na kiṃ cid avamanyate
GE07mbh_14_u:047.011a: hitvā guṇamayaṃ sarvaṃ karma jantuḥ śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:047.011c: ubhe satyānṛte hitvā mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:047.014a: etac chittvā ca bhittvā ca jñānena paramāsinā
GE07mbh_14_u:047.014c: hitvā cāmaratāṃ prāpya jahyād vai mṛtyujanmanī
GE07mbh_14_u:047.015a: dvāv etau pakṣiṇau nityau sakhāyau cāpy acetanau
GE07mbh_14_u:047.015c: etābhyāṃ tu paro yasya cetanāvān iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:047.016c: sa kṣetrajñaḥ sattvasaṃghātabuddhir; guṇātigo mucyate mṛtyupāśāt brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:048.001a: ke cid brahmamayaṃ vṛkṣaṃ ke cid brahmamayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:048.001c: ke cit puruṣam avyaktaṃ ke cit param anāmayam
GE07mbh_14_u:048.002a: ucchvāsamātram api ced yo 'ntakāle samo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:048.004a: prāṇāyāmair atha prāṇān saṃyamya sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.005a: evaṃ pūrvaṃ prasannātmā labhate yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:048.006e: na śakyam anyathā gantuṃ puruṣaṃ tam atho dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.007a: kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:048.007c: jñānaṃ tyāgo 'tha saṃnyāsaḥ sāttvikaṃ vṛttam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:048.008c: sattvaṃ ca puruṣaś caikas tatra nāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:048.009a: āhur eke ca vidvāṃso ye jñāne supratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.010a: pṛthagbhūtas tato nityam ity etad avicāritam
GE07mbh_14_u:048.010c: pṛthagbhāvaś ca vijñeyaḥ sahajaś cāpi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.011c: maśakodumbare tv aikyaṃ pṛthaktvam api dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:048.012a: matsyo yathānyaḥ syād apsu saṃprayogas tathānayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.013a: ity uktavantaṃ te viprās tadā lokapitāmaham
GE07mbh_14_u:048.014a: kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:048.014c: vyāhatām iva paśyāmo dharmasya vividhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:048.015a: ūrdhvaṃ dehād vadanty eke naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.015c: ke cit saṃśayitaṃ sarvaṃ niḥsaṃśayam athāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.016a: anityaṃ nityam ity eke nāsty astīty api cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.016c: ekarūpaṃ dvidhety eke vyāmiśram iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.016e: ekam eke pṛthak cānye bahutvam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.017c: jaṭājinadharāś cānye muṇḍāḥ ke cid asaṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.018a: asnānaṃ ke cid icchanti snānam ity api cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.018c: āhāraṃ ke cid icchanti ke cic cānaśane ratāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.019a: karma ke cit praśaṃsanti praśāntim api cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.019c: deśakālāv ubhau ke cin naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.019e: ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid bhogān pṛthagvidhān
GE07mbh_14_u:048.020a: dhanāni ke cid icchanti nirdhanatvaṃ tathāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.020c: upāsyasādhanaṃ tv eke naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.021c: puṇyena yaśasety eke naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.022a: sadbhāvaniratāś cānye ke cit saṃśayite sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.022c: duḥkhād anye sukhād anye dhyānam ity apare sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.023a: yajñam ity apare dhīrāḥ pradānam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.023c: sarvam eke praśaṃsanti na sarvam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:048.024a: tapas tv anye praśaṃsanti svādhyāyam apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.024c: jñānaṃ saṃnyāsam ity eke svabhāvaṃ bhūtacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.026a: idaṃ śreya idaṃ śreya ity evaṃ prasthito janaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.026c: yo hi yasmin rato dharme sa taṃ pūjayate sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:048.027a: tatra no vihatā prajñā manaś ca bahulīkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:048.027c: etad ākhyātum icchāmaḥ śreyaḥ kim iti sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:048.028a: ataḥ paraṃ ca yad guhyaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:048.029a: evam uktaḥ sa tair viprair bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:048.029c: tebhyaḥ śaśaṃsa dharmātmā yāthātathyena buddhimān brahmovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:049.001a: hanta vaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchatha sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.001b-0087_01: guruṇā śiṣyam āsādya yad uktaṃ tan nibodhata
GE07mbh_14_u:049.001c: samastam iha tac chrutvā samyag evāvadhāryatām
GE07mbh_14_u:049.003a: jñānaṃ niḥśreya ity āhur vṛddhā niścayadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.004a: hiṃsāparāś ca ye loke ye ca nāstikavṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.005a: āśīryuktāni karmāṇi kurvate ye tv atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.005c: te 'smiṃl loke pramodante jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.006a: kurvate ye tu karmāṇi śraddadhānā vipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.007c: saṃyogo viprayogaś ca tan nibodhata sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.008c: viṣayī puruṣo nityaṃ sattvaṃ ca viṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.009c: bhujyamānaṃ na jānīte nityaṃ sattvam acetanam
GE07mbh_14_u:049.009e: yas tv eva tu vijānīte yo bhuṅkte yaś ca bhujyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.011a: samaḥ saṃjñāgatas tv evaṃ yadā sarvatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.012a: sarvair api guṇair vidvān vyatiṣakto na lipyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.012e: evam evāpy asaṃsaktaḥ puruṣaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.013c: yathā dravyaṃ ca kartā ca saṃyogo 'py anayos tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.014a: yathā pradīpam ādāya kaś cit tamasi gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:049.016a: vyaktaḥ sattvaguṇas tv evaṃ puruṣo 'vyakta iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.016c: etad viprā vijānīta hanta bhūyo bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.017b-0088_01: tat padaṃ samanuprāptaṃ yatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_14_u:049.017b-0088_02: tvam apy etan mahābhāga yathoktaṃ brahmavarcasā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.017b-0088_03: vyaktaḥ sattvaguṇas tv evaṃ buddhimān sukham edhate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.018c: upāyajño hi medhāvī sukham atyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:049.019a: yathādhvānam apātheyaḥ prapanno mānavaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:049.019c: kleśena yāti mahatā vinaśyaty antarāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.020a: tathā karmasu vijñeyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.021a: yathā ca dīrgham adhvānaṃ padbhyām eva prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.024a: yāvad rathapathas tāvad rathena sa tu gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:049.024c: kṣīṇe rathapathe prājño ratham utsṛjya gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:049.026c: bāhubhyām eva saṃmohād vadhaṃ carcchaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:049.027a: nāvā cāpi yathā prājño vibhāgajñas taritrayā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.027c: aklāntaḥ salilaṃ gāhet kṣipraṃ saṃtarati dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:049.028a: tīrṇo gacchet paraṃ pāraṃ nāvam utsṛjya nirmamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.029a: snehāt saṃmoham āpanno nāvi dāśo yathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.030a: nāvaṃ na śakyam āruhya sthale viparivartitum
GE07mbh_14_u:049.030c: tathaiva ratham āruhya nāpsu caryā vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.031a: evaṃ karma kṛtaṃ citraṃ viṣayasthaṃ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:049.031c: yathā karma kṛtaṃ loke tathā tad upapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.032a: yan naiva gandhino rasyaṃ na rūpasparśaśabdavat
GE07mbh_14_u:049.032c: manyante munayo buddhyā tat pradhānaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.033a: tatra pradhānam avyaktam avyaktasya guṇo mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:049.034c: pṛthaktvena hi bhūtānāṃ viṣayā vai guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.035c: bījadharmā mahān ātmā prasavaś ceti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:049.036a: bījadharmā tv ahaṃkāraḥ prasavaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.037a: bījadharmiṇa ity āhuḥ prasavaṃ ca na kurvate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.038c: triguṇaṃ jyotir ity āhur āpaś cāpi caturguṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.040a: śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.040c: ete pañca guṇā bhūmer vijñeyā dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.041a: pārthivaś ca sadā gandho gandhaś ca bahudhā smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.041c: tasya gandhasya vakṣyāmi vistareṇa bahūn guṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:049.042a: iṣṭaś cāniṣṭagandhaś ca madhuro 'mlaḥ kaṭus tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.042c: nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rūkṣo viśada eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:049.042e: evaṃ daśavidho jñeyaḥ pārthivo gandha ity uta
GE07mbh_14_u:049.043a: śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ rasaś cāpāṃ guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.043c: rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi rasas tu bahudhā smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.044a: madhuro 'mlaḥ kaṭus tiktaḥ kaṣāyo lavaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.045a: śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ triguṇaṃ jyotir ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.045c: jyotiṣaś ca guṇo rūpaṃ rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:049.046a: śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā raktaṃ nīlaṃ pītāruṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.046c: hrasvaṃ dīrghaṃ tathā sthūlaṃ caturasrāṇu vṛttakam
GE07mbh_14_u:049.048a: śabdasparśau ca vijñeyau dviguṇo vāyur ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:049.048c: vāyoś cāpi guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaś ca bahudhā smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.049a: uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukho duḥkhaḥ snigdho viśada eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:049.049c: kaṭhinaś cikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilo dāruṇo mṛduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.051a: tatraikaguṇam ākāśaṃ śabda ity eva ca smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.051c: tasya śabdasya vakṣyāmi vistareṇa bahūn guṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:049.052a: ṣaḍjarṣabhau ca gāndhāro madhyamaḥ pañcamas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.052c: ataḥ paraṃ tu vijñeyo niṣādo dhaivatas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:049.053a: iṣṭo 'niṣṭaś ca śabdas tu saṃhataḥ pravibhāgavān
GE07mbh_14_u:049.054a: ākāśam uttamaṃ bhūtam ahaṃkāras tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:049.054c: ahaṃkārāt parā buddhir buddher ātmā tataḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:049.055a: tasmāt tu param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.001a: bhūtānām atha pañcānāṃ yathaiṣām īśvaraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.001c: niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā mana eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:050.002a: adhiṣṭhātā mano nityaṃ bhūtānāṃ mahatāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:050.002c: buddhir aiśvaryam ācaṣṭe kṣetrajñaḥ sarva ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:050.003a: indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte sadaśvān iva sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.003c: indriyāṇi mano buddhiṃ kṣetrajño yuñjate sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:050.004c: tam āruhya sa bhūtātmā samantāt paridhāvati
GE07mbh_14_u:050.006a: evaṃ yo vetti vidvān vai sadā brahmamayaṃ ratham
GE07mbh_14_u:050.006c: sa dhīraḥ sarvalokeṣu na moham adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:050.009c: etad brahmavanaṃ nityaṃ yasmiṃś carati kṣetravit
GE07mbh_14_u:050.010a: loke 'smin yāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:050.010c: tāny evāgre pralīyante paścād bhūtakṛtā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.011c: sarve svabhāvataḥ sṛṣṭā na kriyābhyo na kāraṇāt
GE07mbh_14_u:050.012a: ete viśvakṛto viprā jāyante ha punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.012c: tebhyaḥ prasūtās teṣv eva mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_14_u:050.013c: bhūtebhyaś cāpi pañcabhyo mukto gacchet prajāpatim
GE07mbh_14_u:050.017c: tat sarvaṃ tapasā sādhyaṃ tapo hi duratikramam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.019c: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni trasāni sthāvarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:050.020c: tathaiva tapasā devā mahābhāgā divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.021a: āśīryuktāni karmāṇi kurvate ye tv atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.025a: avyaktād eva saṃbhūtaḥ samayajño gataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.026c: kṣetrajña iti taṃ vidyād yas taṃ veda sa vedavit
GE07mbh_14_u:050.027a: cittaṃ cittād upāgamya munir āsīta saṃyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.027c: yaccittas tanmanā bhūtvā guhyam etat sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.028c: nibodhata yathā hīdaṃ guṇair lakṣaṇam ity uta
GE07mbh_14_u:050.029a: dvyakṣaras tu bhaven mṛtyus tryakṣaraṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.029c: mameti ca bhaven mṛtyur na mameti ca śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.030a: karma ke cit praśaṃsanti mandabuddhitarā narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.030c: ye tu buddhā mahātmāno na praśaṃsanti karma te
GE07mbh_14_u:050.032a: tasmāt karmasu niḥsnehā ye ke cit pāradarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.032c: vidyāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo na tu karmamayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.032d-0091_01: ya evam amṛtaṃ nityam agrāhyaṃ śaśvad akṣaram
GE07mbh_14_u:050.032d-0091_02: vaśyātmānam asaṃśliṣṭaṃ yo veda na mṛto bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:050.033a: apūrvam amṛtaṃ nityaṃ ya enam avicāriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.033e: agrāhyo 'mṛto bhavati ya ebhiḥ kāraṇair dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.034c: sa tad brahma śubhaṃ vetti yasmād bhūyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:050.035c: lakṣaṇaṃ hi prasādasya yathā syāt svapnadarśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.036a: gatir eṣā tu muktānāṃ ye jñānapariniṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.036c: pravṛttayaś ca yāḥ sarvāḥ paśyanti pariṇāmajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.037a: eṣā gatir asaktānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.037c: eṣā jñānavatāṃ prāptir etad vṛttam aninditam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.038c: śakyā gatir iyaṃ gantuṃ sarvatra samadarśinā
GE07mbh_14_u:050.039a: etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā viprarṣisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.039c: evam ācarata kṣipraṃ tataḥ siddhim avāpsyatha
GE07mbh_14_u:050.040a: ity uktās te tu munayo brahmaṇā guruṇā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:050.041a: tvam apy etan mahābhāga yathoktaṃ brahmaṇo vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:050.041c: samyag ācara śuddhātmaṃs tataḥ siddhim avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:050.042a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā śiṣyo guruṇā dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:050.042c: cakāra sarvaṃ kaunteya tato mokṣam avāptavān
GE07mbh_14_u:050.043a: kṛtakṛtyaś ca sa tadā śiṣyaḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:050.043c: tat padaṃ samanuprāpto yatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_14_u:050.044a: ko nv asau brāhmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇa kaś ca śiṣyo janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:050.044c: śrotavyaṃ cen mayaitad vai tat tvam ācakṣva me vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:050.045a: ahaṃ gurur mahābāho manaḥ śiṣyaṃ ca viddhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:050.045c: tvatprītyā guhyam etac ca kathitaṃ me dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:050.046a: mayi ced asti te prītir nityaṃ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:050.046c: adhyātmam etac chrutvā tvaṃ samyag ācara suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:050.047a: tatas tvaṃ samyag ācīrṇe dharme 'smin kurunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:050.048a: pūrvam apy etad evoktaṃ yuddhakāla upasthite
GE07mbh_14_u:050.048c: mayā tava mahābāho tasmād atra manaḥ kuru
GE07mbh_14_u:050.049a: mayā tu bharataśreṣṭha ciradṛṣṭaḥ pitā vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:050.049c: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi saṃmate tava phalguna
GE07mbh_14_u:050.050b-0093_04: dānam apy arthadoṣeṇa nāma tasmāt kalau smaret
GE07mbh_14_u:050.050b-0093_05: yadi gantuṃ kṛtā buddhir vāsudeva namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_14_u:050.050c: gacchāvo nagaraṃ kṛṣṇa gajasāhvayam adya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:050.051c: samanujñāpya durdharṣaṃ svāṃ purīṃ yātum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:051.001c: muhūrtād iva cācaṣṭa yuktam ity eva dārukaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.003a: ity uktāḥ sainikās te tu sajjībhūtā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:051.004a: tatas tau ratham āsthāya prayātau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_14_u:051.004c: vikurvāṇau kathāś citrāḥ prīyamāṇau viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:051.006c: nihatāḥ śatravaś cāpi prāptaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_14_u:051.007c: bhavantaṃ plavam āsādya tīrṇāḥ sma kurusāgaram
GE07mbh_14_u:051.007d-0094_01: bhaktāṃs tvam āśritān asmān pālayāmutra ceha ca
GE07mbh_14_u:051.008c: yathāhaṃ tvā vijānāmi yathā cāhaṃ bhavanmanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.008d-0095_01: bhavāmi satataṃ kṛṣṇa tathā kuru mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:051.009c: ratiḥ krīḍāmayī tubhyaṃ māyā te rodasī vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:051.010a: tvayi sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ yad idaṃ sthāṇujaṅgamam
GE07mbh_14_u:051.010c: tvaṃ hi sarvaṃ vikuruṣe bhūtagrāmaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:051.012a: prāṇo vāyuḥ satatagaḥ krodho mṛtyuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.012c: prasāde cāpi padmā śrīr nityaṃ tvayi mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:051.013a: ratis tuṣṭir dhṛtiḥ kṣāntis tvayi cedaṃ carācaram
GE07mbh_14_u:051.014a: sudīrgheṇāpi kālena na te śakyā guṇā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:051.014c: ātmā ca paramo vaktuṃ namas te nalinekṣaṇa
GE07mbh_14_u:051.015a: vidito me 'si durdharṣa nāradād devalāt tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:051.016a: tvayi sarvaṃ samāsaktaṃ tvam evaiko janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.017a: etat sarvam ahaṃ samyag ācariṣye janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:051.018a: yat pāpo nihataḥ saṃkhye kauravyo dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.018c: tvayā dagdhaṃ hi tat sainyaṃ mayā vijitam āhave
GE07mbh_14_u:051.019a: bhavatā tat kṛtaṃ karma yenāvāpto jayo mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:051.020c: saindhavasya ca pāpasya bhūriśravasa eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:051.020d-0096_01: tasmāt tvam eva saṃcintya hitaṃ kuru yathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:051.021c: yad uktas tat kariṣyāmi na hi me 'tra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:051.023a: rucitaṃ hi mamaitat te dvārakāgamanaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:051.023c: acirāc caiva dṛṣṭā tvaṃ mātulaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:051.026a: viduraṃ ca mahābuddhiṃ rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_14_u:051.026c: bhīmasenaṃ ca durdharṣaṃ mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_14_u:051.027a: gāndhārīṃ ca mahāprājñāṃ pṛthāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ ca bhāminīm
GE07mbh_14_u:051.027c: subhadrādyāś ca tāḥ sarvā bharatānāṃ striyas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:051.027e: dadṛśāte sthitāḥ sarvā gāndhārīṃ parivārya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:051.028c: nivedya nāmadheye sve tasya pādāv agṛhṇatām
GE07mbh_14_u:051.029a: gāndhāryāś ca pṛthāyāś ca dharmarājñas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:051.029c: bhīmasya ca mahātmānau tathā pādāv agṛhṇatām
GE07mbh_14_u:051.029d-0097_01: bhīmasya ca vavandāte tathā pādau mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.030a: kṣattāraṃ cāpi saṃpūjya pṛṣṭvā kuśalam avyayam
GE07mbh_14_u:051.030c: taiḥ sārdhaṃ nṛpatiṃ vṛddhaṃ tatas taṃ paryupāsatām
GE07mbh_14_u:051.031c: janārdanaṃ ca medhāvī vyasarjayata vai gṛhān
GE07mbh_14_u:051.032a: te 'nujñātā nṛpatinā yayuḥ svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:051.032c: dhanaṃjayagṛhān eva yayau kṛṣṇas tu vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:051.035a: tatas tau tat praviśyātha dadṛśāte mahābalau
GE07mbh_14_u:051.037a: tataḥ sa rājā medhāvī vivakṣū prekṣya tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_14_u:051.038a: vivakṣū hi yuvāṃ manye vīrau yadukurūdvahau
GE07mbh_14_u:051.038c: brūta kartāsmi sarvaṃ vāṃ na cirān mā vicāryatām
GE07mbh_14_u:051.039a: ity ukte phalgunas tatra dharmarājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:051.041a: sa gacched abhyanujñāto bhavatā yadi manyase
GE07mbh_14_u:051.042a: puṇḍarīkākṣa bhadraṃ te gaccha tvaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:051.042c: purīṃ dvāravatīm adya draṣṭuṃ śūrasutaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_14_u:051.043a: rocate me mahābāho gamanaṃ tava keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:051.043c: mātulaś ciradṛṣṭo me tvayā devī ca devakī
GE07mbh_14_u:051.044a: mātulaṃ vasudevaṃ tvaṃ baladevaṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:051.045a: smarethāś cāpi māṃ nityaṃ bhīmaṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE07mbh_14_u:051.045c: phalgunaṃ nakulaṃ caiva sahadevaṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:051.046a: ānartān avalokya tvaṃ pitaraṃ ca mahābhuja
GE07mbh_14_u:051.046c: vṛṣṇīṃś ca punar āgaccher hayamedhe mamānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:051.047a: sa gaccha ratnāny ādāya vividhāni vasūni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:051.047c: yac cāpy anyan manojñaṃ te tad apy ādatsva sātvata
GE07mbh_14_u:051.048a: iyaṃ hi vasudhā sarvā prasādāt tava mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:051.048c: asmān upagatā vīra nihatāś cāpi śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.049c: vāsudevo varaḥ puṃsām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:051.050a: tavaiva ratnāni dhanaṃ ca kevalam; dharā ca kṛtsnā tu mahābhujādya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:051.050c: yad asti cānyad draviṇaṃ gṛheṣu me; tvam eva tasyeśvara nityam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.051a: tathety athoktaḥ pratipūjitas tadā; gadāgrajo dharmasutena vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:051.051c: pitṛṣvasām abhyavadad yathāvidhi; saṃpūjitaś cāpy agamat pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:051.052a: tayā sa samyak pratinanditas tadā; tathaiva sarvair vidurādibhis tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.052c: viniryayau nāgapurād gadāgrajo; rathena divyena caturyujā hariḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.053a: rathaṃ subhadrām adhiropya bhāminīṃ; yudhiṣṭhirasyānumate janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.053c: pitṛṣvasāyāś ca tathā mahābhujo; viniryayau paurajanābhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.054a: tam anvagād vānaravaryaketanaḥ; sasātyakir mādravatīsutāv api
GE07mbh_14_u:051.054c: agādhabuddhir viduraś ca mādhavaṃ; svayaṃ ca bhīmo gajarājavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:051.055a: nivartayitvā kururāṣṭravardhanāṃs; tataḥ sa sarvān viduraṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:051.055c: janārdano dārukam āha satvaraḥ; pracodayāśvān iti sātyakis tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:051.056c: yathā nihatyārigaṇāñ śatakratur; divaṃ tathānartapurīṃ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_14_u:052.002a: punaḥ punaś ca vārṣṇeyaṃ paryaṣvajata phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.002c: ā cakṣurviṣayāc cainaṃ dadarśa ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.003a: kṛcchreṇaiva ca tāṃ pārtho govinde viniveśitām
GE07mbh_14_u:052.003c: saṃjahāra tadā dṛṣṭiṃ kṛṣṇaś cāpy aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.004a: tasya prayāṇe yāny āsan nimittāni mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.004c: bahūny adbhutarūpāṇi tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:052.005a: vāyur vegena mahatā rathasya purato vavau
GE07mbh_14_u:052.006a: vavarṣa vāsavaś cāpi toyaṃ śuci sugandhi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:052.007d-0103_01: āgacchantam apaśyad vai udaṅkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.008a: sa taṃ saṃpūjya tejasvī muniṃ pṛthulalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.008c: pūjitas tena ca tadā paryapṛcchad anāmayam
GE07mbh_14_u:052.009a: sa pṛṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ tena saṃpūjya madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_14_u:052.010a: kaccic chaure tvayā gatvā kurupāṇḍavasadma tat
GE07mbh_14_u:052.010c: kṛtaṃ saubhrātram acalaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:052.013a: svarāṣṭreṣu ca rājānaḥ kaccit prāpsyanti vai sukham
GE07mbh_14_u:052.014a: yā me saṃbhāvanā tāta tvayi nityam avartata
GE07mbh_14_u:052.014c: api sā saphalā kṛṣṇa kṛtā te bharatān prati
GE07mbh_14_u:052.015a: kṛto yatno mayā brahman saubhrātre kauravān prati
GE07mbh_14_u:052.015d-0105_01: nāśakyanta yadā sāmye te sthāpayitum añjasā
GE07mbh_14_u:052.016a: tatas te nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ sarve sasutabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.016c: na diṣṭam abhyatikrāntuṃ śakyaṃ buddhyā balena vā
GE07mbh_14_u:052.016e: maharṣe viditaṃ nūnaṃ sarvam etat tavānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:052.017a: te 'tyakrāman matiṃ mahyaṃ bhīṣmasya vidurasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:052.017b-0106_01: yathā tu militaṃ sarvaṃ mahyaṃ bhīṣmasya saṃgaram
GE07mbh_14_u:052.018a: pañca vai pāṇḍavāḥ śiṣṭā hatamitrā hatātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.020a: yasmāc chaktena te kṛṣṇa na trātāḥ kurupāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.020c: saṃbandhinaḥ priyās tasmāc chapsye 'haṃ tvām asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:052.021a: na ca te prasabhaṃ yasmāt te nigṛhya nivartitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.022a: tvayā hi śaktena satā mithyācāreṇa mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:052.022c: upacīrṇāḥ kuruśreṣṭhā yas tv etān samupekṣathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.023a: śṛṇu me vistareṇedaṃ yad vakṣye bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:052.023c: gṛhāṇānunayaṃ cāpi tapasvī hy asi bhārgava
GE07mbh_14_u:052.024a: śrutvā tvam etad adhyātmaṃ muñcethāḥ śāpam adya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:052.024c: na ca māṃ tapasālpena śakto 'bhibhavituṃ pumān
GE07mbh_14_u:052.025a: na ca te tapaso nāśam icchāmi japatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:052.025c: tapas te sumahad dīptaṃ guravaś cāpi toṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:052.026c: duḥkhārjitasya tapasas tasmān necchāmi te vyayam
GE07mbh_14_u:053.001a: brūhi keśava tattvena tvam adhyātmam aninditam
GE07mbh_14_u:053.001c: śrutvā śreyo 'bhidhāsyāmi śāpaṃ vā te janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:053.002a: tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi bhāvān madāśrayān
GE07mbh_14_u:053.002b-0107_02: kadā cit tamasā rudro viṣṇuḥ sattvaguṇe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:053.002b-0107_03: rajasy api tathā brahmā guṇād anyaguṇānugau
GE07mbh_14_u:053.002c: tathā rudrān vasūṃś cāpi viddhi matprabhavān dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:053.003a: mayi sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvabhūteṣu cāpy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:053.003c: sthita ity abhijānīhi mā te 'bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:053.005a: sad asac caiva yat prāhur avyaktaṃ vyaktam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:053.005c: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva sarvam etan madātmakam
GE07mbh_14_u:053.006a: ye cāśrameṣu vai dharmāś caturṣu vihitā mune
GE07mbh_14_u:053.006c: daivāni caiva karmāṇi viddhi sarvaṃ madātmakam
GE07mbh_14_u:053.007a: asac ca sadasac caiva yad viśvaṃ sadasataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:053.007c: tataḥ paraṃ nāsti caiva devadevāt sanātanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:053.008a: oṃkāraprabhavān vedān viddhi māṃ tvaṃ bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:053.009a: hotāram api havyaṃ ca viddhi māṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:053.010a: udgātā cāpi māṃ stauti gītaghoṣair mahādhvare
GE07mbh_14_u:053.011a: viddhi mahyaṃ sutaṃ dharmam agrajaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:053.012a: tatrāhaṃ vartamānaiś ca nivṛttaiś caiva mānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:053.012c: bahvīḥ saṃsaramāṇo vai yonīr hi dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:053.013c: tais tair veṣaiś ca rūpaiś ca triṣu lokeṣu bhārgava
GE07mbh_14_u:053.014a: ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ brahmā śakro 'tha prabhavāpyayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:053.014c: bhūtagrāmasya sarvasya sraṣṭā saṃhāra eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:053.015a: adharme vartamānānāṃ sarveṣām aham apy uta
GE07mbh_14_u:053.015c: dharmasya setuṃ badhnāmi calite calite yuge
GE07mbh_14_u:053.015e: tās tā yonīḥ praviśyāhaṃ prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_14_u:053.016a: yadā tv ahaṃ devayonau vartāmi bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:053.016c: tadāhaṃ devavat sarvam ācarāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:053.017c: tadā gandharvavac ceṣṭāḥ sarvāś ceṣṭāmi bhārgava
GE07mbh_14_u:053.018a: nāgayonau yadā caiva tadā vartāmi nāgavat
GE07mbh_14_u:053.019a: mānuṣye vartamāne tu kṛpaṇaṃ yācitā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:053.019c: na ca te jātasaṃmohā vaco gṛhṇanti me hitam
GE07mbh_14_u:053.020a: bhayaṃ ca mahad uddiśya trāsitāḥ kuravo mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:053.020c: kruddheva bhūtvā ca punar yathāvad anudarśitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:053.021c: dharmeṇa nihatā yuddhe gatāḥ svargaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:053.022a: lokeṣu pāṇḍavāś caiva gatāḥ khyātiṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:053.022c: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:054.001c: nūnaṃ bhavatprasādo 'yam iti me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.002a: cittaṃ ca suprasannaṃ me tvadbhāvagatam acyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:054.002c: vinivṛttaś ca me kopa iti viddhi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_14_u:054.003a: yadi tv anugrahaṃ kaṃ cit tvatto 'rho 'haṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:054.003c: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ tan nidarśaya
GE07mbh_14_u:054.004a: tataḥ sa tasmai prītātmā darśayām āsa tad vapuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.004c: śāśvataṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ dhīmān dadṛśe yad dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.005b-0110_03: tad dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ rūpaṃ viṣṇor vaiṣṇavam adbhutam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.005c: vismayaṃ ca yayau vipras tad dṛṣṭvā rūpam aiśvaram uttaṅka uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:054.006-0111_01: namo namas te sarvātman nārāyaṇa parātpara
GE07mbh_14_u:054.006-0111_10: karmabhir bahubhiḥ pāpair baddhaṃ pāhi janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:054.006a: viśvakarman namas te 'stu yasya te rūpam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.006c: padbhyāṃ te pṛthivī vyāptā śirasā cāvṛtaṃ nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.007a: dyāvāpṛthivyor yan madhyaṃ jaṭhareṇa tad āvṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.007c: bhujābhyām āvṛtāś cāśās tvam idaṃ sarvam acyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:054.008a: saṃharasva punar deva rūpam akṣayyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.008c: punas tvāṃ svena rūpeṇa draṣṭum icchāmi śāśvatam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:054.009c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti tadā tam uttaṅko 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.010a: paryāpta eṣa evādya varas tvatto mahādyute
GE07mbh_14_u:054.010c: yat te rūpam idaṃ kṛṣṇa paśyāmi prabhavāpyayam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.011a: tam abravīt punaḥ kṛṣṇo mā tvam atra vicāraya
GE07mbh_14_u:054.011c: avaśyam etat kartavyam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:054.012a: avaśyakaraṇīyaṃ vai yady etan manyase vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:054.012c: toyam icchāmi yatreṣṭaṃ maruṣv etad dhi durlabham
GE07mbh_14_u:054.013a: tataḥ saṃhṛtya tat tejaḥ provācottaṅkam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.013c: eṣṭavye sati cintyo 'ham ity uktvā dvārakāṃ yayau
GE07mbh_14_u:054.014a: tataḥ kadā cid bhagavān uttaṅkas toyakāṅkṣayā
GE07mbh_14_u:054.017a: smarann eva ca taṃ prāha mātaṅgaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:054.017c: ehy uttaṅka pratīcchasva matto vāri bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:054.017e: kṛpā hi me sumahatī tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṭsamāhatam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.018a: ity uktas tena sa munis tat toyaṃ nābhyanandata
GE07mbh_14_u:054.018c: cikṣepa ca sa taṃ dhīmān vāgbhir ugrābhir acyutam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.019a: punaḥ punaś ca mātaṅgaḥ pibasveti tam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:054.020a: sa tathā niścayāt tena pratyākhyāto mahātmanā
GE07mbh_14_u:054.021a: uttaṅkas taṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā tato vrīḍitamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.023a: na yuktaṃ tādṛśaṃ dātuṃ tvayā puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:054.024c: uttaṅkaṃ ślakṣṇayā vācā sāntvayann idam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:054.025a: yādṛśeneha rūpeṇa yogyaṃ dātuṃ vṛtena vai
GE07mbh_14_u:054.025c: tādṛśaṃ khalu me dattaṃ tvaṃ tu tan nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_14_u:054.026a: mayā tvadartham ukto hi vajrapāṇiḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.027a: sa mām uvāca devendro na martyo 'martyatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:054.027c: anyam asmai varaṃ dehīty asakṛd bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:054.028a: amṛtaṃ deyam ity eva mayoktaḥ sa śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.028c: sa māṃ prasādya devendraḥ punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:054.029a: yadi deyam avaśyaṃ vai mātaṅgo 'haṃ mahādyute
GE07mbh_14_u:054.030a: yady evaṃ pratigṛhṇāti bhārgavo 'mṛtam adya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:054.030e: pratyākhyātas tv ahaṃ tena na dadyām iti bhārgava
GE07mbh_14_u:054.031a: sa tathā samayaṃ kṛtvā tena rūpeṇa vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.031b-0113_01: sa tathā tena rūpeṇa vāsavas tvām upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:054.032a: yat tu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ bhūya eva tavepsitam
GE07mbh_14_u:054.032c: toyepsāṃ tava durdharṣa kariṣye saphalām aham
GE07mbh_14_u:054.033a: yeṣv ahaḥsu tava brahman salilecchā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:054.034a: rasavac ca pradāsyanti te toyaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:054.034c: uttaṅkameghā ity uktāḥ khyātiṃ yāsyanti cāpi te
GE07mbh_14_u:054.035a: ity uktaḥ prītimān vipraḥ kṛṣṇena sa babhūva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:054.035c: adyāpy uttaṅkameghāś ca marau varṣanti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:055.002c: gurubhaktaḥ sa tejasvī nānyaṃ kaṃ cid apūjayat
GE07mbh_14_u:055.003c: auttaṅkīṃ guruvṛttiṃ vai prāpnuyām iti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:055.005a: sa tasya damaśaucābhyāṃ vikrāntena ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:055.007a: taṃ krameṇa jarā tāta pratipede mahāmunim
GE07mbh_14_u:055.007c: na cānvabudhyata tadā sa munir guruvatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.008a: tataḥ kadā cid rājendra kāṣṭhāny ānayituṃ yayau
GE07mbh_14_u:055.010c: tataḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ saha tadā papāta dharaṇītale
GE07mbh_14_u:055.011a: tataḥ sa bhāraniṣpiṣṭaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭaś ca bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.013a: tasyā nipetatur dagdhau karau tair aśrubindubhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.013c: na hi tān aśrupātān vai śaktā dhārayituṃ mahī
GE07mbh_14_u:055.014a: gautamas tv abravīd vipram uttaṅkaṃ prītamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.014c: kasmāt tāta tavādyeha śokottaram idaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.014e: sa svairaṃ brūhi viprarṣe śrotum icchāmi te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.016a: jareyaṃ nāvabuddhā me nābhijñātaṃ sukhaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_14_u:055.016c: śatavarṣoṣitaṃ hi tvaṃ na mām abhyanujānathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.017a: bhavatā hy abhyanujñātāḥ śiṣyāḥ pratyavarā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:055.019a: kiṃ tv adya yadi te śraddhā gamanaṃ prati bhārgava
GE07mbh_14_u:055.019c: anujñāṃ gṛhya mattas tvaṃ gṛhān gacchasva mā ciram
GE07mbh_14_u:055.020a: gurvarthaṃ kaṃ prayacchāmi brūhi tvaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:055.020c: tam upākṛtya gaccheyam anujñātas tvayā vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:055.021a: dakṣiṇā paritoṣo vai gurūṇāṃ sadbhir ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:055.021c: tava hy ācarato brahmaṃs tuṣṭo 'haṃ vai na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.022a: itthaṃ ca parituṣṭaṃ māṃ vijānīhi bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:055.022c: yuvā ṣoḍaśavarṣo hi yad adya bhavitā bhavān
GE07mbh_14_u:055.023a: dadāmi patnīṃ kanyāṃ ca svāṃ te duhitaraṃ dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:055.023c: etām ṛte hi nānyā vai tvattejo 'rhati sevitum
GE07mbh_14_u:055.024a: tatas tāṃ pratijagrāha yuvā bhūtvā yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_14_u:055.025a: kiṃ bhavatyai prayacchāmi gurvarthaṃ viniyuṅkṣva mām
GE07mbh_14_u:055.025c: priyaṃ hi tava kāṅkṣāmi prāṇair api dhanair api
GE07mbh_14_u:055.026a: yad durlabhaṃ hi loke 'smin ratnam atyadbhutaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:055.026c: tad ānayeyaṃ tapasā na hi me 'trāsti saṃśayaḥ ahalyovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:055.027a: parituṣṭāsmi te putra nityaṃ bhagavatā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:055.027c: paryāptaye tad bhadraṃ te gaccha tāta yathecchakam
GE07mbh_14_u:055.028a: uttaṅkas tu mahārāja punar evābravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.028c: ājñāpayasva māṃ mātaḥ kartavyaṃ hi priyaṃ tava ahalyovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:055.029c: te samānaya bhadraṃ te gurvarthaḥ sukṛto bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:055.031a: sa jagāma tataḥ śīghram uttaṅko brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.032a: gautamas tv abravīt patnīm uttaṅko nādya dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:055.032c: iti pṛṣṭā tam ācaṣṭa kuṇḍalārthaṃ gataṃ tu vai
GE07mbh_14_u:055.033a: tataḥ provāca patnīṃ sa na te samyag idaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:055.033c: śaptaḥ sa pārthivo nūnaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ vadhiṣyati ahalyovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:055.034a: ajānantyā niyuktaḥ sa bhagavan brāhmaṇo 'dya me
GE07mbh_14_u:055.034c: bhavatprasādān na bhayaṃ kiṃ cit tasya bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:055.035a: ity uktaḥ prāha tāṃ patnīm evam astv iti gautamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:055.035c: uttaṅko 'pi vane śūnye rājānaṃ taṃ dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_14_u:056.001a: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtaṃ rājānaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:056.002a: cakāra na vyathāṃ vipro rājā tv enam athābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:056.003a: diṣṭyā tvam asi kalyāṇa ṣaṣṭhe kāle mamāntikam
GE07mbh_14_u:056.004a: rājan gurvarthinaṃ viddhi carantaṃ mām ihāgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:056.004c: na ca gurvartham udyuktaṃ hiṃsyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ rājovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:056.005c: na ca śakyaḥ samutsraṣṭuṃ kṣudhitena mayādya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:056.006a: evam astu mahārāja samayaḥ kriyatāṃ tu me
GE07mbh_14_u:056.006c: gurvartham abhinirvartya punar eṣyāmi te vaśam
GE07mbh_14_u:056.007a: saṃśrutaś ca mayā yo 'rtho gurave rājasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:056.007c: tvadadhīnaḥ sa rājendra taṃ tvā bhikṣe nareśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:056.008a: dadāsi vipramukhyebhyas tvaṃ hi ratnāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:056.008c: dātā tvaṃ ca naravyāghra pātrabhūtaḥ kṣitāv iha
GE07mbh_14_u:056.008e: pātraṃ pratigrahe cāpi viddhi māṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:056.009c: samayeneha rājendra punar eṣyāmi te vaśam
GE07mbh_14_u:056.010a: satyaṃ te pratijānāmi nātra mithyāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:056.010c: anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me svaireṣv api kuto 'nyathā
GE07mbh_14_u:056.011a: yadi mattas tvadāyatto gurvarthaḥ kṛta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:056.011c: yadi cāsmi pratigrāhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:056.012a: pratigrāhyo mato me tvaṃ sadaiva puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:056.013a: patnyās te mama viprarṣe rucire maṇikuṇḍale
GE07mbh_14_u:056.013c: varayārthaṃ tvam anyaṃ vai taṃ te dāsyāmi suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:056.014a: alaṃ te vyapadeśena pramāṇaṃ yadi te vayam
GE07mbh_14_u:056.014c: prayaccha kuṇḍale me tvaṃ satyavāg bhava pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:056.015a: ity uktas tv abravīd rājā tam uttaṅkaṃ punar
GE07mbh_14_u:056.015c: gaccha madvacanād devīṃ brūhi dehīti sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:056.016a: saivam uktā tvayā nūnaṃ madvākyena śucismitā
GE07mbh_14_u:056.016c: pradāsyati dvijaśreṣṭha kuṇḍale te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:056.017a: kva patnī bhavataḥ śakyā mayā draṣṭuṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:056.017c: svayaṃ vāpi bhavān patnīṃ kimarthaṃ nopasarpati
GE07mbh_14_u:056.018a: drakṣyate tāṃ bhavān adya kasmiṃś cid vananirjhare
GE07mbh_14_u:056.018c: ṣaṣṭhe kāle na hi mayā sā śakyā draṣṭum adya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:056.019a: uttaṅkas tu tathoktaḥ sa jagāma bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:056.019c: madayantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā so 'jñāpayat svaṃ prayojanam
GE07mbh_14_u:056.021c: abhijñānaṃ tu kiṃ cit tvaṃ samānetum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:056.022a: ime hi divye maṇikuṇḍale me; devāś ca yakṣāś ca mahoragāś ca
