GE07mbh_14_u:056.022c: tais tair upāyaiḥ parihartukāmāś; chidreṣu nityaṃ paritarkayanti
GE07mbh_14_u:056.023a: nikṣiptam etad bhuvi pannagās tu; ratnaṃ samāsādya parāmṛṣeyuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:056.023c: yakṣās tathocchiṣṭadhṛtaṃ surāś ca; nidrāvaśaṃ tvā paridharṣayeyuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:056.024a: chidreṣv eteṣu hi sadā hy adhṛṣyeṣu dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:056.025a: syandete hi divā rukmaṃ rātrau ca dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:056.026a: ete hy āmucya bhagavan kṣutpipāsābhayaṃ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:056.026c: viṣāgniśvāpadebhyaś ca bhayaṃ jātu na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:056.027a: hrasvena caite āmukte bhavato hrasvake tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:056.028c: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāte tad abhijñānam ānaya
GE07mbh_14_u:057.001a: sa mitrasaham āsādya tv abhijñānam ayācata
GE07mbh_14_u:057.001c: tasmai dadāv abhijñānaṃ sa cekṣvākuvaras tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.002a: na caivaiṣā gatiḥ kṣemyā na cānyā vidyate gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.002c: etan me matam ājñāya prayaccha maṇikuṇḍale
GE07mbh_14_u:057.003a: ity uktas tām uttaṅkas tu bhartur vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:057.003c: śrutvā ca sā tataḥ prādāt tasmai te maṇikuṇḍale
GE07mbh_14_u:057.004a: avāpya kuṇḍale te tu rājānaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:057.004c: kim etad guhyavacanaṃ śrotum icchāmi pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:057.005a: prajā nisargād viprān vai kṣatriyāḥ pūjayanti ha
GE07mbh_14_u:057.005c: viprebhyaś cāpi bahavo doṣāḥ prādurbhavanti naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.006a: so 'haṃ dvijebhyaḥ praṇato viprād doṣam avāptavān
GE07mbh_14_u:057.006c-0114_01: na cānyām api paśyāmi gatiṃ gatimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:057.007a: na hi rājñā viśeṣeṇa viruddhena dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.007c: śakyaṃ nṛloke saṃsthātuṃ pretya vā sukham edhitum
GE07mbh_14_u:057.008a: tad iṣṭe te mayaivaite datte sve maṇikuṇḍale
GE07mbh_14_u:057.008c: yaḥ kṛtas te 'dya samayaḥ saphalaṃ taṃ kuruṣva me
GE07mbh_14_u:057.009a: rājaṃs tatheha kartāsmi punar eṣyāmi te vaśam
GE07mbh_14_u:057.009c: praśnaṃ tu kaṃ cit praṣṭuṃ tvāṃ vyavasiṣye paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_14_u:057.010a: brūhi vipra yathākāmaṃ prativaktāsmi te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.010c: chettāsmi saṃśayaṃ te 'dya na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.011c: mitreṣu yaś ca viṣamaḥ stena ity eva taṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.012a: sa bhavān mitratām adya saṃprāpto mama pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:057.012c: sa me buddhiṃ prayacchasva samāṃ buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:057.013c: bhavatsakāśam āgantuṃ kṣamaṃ mama na veti vā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.014a: kṣamaṃ ced iha vaktavyaṃ mayā dvijavarottama
GE07mbh_14_u:057.015c: āgacchato hi te vipra bhaven mṛtyur asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:057.016a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā rājñā kṣamaṃ buddhimatā hitam
GE07mbh_14_u:057.018c: tathā te kuṇḍale baddhvā tathā kṛṣṇājine 'nayat
GE07mbh_14_u:057.019c: bilvaṃ dadarśa kasmiṃś cid āruroha kṣudhānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.020b-0115_01: pātayām āsa bilvāni tadā sa dvijapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.020b-0115_03: nyapataṃs tāni bilvāni tasminn evājine vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:057.020c: yasmiṃs te kuṇḍale baddhe tadā dvijavareṇa vai
GE07mbh_14_u:057.020d-0116_02: sakuṇḍalaṃ tad ajinaṃ papāta sahasā taroḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.021c: apaśyad bhujagaḥ kaś cit te tatra maṇikuṇḍale
GE07mbh_14_u:057.022a: airāvatakulotpannaḥ śīghro bhūtvā tadā sa vai
GE07mbh_14_u:057.023a: hriyamāṇe tu dṛṣṭvā sa kuṇḍale bhujagena ha
GE07mbh_14_u:057.024a: sa daṇḍakāṣṭham ādāya valmīkam akhanat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.024b-0117_01: ahāni triṃśad avyagraḥ pañca cānyāni bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:057.025a: tasya vegam asahyaṃ tam asahantī vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.028a: sa tu taṃ brāhmaṇo bhūtvā tasya duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.028c: uttaṅkam abravīt tāta naitac chakyaṃ tvayeti vai
GE07mbh_14_u:057.029a: ito hi nāgaloko vai yojanāni sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.029b-0118_01: yatra te kuṇḍale nīte bhujagena dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:057.029c: na daṇḍakāṣṭhasādhyaṃ ca manye kāryam idaṃ tava
GE07mbh_14_u:057.030a: nāgaloke yadi brahman na śakye kuṇḍale mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.030c: prāptuṃ prāṇān vimokṣyāmi paśyatas te dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:057.031a: yadā sa nāśakat tasya niścayaṃ kartum anyathā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.031c: vajrapāṇis tadā daṇḍaṃ vajrāstreṇa yuyoja ha
GE07mbh_14_u:057.033a: sa tena mārgeṇa tadā nāgalokaṃ viveśa ha
GE07mbh_14_u:057.036a: tasya lokasya ca dvāraṃ dadarśa sa bhṛgūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.037a: nāgalokam uttaṅkas tu prekṣya dīno 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.039a: dhamasvāpānam etan me tatas tvaṃ vipra lalpsyase
GE07mbh_14_u:057.040a: mā jugupsāṃ kṛthāḥ putra tvam atrārthe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:057.041c: yan mayā cīrṇapūrvaṃ ca śrotum icchāmi tad dhy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:057.042a: guror guruṃ māṃ jānīhi jvalitaṃ jātavedasam
GE07mbh_14_u:057.042c: tvayā hy ahaṃ sadā vatsa guror arthe 'bhipūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.043c: tasmāc chreyo vidhāsyāmi tavaivaṃ kuru mā ciram
GE07mbh_14_u:057.044a: ity uktaḥ sa tathākārṣīd uttaṅkaś citrabhānunā
GE07mbh_14_u:057.046c: nāgaloke mahārāja na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:057.050a: śrutvā ca niścayaṃ tasya maharṣes tigmatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:057.052a: prasādya brāhmaṇaṃ te tu pādyam arghyaṃ nivedya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:057.053c: agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā jagāma gurusadma tat
GE07mbh_14_u:057.054a: sa gatvā tvarito rājan gautamasya niveśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:057.055a: evaṃ mahātmanā tena trīṃl lokāñ janamejaya
GE07mbh_14_u:057.056c: pareṇa tapasā yukto yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:058.001c: ata ūrdhvaṃ mahābāhuḥ kiṃ cakāra mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:058.002a: dattvā varam uttaṅkāya prāyāt sātyakinā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:058.003a: sarāṃsi ca nadīś caiva vanāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:058.006c: vāsobhiś ca mahāśailaḥ kalpavṛkṣaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:058.008c: puṃbhiḥ strībhiś ca saṃghuṣṭaḥ pragīta iva cābhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:058.009a: mattānāṃ hṛṣṭarūpāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:058.014b-0121_01: stuvanty antarhitā devā gandharvāś ca saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:058.014b-0121_03: tvaṃ sraṣṭā sṛjyam ādhāraṃ kāraṇaṃ dharmavedavit
GE07mbh_14_u:058.014b-0121_04: tvayā yat kriyate deva na jānīmo 'tra māyayā
GE07mbh_14_u:058.014b-0121_06: brahmādīnāṃ ca govinda saṃnidhyaṃ śaraṇaṃ namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:058.014b-0121_07: iti stute mānuṣaiś ca pūjite devakīsute
GE07mbh_14_u:058.015a: tataḥ saṃpūjyamānaḥ sa viveśa bhavanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_14_u:058.015c: govindaḥ sātyakiś caiva jagāma bhavanaṃ svakam
GE07mbh_14_u:058.016c: kṛtvā nasukaraṃ karma dānaveṣv iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:058.018a: sa tān abhyarcya medhāvī pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:058.018b-0122_01: jaharṣa dhīmān dhīmadbhiḥ pravṛttaḥ sa mudāyutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:058.018b-0123_03: kṛṣṇo 'pi bhrātaraṃ rāmaṃ yatnāt samabhivādya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:058.019a: tābhyāṃ ca saṃpariṣvaktaḥ sāntvitaś ca mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:058.020c: kathayām āsa taṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ pitrā mahāhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:059.002a: tvaṃ tu pratyakṣadarśī ca kāryajñaś ca mahābhuja
GE07mbh_14_u:059.003a: yathā tad abhavad yuddhaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_14_u:059.005a: ity uktaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pitrā mātus tadantike
GE07mbh_14_u:059.006c: bahulatvān na saṃkhyātuṃ śakyāny abdaśatair api
GE07mbh_14_u:059.007a: prādhānyatas tu gadataḥ samāsenaiva me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:059.010a: teṣāṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ daśāhāni mahātmanām
GE07mbh_14_u:059.012a: akarot sa tataḥ kālaṃ śaratalpagato muniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:059.015a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tv abhūn netā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahāstravit
GE07mbh_14_u:059.015c: gupto bhīmena tejasvī mitreṇa varuṇo yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:059.016c: pitur nikārān saṃsmṛtya raṇe karmākaron mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:059.018a: dināni pañca tad yuddham abhūt paramadāruṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:059.019a: tataḥ senāpatir abhūt karṇo dauryodhane bale
GE07mbh_14_u:059.021a: tataḥ pārthaṃ samāsādya pataṃga iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_14_u:059.022a: hate karṇe tu kauravyā nirutsāhā hataujasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:059.025a: hate śalye tu śakuniṃ sahadevo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:059.027c: hrade dvaipāyane cāpi salilasthaṃ dadarśa tam
GE07mbh_14_u:059.028a: tataḥ śiṣṭena sainyena samantāt parivārya tam
GE07mbh_14_u:059.029a: vigāhya salilaṃ tv āśu vāgbāṇair bhṛśavikṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:059.030a: tataḥ sa nihato rājā dhārtarāṣṭro mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_14_u:059.031a: tatas tat pāṇḍavaṃ sainyaṃ saṃsuptaṃ śibire niśi
GE07mbh_14_u:059.035a: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddham ahāny aṣṭādaśa prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:059.035c: yatra te pṛthivīpālā nihatāḥ svargam āvasan
GE07mbh_14_u:059.036a: śṛṇvatāṃ tu mahārāja kathāṃ tāṃ romaharṣaṇīm
GE07mbh_14_u:060.001a: kathayann eva tu tadā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_14_u:060.002c: apriyaṃ vasudevasya mā bhūd iti mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.004a: subhadrā tu tam utkrāntam ātmajasya vadhaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:060.004c: ācakṣva kṛṣṇa saubhadravadham ity apatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:060.004d-0128_01: ākhyāpayan mahat tatra hy abhimanyor vadhaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:060.005a: tām apaśyan nipatitāṃ vasudevaḥ kṣitau tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:060.005c: dṛṣṭvaiva ca papātorvyāṃ so 'pi duḥkhena mūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.007a: nanu tvaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa satyavāg bhuvi viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.007c: yad dauhitravadhaṃ me 'dya na khyāpayasi śatruhan
GE07mbh_14_u:060.008c: sadṛśākṣas tava kathaṃ śatrubhir nihato raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:060.009a: durmaraṃ bata vārṣṇeya kāle 'prāpte nṛbhiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:060.009c: yatra me hṛdayaṃ duḥkhāc chatadhā na vidīryate
GE07mbh_14_u:060.010a: kim abravīt tvā saṃgrāme subhadrāṃ mātaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:060.010c: māṃ cāpi puṇḍarīkākṣa capalākṣaḥ priyo mama
GE07mbh_14_u:060.011a: āhavaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā kaccin na nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.011c: kaccin mukhaṃ na govinda tenājau vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:060.012a: sa hi kṛṣṇa mahātejāḥ ślāghann iva mamāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.013c: dharaṇyāṃ nihataḥ śete tan mamācakṣva keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:060.014a: sa hi droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca karṇaṃ ca rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_14_u:060.014c: spardhate sma raṇe nityaṃ duhituḥ putrako mama
GE07mbh_14_u:060.016a: na tena vikṛtaṃ vaktraṃ kṛtaṃ saṃgrāmamūrdhani
GE07mbh_14_u:060.016c: na pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaś cāpi saṃgrāmas tena dustaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.018a: eko hy ekena satataṃ yudhyamāno yadi prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:060.018c: na sa śakyeta saṃgrāme nihantum api vajriṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:060.019a: samāhūte tu saṃgrāme pārthe saṃśaptakais tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:060.020a: tataḥ śatrukṣayaṃ kṛtvā sumahāntaṃ raṇe pituḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.021a: nūnaṃ ca sa gataḥ svargaṃ jahi śokaṃ mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:060.021c: na hi vyasanam āsādya sīdante sannarāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:060.022c: raṇe mahendrapratimāḥ sa kathaṃ nāpnuyād divam
GE07mbh_14_u:060.023a: sa śokaṃ jahi durdharṣa mā ca manyuvaśaṃ gamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.023c: śastrapūtāṃ hi sa gatiṃ gataḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.024a: tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre subhadreyaṃ svasā mama
GE07mbh_14_u:060.024c: duḥkhārtātho pṛthāṃ prāpya kurarīva nanāda ha
GE07mbh_14_u:060.025c: ārye kva dārakāḥ sarve draṣṭum icchāmi tān aham
GE07mbh_14_u:060.026a: asyās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvās tāḥ kuruyoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.027a: uttarāṃ cābravīd bhadrā bhadre bhartā kva te gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.027c: kṣipram āgamanaṃ mahyaṃ tasmai tvaṃ vedayasva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:060.028a: nanu nāma sa vairāṭi śrutvā mama giraṃ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:060.028c: bhavanān niṣpataty āśu kasmān nābhyeti te patiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.029c: kuśalaṃ cābruvan sarve tvāṃ yuyutsum ihāgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:060.031a: evamādi tu vārṣṇeyyās tad asyāḥ paridevitam
GE07mbh_14_u:060.031c: śrutvā pṛthā suduḥkhārtā śanair vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:060.032b-0129_01: evaṃ vilapatīṃ tāṃ tu sātyakis tu tadābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:060.032c: pitrā ca pālito bālaḥ sa hataḥ kāladharmaṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:060.033c: putro hi tava durdharṣaḥ saṃprāptaḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:060.035a: uttarāṃ tvam avekṣasva garbhiṇīṃ mā śucaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:060.035c: putram eṣā hi tasyāśu janayiṣyati bhāminī
GE07mbh_14_u:060.036c: vihāya śokaṃ durdharṣaṃ śrāddham asya hy akalpayat
GE07mbh_14_u:060.037a: samanujñāpya dharmajñā rājānaṃ bhīmam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:060.037c: yamau yamopamau caiva dadau dānāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:060.038a: tataḥ pradāya bahvīr gā brāhmaṇebhyo yadūdvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:060.039a: vairāṭi neha saṃtāpas tvayā kāryo yaśasvini
GE07mbh_14_u:060.039c: bhartāraṃ prati suśroṇi garbhasthaṃ rakṣa me śiśum
GE07mbh_14_u:060.040a: evam uktvā tataḥ kuntī virarāma mahādyute
GE07mbh_14_u:060.041a: evaṃ sa nidhanaṃ prāpto dauhitras tava mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:060.041c: saṃtāpaṃ jahi durdharṣa mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:061.001a: etac chrutvā tu putrasya vacaḥ śūrātmajas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:061.001c: vihāya śokaṃ dharmātmā dadau śrāddham anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:061.004c: brāhmaṇānāṃ tadā kṛṣṇas tad abhūd romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:061.005a: suvarṇaṃ caiva gāś caiva śayanācchādanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:061.005c: dīyamānaṃ tadā viprāḥ prabhūtam iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:061.006c: abhimanyos tadā śrāddham akurvan satyakas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:061.008c: nābhuṅkta patiśokārtā tad abhūt karuṇaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:061.008e: kukṣistha eva tasyāstu sa garbhaḥ saṃpralīyata
GE07mbh_14_u:061.008f-0130_01: dhriyamāṇe 'tha tasmiṃs tu garbhe kukṣistha eva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:061.009a: ājagāma tato vyāso jñātvā divyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:061.009e: uttarāṃ ca mahātejāḥ śokaḥ saṃtyajyatām ayam
GE07mbh_14_u:061.011c: vyāso vākyam uvācedaṃ harṣayann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:061.013a: tasmāc chokaṃ kuruśreṣṭha jahi tvam arikarśana
GE07mbh_14_u:061.013c: vicāryam atra na hi te satyam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:061.014c: puroktaṃ tat tathā bhāvi mā te 'trāstu vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:061.015c: na sa śocyas tvayā tāta na cānyaiḥ kurubhis tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:061.017a: pitāpi tava dharmajña garbhe tasmin mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:061.018a: tataḥ saṃcodayām āsa vyāso dharmātmajaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_14_u:061.019a: dharmarājo 'pi medhāvī śrutvā vyāsasya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.001c: aśvamedhaṃ prati tadā kiṃ nṛpaḥ pracakāra ha
GE07mbh_14_u:062.002a: ratnaṃ ca yan maruttena nihitaṃ pṛthivītale
GE07mbh_14_u:062.002c: tad avāpa kathaṃ ceti tan me brūhi dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:062.003c: bhrātṝn sarvān samānāyya kāle vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:062.003e: arjunaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca mādrīputrau yamāv api
GE07mbh_14_u:062.004a: śrutaṃ vo vacanaṃ vīrāḥ sauhṛdād yan mahātmanā
GE07mbh_14_u:062.006a: bhīṣmeṇa ca mahāprājña govindena ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_14_u:062.006c: saṃsmṛtya tad ahaṃ samyak kartum icchāmi pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.007a: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca sarveṣāṃ tad dhi no hitam
GE07mbh_14_u:062.007c: anubandhe ca kalyāṇaṃ yad vaco brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.008a: iyaṃ hi vasudhā sarvā kṣīṇaratnā kurūdvahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.008c: tac cācaṣṭa bahu vyāso maruttasya dhanaṃ nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.009a: yady etad vo bahumataṃ manyadhvaṃ vā kṣamaṃ yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:062.009c: tad ānayāmahe sarve kathaṃ vā bhīma manyase
GE07mbh_14_u:062.011a: rocate me mahābāho yad idaṃ bhāṣitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:062.012a: yadi tat prāpnuyāmeha dhanam āvikṣitaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:062.012c: kṛtam eva mahārāja bhaved iti matir mama
GE07mbh_14_u:062.013c: tad ānayāma bhadraṃ te samabhyarcya kapardinam
GE07mbh_14_u:062.014a: taṃ vibhuṃ devadeveśaṃ tasyaivānucarāṃś ca tān
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015a: rakṣante ye ca tad dravyaṃ kiṃkarā raudradarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015c: te ca vaśyā bhaviṣyanti prasanne vṛṣabhadhvaje
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015d-0133_01: sa hi devaḥ prasannātmā bhaktānāṃ parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015d-0133_02: dadāty amaratāṃ cāpi kiṃ punaḥ kāñcanaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015d-0133_03: vanasthasya purā jiṣṇor astraṃ pāśupataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015d-0133_04: raudraṃ brahmaśiraś cādāt prasannaḥ kiṃ punar dhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015d-0133_05: vayaṃ sarve hi tadbhaktāḥ sa cāsmākaṃ prasīdati
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015d-0133_12: kas tāṃ senāṃ tadā rājan manasāpi pradharṣayet
GE07mbh_14_u:062.015d-0133_15: tasyaiva ca prasādena nihatāḥ śatravas tava
GE07mbh_14_u:062.016a: śrutvaivaṃ vadatas tasya vākyaṃ bhīmasya bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:062.017c: senām ājñāpayām āsur nakṣatre 'hani ca dhruve
GE07mbh_14_u:062.018a: tato yayuḥ pāṇḍusutā brāhmaṇān svasti vācya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:062.019c: āśāsya ca mahātmānaṃ prayayur muditā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:062.020a: teṣāṃ prayāsyatāṃ tatra maṅgalāni śubhāny atha
GE07mbh_14_u:062.020c: prāhuḥ prahṛṣṭamanaso dvijāgryā nāgarāś ca te
GE07mbh_14_u:062.023c: saṃpūjyamānāḥ pauraiś ca brāhmaṇaiś ca manīṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:063.005a: tathaiva sainikā rājan rājānam anuyānti ye
GE07mbh_14_u:063.006a: sa sarāṃsi nadīś caiva vanāny upavanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:063.007a: tasmin deśe ca rājendra yatra tad dravyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:063.007c: cakre niveśanaṃ rājā pāṇḍavaḥ saha sainikaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:063.007e: śive deśe same caiva tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:063.009a: prāṅ niveśāt tu rājānaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sapurodhasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:063.010a: kṛtvā ca madhye rājānam amātyāṃś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:063.011c: kārayitvā sa rājendro brāhmaṇān idam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:063.012a: asmin kārye dvijaśreṣṭhā nakṣatre divase śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:063.012c: yathā bhavanto manyante kartum arhatha tat tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:063.013a: na naḥ kālātyayo vai syād ihaiva parilambatām
GE07mbh_14_u:063.013c: iti niścitya viprendrāḥ kriyatāṃ yad anantaram
GE07mbh_14_u:063.015a: adyaiva nakṣatram ahaś ca puṇyaṃ; yatāmahe śreṣṭhatamaṃ kriyāsu
GE07mbh_14_u:063.015c: ambhobhir adyeha vasāma rājann; upoṣyatāṃ cāpi bhavadbhir adya
GE07mbh_14_u:063.016a: śrutvā tu teṣāṃ dvijasattamānāṃ; kṛtopavāsā rajanīṃ narendrāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:063.016c: ūṣuḥ pratītāḥ kuśasaṃstareṣu; yathādhvareṣu jvalitā havyavāhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:063.017a: tato niśā sā vyagaman mahātmanāṃ; saṃśṛṇvatāṃ viprasamīritā giraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:063.017c: tataḥ prabhāte vimale dvijarṣabhā; vaco 'bruvan dharmasutaṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_14_u:064.002a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:064.003c: mantrasiddhaṃ caruṃ kṛtvā purodhāḥ prayayau tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:064.005a: sumanobhiś ca citrābhir lājair uccāvacair api
GE07mbh_14_u:064.005e: kiṃkarāṇāṃ tataḥ paścāc cakāra balim uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:064.006c: tathānyeṣāṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ bhūtādhipatayaś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:064.007b-0135_02: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sahasrāṇi gavāṃ dattvā tu bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:064.008a: kṛtvā tu pūjāṃ rudrasya gaṇānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:064.008c: yayau vyāsaṃ puraskṛtya nṛpo ratnanidhiṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:064.010a: śaṅkhādīṃś ca nidhīn sarvān nidhipālāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:064.010c: arcayitvā dvijāgryān sa svasti vācya ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:064.011c: prītimān sa kuruśreṣṭhaḥ khānayām āsa taṃ nidhim
GE07mbh_14_u:064.014a: teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam apy āsīn mahān karapuṭas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:064.014c: trilakṣaṃ bhājanaṃ rājaṃs tulārdham abhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:064.015a: vāhanaṃ pāṇḍuputrasya tatrāsīt tu viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:064.016c: śakaṭāni rathāś caiva tāvad eva kareṇavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:064.016e: kharāṇāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ ca parisaṃkhyā na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:064.017a: etad vittaṃ tad abhavad yad uddadhre yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:064.018a: eteṣv ādhāya tad dravyaṃ punar abhyarcya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:064.018c: mahādevaṃ prati yayau puraṃ nāgāhvayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:064.020a: sā purābhimukhī rājañ jagāma mahatī camūḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:065.001a: etasminn eva kāle tu vāsudevo 'pi vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:065.002c: yathokto dharmaputreṇa vrajan sa svapurīṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:065.005a: draupadīm uttarāṃ caiva pṛthāṃ cāpy avalokakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:065.008c: jajñe tava pitā rājan parikṣit paravīrahā
GE07mbh_14_u:065.010c: āviśya pradiśaḥ sarvāḥ punar eva vyupāramat
GE07mbh_14_u:065.012a: tatas tvaritam āyāntīṃ dadarśa svāṃ pitṛṣvasām
GE07mbh_14_u:065.013a: pṛṣṭhato draupadīṃ caiva subhadrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_14_u:065.014a: tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ samāsādya kuntī rājasutā tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:065.015c: tvaṃ no gatiḥ pratiṣṭhā ca tvadāyattam idaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_14_u:065.016c: aśvatthāmnā hato jātas tam ujjīvaya keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:065.017a: tvayā hy etat pratijñātam aiṣīke yadunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:065.017c: ahaṃ saṃjīvayiṣyāmi mṛtaṃ jātam iti prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:065.018a: so 'yaṃ jāto mṛtas tāta paśyainaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:065.018c: uttarāṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca draupadīṃ māṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:065.019a: dharmaputraṃ ca bhīmaṃ ca phalgunaṃ nakulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:065.019c: sahadevaṃ ca durdharṣa sarvān nas trātum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:065.020a: asmin prāṇāḥ samāyattāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mamaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:065.020c: pāṇḍoś ca piṇḍo dāśārha tathaiva śvaśurasya me
GE07mbh_14_u:065.021a: abhimanyoś ca bhadraṃ te priyasya sadṛśasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:065.022a: uttarā hi priyoktaṃ vai kathayaty arisūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:065.022c: abhimanyor vacaḥ kṛṣṇa priyatvāt te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:065.023a: abravīt kila dāśārha vairāṭīm ārjuniḥ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:065.023c: mātulasya kulaṃ bhadre tava putro gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:065.024c: astrāṇi ca vicitrāṇi nītiśāstraṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_14_u:065.025a: ity etat praṇayāt tāta saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_14_u:065.025c: kathayām āsa durdharṣas tathā caitan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:065.026a: tās tvāṃ vayaṃ praṇamyeha yācāmo madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:065.026c: kulasyāsya hitārthaṃ tvaṃ kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:065.027a: evam uktvā tu vārṣṇeyaṃ pṛthā pṛthulalocanā
GE07mbh_14_u:065.027c: ucchritya bāhū duḥkhārtā tāś cānyāḥ prāpatan bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:065.028c: svasrīyo vāsudevasya mṛto jāta iti prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:065.029a: evam ukte tataḥ kuntīṃ pratyagṛhṇāj janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:065.029c: bhūmau nipatitāṃ caināṃ sāntvayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:066.001a: utthitāyāṃ pṛthāyāṃ tu subhadrā bhrātaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:066.001c: dṛṣṭvā cukrośa duḥkhārtā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:066.003c: sottarāyāṃ nipatitā vijaye mayi caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:066.004a: seyaṃ jvalantī hṛdaye mayi tiṣṭhati keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:066.004c: yan na paśyāmi durdharṣa mama putrasutaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:066.005a: kiṃ nu vakṣyati dharmātmā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:066.005c: bhīmasenārjunau cāpi mādravatyāḥ sutau ca tau
GE07mbh_14_u:066.006a: śrutvābhimanyos tanayaṃ jātaṃ ca mṛtam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:066.007a: abhimanyuḥ priyaḥ kṛṣṇa pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:066.007c: te śrutvā kiṃ nu vakṣyanti droṇaputrāstranirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:066.008a: bhavitātaḥ paraṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ nu manye janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:066.008c: abhimanyoḥ sutāt kṛṣṇa mṛtāj jātād ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:066.009a: sāhaṃ prasādaye kṛṣṇa tvām adya śirasā natā
GE07mbh_14_u:066.009c: pṛtheyaṃ draupadī caiva tāḥ paśya puruṣottama
GE07mbh_14_u:066.010a: yadā droṇasuto garbhān pāṇḍūnāṃ hanti mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:066.012a: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā jānamānā balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_14_u:066.013a: yady evaṃ tvaṃ pratiśrutya na karoṣi vacaḥ śubham
GE07mbh_14_u:066.014a: abhimanyoḥ suto vīra na saṃjīvati yady ayam
GE07mbh_14_u:066.014c: jīvati tvayi durdharṣa kiṃ kariṣyāmy ahaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:066.016a: tvaṃ hi keśava dharmātmā satyavān satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:066.016c: sa tāṃ vācam ṛtāṃ kartum arhasi tvam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:066.017a: icchann api hi lokāṃs trīñ jīvayethā mṛtān imān
GE07mbh_14_u:066.017c: kiṃ punar dayitaṃ jātaṃ svasrīyasyātmajaṃ mṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:066.018a: prabhāvajñāsmi te kṛṣṇa tasmād etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:066.019a: svaseti vā mahābāho hataputreti vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:066.019c: prapannā mām iyaṃ veti dayāṃ kartum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:067.001a: evam uktas tu rājendra keśihā duḥkhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.001c: tatheti vyājahāroccair hlādayann iva taṃ janam
GE07mbh_14_u:067.002a: vākyena tena hi tadā taṃ janaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.002c: hlādayām āsa sa vibhur gharmārtaṃ salilair iva
GE07mbh_14_u:067.003a: tataḥ sa prāviśat tūrṇaṃ janmaveśma pitus tava
GE07mbh_14_u:067.004a: apāṃ kumbhaiḥ supūrṇaiś ca vinyastaiḥ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_14_u:067.005a: śastraiś ca vimalair nyastaiḥ pāvakaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.006a: dakṣaiś ca parito vīra bhiṣagbhiḥ kuśalais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:067.006c: dadarśa ca sa tejasvī rakṣoghnāny api sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.006e: dravyāṇi sthāpitāni sma vidhivat kuśalair janaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.007a: tathāyuktaṃ ca tad dṛṣṭvā janmaveśma pitus tava
GE07mbh_14_u:067.007c: hṛṣṭo 'bhavad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:067.008c: draupadī tvaritā gatvā vairāṭīṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:067.009a: ayam āyāti te bhadre śvaśuro madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.010a: sāpi bāṣpakalāṃ vācaṃ nigṛhyāśrūṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:067.012c: abhimanyuṃ ca māṃ caiva hatau tulyaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:067.013a: vārṣṇeya madhuhan vīra śirasā tvāṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_14_u:067.014a: yadi sma dharmarājñā vā bhīmasenena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.014c: tvayā vā puṇḍarīkākṣa vākyam uktam idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:067.015a: ajānatīm iṣīkeyaṃ janitrīṃ hantv iti prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:067.015c: aham eva vinaṣṭā syāṃ nedam evaṃgataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:067.016c: kṛtvā nṛśaṃsaṃ durbuddhir drauṇiḥ kiṃ phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:067.017a: sā tvā prasādya śirasā yāce śatrunibarhaṇa
GE07mbh_14_u:067.017c: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi govinda nāyaṃ saṃjīvate yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:067.018a: asmin hi bahavaḥ sādho ye mamāsan manorathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.018c: te droṇaputreṇa hatāḥ kiṃ nu jīvāmi keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:067.019a: āsīn mama matiḥ kṛṣṇa pūrṇotsaṅgā janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:067.020c: viphalā me kṛtāḥ kṛṣṇa hṛdi sarve manorathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:067.022c: yaḥ pāṇḍavīṃ śriyaṃ tyaktvā gato 'dya yamasādanam
GE07mbh_14_u:067.023c: abhimanyau hate vīra tvām eṣyāmy acirād iti
GE07mbh_14_u:067.024a: tac ca nākaravaṃ kṛṣṇa nṛśaṃsā jīvitapriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:067.024c: idānīm āgatāṃ tatra kiṃ nu vakṣyati phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.002c: cukrośa kuntī duḥkhārtā sarvāś ca bharatastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.003a: muhūrtam iva tad rājan pāṇḍavānāṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:068.004c: kaśmalābhihatā vīra vairāṭī tv abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:068.005a: pratilabhya tu sā saṃjñām uttarā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:068.005c: aṅkam āropya taṃ putram idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:068.006a: dharmajñasya sutaḥ saṃs tvam adharmam avabudhyase
GE07mbh_14_u:068.007a: putra gatvā mama vaco brūyās tvaṃ pitaraṃ tava
GE07mbh_14_u:068.007c: durmaraṃ prāṇināṃ vīra kāle prāpte kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:068.008a: yāhaṃ tvayā vihīnādya patyā putreṇa caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:068.009c: bhakṣayiṣye viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣye vā hutāśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:068.010a: atha vā durmaraṃ tāta yad idaṃ me sahasradhā
GE07mbh_14_u:068.012a: āryāṃ ca paśya pāñcālīṃ sātvatīṃ ca tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_14_u:068.012c: māṃ ca paśya suduḥkhārtāṃ vyādhaviddhāṃ mṛgīm iva
GE07mbh_14_u:068.014a: evaṃ vipralapantīṃ tu dṛṣṭvā nipatitāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.014c: uttarāṃ tāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ punar utthāpayanty uta
GE07mbh_14_u:068.015a: utthāya tu punar dhairyāt tadā matsyapateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_14_u:068.016a: śrutvā sa tasyā vipulaṃ vilāpaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.016c: upaspṛśya tataḥ kṛṣṇo brahmāstraṃ saṃjahāra tat
GE07mbh_14_u:068.017a: pratijajñe ca dāśārhas tasya jīvitam acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.017c: abravīc ca viśuddhātmā sarvaṃ viśrāvayañ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:068.018a: na bravīmy uttare mithyā satyam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:068.019a: noktapūrvaṃ mayā mithyā svaireṣv api kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:068.019c: na ca yuddhe parāvṛttas tathā saṃjīvatām ayam
GE07mbh_14_u:068.020a: yathā me dayito dharmo brāhmaṇāś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.020c: abhimanyoḥ suto jāto mṛto jīvatv ayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:068.021c: virodhaṃ tena satyena mṛto jīvatv ayaṃ śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.022a: yathā satyaṃ ca dharmaś ca mayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitau
GE07mbh_14_u:068.022c: tathā mṛtaḥ śiśur ayaṃ jīvatām abhimanyujaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:068.023a: yathā kaṃsaś ca keśī ca dharmeṇa nihatau mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:068.023c: tena satyena bālo 'yaṃ punar ujjīvatām iha
GE07mbh_14_u:068.023d-0138_01: yadi me brahmacaryaṃ syāt satyaṃ ca mayi saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:068.024a: ity ukto vāsudevena sa bālo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:068.024b-0139_03: spṛṣṭamātras tu kṛṣṇena sa hi bālo 'bhimanyujaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:069.001a: brahmāstraṃ tu yadā rājan kṛṣṇena pratisaṃhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:069.001c: tadā tad veśma te pitrā tejasābhividīpitam
GE07mbh_14_u:069.002a: tato rakṣāṃsi sarvāṇi neśus tyaktvā gṛhaṃ tu tat
GE07mbh_14_u:069.002c: antarikṣe ca vāg āsīt sādhu keśava sādhv iti
GE07mbh_14_u:069.003a: tad astraṃ jvalitaṃ cāpi pitāmaham agāt tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:069.003c: tataḥ prāṇān punar lebhe pitā tava janeśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:069.004a: babhūvur muditā rājaṃs tatas tā bharatastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:069.004c: brāhmaṇān vācayām āsur govindasya ca śāsanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:069.005a: tatas tā muditāḥ sarvāḥ praśaśaṃsur janārdanam
GE07mbh_14_u:069.006a: kuntī drupadaputrī ca subhadrā cottarā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:069.007a: tatra mallā naṭā jhallā granthikāḥ saukhaśāyikāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:069.008e: tatas tasyai dadau prīto bahuratnaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:069.010c: parikṣid iti nāmāsya bhavatv ity abravīt tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:069.012a: māsajātas tu te vīra pitā bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:069.012d-0142_03: bhārārtair vāhanais tatra gorute gorute pathi
GE07mbh_14_u:069.012d-0142_05: nāsīt tatra naraḥ kaś cid abhārārto nṛpaṃ vinā
GE07mbh_14_u:069.012d-0142_06: bhīmādayo 'pi yajñārthaṃ vahante kiṃ punar janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:069.014a: patākābhir vicitrābhir dhvajaiś ca vividhair api
GE07mbh_14_u:069.017a: nartakaiś cāpi nṛtyadbhir gāyanānāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:069.017c: āsīd vaiśravaṇasyeva nivāsas tat puraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:069.018a: bandibhiś ca narai rājan strīsahāyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:069.019c: adarśayann iva tadā kurūn vai dakṣiṇottarān
GE07mbh_14_u:070.002a: te sametya yathānyāyaṃ pāṇḍavā vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:070.004a: te kośam agrataḥ kṛtvā viviśuḥ svapuraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:070.006a: dhṛtarāṣṭrād anu ca te gāndhārīṃ subalātmajām
GE07mbh_14_u:070.007a: viduraṃ pūjayitvā ca vaiśyāputraṃ sametya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:070.007c: pūjyamānāḥ sma te vīrā vyarājanta viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:070.008a: tatas tat param āścaryaṃ vicitraṃ mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_14_u:070.008c: śuśruvus te tadā vīrāḥ pitus te janma bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:070.009a: tad upaśrutya te karma vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.011a: tasya sarve yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakruḥ kurūdvahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.013a: bhavatprasādād bhagavan yad idaṃ ratnam āhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:070.014c: tvadadhīnā vayaṃ sarve kṛṣṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.015a: anujānāmi rājaṃs tvāṃ kriyatāṃ yad anantaram
GE07mbh_14_u:070.016c: teneṣṭvā tvaṃ vipāpmā vai bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.017a: ity uktaḥ sa tu dharmātmā kururājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.018a: samanujñāpya tu sa taṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.019c: yad brūyāṃ tvāṃ mahābāho tat kṛthās tvam ihācyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:070.020c: parākrameṇa buddhyā ca tvayeyaṃ nirjitā mahī
GE07mbh_14_u:070.021a: dīkṣayasva tvam ātmānaṃ tvaṃ naḥ paramako guruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.021c: tvayīṣṭavati dharmajña vipāpmā syām ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:070.021e: tvaṃ hi yajño 'kṣaraḥ sarvas tvaṃ dharmas tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.022a: tvam evaitan mahābāho vaktum arhasy ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:070.022c: tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvabhūtānām iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.023c: guṇabhūtāḥ sma te rājaṃs tvaṃ no rājan mato guruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:070.024a: yajasva madanujñātaḥ prāpta eva kratur mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:070.024c: yunaktu no bhavān kārye yatra vāñchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:070.024e: satyaṃ te pratijānāmi sarvaṃ kartāsmi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_14_u:071.001a: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.001c: vyāsam āmantrya medhāvī tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:071.002a: yathā kālaṃ bhavān vetti hayamedhasya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.002c: dīkṣayasva tadā mā tvaṃ tvayy āyatto hi me kratuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.003a: ahaṃ pailo 'tha kaunteya yājñavalkyas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:071.003c: vidhānaṃ yad yathākālaṃ tat kartāro na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.004a: caitryāṃ hi paurṇamāsyāṃ ca tava dīkṣā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:071.005a: aśvavidyāvidaś caiva sūtā viprāś ca tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.006c: sa paryetu yaśo nāmnā tava pārthiva vardhayan
GE07mbh_14_u:071.007a: ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā pāṇḍavaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.008a: sa saṃbhārān samāhṛtya nṛpo dharmātmajas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:071.009c: yathākālaṃ yathāyogaṃ sajjāḥ sma tava dīkṣaṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:071.010a: sphyaś ca kūrcaś ca sauvarṇo yac cānyad api kaurava
GE07mbh_14_u:071.010c: tatra yogyaṃ bhavet kiṃ cit tad raukmaṃ kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:071.011a: aśvaś cotsṛjyatām adya pṛthvyām atha yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:071.011c: suguptaś ca caratv eṣa yathāśāstraṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:071.012a: ayam aśvo mayā brahmann utsṛṣṭaḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:071.013c: kaḥ pālayed iti mune tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:071.014a: ity uktaḥ sa tu rājendra kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:071.015a: jiṣṇuḥ sahiṣṇur dhṛṣṇuś ca sa enaṃ pālayiṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:071.015c: śaktaḥ sa hi mahīṃ jetuṃ nivātakavacāntakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.016a: tasmin hy astrāṇi divyāni divyaṃ saṃhananaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:071.016c: divyaṃ dhanuś ceṣudhī ca sa enam anuyāsyati
GE07mbh_14_u:071.018c: abhimanyoḥ pitā vīraḥ sa enam anuyāsyati
GE07mbh_14_u:071.019c: samartho rakṣituṃ rāṣṭraṃ nakulaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:071.021a: tat tu sarvaṃ yathānyāyam uktaṃ kurukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.021c: cakāra phalgunaṃ cāpi saṃdideśa hayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:071.022a: ehy arjuna tvayā vīra hayo 'yaṃ paripālyatām
GE07mbh_14_u:071.022c: tvam arho rakṣituṃ hy enaṃ nānyaḥ kaś cana mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.023a: ye cāpi tvāṃ mahābāho pratyudīyur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.023c: tair vigraho yathā na syāt tathā kāryaṃ tvayānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:071.024a: ākhyātavyaś ca bhavatā yajño 'yaṃ mama sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:071.025a: evam uktvā sa dharmātmā bhrātaraṃ savyasācinam
GE07mbh_14_u:071.025c: bhīmaṃ ca nakulaṃ caiva puraguptau samādadhat
GE07mbh_14_u:071.026a: kuṭumbatantre ca tathā sahadevaṃ yudhāṃ patim
GE07mbh_14_u:072.001a: dīkṣākāle tu saṃprāpte tatas te sumahartvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:072.002a: kṛtvā sa paśubandhāṃś ca dīkṣitaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:072.003a: hayaś ca hayamedhārthaṃ svayaṃ sa brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_14_u:072.004a: sa rājā dharmajo rājan dīkṣito vibabhau tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:072.006c: babhūvur arjunaś caiva pradīpta iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:072.008c: tam aśvaṃ pṛthivīpāla mudā yuktaḥ sasāra ha
GE07mbh_14_u:072.009a: ākumāraṃ tadā rājann āgamat tat puraṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:072.010c: didṛkṣūṇāṃ hayaṃ taṃ ca taṃ caiva hayasāriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:072.012a: eṣa gacchati kaunteyas turagaś caiva dīptimān
GE07mbh_14_u:072.012c: yam anveti mahābāhuḥ saṃspṛśan dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:072.013a: evaṃ śuśrāva vadatāṃ giro jiṣṇur udāradhīḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:072.013c: svasti te 'stu vrajāriṣṭaṃ punaś caihīti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:072.014c: nainaṃ paśyāma saṃmarde dhanur etat pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:072.015a: etad dhi bhīmanirhrādaṃ viśrutaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:072.015c: svasti gacchatv ariṣṭaṃ vai panthānam akutobhayam
GE07mbh_14_u:072.015e: nivṛttam enaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ punar evaṃ ca te 'bruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:072.016c: śuśrāva madhurā vācaḥ punaḥ punar udīritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:072.018c: anujagmur mahātmānaṃ kṣatriyāś ca viśo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:072.019c: cacāra sa mahārāja yathādeśaṃ sa sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:072.020a: tatra yuddhāni vṛttāni yāny āsan pāṇḍavasya ha
GE07mbh_14_u:072.020c: tāni vakṣyāmi te vīra vicitrāṇi mahānti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:072.021a: sa hayaḥ pṛthivīṃ rājan pradakṣiṇam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:072.022c: śanais tadā pariyayau śvetāśvaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:072.023a: tatra saṃkalanā nāsti rājñām ayutaśas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:072.024c: mlecchāś cānye bahuvidhāḥ pūrvaṃ vinikṛtā raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:072.026a: evaṃ yuddhāni vṛttāni tatra tatra mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:072.027a: yāni tūbhayato rājan prataptāni mahānti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:073.004a: tataḥ kirīṭī saṃcintya teṣāṃ rājñāṃ cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_14_u:073.004c: vārayām āsa tān vīrān sāntvapūrvam ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:073.005a: tam anādṛtya te sarve śarair abhyahanaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:073.006a: abravīc ca tato jiṣṇuḥ prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:073.006c: nivartadhvam adharmajñāḥ śreyo jīvitam eva vaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:073.007a: sa hi vīraḥ prayāsyan vai dharmarājena vāritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:073.007c: hatabāndhavā na te pārtha hantavyāḥ pārthivā iti
GE07mbh_14_u:073.008a: sa tadā tad vacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:073.008c: tān nivartadhvam ity āha na nyavartanta cāpi te
GE07mbh_14_u:073.013a: sa tāñ jyāpuṅkhanirmuktair bahubhiḥ subahūñ śarān
GE07mbh_14_u:073.013c: ciccheda pāṇḍavo rājaṃs te bhūmau nyapataṃs tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:073.017a: tasya tāṃ śīghratām īkṣya tutoṣātīva vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:073.018a: na saṃdadhānaṃ dadṛśe nādadānaṃ ca taṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:073.018c: kirantam eva sa śarān dadṛśe pākaśāsaniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:073.019a: sa tu taṃ pūjayām āsa dhṛtavarmāṇam āhave
GE07mbh_14_u:073.019c: manasā sa muhūrtaṃ vai raṇe samabhiharṣayan
GE07mbh_14_u:073.019d-0145_01: na vivyādha raṇe kruddhaḥ kuntīputro hasann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:073.019d-0145_02: saubhadrasyeva tat karma dṛṣṭvā bālasya vismitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:073.020a: taṃ pannagam iva kruddhaṃ kuruvīraḥ smayann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:073.021c: dhṛtavarmā śaraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ mumoca vijaye tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:073.022a: sa tena vijayas tūrṇam asyan viddhaḥ kare bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:073.022c: mumoca gāṇḍīvaṃ duḥkhāt tat papātātha bhūtale
GE07mbh_14_u:073.025a: tato roṣānvito jiṣṇuḥ pramṛjya rudhiraṃ karāt
GE07mbh_14_u:073.025c: dhanur ādatta tad divyaṃ śaravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ca
GE07mbh_14_u:073.029a: tato yodhāñ jaghānāśu teṣāṃ sa daśa cāṣṭa ca
GE07mbh_14_u:073.030a: tāṃs tu prabhagnān saṃprekṣya tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:073.032c: tava sma kiṃkarāḥ sarve sarve ca vaśagās tava
GE07mbh_14_u:073.033a: ājñāpayasva naḥ pārtha prahvān preṣyān avasthitān
GE07mbh_14_u:073.034a: etad ājñāya vacanaṃ sarvāṃs tān abravīt tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:073.034c: jīvitaṃ rakṣata nṛpāḥ śāsanaṃ gṛhyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:074.004a: tam ālakṣya mahābāhuḥ kurūṇām ṛṣabhas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:074.005c: hayam utsṛjya taṃ vīras tataḥ pārtham upādravat
GE07mbh_14_u:074.006a: punaḥ praviśya nagaraṃ daṃśitaḥ sa nṛpottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:074.008c: āhvayām āsa kauravyaṃ bālyān mohāc ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_14_u:074.009c: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhas tataḥ śvetahayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:074.011a: pracodyamānaḥ sa gajas tena rājñā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:074.012a: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kruddho rājan dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:074.014c: dvidhā tridhā ca ciccheda kha eva khagamais tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:074.015a: sa tān dṛṣṭvā tathā chinnāṃs tomarān bhagadattajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:074.015c: iṣūn asaktāṃs tvaritaḥ prāhiṇot pāṇḍavaṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:074.017a: sa tair viddho mahātejā vajradatto mahāhave
GE07mbh_14_u:074.017c: bhṛśāhataḥ papātorvyāṃ na tv enam ajahāt smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:074.018a: tataḥ sa punar āruhya vāraṇapravaraṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:074.018c: avyagraḥ preṣayām āsa jayārthī vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:074.019c: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho jvalitān iva pāvakān
GE07mbh_14_u:074.020a: sa tair viddho mahānāgo visravan rudhiraṃ babhau
GE07mbh_14_u:075.001a: evaṃ trirātram abhavat tad yuddhaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:075.002c: jahāsa sasvanaṃ hāsaṃ vākyaṃ cedam athābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:075.003a: arjunārjuna tiṣṭhasva na me jīvan vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_14_u:075.003c: tvāṃ nihatya kariṣyāmi pitus toyaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:075.004a: tvayā vṛddho mama pitā bhagadattaḥ pituḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_14_u:075.004c: hato vṛddho 'pacāyitvāc chiśuṃ mām adya yodhaya
GE07mbh_14_u:075.005a: ity evam uktvā saṃkruddho vajradatto narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:075.005c: preṣayām āsa kauravya vāraṇaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:075.008a: sa tena preṣito rājñā meghavan ninadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:075.010c: gāṇḍīvam āśritya balī na vyakampata śatruhā
GE07mbh_14_u:075.011a: cukrodha balavac cāpi pāṇḍavas tasya bhūpateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:075.012a: tatas taṃ vāraṇaṃ kruddhaḥ śarajālena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:075.013c: tasthau śarair vitunnāṅgaḥ śvāvic chalalito yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:075.015c: vārayām āsa tān astāṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:075.018a: sa tena vāraṇo rājan marmaṇy abhihato bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:075.020c: taṃ na bhetavyam ity āha tato bhūmigataṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_14_u:075.021a: abravīd dhi mahātejāḥ prasthitaṃ māṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:075.021c: rājānas te na hantavyā dhanaṃjaya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:075.022a: sarvam etan naravyāghra bhavatv etāvatā kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:075.022c: yodhāś cāpi na hantavyā dhanaṃjaya raṇe tvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:075.023a: vaktavyāś cāpi rājānaḥ sarvaiḥ saha suhṛjjanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:075.024a: iti bhrātṛvacaḥ śrutvā na hanmi tvāṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:075.024c: uttiṣṭha na bhayaṃ te 'sti svastimān gaccha pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:075.026a: evam uktaḥ sa rājā tu bhagadattātmajas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:075.026c: tathety evābravīd vākyaṃ pāṇḍavenābhinirjitaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:076.001-0150_02: visṛjya yāte turage saindhavān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:076.001a: saindhavair abhavad yuddhaṃ tatas tasya kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.001c: hataśeṣair mahārāja hatānāṃ ca sutair api
GE07mbh_14_u:076.003a: aśvaṃ ca taṃ parāmṛśya viṣayānte viṣopamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.003c: na bhayaṃ cakrire pārthād bhīmasenād anantarāt
GE07mbh_14_u:076.005a: tatas te tu mahāvīryā rājānaḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:076.006a: te nāmāny atha gotrāṇi karmāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:076.008c: sarve yuyudhire vīrā rathasthās taṃ padātinam
GE07mbh_14_u:076.012c: taiḥ kīrṇaḥ śuśubhe pārtho ravir meghāntare yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:076.014c: trailokyam abhavad rājan raviś cāsīd rajoruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.015c: rāhur agrasad ādityaṃ yugapat somam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:076.016a: ulkāś ca jaghnire sūryaṃ vikīryantyaḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.021c: mohāt papāta gāṇḍīvam āvāpaś ca karād api
GE07mbh_14_u:076.024a: tato devarṣayaḥ sarve tathā saptarṣayo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:076.024c: brahmarṣayaś ca vijayaṃ jepuḥ pārthasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.026c: yantrasyeveha śabdo 'bhūn mahāṃs tasya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.027a: tataḥ sa śaravarṣāṇi pratyamitrān prati prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.028a: tatas te saindhavā yodhāḥ sarva eva sarājakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.028c: nādṛśyanta śaraiḥ kīrṇāḥ śalabhair iva pāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.029a: tasya śabdena vitresur bhayārtāś ca vidudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.029c: mumucuś cāśru śokārtāḥ suṣupuś cāpi saindhavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:076.030a: tāṃs tu sarvān naraśreṣṭhaḥ sarvato vicaran balī
GE07mbh_14_u:076.031c: vyasṛjad dikṣu sarvāsu mahendra iva vajrabhṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:077.001c: vibabhau yudhi durdharṣo himavān acalo yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.002a: tataḥ saindhavayodhās te punar eva vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.003a: tān prasahya mahāvīryaḥ punar eva vyavasthitān
GE07mbh_14_u:077.003c: tataḥ provāca kaunteyo mumūrṣūñ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.004a: yudhyadhvaṃ parayā śaktyā yatadhvaṃ ca vadhe mama
GE07mbh_14_u:077.004c: kurudhvaṃ sarvakāryāṇi mahad vo bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:077.005a: eṣa yotsyāmi vaḥ sarvān nivārya śaravāgurām
GE07mbh_14_u:077.006a: etāvad uktvā kauravyo ruṣā gāṇḍīvabhṛt tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.006c: tato 'tha vacanaṃ smṛtvā bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:077.007a: na hantavyā raṇe tāta kṣatriyā vijigīṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.007c: jetavyāś ceti yat proktaṃ dharmarājñā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.007e: cintayām āsa ca tadā phalgunaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.008a: ity ukto 'haṃ narendreṇa na hantavyā nṛpā iti
GE07mbh_14_u:077.008c: kathaṃ tan na mṛṣeha syād dharmarājavacaḥ śubham
GE07mbh_14_u:077.009a: na hanyeraṃś ca rājāno rājñaś cājñā kṛtā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:077.009c: iti saṃcintya sa tadā bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.010a: bālān striyo vā yuṣmākaṃ na haniṣye vyavasthitān
GE07mbh_14_u:077.010c: yaś ca vakṣyati saṃgrāme tavāsmīti parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.011a: etac chrutvā vaco mahyaṃ kurudhvaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.012a: evam uktvā tu tān vīrān yuyudhe kurupuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.015a: chittvā tu tān āśugamān kaṅkapatrāñ śilāśitān
GE07mbh_14_u:077.015c: ekaikam eṣa daśabhir bibheda samare śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.016a: tataḥ prāsāṃś ca śaktīś ca punar eva dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_14_u:077.016c: jayadrathaṃ hataṃ smṛtvā cikṣipuḥ saindhavā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.017a: teṣāṃ kirīṭī saṃkalpaṃ moghaṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.017c: sarvāṃs tān antarā chittvā mudā cukrośa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.019a: teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ caiva punar eva ca dhāvatām
GE07mbh_14_u:077.022a: tāṃs tu sarvān pariglānān viditvā dhṛtarāṣṭrajā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.022c: duḥśalā bālam ādāya naptāraṃ prayayau tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.023e: dhanaṃjayo 'pi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanur visasṛje prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.024c: prāha kiṃ karavāṇīti sā ca taṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:077.026a: ity uktas tasya pitaraṃ sa papracchārjunas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.026c: kvāsāv iti tato rājan duḥśalā vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:077.027c: pañcatvam agamad vīra yathā tan me nibodha ha
GE07mbh_14_u:077.028a: sa pūrvaṃ pitaraṃ śrutvā hataṃ yuddhe tvayānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:077.028c: tvām āgataṃ ca saṃśrutya yuddhāya hayasāriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:077.029a: prāpto bībhatsur ity eva nāma śrutvaiva te 'nagha
GE07mbh_14_u:077.030a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ tatas tasyātmajaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:077.031a: ity uktvārtasvaraṃ sā tu mumoca dhṛtarāṣṭrajā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.031c: dīnā dīnaṃ sthitaṃ pārtham abravīc cāpy adhomukham
GE07mbh_14_u:077.032a: svasāraṃ mām avekṣasva svasrīyātmajam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:077.032c: kartum arhasi dharmajña dayāṃ mayi kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:077.032e: vismṛtya kururājānaṃ taṃ ca mandaṃ jayadratham
GE07mbh_14_u:077.033c: tathāyaṃ surathāj jāto mama pautro mahābhuja
GE07mbh_14_u:077.034c: śamārthaṃ sarvayodhānāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_14_u:077.035c: prasādam asya bālasya tasmāt tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:077.036a: eṣa prasādya śirasā mayā sārdham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:077.036c: yācate tvāṃ mahābāho śamaṃ gaccha dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:077.037a: bālasya hatabandhoś ca pārtha kiṃ cid ajānataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.037c: prasādaṃ kuru dharmajña mā manyuvaśam anvagāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.038a: tam anāryaṃ nṛśaṃsaṃ ca vismṛtyāsya pitāmaham
GE07mbh_14_u:077.039c: saṃsmṛtya devīṃ gāndhārīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_14_u:077.040a: dhik taṃ duryodhanaṃ kṣudraṃ rājyalubdhaṃ ca māninam
GE07mbh_14_u:077.040c: yatkṛte bāndhavāḥ sarve mayā nītā yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_14_u:077.041a: ity uktvā bahu sāntvādi prasādam akaroj jayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.041c: pariṣvajya ca tāṃ prīto visasarja gṛhān prati
GE07mbh_14_u:077.042a: duḥśalā cāpi tān yodhān nivārya mahato raṇāt
GE07mbh_14_u:077.042c: saṃpūjya pārthaṃ prayayau gṛhān prati śubhānanā
GE07mbh_14_u:077.043b-0151_01: evaṃ nirjitya tān vīrān saindhavān sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:077.043c: punar evānvadhāvat sa taṃ hayaṃ kāmacāriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:077.044a: sasāra yajñiyaṃ vīro vidhivat sa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:077.045a: sa ca vājī yatheṣṭena tāṃs tān deśān yathāsukham
GE07mbh_14_u:077.046a: krameṇa sa hayas tv evaṃ vicaran bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:078.001a: śrutvā tu nṛpatir vīraṃ pitaraṃ babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.003a: uvāca cainaṃ dharmātmā samanyuḥ phalgunas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:078.003c: prakriyeyaṃ na te yuktā bahis tvaṃ kṣatradharmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.004c: yajñiyaṃ viṣayānte māṃ nāyotsīḥ kiṃ nu putraka
GE07mbh_14_u:078.005c: yo māṃ yuddhāya saṃprāptaṃ sāmnaivātho tvam agrahīḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.006a: na tvayā puruṣārthaś ca kaś cid astīha jīvatā
GE07mbh_14_u:078.006c: yas tvaṃ strīvad yudhā prāptaṃ sāmnā māṃ pratyagṛhṇathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.007a: yady ahaṃ nyastaśastras tvām āgaccheyaṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_14_u:078.007c: prakriyeyaṃ tato yuktā bhavet tava narādhama
GE07mbh_14_u:078.008a: tam evam uktaṃ bhartrā tu viditvā pannagātmajā
GE07mbh_14_u:078.009a: sā dadarśa tataḥ putraṃ vimṛśantam adhomukham
GE07mbh_14_u:078.011a: ulūpīṃ māṃ nibodha tvaṃ mātaraṃ pannagātmajām
GE07mbh_14_u:078.011c: kuruṣva vacanaṃ putra dharmas te bhavitā paraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.012c: evam eṣa hi te prīto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.013a: evam uddharṣito mātrā sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.014a: saṃnahya kāñcanaṃ varma śirastrāṇaṃ ca bhānumat
GE07mbh_14_u:078.016c: prayayau pārtham uddiśya sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.018a: gṛhītaṃ vājinaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītātmā sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.019a: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ vīraṃ śaravrātaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.020a: tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ pituḥ putrasya cātulam
GE07mbh_14_u:078.022a: so 'bhyagāt saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.023a: sa gāḍhavedano dhīmān ālambya dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:078.023c: divyaṃ tejaḥ samāviśya pramīta iva saṃbabhau
GE07mbh_14_u:078.024c: putraṃ śakrātmajo vākyam idam āha mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:078.025c: sadṛśaṃ karma te dṛṣṭvā prītimān asmi putraka
GE07mbh_14_u:078.026a: vimuñcāmy eṣa bāṇāṃs te putra yuddhe sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_14_u:078.026c: ity evam uktvā nārācair abhyavarṣad amitrahā
GE07mbh_14_u:078.027c: nārācair acchinad rājā sarvān eva tridhā tridhā
GE07mbh_14_u:078.028a: tasya pārthaḥ śarair divyair dhvajaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:078.030c: padātiḥ pitaraṃ kopād yodhayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_14_u:078.033a: tataḥ sa bālyāt pitaraṃ vivyādha hṛdi patriṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:078.034a: sa bāṇas tejasā dīpto jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.035c: mahīṃ jagāma mohārtas tato rājan dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.037a: vyāyamya saṃyuge rājā dṛṣṭvā ca pitaraṃ hatam
GE07mbh_14_u:078.037c: pūrvam eva ca bāṇaughair gāḍhaviddho 'rjunena saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:078.038a: bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:079.001c: mumoha duḥkhād durdharṣā nipapāta ca bhūtale
GE07mbh_14_u:079.002a: pratilabhya ca sā saṃjñāṃ devī divyavapurdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:079.003a: ulūpi paśya bhartāraṃ śayānaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:079.004a: nanu tvam ārye dharmajñā nanu cāsi pativratā
GE07mbh_14_u:079.004c: yat tvatkṛte 'yaṃ patitaḥ patis te nihato raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:079.005a: kiṃ tu sarvāparādho 'yaṃ yadi te 'dya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:079.006a: nanu tvam ārye dharmajñā trailokyaviditā śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:079.006c: yad ghātayitvā bhartāraṃ putreṇeha na śocasi
GE07mbh_14_u:079.007c: patim eva tu śocāmi yasyātithyam idaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:079.008a: ity uktvā sā tadā devīm ulūpīṃ pannagātmajām
GE07mbh_14_u:079.009c: ayam aśvo mahābāho mayā te parimokṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:079.010a: nanu nāma tvayā vīra dharmarājasya yajñiyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:079.010c: ayam aśvo 'nusartavyaḥ sa śeṣe kiṃ mahītale
GE07mbh_14_u:079.011c: sa kasmāt prāṇado 'nyeṣāṃ prāṇān saṃtyaktavān asi
GE07mbh_14_u:079.012a: ulūpi sādhu saṃpaśya bhartāraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:079.012c: putraṃ cainaṃ samutsāhya ghātayitvā na śocasi
GE07mbh_14_u:079.013a: kāmaṃ svapitu bālo 'yaṃ bhūmau pretagatiṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:079.014c: nārīṇāṃ tu bhavaty etan mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_14_u:079.015a: sakhyaṃ hy etat kṛtaṃ dhātrā śāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ ca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:079.015c: sakhyaṃ samabhijānīhi satyaṃ saṃgatam astu te
GE07mbh_14_u:079.016a: putreṇa ghātayitvemaṃ patiṃ yadi na me 'dya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:079.017c: ihaiva prāyam āśiṣye prekṣantyās te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:079.018c: tataḥ prāyam upāsīnā tūṣṇīm āsīj janādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:080.001a: tathā vilapyoparatā bhartuḥ pādau pragṛhya sā
GE07mbh_14_u:080.002a: tataḥ saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:080.003a: ito duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu yan me mātā sukhaidhitā
GE07mbh_14_u:080.003c: bhūmau nipatitaṃ vīram anuśete mṛtaṃ patim
GE07mbh_14_u:080.004c: mayā vinihataṃ saṃkhye prekṣate durmaraṃ bata
GE07mbh_14_u:080.005a: aho 'syā hṛdayaṃ devyā dṛḍhaṃ yan na vidīryate
GE07mbh_14_u:080.006a: durmaraṃ puruṣeṇeha manye hy adhvany anāgate
GE07mbh_14_u:080.006c: yatra nāhaṃ na me mātā viprayujyeta jīvitāt
GE07mbh_14_u:080.007a: aho dhik kuruvīrasya hy uraḥsthaṃ kāñcanaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:080.008a: bho bho paśyata me vīraṃ pitaraṃ brāhmaṇā bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:080.009c: kurvantu śāntikāṃ tv adya raṇe yo 'yaṃ mayā hataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:080.010a: vyādiśantu ca kiṃ viprāḥ prāyaścittam ihādya me
GE07mbh_14_u:080.011a: duścarā dvādaśa samā hatvā pitaram adya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:080.012a: śiraḥkapāle cāsyaiva bhuñjataḥ pitur adya me
GE07mbh_14_u:080.012c: prāyaścittaṃ hi nāsty anyad dhatvādya pitaraṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:080.013c: kṛtaṃ priyaṃ mayā te 'dya nihatya samare 'rjunam
GE07mbh_14_u:080.014a: so 'ham apy adya yāsyāmi gatiṃ pitṛniṣevitām
GE07mbh_14_u:080.014c: na śaknomy ātmanātmānam ahaṃ dhārayituṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:080.015a: sā tvaṃ mayi mṛte mātas tathā gāṇḍīvadhanvani
GE07mbh_14_u:080.017c: tvaṃ ca mātar yathā satyaṃ bravīmi bhujagottame
GE07mbh_14_u:080.018a: yadi nottiṣṭhati jayaḥ pitā me bharatarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:080.019a: na hi me pitaraṃ hatvā niṣkṛtir vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:080.020a: vīraṃ hi kṣatriyaṃ hatvā gośatena pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:080.020c: pitaraṃ tu nihatyaivaṃ dustarā niṣkṛtir mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:080.021a: eṣa hy eko mahātejāḥ pāṇḍuputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:080.021c: pitā ca mama dharmātmā tasya me niṣkṛtiḥ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:080.022a: ity evam uktvā nṛpate dhanaṃjayasuto nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:081.002a: ulūpī cintayām āsa tadā saṃjīvanaṃ maṇim
GE07mbh_14_u:081.003a: taṃ gṛhītvā tu kauravya nāgarājapateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_14_u:081.004a: uttiṣṭha mā śucaḥ putra naiṣa jiṣṇus tvayā hataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:081.004c: ajeyaḥ puruṣair eṣa devair vāpi savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:081.005a: mayā tu mohinī nāma māyaiṣā saṃprayojitā
GE07mbh_14_u:081.006a: jijñāsur hy eṣa vai putra balasya tava kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:081.007a: tasmād asi mayā putra yuddhārthaṃ paricoditaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:081.007c: mā pāpam ātmanaḥ putra śaṅkethās tv aṇv api prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:081.008c: nainaṃ śakto hi saṃgrāme jetuṃ śakro 'pi putraka
GE07mbh_14_u:081.009a: ayaṃ tu me maṇir divyaḥ samānīto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:081.009c: mṛtān mṛtān pannagendrān yo jīvayati nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:081.010a: etam asyorasi tvaṃ tu sthāpayasva pituḥ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:081.010c: saṃjīvitaṃ punaḥ putra tato draṣṭāsi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_14_u:081.011a: ity uktaḥ sthāpayām āsa tasyorasi maṇiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:081.012a: tasmin nyaste maṇau vīra jiṣṇur ujjīvitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:081.015c: sādhu sādhv iti cākāśe babhūva sumahān svanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:081.018c: raṇājiram amitraghna yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_14_u:081.019a: jananī ca kimarthaṃ te raṇabhūmim upāgatā
GE07mbh_14_u:081.020a: jānāmy aham idaṃ yuddhaṃ tvayā madvacanāt kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:081.020c: strīṇām āgamane hetum aham icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_14_u:081.021a: tam uvāca tataḥ pṛṣṭo maṇipūrapatis tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:081.021c: prasādya śirasā vidvān ulūpī pṛcchyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:082.002c: mama vā cañcalāpāṅge kaccit tvaṃ śubham icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:082.003c: akārṣam aham ajñānād ayaṃ vā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.004a: kaccic ca rājaputrī te sapatnī caitravāhinī
GE07mbh_14_u:082.005c: na me tvam aparāddho 'si na nṛpo babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.005e: na janitrī tathāsyeyaṃ mama yā preṣyavat sthitā
GE07mbh_14_u:082.006a: śrūyatāṃ yad yathā cedaṃ mayā sarvaṃ viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_14_u:082.006c: na me kopas tvayā kāryaḥ śirasā tvāṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_14_u:082.007a: tvatprītyarthaṃ hi kauravya kṛtam etan mayānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:082.007c: yat tac chṛṇu mahābāho nikhilena dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:082.008c: adharmeṇa hataḥ pārtha tasyaiṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā
GE07mbh_14_u:082.009a: na hi bhīṣmas tvayā vīra yudhyamāno nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.009c: śikhaṇḍinā tu saṃsaktas tam āśritya hatas tvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:082.010a: tasya śāntim akṛtvā tu tyajes tvaṃ yadi jīvitam
GE07mbh_14_u:082.010c: karmaṇā tena pāpena patethā niraye dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:082.011a: eṣā tu vihitā śāntiḥ putrād yāṃ prāptavān asi
GE07mbh_14_u:082.012a: purā hi śrutam etad vai vasubhiḥ kathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:082.012c: gaṅgāyās tīram āgamya hate śāṃtanave nṛpe
GE07mbh_14_u:082.013a: āplutya devā vasavaḥ sametya ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_14_u:082.013c: idam ūcur vaco ghoraṃ bhāgīrathyā mate tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:082.015a: tad anenābhiṣaṅgeṇa vayam apy arjunaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:082.015c: śāpena yojayāmeti tathāstv iti ca sābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:082.016a: tad ahaṃ pitur āvedya bhṛśaṃ pravyathitendriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:082.016c: abhavaṃ sa ca tac chrutvā viṣādam agamat param
GE07mbh_14_u:082.017a: pitā tu me vasūn gatvā tvadarthaṃ samayācata
GE07mbh_14_u:082.017c: punaḥ punaḥ prasādyaināṃs ta enam idam abruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:082.018c: sa enaṃ raṇamadhyasthaṃ śaraiḥ pātayitā bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:082.019a: evaṃ kṛte sa nāgendra muktaśāpo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:082.019c: gaccheti vasubhiś cokto mama cedaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.020a: tac chrutvā tvaṃ mayā tasmāc chāpād asi vimokṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.020c: na hi tvāṃ devarājo 'pi samareṣu parājayet
GE07mbh_14_u:082.021a: ātmā putraḥ smṛtas tasmāt tenehāsi parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.021c: nātra doṣo mama mataḥ kathaṃ vā manyase vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:082.022a: ity evam ukto vijayaḥ prasannātmābravīd idam
GE07mbh_14_u:082.022c: sarvaṃ me supriyaṃ devi yad etat kṛtavaty asi
GE07mbh_14_u:082.025a: ity evam uktaḥ pārthena sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.027a: mama tv anugrahārthāya praviśasva puraṃ svakam
GE07mbh_14_u:082.027c: bhāryābhyāṃ saha śatrughna mā bhūt te 'tra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:082.028a: uṣitveha viśalyas tvaṃ sukhaṃ sve veśmani prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:082.029a: ity uktaḥ sa tu putreṇa tadā vānaraketanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.030a: viditaṃ te mahābāho yathā dīkṣāṃ carāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:082.030c: na sa tāvat pravekṣyāmi puraṃ te pṛthulocana
GE07mbh_14_u:082.031a: yathākāmaṃ prayāty eṣa yajñiyaś ca turaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:082.031c: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi na sthānaṃ vidyate mama
GE07mbh_14_u:082.032a: sa tatra vidhivat tena pūjitaḥ pākaśāsaniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.001a: sa tu vājī samudrāntāṃ paryetya pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:083.004a: tataḥ purāt sa niṣkramya rathī dhanvī śarī talī
GE07mbh_14_u:083.006a: kim ayaṃ cāryate vājī strīmadhya iva bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:083.007a: adattānunayo yuddhe yadi tvaṃ pitṛbhir mama
GE07mbh_14_u:083.008a: ity uktaḥ pratyuvācainaṃ pāṇḍavaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:083.008c: vighnakartā mayā vārya iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:083.009a: bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena nṛpate tavāpi viditaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:083.009c: praharasva yathāśakti na manyur vidyate mama
GE07mbh_14_u:083.010a: ity uktaḥ prāharat pūrvaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ magadheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.011c: cakāra moghāṃs tān bāṇān ayatnād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:083.012a: sa moghaṃ tasya bāṇaughaṃ kṛtvā vānaraketanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.012c: śarān mumoca jvalitān dīptāsyān iva pannagān
GE07mbh_14_u:083.013c: anyeṣu ca rathāṅgeṣu na śarīre na sārathau
GE07mbh_14_u:083.014c: manyamānaḥ svavīryaṃ tan māgadhaḥ prāhiṇoc charān
GE07mbh_14_u:083.015c: babhau vāsantika iva palāśaḥ puṣpito mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:083.016c: tena tasthau sa kauravya lokavīrasya darśane
GE07mbh_14_u:083.017a: savyasācī tu saṃkruddho vikṛṣya balavad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.017c: hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān sāratheś ca śiro 'harat
GE07mbh_14_u:083.018a: dhanuś cāsya mahac citraṃ kṣureṇa pracakarta ha
GE07mbh_14_u:083.018c: hastāvāpaṃ patākāṃ ca dhvajaṃ cāsya nyapātayat
GE07mbh_14_u:083.019a: sa rājā vyathito vyaśvo vidhanur hatasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.024c: bahv etat samare karma tava bālasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:083.025a: yudhiṣṭhirasya saṃdeśo na hantavyā nṛpā iti
GE07mbh_14_u:083.025c: tena jīvasi rājaṃs tvam aparāddho 'pi me raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:083.026a: iti matvā sa cātmānaṃ pratyādiṣṭaṃ sma māgadhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.026d-0157_01: parājito 'smi bhadraṃ te nāhaṃ yoddhum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_14_u:083.026d-0157_02: yac ca kṛtyaṃ mayā te 'dya tad brūhi kṛtam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:083.027a: tam arjunaḥ samāśvāsya punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:083.027c: āgantavyaṃ parāṃ caitrīm aśvamedhe nṛpasya naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.028a: ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā pūjayām āsa taṃ hayam
GE07mbh_14_u:083.028c: phalgunaṃ ca yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vidhivat sahadevajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:083.029a: tato yatheṣṭam agamat punar eva sa kesarī
GE07mbh_14_u:083.030a: tatra tatra ca bhūrīṇi mlecchasainyāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.001c: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya cārayām āsa taṃ hayam
GE07mbh_14_u:084.002a: tataḥ sa punar āvṛtya hayaḥ kāmacaro balī
GE07mbh_14_u:084.004a: tatrārcito yayau rājaṃs tadā sa turagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.004c: kāśīn andhrān kosalāṃś ca kirātān atha taṅgaṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:084.005a: tatra pūjāṃ yathānyāyaṃ pratigṛhya sa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.005c: punar āvṛtya kaunteyo daśārṇān agamat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:084.007a: taṃ cāpi vaśam ānīya kirīṭī puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.008c: tataś cakre niṣādaiḥ sa saṃgrāmaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:084.009a: tatas tam api kaunteyaḥ samareṣv aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.010a: sa taṃ jitvā mahārāja naiṣādiṃ pākaśāsaniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.011a: tatrāpi draviḍair andhrai raudrair māhiṣakair api
GE07mbh_14_u:084.011c: tathā kollagireyaiś ca yuddham āsīt kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.011d-0158_01: tāṃś cāpi vijayo jitvā nātitīvreṇa karmaṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:084.012c: gokarṇam api cāsādya prabhāsam api jagmivān
GE07mbh_14_u:084.014c: prayayus tāṃs tadā rājann ugraseno nyavārayat
GE07mbh_14_u:084.016e: tatas tābhyām anujñāto yayau yena hayo gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.017a: tataḥ sa paścimaṃ deśaṃ samudrasya tadā hayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:084.017c: krameṇa vyacarat sphītaṃ tataḥ pañcanadaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_14_u:084.018a: tasmād api sa kauravya gāndhāraviṣayaṃ hayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.001a: śakunes tu suto vīro gāndhārāṇāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.002a: amṛṣyamāṇās te yodhā nṛpateḥ śakuner vadham
GE07mbh_14_u:085.003a: tān uvāca sa dharmātmā bībhatsur aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.003c: yudhiṣṭhirasya vacanaṃ na ca te jagṛhur hitam
GE07mbh_14_u:085.004c: parivārya hayaṃ jagmus tataś cukrodha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.005a: tataḥ śirāṃsi dīptāgrais teṣāṃ ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.006a: te vadhyamānāḥ pārthena hayam utsṛjya saṃbhramāt
GE07mbh_14_u:085.008c: sa rājā śakuneḥ putraḥ pāṇḍavaṃ pratyavārayat
GE07mbh_14_u:085.009c: pārtho 'bravīn na me vadhyā rājāno rājaśāsanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:085.009e: alaṃ yuddhena te vīra na te 'sty adya parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.010a: ity uktas tad anādṛtya vākyam ajñānamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.012a: tad dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ jagmur gāndhārāḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_14_u:085.012c: icchatā tena na hato rājety api ca te viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.013c: babhau tair eva sahitas trastaiḥ kṣudramṛgair iva
GE07mbh_14_u:085.014a: teṣāṃ tu tarasā pārthas tatraiva paridhāvatām
GE07mbh_14_u:085.015a: ucchritāṃs tu bhujān ke cin nābudhyanta śarair hṛtān
GE07mbh_14_u:085.017a: na hy adṛśyanta vīrasya ke cid agre 'gryakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:085.017c: ripavaḥ pātyamānā vai ye saheyur mahāśarān
GE07mbh_14_u:085.019a: sā nyavārayad avyagrā taṃ putraṃ yuddhadurmadam
GE07mbh_14_u:085.019c: prasādayām āsa ca taṃ jiṣṇum akliṣṭakāriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:085.020a: tāṃ pūjayitvā kaunteyaḥ prasādam akarot tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:085.020c: śakuneś cāpi tanayaṃ sāntvayann idam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:085.021a: na me priyaṃ mahābāho yat te buddhir iyaṃ kṛtā
GE07mbh_14_u:085.022c: tena jīvasi rājaṃs tvaṃ nihatās tv anugās tava
GE07mbh_14_u:085.023a: maivaṃ bhūḥ śāmyatāṃ vairaṃ mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_14_u:085.023c: āgantavyaṃ parāṃ caitrīm aśvamedhe nṛpasya naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.001a: ity uktvānuyayau pārtho hayaṃ taṃ kāmacāriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:086.001b-0159_01: te nyavartanta gāndhārā hataśiṣṭāḥ svakaṃ puram
GE07mbh_14_u:086.001c: nyavartata tato vājī yena nāgāhvayaṃ puram
GE07mbh_14_u:086.002a: taṃ nivṛttaṃ tu śuśrāva cāreṇaiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.003a: vijayasya ca tat karma gāndhāraviṣaye tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:086.003c: śrutvānyeṣu ca deśeṣu sa suprīto 'bhavan nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.004a: etasminn eva kāle tu dvādaśīṃ māghapākṣikīm
GE07mbh_14_u:086.005c: bhīmaṃ ca nakulaṃ caiva sahadevaṃ ca kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.006a: provācedaṃ vacaḥ kāle tadā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.007c: yathā me puruṣāḥ prāhur ye dhanaṃjayasāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.008a: upasthitaś ca kālo 'yam abhito vartate hayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.008c: māghī ca paurṇamāsīyaṃ māsaḥ śeṣo vṛkodara
GE07mbh_14_u:086.010a: ity uktaḥ sa tu tac cakre bhīmo nṛpatiśāsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:086.011a: tato yayau bhīmasenaḥ prājñaiḥ sthapatibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:086.014a: stambhān kanakacitrāṃś ca toraṇāni bṛhanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:086.015c: kārayām āsa dharmātmā tatra tatra yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:086.016c: kārayām āsa bhīmaḥ sa vividhāni hy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.018c: ratnāny anekāny ādāya striyo 'śvān āyudhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:086.024a: sarvāṃś ca tān anuyayau yāvad āvasathād iti
GE07mbh_14_u:086.024c: svayam eva mahātejā dambhaṃ tyaktvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:086.025a: tataḥ kṛtvā sthapatayaḥ śilpino 'nye ca ye tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:086.026a: tac chrutvā dharmarājaḥ sa kṛtaṃ sarvam aninditam
GE07mbh_14_u:086.026c-0164_01: śrīmannāmā ca bhavatu janānāṃ puṇyadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:087.001a: tasmin yajñe pravṛtte tu vāgmino hetuvādinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:087.002a: dadṛśus taṃ nṛpatayo yajñasya vidhim uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:087.004c: na hi kiṃ cid asauvarṇam apaśyaṃs tatra pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:087.006a: sthalajā jalajā ye ca paśavaḥ ke cana prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:087.006c: sarvān eva samānītāṃs tān apaśyanta te nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:087.007a: gāś caiva mahiṣīś caiva tathā vṛddhāḥ striyo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:087.007c: audakāni ca sattvāni śvāpadāni vayāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:087.009c: yajñavāṭaṃ nṛpā dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āgaman
GE07mbh_14_u:087.009d-0166_01: aniśaṃ dīyate ca sma tatra bhojyaṃ pṛthagvidham
GE07mbh_14_u:087.010a: pūrṇe śatasahasre tu viprāṇāṃ tatra bhuñjatām
GE07mbh_14_u:087.011c: evaṃ sa vavṛte yajño dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:087.012c: dadhikulyāś ca dadṛśuḥ sarpiṣaś ca hradāñjanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:087.016c: teṣāṃ nṛpopabhojyāni brāhmaṇebhyo daduḥ sma te
GE07mbh_14_u:088.002c: eteṣāṃ kriyatāṃ pūjā pūjārhā hi nareśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:088.003a: ity uktaḥ sa tathā cakre narendreṇa yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_14_u:088.004b-0167_02: devāś ca munayo viprā manasā vandya keśavam
GE07mbh_14_u:088.004b-0167_03: pratyutthitās tatas tatra praviveśa sa mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:088.006a: teṣām api parāṃ pūjāṃ cakre bhīmo mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:088.006c: viviśus te ca veśmāni ratnavanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:088.008a: sa taṃ papraccha kaunteyaḥ punaḥ punar ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_14_u:088.010a: samīpe ca mahābāhum ācaṣṭa ca mama prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:088.011c: diṣṭyā sa kuśalī jiṣṇur upayāti ca mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:088.014a: idam āha mahārāja pārthavākyaṃ naraḥ sa mām
GE07mbh_14_u:088.014c: vācyo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kṛṣṇa kāle vākyam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:088.015c: teṣām ekaikaśaḥ pūjā kāryety etat kṣamaṃ hi naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:088.016a: ity etad vacanād rājā vijñāpyo mama mānada
GE07mbh_14_u:088.016c: na tad ātyayikaṃ hi syād yad arghyānayane bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:088.017a: kartum arhati tad rājā bhavāṃś cāpy anumanyatām
GE07mbh_14_u:088.017c: rājadveṣād vinaśyeyur nemā rājan prajāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:088.018a: idam anyac ca kaunteya vacaḥ sa puruṣo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:088.018c: dhanaṃjayasya nṛpate tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:088.020c: sa hi bhakto 'nuraktaś ca mama nityam iti prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:088.021a: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:088.021c: abhinandyāsya tad vākyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:089.001a: śrutaṃ priyam idaṃ kṛṣṇa yat tvam arhasi bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_14_u:089.002c: punar āsan hṛṣīkeśa tatra tatreti me śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:089.003a: mannimittaṃ hi sa sadā pārthaḥ sukhavivarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.003c: atīva vijayo dhīmān iti me dūyate manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.004e: aniṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇa yena duḥkhāny upāśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:089.005c: na ca paśyāmi bībhatsor nindyaṃ gātreṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:089.005e: śrotavyaṃ cen mayaitad vai tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:089.006a: ity uktaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo dhyātvā sumahad antaram
GE07mbh_14_u:089.007a: na hy asya nṛpate kiṃ cid aniṣṭam upalakṣaye
GE07mbh_14_u:089.008a: tābhyāṃ sa puruṣavyāghro nityam adhvasu yujyate
GE07mbh_14_u:089.008c: na hy anyad anupaśyāmi yenāsau duḥkhabhāg jayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.009a: ity uktaḥ sa kuruśreṣṭhas tathyaṃ kṛṣṇena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_14_u:089.009c: provāca vṛṣṇiśārdūlam evam etad iti prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:089.010a: kṛṣṇā tu draupadī kṛṣṇaṃ tiryak sāsūyam aikṣata
GE07mbh_14_u:089.010c: pratijagrāha tasyās taṃ praṇayaṃ cāpi keśihā
GE07mbh_14_u:089.010e: sakhyuḥ sakhā hṛṣīkeśaḥ sākṣād iva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.011a: tatra bhīmādayas te tu kuravo yādavās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:089.014c: priyākhyānanimittaṃ vai dadau bahu dhanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:089.015a: tato dvitīye divase mahāñ śabdo vyavardhata
GE07mbh_14_u:089.016a: tato reṇuḥ samudbhūto vibabhau tasya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.017c: diṣṭyāsi pārtha kuśalī dhanyo rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.018a: ko 'nyo hi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām avajitya sapārthivām
GE07mbh_14_u:089.019c: teṣām apīdṛśaṃ karma na kiṃ cid anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_14_u:089.020c: yat tvaṃ kurukulaśreṣṭha duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān iha
GE07mbh_14_u:089.021a: ity evaṃ vadatāṃ teṣāṃ nṝṇāṃ śrutisukhā giraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.022a: tato rājā sahāmātyaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca yadunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.022c: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ puraskṛtya te taṃ pratyudyayus tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:089.024a: taiḥ sametyārcitas tān sa pratyarcya ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:089.025a: etasminn eva kāle tu sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:089.025c: mātṛbhyāṃ sahito dhīmān kurūn abhyājagāma ha
GE07mbh_14_u:089.025d-0170_01: tatra vṛddhān yathā vatsa kurūn anyāṃś ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_14_u:089.026a: sa sametya kurūn sarvān sarvais tair abhinanditaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.002e: subhadrāṃ ca yathānyāyaṃ yāś cānyāḥ kuruyoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.003a: dadau kuntī tatas tābhyāṃ ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:090.003c: draupadī ca subhadrā ca yāś cāpy anyā daduḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.005a: sa ca rājā mahāvīryaḥ pūjito babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.006a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca rājānaṃ bhīmādīṃś cāpi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_14_u:090.007a: sa taiḥ premṇā pariṣvaktaḥ pūjitaś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:090.007c: dhanaṃ cāsmai dadur bhūri prīyamāṇā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.009a: tasmai kṛṣṇo dadau rājñe mahārham abhipūjitam
GE07mbh_14_u:090.010a: dharmarājaś ca bhīmaś ca yamajau phalgunas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:090.011a: tatas tṛtīye divase satyavatyāḥ suto muniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.012a: adya prabhṛti kaunteya yajasva samayo hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:090.012c: muhūrto yajñiyaḥ prāptaś codayanti ca yājakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.013a: ahīno nāma rājendra kratus te 'yaṃ vikalpavān
GE07mbh_14_u:090.014a: evam eva mahārāja dakṣiṇāṃ triguṇāṃ kuru
GE07mbh_14_u:090.014c: tritvaṃ vrajatu te rājan brāhmaṇā hy atra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:090.015a: trīn aśvamedhān atra tvaṃ saṃprāpya bahudakṣiṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:090.016a: pavitraṃ paramaṃ hy etat pāvanānāṃ ca pāvanam
GE07mbh_14_u:090.017a: ity uktaḥ sa tu tejasvī vyāsenāmitatejasā
GE07mbh_14_u:090.018a: tatra vedavido rājaṃś cakruḥ karmāṇi yājakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.019a: na teṣāṃ skhalitaṃ tatra nāsīd apahutaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:090.019c: kramayuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca cakrus tatra dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.020c: cakrus te vidhivad rājaṃs tathaivābhiṣavaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.022a: na tatra kṛpaṇaḥ kaś cin na daridro babhūva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:090.022c: kṣudhito duḥkhito vāpi prākṛto vāpi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.025c: nāvrato nānupādhyāyo na ca vādākṣamo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.026a: tato yūpocchraye prāpte ṣaḍ bailvān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:090.027a: devadārumayau dvau tu yūpau kurupateḥ kratau
GE07mbh_14_u:090.028c: sa bhīmaḥ kārayām āsa dharmarājasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:090.032c: taṃ taṃ devaṃ samuddiśya pakṣiṇaḥ paśavaś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:090.033a: ṛṣabhāḥ śāstrapaṭhitās tathā jalacarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:090.034a: yūpeṣu niyataṃ cāsīt paśūnāṃ triśataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:090.035a: sa yajñaḥ śuśubhe tasya sākṣād devarṣisaṃkulaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.037a: tasmin sadasi nityās tu vyāsaśiṣyā dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.038a: nāradaś ca babhūvātra tumburuś ca mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:090.039c: ramayanti sma tān viprān yajñakarmāntareṣv atha
GE07mbh_14_u:091.003a: uddhṛtya tu vapāṃ tasya yathāśāstraṃ dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.005a: śiṣṭāny aṅgāni yāny āsaṃs tasyāśvasya narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:091.005c: tāny agnau juhuvur dhīrāḥ samastāḥ ṣoḍaśartvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.006a: saṃsthāpyaivaṃ tasya rājñas taṃ kratuṃ śakratejasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.006c: vyāsaḥ saśiṣyo bhagavān vardhayām āsa taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_14_u:091.009a: pṛthivī bhavatas tv eṣā saṃnyastā rājasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:091.009c: niṣkrayo dīyatāṃ mahyaṃ brāhmaṇā hi dhanārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.010a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu tān viprān pratyuvāca mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.010c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito dhīmān madhye rājñāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_14_u:091.011c: arjunena jitā seyam ṛtvigbhyaḥ prāpitā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:091.012a: vanaṃ pravekṣye viprendrā vibhajadhvaṃ mahīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:091.013c: idaṃ hi me mataṃ nityaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mamānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.014a: ity uktavati tasmiṃs te bhrātaro draupadī ca sā
GE07mbh_14_u:091.014c: evam etad iti prāhus tad abhūd romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:091.015a: tato 'ntarikṣe vāg āsīt sādhu sādhv iti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:091.016a: dvaipāyanas tathoktas tu punar eva yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_14_u:091.016c: uvāca madhye viprāṇām idaṃ saṃpūjayan muniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.017a: dattaiṣā bhavatā mahyaṃ tāṃ te pratidadāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:091.017c: hiraṇyaṃ dīyatām ebhyo dvijātibhyo dharās tu te
GE07mbh_14_u:091.018c: yathāha bhagavān vyāsas tathā tat kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:091.019a: ity uktaḥ sa kuruśreṣṭhaḥ prītātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:091.020a: na kariṣyati tal loke kaś cid anyo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.021a: pratigṛhya tu tad dravyaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.021c: ṛtvigbhyaḥ pradadau vidvāṃś caturdhā vyabhajaṃś ca te
GE07mbh_14_u:091.022a: pṛthivyā niṣkrayaṃ dattvā tad dhiraṇyaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.024a: yajñavāṭe tu yat kiṃ cid dhiraṇyam api bhūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:091.024c: toraṇāni ca yūpāṃś ca ghaṭāḥ pātrīs tatheṣṭakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.025e: kālena mahatā jahrus tat suvarṇaṃ tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.026a: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve muditā jagmur ālayān
GE07mbh_14_u:091.027a: svam aṃśaṃ bhagavān vyāsaḥ kuntyai pādābhivādanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:091.028a: śvaśurāt prītidāyaṃ taṃ prāpya sā prītamānasā
GE07mbh_14_u:091.028c: cakāra puṇyaṃ loke tu sumahāntaṃ pṛthā tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:091.029a: gatvā tv avabhṛthaṃ rājā vipāpmā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:091.030a: pāṇḍavāś ca mahīpālaiḥ sametaiḥ saṃvṛtās tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:091.031a: rājabhyo 'pi tataḥ prādād ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:091.031c: gajān aśvān alaṃkārān striyo vastrāṇi kāñcanam
GE07mbh_14_u:091.032c: visṛjañ śuśubhe rājā yathā vaiśravaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:091.033a: ānāyya ca tathā vīraṃ rājānaṃ babhruvāhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:091.033c: pradāya vipulaṃ vittaṃ gṛhān prāsthāpayat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:091.034a: duḥśalāyāś ca taṃ pautraṃ bālakaṃ pārthivarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:091.035a: rājñaś caivāpi tān sarvān suvibhaktān supūjitān
GE07mbh_14_u:091.036a: evaṃ babhūva yajñaḥ sa dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:091.038c: paśūnāṃ vadhyatāṃ cāpi nāntas tatra sma dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:091.041a: varṣitvā dhanadhārābhiḥ kāmai ratnair dhanais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:092.001c: yad āścaryam abhūt kiṃ cit tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:092.002c: aśvamedhe mahāyajñe nivṛtte yad abhūd vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:092.006a: sakṛd utsṛjya taṃ nādaṃ trāsayāno mṛgadvijān
GE07mbh_14_u:092.006c: mānuṣaṃ vacanaṃ prāha dhṛṣṭo bilaśayo mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:092.007a: saktuprasthena vo nāyaṃ yajñas tulyo narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.008a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nakulasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:092.008c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmuḥ sarve te brāhmaṇarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.009a: tataḥ sametya nakulaṃ paryapṛcchanta te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.010a: kiṃ balaṃ paramaṃ tubhyaṃ kiṃ śrutaṃ kiṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:092.010c: kathaṃ bhavantaṃ vidyāma yo no yajñaṃ vigarhase
GE07mbh_14_u:092.012c: mantrapūtaṃ hutaś cāgnir dattaṃ deyam amatsaram
GE07mbh_14_u:092.013a: tuṣṭā dvijarṣabhāś cātra dānair bahuvidhair api
GE07mbh_14_u:092.013c: kṣatriyāś ca suyuddhena śrāddhair api pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.014a: pālanena viśas tuṣṭāḥ kāmais tuṣṭā varastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.015a: jñātisaṃbandhinas tuṣṭāḥ śaucena ca nṛpasya naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.015c: devā havirbhiḥ puṇyaiś ca rakṣaṇaiḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.016a: yad atra tathyaṃ tad brūhi satyasaṃdha dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:092.017a: śraddheyavākyaḥ prājñas tvaṃ divyaṃ rūpaṃ bibharṣi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:092.017c: samāgataś ca viprais tvaṃ tattvato vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:092.018a: iti pṛṣṭo dvijais taiḥ sa prahasya nakulo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:092.018c: naiṣānṛtā mayā vāṇī proktā darpeṇa vā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.019a: yan mayoktam idaṃ kiṃ cid yuṣmābhiś cāpy upaśrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:092.019c: saktuprasthena vo nāyaṃ yajñas tulyo narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.020a: ity avaśyaṃ mayaitad vo vaktavyaṃ dvijapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:092.021a: anubhūtaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ ca yan mayādbhutam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:092.022a: svargaṃ yena dvijaḥ prāptaḥ sabhāryaḥ sasutasnuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.001a: hanta vo vartayiṣyāmi dānasya paramaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.002c: uñchavṛttir dvijaḥ kaś cit kāpotir abhavat purā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.003a: sabhāryaḥ saha putreṇa sasnuṣas tapasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.004a: ṣaṣṭhe kāle tadā vipro bhuṅkte taiḥ saha suvrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.004c: ṣaṣṭhe kāle kadā cic ca tasyāhāro na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:093.004e: bhuṅkte 'nyasmin kadā cit sa ṣaṣṭhe kāle dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.005c: nāvidyata tadā viprāḥ saṃcayas tān nibodhata
GE07mbh_14_u:093.006a: kāle kāle 'sya saṃprāpte naiva vidyeta bhojanam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.006c: kṣudhāparigatāḥ sarve prātiṣṭhanta tadā tu te
GE07mbh_14_u:093.007a: uñchaṃs tadā śuklapakṣe madhyaṃ tapati bhāskare
GE07mbh_14_u:093.007c: uṣṇārtaś ca kṣudhārtaś ca sa vipras tapasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.007e: uñcham aprāptavān eva sārdhaṃ parijanena ha
GE07mbh_14_u:093.008a: sa tathaiva kṣudhāviṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭvā toyaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:093.008c: kṣapayām āsa taṃ kālaṃ kṛcchraprāṇo dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.009a: atha ṣaṣṭhe gate kāle yavaprastham upārjayat
GE07mbh_14_u:093.009c: yavaprasthaṃ ca te saktūn akurvanta tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.010a: kṛtajapyāhvikās te tu hutvā vahniṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:093.011a: athāgacchad dvijaḥ kaś cid atithir bhuñjatāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.012a: te 'bhivādya sukhapraśnaṃ pṛṣṭvā tam atithiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.014c: kuṭīṃ praveśayām āsuḥ kṣudhārtam atithiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.015a: idam arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca bṛsī ceyaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:093.015e: pratigṛhṇīṣva bhadraṃ te mayā dattā dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.016a: ity uktaḥ pratigṛhyātha saktūnāṃ kuḍavaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.016c: bhakṣayām āsa rājendra na ca tuṣṭiṃ jagāma saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.017a: sa uñchavṛttiḥ taṃ prekṣya kṣudhāparigataṃ dvijam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.017c: āhāraṃ cintayām āsa kathaṃ tuṣṭo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_14_u:093.018a: tasya bhāryābravīd rājan madbhāgo dīyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:093.019a: iti bruvantīṃ tāṃ sādhvīṃ dharmātmā sa dvijarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.019d-0178_01: ātmānumānato vidvān sa tu viprarṣabhas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.020a: jānan vṛddhāṃ kṣudhārtāṃ ca śrāntāṃ glānāṃ tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_14_u:093.020c: tvagasthibhūtāṃ vepantīṃ tato bhāryām uvāca tām
GE07mbh_14_u:093.021c: striyo rakṣyāś ca poṣyāś ca naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:093.022a: anukampito naro nāryā puṣṭo rakṣita eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.022c: prapated yaśaso dīptān na ca lokān avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_14_u:093.022d-0179_02: dāreṣv adhīno dharmaś ca pitṝṇām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.022d-0179_03: na vetti karmato bhāryārakṣaṇe yo 'kṣamaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_14_u:093.022d-0179_04: ayaśo mahad āpnoti narakāṃś caiva gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:093.023a: ity uktā sā tataḥ prāha dharmārthau nau samau dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:093.024a: satyaṃ ratiś ca dharmaś ca svargaś ca guṇanirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.025a: ṛtur mātuḥ pitur bījaṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.025c: bhartuḥ prasādāt strīṇāṃ vai ratiḥ putraphalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.026a: pālanād dhi patis tvaṃ me bhartāsi bharaṇān mama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.026c: putrapradānād varadas tasmāt saktūn gṛhāṇa me
GE07mbh_14_u:093.028a: ity uktaḥ sa tayā saktūn pragṛhyedaṃ vaco 'bravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:093.028c: dvija saktūn imān bhūyaḥ pratigṛhṇīṣva sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.029a: sa tān pragṛhya bhuktvā ca na tuṣṭim agamad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.029d-0180_01: tam uvāca tataḥ putraḥ pitaraṃ dīnamānasam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.030a: saktūn imān pragṛhya tvaṃ dehi viprāya sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.030c: ity evaṃ sukṛtaṃ manye tasmād etat karomy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:093.031a: bhavān hi paripālyo me sarvayatnair dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.031c: sādhūnāṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ hy etat pitur vṛddhasya poṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.032a: putrārtho vihito hy eṣa sthāvirye paripālanam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.032c: śrutir eṣā hi viprarṣe triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.033c: prāṇo hi paramo dharmaḥ sthito deheṣu dehinām pitovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.034a: api varṣasahasrī tvaṃ bāla eva mato mama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.034c: utpādya putraṃ hi pitā kṛtakṛtyo bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_14_u:093.035a: bālānāṃ kṣud balavatī jānāmy etad ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:093.035c: vṛddho 'haṃ dhārayiṣyāmi tvaṃ balī bhava putraka
GE07mbh_14_u:093.036a: jīrṇena vayasā putra na mā kṣud bādhate 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.036c: dīrghakālaṃ tapas taptaṃ na me maraṇato bhayam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.037a: apatyam asmi te putras trāṇāt putro hi viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.037c: ātmā putraḥ smṛtas tasmāt trāhy ātmānam ihātmanā
