GE07mbh_14_u:093.037d-0181_01: putro 'haṃ tava viprarṣe tvayā pālyo 'smi sarvadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.037d-0181_02: idānīṃ tu imān saktūn dīyatāṃ kṣudhitāya ca pitovāca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.038a: rūpeṇa sadṛśas tvaṃ me śīlena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.038c: parīkṣitaś ca bahudhā saktūn ādadmi te tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.038d-0182_01: praśrayeṇa tathā buddhyā vṛttyā kṣāntyā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.039a: ity uktvādāya tān saktūn prītātmā dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.039c: prahasann iva viprāya sa tasmai pradadau tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.040a: bhuktvā tān api saktūn sa naiva tuṣṭo babhūva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:093.041a: taṃ vai vadhūḥ sthitā sādhvī brāhmaṇapriyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.041c: saktūn ādāya saṃhṛṣṭā guruṃ taṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:093.042a: saṃtānāt tava saṃtānaṃ mama vipra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:093.042c: saktūn imān atithaye gṛhītvā tvaṃ prayaccha me
GE07mbh_14_u:093.043c: pautreṇa tān avāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_14_u:093.044a: dharmādyā hi yathā tretā vahnitretā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.045a: pitṝṃs trāṇāt tārayati putra ity anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_14_u:093.047c: kalyāṇavṛtte kalyāṇi naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:093.048c: kṛcchravṛttiṃ nirāhārāṃ drakṣyāmi tvāṃ kathaṃ nv aham
GE07mbh_14_u:093.049a: bālā kṣudhārtā nārī ca rakṣyā tvaṃ satataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.050a: guror mama gurus tvaṃ vai yato daivatadaivatam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.050c: devātidevas tasmāt tvaṃ saktūn ādatsva me vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:093.051a: dehaḥ prāṇaś ca dharmaś ca śuśrūṣārtham idaṃ guroḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.051c: tava vipra prasādena lokān prāpsyāmy abhīpsitān
GE07mbh_14_u:093.052a: avekṣyā iti kṛtvā tvaṃ dṛḍhabhaktyeti vā dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:093.052c: cintyā mameyam iti vā saktūn ādātum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:093.053a: anena nityaṃ sādhvī tvaṃ śīlavṛttena śobhase
GE07mbh_14_u:093.054a: tasmāt saktūn grahīṣyāmi vadhūr nārhasi vañcanām
GE07mbh_14_u:093.054c: gaṇayitvā mahābhāge tvaṃ hi dharmabhṛtāṃ varā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.055a: ity uktvā tān upādāya saktūn prādād dvijātaye
GE07mbh_14_u:093.055c: tatas tuṣṭo 'bhavad vipras tasya sādhor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.056a: prītātmā sa tu taṃ vākyam idam āha dvijarṣabham
GE07mbh_14_u:093.058a: aho dānaṃ ghuṣyate te svarge svarganivāsibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.058c: gaganāt puṣpavarṣaṃ ca paśyasva patitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:093.059c: stuvanto devadūtāś ca sthitā dānena vismitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.060c: kāṅkṣante darśanaṃ tubhyaṃ divaṃ gaccha dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:093.061c: anāgatāś ca bahavaḥ subahūni yugāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.062c: agahvareṇa dharmeṇa tasmād gaccha divaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:093.063a: śraddhayā parayā yas tvaṃ tapaś carasi suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:093.063c-0184_01: prītātmā devatāḥ sarve yate na tapasā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.064a: sarvasvam etad yasmāt te tyaktaṃ śuddhena cetasā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.064c: kṛcchrakāle tataḥ svargo jito 'yaṃ tava karmaṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.065a: kṣudhā nirṇudati prajñāṃ dharmyāṃ buddhiṃ vyapohati
GE07mbh_14_u:093.066a: bubhukṣāṃ jayate yas tu sa svargaṃ jayate dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.066c: yadā dānarucir bhavati tadā dharmo na sīdati
GE07mbh_14_u:093.067c: dharmam eva guruṃ jñātvā tṛṣṇā na gaṇitā tvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.068a: dravyāgamo nṛṇāṃ sūkṣmaḥ pātre dānaṃ tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:093.068c: kālaḥ parataro dānāc chraddhā cāpi tataḥ parā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.069a: svargadvāraṃ susūkṣmaṃ hi narair mohān na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:093.070a: tat tu paśyanti puruṣā jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.071a: sahasraśaktiś ca śataṃ śataśaktir daśāpi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.071c: dadyād apaś ca yaḥ śaktyā sarve tulyaphalāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.072a: rantidevo hi nṛpatir apaḥ prādād akiṃcanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.072c: śuddhena manasā vipra nākapṛṣṭhaṃ tato gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.073a: na dharmaḥ prīyate tāta dānair dattair mahāphalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.073c: nyāyalabdhair yathā sūkṣmaiḥ śraddhāpūtaiḥ sa tuṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:093.074c: ekāṃ dattvā sa pārakyāṃ narakaṃ samavāptavān
GE07mbh_14_u:093.075c: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān modate divi suvrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.076a: vibhave na nṛṇāṃ puṇyaṃ svaśaktyā svarjitaṃ satām
GE07mbh_14_u:093.076b-0185_01: nṛṇāṃ puṇyaṃ sa śaktyā ca varjitaṃ garjanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.076c: na yajñair vividhair vipra yathānyāyena saṃcitaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.077a: krodho dānaphalaṃ hanti lobhāt svargaṃ na gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:093.077c: nyāyavṛttir hi tapasā dānavit svargam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:093.078c: na cāśvamedhair bahubhiḥ phalaṃ samam idaṃ tava
GE07mbh_14_u:093.080a: sarveṣāṃ vo dvijaśreṣṭha divyaṃ yānam upasthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.080c: ārohata yathākāmaṃ dharmo 'smi dvija paśya mām
GE07mbh_14_u:093.081a: pāvito hi tvayā deho loke kīrtiḥ sthirā ca te
GE07mbh_14_u:093.081c: sabhāryaḥ sahaputraś ca sasnuṣaś ca divaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_14_u:093.082a: ity uktavākyo dharmeṇa yānam āruhya sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.082c: sabhāryaḥ sasutaś cāpi sasnuṣaś ca divaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_14_u:093.083a: tasmin vipre gate svargaṃ sasute sasnuṣe tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.084a: tatas tu saktugandhena kledena salilasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:093.084c: divyapuṣpāvamardāc ca sādhor dānalavaiś ca taiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.084e: viprasya tapasā tasya śiro me kāñcanīkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.085c: śarīrārdhaṃ ca me viprāḥ śātakumbhamayaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:093.086a: katham evaṃvidhaṃ me syād anyat pārśvam iti dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.086c: tapovanāni yajñāṃś ca hṛṣṭo 'bhyemi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.087a: yajñaṃ tv aham imaṃ śrutvā kururājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.087c: āśayā parayā prāpto na cāhaṃ kāñcanīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.088a: tato mayoktaṃ tad vākyaṃ prahasya dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:093.089c: na hi yajño mahān eṣa sadṛśas tair mato mama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.089d-0186_01: saktuprasthena vo nāyaṃ yajñas tulyo matir mama
GE07mbh_14_u:093.090a: ity uktvā nakulaḥ sarvān yajñe dvijavarāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:093.090c: jagāmādarśanaṃ rājan viprās te ca yayur gṛhān
GE07mbh_14_u:093.091a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā parapuraṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:093.091c: yad āścaryam abhūt tasmin vājimedhe mahākratau
GE07mbh_14_u:093.092a: na vismayas te nṛpate yajñe kāryaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:093.093c: tapo damaś ca satyaṃ ca dānaṃ ceti samaṃ matam
GE07mbh_14_u:094.001c: śāntivyavasitā viprāḥ śamo dama iti prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:094.002a: tasmād yajñaphalais tulyaṃ na kiṃ cid iha vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:094.002c: iti me vartate buddhis tathā caitad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:094.003a: yajñair iṣṭvā hi bahavo rājāno dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:094.003c: iha kīrtiṃ parāṃ prāpya pretya svargam ito gatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.004d-0187_02: iha loke parāṃ kīrtiṃ vimucya divi saṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.006a: atha kasmāt sa nakulo garhayām āsa taṃ kratum
GE07mbh_14_u:094.006d-0188_01: iti hetor mahārāja nakulo 'garhayac ca tat
GE07mbh_14_u:094.006d-0188_02: karma rājño mahābuddhe dharmaḥ sūkṣmo mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:094.007a: yajñasya vidhim agryaṃ vai phalaṃ caiva nararṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:094.007c: gadataḥ śṛṇu me rājan yathāvad iha bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:094.008a: purā śakrasya yajataḥ sarva ūcur maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.010a: supratītais tadā vipraiḥ svāgamaiḥ susvanair nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:094.012a: tato dīnān paśūn dṛṣṭvā ṛṣayas te tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.012c: ūcuḥ śakraṃ samāgamya nāyaṃ yajñavidhiḥ śubhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.013a: apavijñānam etat te mahāntaṃ dharmam icchataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.013c: na hi yajñe paśugaṇā vidhidṛṣṭāḥ puraṃdara
GE07mbh_14_u:094.014a: dharmopaghātakas tv eṣa samārambhas tava prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:094.014c: nāyaṃ dharmakṛto dharmo na hiṃsā dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:094.015a: āgamenaiva te yajñaṃ kurvantu yadi hecchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:094.015c: vidhidṛṣṭena yajñena dharmas te sumahān bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:094.017a: śatakratus tu tad vākyam ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.018c: jaṅgamaiḥ sthāvarair vāpi yaṣṭavyam iti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:094.019a: te tu khinnā vivādena ṛṣayas tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.019c: tataḥ saṃdhāya śakreṇa papracchur nṛpatiṃ vasum
GE07mbh_14_u:094.020a: mahābhāga kathaṃ yajñeṣv āgamo nṛpate smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.020c: yaṣṭavyaṃ paśubhir medhyair atho bījair ajair api
GE07mbh_14_u:094.021a: tac chrutvā tu vacas teṣām avicārya balābalam
GE07mbh_14_u:094.022a: evam uktvā sa nṛpatiḥ praviveśa rasātalam
GE07mbh_14_u:094.022c: uktveha vitathaṃ rājaṃś cedīnām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.022d-0190_01: tasmān na vācyaṃ hy ekena bahujñenāpi saṃśaye
GE07mbh_14_u:094.023a: anyāyopagataṃ dravyam atītaṃ yo hy apaṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.024a: dharmavaitaṃsiko yas tu pāpātmā puruṣas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:094.025a: pāpena karmaṇā vipro dhanaṃ labdhvā niraṅkuśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.026c: tāni sattvam anāsādya naśyanti vipulāny api
GE07mbh_14_u:094.027c: dāne na kīrtir bhavati pretya ceha ca durmateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.029a: evaṃ labdhvā dhanaṃ lobhād yajate yo dadāti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:094.029c: sa kṛtvā karmaṇā tena na sidhyati durāgamāt
GE07mbh_14_u:094.029d-0191_02: na tasya sa phalaṃ pretya bhuṅkte pāpadhanāgamāt
GE07mbh_14_u:094.030a: uñchaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ śākam udapātraṃ tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.030c: dānaṃ vibhavato dattvā narāḥ svar yānti dharmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.031a: eṣa dharmo mahāṃs tyāgo dānaṃ bhūtadayā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:094.031c: brahmacaryaṃ tathā satyam anukrośo dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
GE07mbh_14_u:094.032a: śrūyante hi purā viprā viśvāmitrādayo nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.033a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ siddhiṃ paramikāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.033c: nṛpāḥ satyaiś ca dānaiś ca nyāyalabdhais tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.034a: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā ye cāśritās tapaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:094.034c: dānadharmāgninā śuddhās te svargaṃ yānti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:095.001a: dharmāgatena tyāgena bhagavan sarvam asti cet
GE07mbh_14_u:095.001c: etan me sarvam ācakṣva kuśalo hy asi bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_14_u:095.002a: tatoñchavṛtter yad vṛttaṃ saktudāne phalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:095.002c: kathitaṃ me mahad brahmaṃs tathyam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:095.003a: kathaṃ hi sarvayajñeṣu niścayaḥ paramo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:095.003c: etad arhasi me vaktuṃ nikhilena dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:095.008c: dame sthitāś ca te sarve dambhamohavivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.009a: vṛtte śuddhe sthitā nityam indriyaiś cāpy avāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.009c: upāsate sma taṃ yajñaṃ bhuñjānās te maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.010c: tasmin satre tu yat kiṃ cid ayogyaṃ tatra nābhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:095.010e: tathā hy anekair munibhir mahāntaḥ kratavaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.013c: na ca varṣati parjanyaḥ katham annaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:095.014a: satraṃ cedaṃ mahad viprā muner dvādaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_14_u:095.014c: na varṣiṣyati devaś ca varṣāṇy etāni dvādaśa
GE07mbh_14_u:095.015a: etad bhavantaḥ saṃcintya maharṣer asya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.016a: ity evam ukte vacane tato 'gastyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_14_u:095.016c: provācedaṃ vaco vāgmī prasādya śirasā munīn
GE07mbh_14_u:095.019c: bījaiḥ kṛtaiḥ kariṣye ca nātra vighno bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:095.020a: nedaṃ śakyaṃ vṛthā kartuṃ mama satraṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:095.020c: varṣiṣyatīha vā devo na vā devo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:095.021a: atha vābhyarthanām indraḥ kuryān na tv iha kāmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.021c: svayam indro bhaviṣyāmi jīvayiṣyāmi ca prajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.022a: yo yad āhārajātaś ca sa tathaiva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:095.022c: viśeṣaṃ caiva kartāsmi punaḥ punar atīva hi
GE07mbh_14_u:095.023a: adyeha svarṇam abhyetu yac cānyad vasu durlabham
GE07mbh_14_u:095.023c: triṣu lokeṣu yac cāsti tad ihāgacchatāṃ svayam
GE07mbh_14_u:095.024c: viśvāvasuś ca ye cānye te 'py upāsantu vaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:095.025a: uttarebhyaḥ kurubhyaś ca yat kiṃ cid vasu vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:095.025c: sarvaṃ tad iha yajñe me svayam evopatiṣṭhatu
GE07mbh_14_u:095.025e: svargaṃ svargasadaś caiva dharmaś ca svayam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:095.026a: ity ukte sarvam evaitad abhavat tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:095.026c: tatas te munayo dṛṣṭvā munes tasya tapobalam
GE07mbh_14_u:095.026e: vismitā vacanaṃ prāhur idaṃ sarve mahārthavat
GE07mbh_14_u:095.027a: prītāḥ sma tava vākyena na tv icchāmas tapovyayam
GE07mbh_14_u:095.027c: svair eva yajñais tuṣṭāḥ smo nyāyenecchāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_14_u:095.028a: yajñān dīkṣās tathā homān yac cānyan mṛgayāmahe
GE07mbh_14_u:095.028c: tan no 'stu svakṛtair yajñair nānyato mṛgayāmahe
GE07mbh_14_u:095.031a: bhavataḥ samyag eṣā hi buddhir hiṃsāvivarjitā
GE07mbh_14_u:095.031c: etām ahiṃsāṃ yajñeṣu brūyās tvaṃ satataṃ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:095.032c: visarjitāḥ samāptau ca satrād asmād vrajāmahe
GE07mbh_14_u:095.035a: prasādayām āsa ca tam agastyaṃ tridaśeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.001c: prāha mānuṣavad vācam etat pṛṣṭo vadasva me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.002a: etat pūrvaṃ na pṛṣṭo 'haṃ na cāsmābhiḥ prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.002c: śrūyatāṃ nakulo yo 'sau yathā vāg asya mānuṣī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.003a: śrāddhaṃ saṃkalpayām āsa jamadagniḥ purā kila
GE07mbh_14_u:096.003c: homadhenus tam āgāc ca svayaṃ cāpi dudoha tām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.004a: tat kṣīraṃ sthāpayām āsa nave bhāṇḍe dṛḍhe śucau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.004c: tac ca krodhaḥ svarūpeṇa piṭharaṃ paryavartayat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.005a: jijñāsus tam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ kiṃ kuryād vipriye kṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:096.005c: iti saṃcintya durmedhā dharṣayām āsa tat payaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.006a: tam ājñāya muniḥ krodhaṃ naivāsya cukupe tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.006c: sa tu krodhas tam āhedaṃ prāñjalir mūrtimān sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.008a: so 'haṃ tvayi sthito hy adya kṣamāvati mahātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:096.008c: bibhemi tapasaḥ sādho prasādaṃ kuru me vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:096.009a: sākṣād dṛṣṭo 'si me krodha gaccha tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.009c: na mamāpakṛtaṃ te 'dya na manyur vidyate mama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.010a: yān uddiśya tu saṃkalpaḥ payaso 'sya kṛto mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.010c: pitaras te mahābhāgās tebhyo budhyasva gamyatām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.012a: sa tān prasādayām āsa śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE07mbh_14_u:096.012b-0197_01: tenāpy ukto mahārāja dharmarājasya vai tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.012c: taiś cāpy ukto yadā dharmaṃ kṣepsyase mokṣyase tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.013a: taiś cokto yajñiyān deśān dharmāraṇyāni caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.013c: jugupsan paridhāvan sa yajñaṃ taṃ samupāsadat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.014c: muktaḥ śāpāt tataḥ krodho dharmo hy āsīd yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015a: evam etat tadā vṛttaṃ tasya yajñe mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015c: paśyatāṃ cāpi nas tatra nakulo 'ntarhitas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-0198_04: ā samāpter jagannātho yajñaṃ rakṣitavān hariḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-0198_05: rakṣitvā sa mahābāhur jagāma dvārakāṃ purīm
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-0199_02: śrotā ca śrāvako yaś ca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0001: aśvamedhe purā vṛtte keśavaṃ keśisūdanam vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0004: tadā rājan namaskṛtya keśavaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0008: śrotavyā yadi me kṛṣṇa tan me kathaya suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0011: yāñ śrutvā brahmahā goghno mātṛhā gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0015: ātmavikrayiṇo mūḍhā jīved yaś ca vikarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0016: pāpāḥ śaṭhā naikṛtikā ḍāmbhikā dūṣakās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0017: rasabhedakarā ye ca ye ca syur brahmaghātakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0018: śūdrapreṣyakarāś corā viprā ye ca purohitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0020: ete cānye ca pāpās te mucyante te 'pi kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0022: ity evaṃ kathite deve dharmaputreṇa saṃsadi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0024: śrotukāmāḥ paraṃ guhyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ dharmam uttamam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0025: tathā bhāgavatāś caiva tatas taṃ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0026: tattvatas tu bhavān eva pādamūlam upāgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0027: yadi jānāsi māṃ bhaktaṃ snigdhaṃ vā bhaktavatsala
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0029: dharmān kathaya deveśa yady anugrahabhāg aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0030: śrutā me mānavā dharmā vāsiṣṭhāḥ kāśyapās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0031: gārgīyā gautamīyāś ca tathā gopālakasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0033: aumā māheśvarāś caiva nandidharmāś ca pāvanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0034: brahmaṇā kathitā ye ca kaumārāś ca śrutā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0037: bhāradvājakṛtā ye ca bṛhaspatikṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0038: kuṇeś ca kuṇibāhoś ca viśvāmitrakṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0042: vālakhilyakṛtā ye ca ye ca saptarṣibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0044: prājāpatyās tathā yāmyā māhendrāś ca śrutā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0045: vaiyyāghrā vyāsagītāś ca vibhāṇḍakakṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0046: nāradīyāḥ śrutā dharmāḥ kāpotāś ca śrutā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0048: krauñcā mṛdaṅgagītāś ca sauryā hārītakāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0053: pāvanatvāt pavitratvād viśiṣṭā iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0054: tasmād dhi tvāṃ prapannasya tvadbhaktasya ca bhāvataḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0055: yuṣmadīyān varān dharmān puṇyān kathaya me 'cyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0056: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu dharmajño dharmaputreṇa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0058: evaṃ te yasya kaunteya yatno dharmeṣu suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0059: tvatsamo durlabho loke na kaś cid iha vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0060: dharmaḥ śruto vā dṛṣṭo vā kathito vā kṛto 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0061: anumodito vā rājendra punātīha naraṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0062: dharmaḥ pitā ca mātā ca dharmo nāthaḥ suhṛt tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0063: dharmo bhrātā sakhā caiva dharmaḥ svāmī paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0064: dharmād arthaś ca kāmaś ca dharmād bhogāḥ sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0065: dharmād aiśvaryam evāgryaṃ dharmāt svargagatiḥ parā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0066: dharmo yaḥ sevitaḥ śuddhas trāyate mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0067: dharmād dvijatvaṃ devatvaṃ dharmaḥ prāpayate naram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0068: yadā ca kṣīyate pāpaṃ kālena puruṣasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0069: tadā saṃjāyate buddhir dharmaṃ kartuṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0071: tad gatvāpīha yo dharmaṃ na karoti sa vañcitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0072: kutsitā ye daridrāś ca virūpā vyādhitās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0073: parapreṣyāś ca mūrkhāś ca na tair dharmaḥ kṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0074: ye ca dīrghāyuṣaḥ śūrāḥ paṇḍitā bhoginas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0075: nīrogā rūpasaṃpannās tair dharmaḥ sukṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0076: evaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtaḥ śuddho nayate gatim uttamām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0077: adharmaṃ sevamānas tu tiryag yonyāṃ pataty asau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0078: idaṃ rahasyaṃ kaunteya śṛṇu dharmam anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0079: kathayiṣye paraṃ dharmaṃ mama bhaktasya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0080: iṣṭas tvam asi me 'tyarthaṃ prapannaś cāpi māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0081: paramārtham api brūmaḥ kiṃ punar dharmasaṃhitām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0082: idaṃ me mānuṣaṃ janma kṛtam ātmani māyayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0084: mānuṣyaṃ bhāvam āpannaṃ ye māṃ gṛhṇanty avajñayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0085: saṃsarantīha te mūḍhās tiryag yoniṣv anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0086: ye ca māṃ sarvabhūtasthaṃ paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0087: madbhaktāṃs tān sadā yuktān matsamīpaṃ nayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0089: madbhaktānāṃ tu mānuṣye saphalaṃ janma pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0093: bhaktir utpadyate tāta manuṣyāṇāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0094: yac ca rūpaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0095: na dṛśyate tathā devair madbhaktair dṛśyate yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0096: aparaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prādurbhāveṣu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0099: darśayāmīha tad rūpaṃ tat prapaśyanti me surāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0101: anugṛhṇāmy ahaṃ taṃ vai saṃsārān mocayāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0102: aham ādir hi devānāṃ sṛṣṭā brahmādayo mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0103: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya jagat sarvaṃ sṛjāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0106: mūrdhānaṃ me divaṃ viddhi candrādityau ca locane
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0107: devāgnir brāhmaṇā vaktraṃ mārutaḥ śvasanaś ca me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0108: diśo me bāhavaś cāṣṭau nakṣatrāṇi ca bhūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0110: mārgo meghānilābhyāṃ tu yan mamodaram avyayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0113: sthito hy ekaguṇaḥ khe 'haṃ dviguṇaś cāsmi mārute
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0114: triguṇo 'gnau sthito 'haṃ vai salile tu caturguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0115: śabdādyā ye guṇāḥ pañca mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0121: acintyo 'ham ananto 'ham ajaro 'ham ajo hy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0125: sudhā cāhaṃ svadhā cāhaṃ svāhā cāhaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0130: saṃhṛtyāhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ kṛtvā vai garbham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0133: sthitvā sṛjāmi bhūtāni jaṅgamāni sthirāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0134: kalpe kalpe ca bhūtāni saṃharāmi sṛjāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0135: na ca māṃ tāni jānanti māyayā mohitāni me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0138: na tad asti kva cid rājan yatrāhaṃ na pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0139: na ca tad vidyate bhūtaṃ mayi yan na pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0140: yāvanmātraṃ bhaved bhūtaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0141: jīvabhūto hy ahaṃ tasmiṃs tāvanmātraṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0142: kiṃ cātra bahunoktena satyam eva bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0143: yad bhūtaṃ yad bhaviṣyac ca tat sarvam aham eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0144: mayā sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni manmayāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0145: mām eva na vijānanti māyayā mohitāni me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0147: mattaḥ prabhavate rājan mayy eva pravilīyate vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0148: evam ātmodbhavaṃ sarvaṃ jagad uddiśya keśavaḥ bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0152: yaḥ śṛṇoti śucir bhūtvā ekacittas tapoyutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0153: svargyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ dharmyaṃ jñeyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0154: śraddadhānasya tasyeha yat pāpaṃ pūrvasaṃcitam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0155: vinaśyaty āśu tat sarvaṃ madbhaktasya viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0156: evaṃ śrutvā vacaḥ puṇyaṃ satyaṃ keśavabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0159: bhūtā yakṣagrahāś caiva guhyakā bhujagās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0164: hṛdi kartuṃ ca tad vākyaṃ praṇemuḥ śirasā natāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0165: tatas te vāsudevena dṛṣṭāḥ saumyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0169: vaiśyasya kīdṛśī deva gatiḥ śūdrasya kīdṛśī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0170: kathaṃ badhyeta pāśena brāhmaṇas tu yamālaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0171: kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā śūdro vā badhyate katham vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0172: etat karmaphalaṃ brūhi lokanātha namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0173: pṛṣṭo 'tha keśavo hy evaṃ dharmaputreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0174: uvāca saṃsāragatiṃ cāturvarṇyasya karmajām bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0176: nāsti kiṃ cin naraśreṣṭha duṣkṛtaṃ brāhmaṇasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0177: ye sthitāḥ syuḥ sadādhyātme saṃdhyāṃ ye cāpy upāsate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0178: yaiś ca pūrṇāhutiḥ prāptā vidhivaj juhvate ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0179: vaiśvadevaṃ ca ye kuryuḥ pūjayanty atithīṃś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0180: nityaṃ svādhyāyaśīlāś ca japayajñaparāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0193: viprebhyaḥ kāmado nityaṃ bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇe rataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0196: tatra divyāpsarobhis tu gandharvaiś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0198: caturyugāni vai triṃśat krīḍitvā tatra devavat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0199: iha mānuṣaloke tu caturvedī dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0206: caturyugāni vai triṃśat krīḍitvā daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0207: iha mānuṣyaloke ca rājā bhavati vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0208: suvarṇakoṭyaḥ pañcāśad ratnānāṃ ca śataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0211: viśeṣatas tu viprāṇāṃ dāsavad yas tu tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0217: iha mānuṣaloke tu vaiśyo dhanapatir bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0218: evaṃ dharmāt paraṃ nāsti mahat saṃsāramokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0219: na ca dharmāt paraṃ kiṃ cit pāpakarmavyapohanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0220: tasmād dharmaḥ sadā kāryo mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0221: na hi dharmānuraktānāṃ loke kiṃ cin na durlabham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0223: sa tena kṣapayet pāpaṃ samyag ācaritena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0224: sahajaṃ yad bhavet karma na tat tyājyaṃ hi kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0225: sa eva tasya dharmo hi tena siddhiṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0226: viguṇo 'pi svadharmas tu pāpakarma vyapohati yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0227: evam eva tu dharmo 'pi kṣīyate pāpavardhanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0228: bhagavan devadeveśa śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0230: śṛṇu pārthiva tat sarvaṃ dharmaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0233: bhavet tu tatkṣaṇād uṣṇaṃ śītatvaṃ ca vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0234: yathoṣṇaṃ vā bhaved alpaṃ śītena bahunāvṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0235: śītalaṃ tad bhavet sarvam uṣṇatvaṃ ca vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0236: evaṃ tu yad bhaved bhūri sukṛtaṃ vātha duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0237: tad alpaṃ kṣapayec chīghraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0239: gūhitasya bhaved vṛddhiḥ kīrtitasya bhavet kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0241: tathā kṛtas tu rājendra dharmo naśyati mānada
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0242: tāv ubhau gūhitau samyag vṛddhiṃ yātau na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0243: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena na pāpaṃ gūhayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0245: tasmāt saṃkīrtayet pāpaṃ satyaṃ dharmaṃ ca gūhayet vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0246: evaṃ śrutvā vacas tasya dharmaputro 'cyutasya tu yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0247: papraccha punar apy anyān dharmān dharmātmajo harim
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0248: vṛthā ca kati janmāni vṛthā dānāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0249: vṛthā ca jīvitaṃ keṣāṃ narāṇāṃ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0252: garbhasthe kiṃ samaśnāti kiṃ bālye vāpi keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0253: yauvanasthe 'pi kiṃ kṛṣṇa vārdhake vāpi kiṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0254: sāttvikaṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānaṃ rājasaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0255: tāmasaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva tarpayiṣyati kiṃ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0256: uttamaṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānaṃ madhyamaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0257: adhamaṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānaṃ teṣāṃ vā vada kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0258: kiṃ dānaṃ nayati hy ūrdhvaṃ kiṃ gatiṃ madhyamāṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0259: gatiṃ jaghanyām atha vā devadeva bravīhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0260: etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0261: tvadīyaṃ vacanaṃ satyaṃ puṇyaṃ ca madhusūdana vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0262: evaṃ dharmaṃ prayatnena pṛṣṭaḥ pāṇḍusutena vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0264: śṛṇu rājan yathānyāyaṃ vacanaṃ tathyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0266: vṛthā ca daśa janmāni catvāri ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0267: vṛthā dānāni pañcāśat pañcaiva ca yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0268: vṛthā ca jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ te ca ṣaṭ parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0270: dharmaghnānāṃ vṛthā janma lubdhānāṃ pāpināṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0271: vṛthā pākaṃ ca ye 'śnanti paradāraratāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0272: pākabhedakarā ye ca ye ca syuḥ satyavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0273: mṛṣṭam aśnāti yaś caiko dṛśyamānas tu bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0274: pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva upādhyāyaṃ guruṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0275: mātulaṃ mātulānīṃ ca yo nihanyāc chapeta vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0277: nirbrahmo niḥsvadhaś caiva śūdrāṇām annabhug dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0278: mama vā śaṃkarasyāpi brahmaṇo vā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0279: atha vā brāhmaṇānāṃ tu ye na bhaktā narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0280: vṛthā janmāny athaiteṣāṃ pāpināṃ viddhi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0281: aśraddhayā ca yad dattam avamānena vāpi yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0282: ḍambhārtham api yad dattaṃ yat pāṣaṇḍihṛtaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0283: śūdrācārāya yad dattaṃ yad dattvā cānukīrtitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0284: roṣayuktaṃ tu yad dattaṃ yad dattam anuśocitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0285: ḍambhārjitaṃ ca yad dattaṃ yac ca vāpy anṛtārjitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0286: brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca yad dattaṃ cauryeṇāpy ārjitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0287: abhiśastāhṛtaṃ yat tu yad dattaṃ patite dvije
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0288: nirbrahmābhihṛtaṃ yat tu yad dhṛtaṃ sarvayācakaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0289: vrātyais tu yad dhṛtaṃ dānam ārūḍhapatitaiś ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0293: strījitāya ca yad dattaṃ vyālagrāhihṛtaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0294: purohitāya yad dattaṃ cikitsakahṛtaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0296: yac chūdrajīvine dattaṃ yac ca devalakāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0297: devadravyāśine yac ca yad dattaṃ citrakarmiṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0299: sevakāya ca yad dattaṃ yad dattaṃ brāhmaṇabruve
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0300: agnihīne ca yad dattaṃ dattaṃ vārdhuṣikāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0301: yad anācāriṇe dattaṃ yat tu dattam anagnaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0303: yan mithyāliṅgine dattaṃ dattaṃ sarvāśine ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0304: nāstikāya ca yad dattaṃ dharmavikrayiṇe ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0305: cārakāya ca yad dattaṃ yad dattaṃ kūṭasākṣiṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0307: vṛthā bhavati tat sarvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0309: nātmānaṃ tārayanty ete na dātāraṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0310: etebhyo dattamātrāṇi dānāni ca bahūny api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0311: vṛthā bhavanti rājendra bhasmany ājyāhutir yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0312: eteṣu yat phalaṃ kiṃ cid bhaviṣyati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0313: rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca tad vilumpanti harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0314: vṛthā hy etāni dattāni kathitāni samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0315: jīvitaṃ tu vṛthā yeṣāṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0316: ye māṃ na pratipadyante śaṃkaraṃ vā narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0317: brāhmaṇān vā mahīdevān vṛthā jīvanti te narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0319: vedān nindanty anācārā vṛthā jīvanti te narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0321: viprān nindanti yajñāṃś ca vṛthā jīvanti te narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0322: ye ca durgāṃ kumāraṃ vā vāyum agniṃ jalaṃ ravim
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0323: pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva gurum indraṃ niśākaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0324: mūḍhā nindanty anācārā vṛthā jīvanti te narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0326: mṛṣṭam aśnāti yaś caiko vṛthā jīvati so 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0327: vṛthā jīvitam ākhyātaṃ dānakālaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0328: tamoniviṣṭacittena dattaṃ dānaṃ tu yad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0329: sa tasya phalam aśnāti naro garbhagato nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0331: dadāti dānaṃ yo martyo bālabhāve tad aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0332: bhoktuṃ bhogaṃ na śaktas tu vyādhibhiḥ pīḍito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0333: dadāti dānaṃ yo martyo vṛddhabhāve tad aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0335: dadāti dānaṃ yo martyo yauvane sa tad aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0336: svayaṃ nītvā tu yad dānaṃ bhaktyā pātre pradīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0338: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ caiva tāmasaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0339: dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ caiva gatiṃ ca trividhāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0340: dānaṃ dātavyam ity eva matiṃ kṛtvā dvijāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0341: upakāraviyuktāya yad dattaṃ tad dhi sāttvikam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0343: dīyate yat prahṛṣṭena tat sāttvikam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0345: samṛddhāya ca yad dattaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0346: saṃbandhine ca yad dattaṃ pramattāya ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0347: phalārthibhir apātrāya tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0349: dīyate taskarāyāpi tad dānaṃ tāmasaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0351: sevakāya ca yad dattaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0352: devāḥ pitṛgaṇāś caiva munayaś cāgnayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0353: sāttvikaṃ dānam aśnanti tuṣyanti ca nareśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0354: dānavā daityasaṃghāś ca grahā yakṣāḥ sarākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0356: piśācāḥ pretasaṃghāś ca kaśmalā ye malīmasāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0357: tāmasaṃ dānam aśnanti gatiṃ ca trividhāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0358: sāttvikānāṃ tu dānānām uttamaṃ phalam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0359: madhyamaṃ rājasānāṃ tu tāmasānāṃ tu paścimam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0361: madhyamaṃ tu samāhūya jaghanyaṃ yācate phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0362: ayācitapradātā yaḥ sa yāti gatim uttamām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0363: samāhūya tu yo dadyān madhyamāṃ sa gatiṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0364: yācito yaś ca vai dadyāj jaghanyāṃ sa gatiṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0365: uttamā daivikā jñeyā madhyamā mānuṣī gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0366: gatiṃ jaghanyāṃ tiryakṣu gatir eṣā tridhā smṛtā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0368: yat tu nikṣipyate dānam akṣayyaṃ saṃprakīrtitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0370: samṛddhānāṃ dvijātīnāṃ kuryāt teṣāṃ ca rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0371: daridrān vṛttihīnāṃś ca pradānaiḥ suṣṭhu pūjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0374: pratigrahītur yat puṇyaṃ pradātāram upaiti tat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0375: tasmād dānaṃ sadā kāryaṃ paratra hitam icchatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0380: āmantrya tu nirāśāni na kartavyāni bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0381: kulāni sudaridrāṇāṃ teṣām āśā hatā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0384: teṣāṃ tu pāvanāyāhaṃ nityam eva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0385: ubhe saṃdhye 'pi tiṣṭhāmi hy askannaṃ tad vrataṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0388: anyeṣām api viprāṇāṃ kilbiṣaṃ hi praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0389: ubhe saṃdhye 'py upāsīta tasmād vipro viśuddhaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0390: daive śrāddhe ca vipraḥ sa niyoktavyo 'jugupsayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0391: jugupsitas tu yaḥ śrāddhaṃ dahaty agnir ivendhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0392: bhārataṃ mānavo dharmo vedāḥ sāṅgāś cikitsitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0394: na brāhmaṇān parīkṣeta daive karmaṇi dharmavit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0398: śvatvaṃ prāpnoti ninditvā parīvādāt kharo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0399: kṛmir bhavaty abhibhavāt kīṭo bhavati matsarī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0400: durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā prākṛtā vā susaṃskṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0402: kṣatriyaṃ caiva sarpaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca bahuśrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0403: nāvamanyeta medhāvī kṛśān api kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0404: etat trayaṃ hi puruṣaṃ nirdahed avamānitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0406: yathā sarvāsv avasthāsu pāvako daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0407: tathā sarvāsv avasthāsu brāhmaṇo daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0408: vyaṅgāḥ kāṇāś ca kubjāś ca vāmanāṅgās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0410: manyuṃ notpādayet teṣāṃ na cāriṣṭān samācaret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0412: manyunā ghnanti te śatrūn vajreṇendra ivāsurān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0413: brāhmaṇo hi mahad daivaṃ jātimātreṇa jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0415: kiṃ punar ye ca kaunteya saṃdhyāṃ nityam upāsate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0417: kavyāni caiva pitaraḥ kiṃ bhūtam adhikaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0418: utpattir eva viprasya mūrtir dharmasya śāśvatī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0419: sa hi dharmārtham utpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0420: svam eva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0422: tasmāt te nāvamantavyā madbhaktā hi dvijāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0423: āraṇyakopaniṣadi ye tu paśyanti māṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0425: svagṛhe vā pravāse vā divārātram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0426: śraddhayā brāhmaṇāḥ pūjyā madbhaktā ye ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0427: nāsti viprasamaṃ daivaṃ nāsti viprasamo guruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0428: nāsti viprāt paro bandhur nāsti viprāt paro nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0429: nāsti viprāt paraṃ tīrthaṃ na puṇyaṃ brāhmaṇāt param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0430: na pavitraṃ paraṃ viprān na dvijāt pāvanaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0431: nāsti viprāt paro dharmo nāsti viprāt parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0433: trāyate dānam apy ekaṃ pātrabhūte kṛtaṃ dvije
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0435: mām arcayanti madbhaktās tebhyo dattam ihākṣayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0436: pradānaiḥ pūjito vipro vandito vāpi saṃstutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0437: saṃbhāṣito vā dṛṣṭo vā madbhakto divam unnayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0439: tān spṛṣṭvā vātha vā dṛṣṭvā naraḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0443: svayaṃ nītvā viśeṣeṇa dānaṃ teṣāṃ gṛheṣv atha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0444: nivāpayet tu yad bhaktyā tad dānaṃ koṭisaṃmitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0445: jāgrataḥ svapato vāpi pravāseṣu gṛheṣv atha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0446: hṛdaye na praṇaśyāmi yasya viprasya bhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0447: saṃpūjito vā dṛṣṭo vā spṛṣṭo vāpi dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0448: saṃbhāṣito vā rājendra punāty eva naraṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0449: evaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu sarvadānāni pāṇḍava vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0451: śrutvaiva sāttvikaṃ dānaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0452: pṛthak pṛthak tv eva gatiṃ phalaṃ cāpi pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0456: bījadoṣeṇa lokeśa jāyante ca kathaṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0458: brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣaṃ ca guṇadoṣau ca keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0460: kena viprā viśeṣeṇa tarante tārayanti ca bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0461: etān kathaya deveśa tvadbhaktasya namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0463: yena tiṣṭhati loko 'yaṃ vinaśyati ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0465: subījaṃ nāma vijñeyaṃ tasya bījaṃ śubhaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0468: sā praśastā varārohā tasyā yoniḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0469: manasā karmaṇā vācā yā bhavet svairacāriṇī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0470: sā kulaghnīti vijñeyā tasyāṃ jātaḥ śvapācakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0471: daive pitrye tathā dāne bhojane sahabhāṣaṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0473: na tasmād duṣṭayonyāṃ tu garbham utpādayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0474: mohena kurute yas tu kulaṃ hanti tripūruṣam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0475: kānīnaś ca sahoḍhaś ca tathobhau kuṇḍagolakau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0477: ṣaḍ ete viśvacaṇḍālā nikṛṣṭāḥ śvapacād api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0478: yo yatra tatra vā retaḥ siktvā śūdrāsu vā caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0479: kāmacārī sa pāpātmā bījaṃ tasyāśubhaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0480: aśubhaṃ tad bhaved bījaṃ śuddhāṃ yoniṃ na cārhati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0481: dūṣayaty api tāṃ yoniṃ śunā līḍhaṃ havir yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0484: mām adhaḥ pātayaty eṣa pāpātmā kāmamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0485: adhogatiṃ vrajet kṣipram iti śaptvā patet tu tat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0486: ātmā hi śuklam uddiṣṭaṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0488: āyus tejo balaṃ vīryaṃ prajñā śrīś ca mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0489: puṇyaṃ ca matpriyatvaṃ ca labhate brahmacaryayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0492: sāyaṃ prātas tu ye saṃdhyāṃ samyaṅ nityam upāsate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0493: nāvaṃ vedamayīṃ kṛtvā tarante tārayanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0494: yo japet pāvanīṃ devīṃ gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0495: na sīdet pratigṛhṇānaḥ pṛthivīṃ ca sasāgarām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0496: ye cāsya duḥsthitāḥ ke cid grahāḥ sūryādayo divi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0497: te cāsya saumyā jāyante śivāḥ śubhakarās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0498: yatra yatra sthitāś caiva dāruṇāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0499: ghorarūpā mahākāyā dharṣayanti na taṃ dvijam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0501: caturṇām api vedānāṃ sā ca rājan garīyasī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0504: kiṃ punar yas tu saṃdhye dve nityam evopatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0505: śīlam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ śaucaṃ mārdavam ārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0506: tasmād vedād viśiṣṭāni manur āha prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0507: bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti brahma yo vedaparamaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0508: svadāranirato dāntaḥ sa vidvān sa ca bhūsuraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0509: saṃdhyām upāsate viprā nityam eva dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0510: te yānti naraśārdūla brahmalokaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0513: sāvitrīṃ caiva vedāṃś ca tulayātolayan purā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0515: caturṇām api vedānāṃ sā hi rājan garīyasī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0516: yathā vikasite puṣpe madhu gṛhṇati ṣaṭpadāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0518: evaṃ gṛhītā sāvitrī sarvavede ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0519: tasmāt tu sarvavedānāṃ sāvitrī prāṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0520: nirjīvā hītare vedā vinā sāvitriyā nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0523: sahasraparamāṃ devīṃ śatamadhyāṃ daśāvarām yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0525: trailokyanātha he kṛṣṇa sarvabhūtātmako hy asi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0526: nānāyogapara śreṣṭha tuṣyase kena karmaṇā bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0528: karoti cen namaskāram upahāraṃ ca kārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0529: stauti yaḥ stutibhir māṃ ca ṛgyajuḥsāmabhiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0530: na toṣayati ced viprān nāhaṃ tuṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0531: brāhmaṇe pūjite nityaṃ pūjito 'smi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0533: parā mayi gatis teṣāṃ pūjayanti ca māṃ hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0536: tam ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa paśyāmi narapuṃgava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0537: kubjāḥ kāṇā vāmanāś ca daridrā vyādhitās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0538: nāvamānyā dvijāḥ prājñair mama rūpā hi te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0539: ye ke cit sāgarāntāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0540: mama rūpaṃ hi teṣv evam arciteṣv arcito 'smy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0541: bahavas tu na jānanti narā jñānabahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0543: avamanyanti ye viprān svadharmāt pātayanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0544: preṣaṇaiḥ preṣayante ca śuśrūṣāṃ kārayanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0550: agnivarṇais tu saṃdaṃśair yamo jihvāṃ samuddharet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0551: ye ca viprān nirīkṣante pāpāḥ pāpena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0552: abrahmaṇyāḥ śruter bāhyā nityaṃ brahmadviṣo narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0555: yaḥ prahāraṃ dvijendrāya dadyāt kuryāc ca śoṇitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0556: asthibhaṅgaṃ ca yaḥ kuryāt prāṇair vā viprayojayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0560: nāvamucyeta durmedhā na tasya kṣīyate gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0565: tasmān nākuśalaṃ brūyān na śuṣkāṃ giram īrayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0566: na brūyāt paruṣāṃ vāṇīṃ na caivaitān atikramet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0567: ye viprāñ śraddhayā vācā pūjayanti narottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0568: arcitaś ca tataś caiva tair bhavāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0569: tarjayanti ca ye viprān krośayanti ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0570: ākruṣṭas tarjitaś cāhaṃ tair bhavāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0579: devadeveśa daityaghna paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0580: etat kathaya sarvajña tvadbhaktasya ca keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0582: kīdṛśaṃ kiṃpramāṇaṃ vā kim adhiṣṭhānam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0591: yamadūtair durādharṣair nīyate vā kathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0592: kiṃ vā tatra gatā deva karma kurvanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0594: kathaṃ vā pāpakarmāṇo yānti pretapuraṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0595: kiṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ vā varṇaḥ ko vāsya keśava bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0596: jīvasya gacchato nityaṃ yamalokaṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0597: śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0601: na tatra vṛkṣacchāyā vā na taṭākaṃ saro 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0602: na vāpyo dīrghikā vāpi na kūpo vā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0603: na maṇṭapaṃ sabhā vāpi na prapā na niketanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0604: na parvato nadī vāpi na bhūmer vivaraṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0605: na grāmo vāśramo vāpi nodyānaṃ vā vanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0606: na kiṃ cid āśrayasthānaṃ pathi tasmin yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0607: jantor hi prāptakālasya vedanārtasya vai bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0609: śarīrāc cālyate jīvo hy avaśo mātariśvanā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0610: nirgato vāyubhūtas tu ṣaṭkośāt tu kalevarāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0612: adṛśyaṃ tat praviṣṭas tu so 'py adṛṣṭena kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0613: so 'ntarātmā dehavatām aṣṭāṅgo yas tu saṃcaret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0614: chedanād bhedanād dāhāt tāḍanād vā na naśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0620: tyaktvā bandhujanaṃ sarvaṃ nirapekṣas tu gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0621: mātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiś cāpi bhrātṛbhir mātulais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0622: dāraiḥ putrair vayasyaiś ca rudadbhis tyajyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0630: trāsaṃ janayati prāyaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ kathāsv api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0632: prāptakālena saṃtyajya bandhūn bhogān dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0633: jarāyujair aṇḍajaiś ca svedajair udbhijjais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0637: madhyamair yuvabhir vāpi bālair vṛddhais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0638: jātamātraiś ca garbhasthair gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0639: pūrvāhṇe vāparāhṇe vā saṃdhyākāle 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0640: pradoṣe vārdharātre vā pratyūṣe vāpy upasthite
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0642: kṣetrasthair vā nabhaḥsthair vā gṛhamadhyagatair api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0643: bhuñjadbhir vā pibadbhir vā khādadbhir vā narottama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0644: āsīnair vā sthitair vāpi śayanīyagatair api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0645: jāgradbhir vā prasuptair vā gantavyas tu mahāpathaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0648: kva cid bhītaiḥ kva cit trastaiḥ praskhaladbhiḥ kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0658: krandadbhiś ca rudadbhiś ca krośadbhiś cāpi visvanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0659: vedanārtaiś ca kūjadbhir vikrośadbhiś ca visvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0665: śvabhir vyāghrair vṛkaiḥ kākair bhakṣyamāṇāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0667: mahiṣaiś ca mṛgaiś cāpi sūkaraiḥ pṛṣatais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0671: visrabdhaṃ svāminaṃ mitraṃ striyaṃ vā ghnanti ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0673: ghātayanti ca ye jīvān duḥkham āpādayanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0674: rākṣasaiś ca śvabhiś caiva bhakṣyamāṇā vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0675: ye haranti ca vastrāṇi śayyāḥ prāvaraṇāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0676: te yānti vidrutā nagnāḥ piśācā iva tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0677: gāś ca dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca balāt kṣetragṛhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0679: pāṣāṇair ulmukair daṇḍaiḥ kāṣṭhaghātaiś ca jharjharaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0682: ākrośantīha vā nityaṃ praharanti ca ye dvijān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0687: tatra cāpi gatāḥ pāpā viṣṭhākūpeṣv anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0689: tataś ca muktāḥ kālena loke cāsmin narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0698: mamānnaṃ dīyatāṃ svāmin pānīyaṃ dīyatāṃ mama vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0699: iti bruvantas tair dūtair yāpayanti yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0700: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ viṣṇoḥ papāta bhuvi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0702: tato labdhvā śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ samāśvasto 'cyutena saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0703: netre prakṣālya toyena bhūyaḥ keśavam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0704: bhīto 'smy ahaṃ mahādeva śrutvā mārgasya vistaram bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0709: yam adhvānaṃ tu gacchanti yathāvat taṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0711: ye prayacchanti vidvadbhyas te sukhaṃ yānti tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0712: annaṃ ye ca prayacchanti brāhmaṇebhyaḥ susaṃskṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0714: te vimānair mahātmāno yānti citrair yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0716: ye ca nityaṃ prabhāṣante satyaṃ niṣkalmaṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0717: te 'pi yānty amalābhrābhair vimānais taṃ yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0722: upānahau ca chattraṃ ca śayanāny āsanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0723: viprebhyo ye prayacchanti vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0724: te yānty aśvair vṛṣair vāpi kuñjarair apy alaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0726: ye ca bhakṣyāṇi dāsyanti bhojyaṃ peyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0727: snigdhānnāny api viprebhyaḥ śraddhayā parayā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0728: te yānti kāñcanair yānaiḥ sukhaṃ vaivasvatālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0730: ye ca kṣīraṃ prayacchanti ghṛtaṃ dadhi guḍaṃ madhu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0734: ye phalāni prayacchanti puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0735: haṃsayuktair vimānais tu yānti dharmapuraṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0740: te sutṛptāḥ sukhaṃ yānti vimānair haṃsacoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0741: ye tilāṃs tiladhenuṃ vā ghṛtadhenum athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0745: yeṣāṃ vāpyaś ca kūpāś ca taṭākāni sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0746: dīrghikāḥ puṣkariṇyaś ca sajalāś ca jalāśayāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0757: śītalaṃ salilaṃ ramyaṃ tṛṣitebhyo diśanti ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0758: te tu tṛptiṃ parāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ yānti mahāpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0761: ārāmān vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃś ca ropayanti ca ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0764: yānti te vāhanair divyaiḥ pūjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0767: aśvayānaṃ tu goyānaṃ hastiyānam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0769: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vāpi vidrumaṃ mauktikaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0770: ye prayacchanti te yānti vimānaiḥ kāñcanojjvalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0772: bhūmidā yānti taṃ lokaṃ sarvakāmaiḥ sutarpitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0774: kanyāṃ ye ca prayacchanti viprāya śrotriyāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0779: yānti dharmapuraṃ yānair vicitrair apy alaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0780: dīpadā yānti yānaiś ca dyotayanto diśo daśa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0787: ye prayacchanti viprebhyas te yānty aśvair yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0788: viśrāmayanti ye viprāñ śrāntān adhvani karśitān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0790: svāgatena ca yo viprān pūjayed āsanena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0793: vratavat prayato nityaṃ sa sukhaṃ yāti tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0794: namaḥ sarvasabhābhyaś cety abhikhyāya dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0795: namaskaroti gobhyo yaḥ sa sukhaṃ yāti tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0797: bhūmim ākramate prātaḥ śayanād utthitaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0801: te 'pi sārasayuktena yānti yānena vai sukham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0802: ye cāpy ekena bhuktena vartante ḍambhavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0803: haṃsayuktair vimānais tu sukhaṃ yānti yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0804: caturthena ca bhuktena vartante ye jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0808: ṣaṣṭhāhnakāliko yas tu varṣam ekaṃ tu vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0810: sa yāti kuñjarasthas tu jayaśabdaravair yutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0813: ye ca māsopavāsaṃ vai kurvate saṃyatendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0817: prāṇāṃs tyajati yo vipro māṃ prapanno hy anāśakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0819: praviṣṭo 'ntarjale yas tu prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0821: svaśarīraṃ hi gṛdhrāṇāṃ manmanā yaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0823: gokṛte strīkṛte caiva hatā viprakṛte 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0825: ye ca kurvanti madbhaktās tīrthayātrāṃ jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0826: te panthānaṃ mahātmāno yānair yānti sunirvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0829: parapīḍām akṛtvaiva bhṛtyān bibhrati ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0830: tatpathaṃ te sukhaṃ yānti vimānaiḥ kāñcanojjvalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0835: ye mām ekāntabhāvena devaṃ tryambakam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0836: pūjayanti namasyanti stuvanti ca dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0838: pūjitās tatra dharmeṇa svayaṃ mālyādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0839: yānty eva mama lokaṃ vā rudralokam athāpi vā vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0846: dānaṃ deyaṃ kathaṃ kṛṣṇa kīdṛśāya dvijāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0847: kīdṛśaṃ vā tapaḥ kṛtvā tatphalaṃ kutra bhujyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0852: yac chrutvā puruṣaḥ strī vā naṣṭapāpaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0854: ekāham api kaunteya bhūmāv utpāditaṃ jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0855: sapta tārayate pūrvān vitṛṣṇā yatra gaur bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0856: pānīyaṃ paramaṃ loke jīvānāṃ jīvanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0863: ye cāpy atoyadātāraḥ pūyas teṣāṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0866: tasmāt toyaṃ sadā deyaṃ tṛṣitebhyo vijānatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0867: agner mūrtiḥ kṣiter yonir amṛtasya ca saṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0868: ato 'mbhaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ mūlam ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0869: adbhiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni jīvanti prabhavanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0872: tat sarvaṃ toyadānena prāpyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0873: ye prayacchanti viprebhyas tv annadānaṃ susaṃskṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0874: tais tu dattā svayaṃ prāṇā bhavanti bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0875: annād raktaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca anne jīvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0876: indriyāṇi ca buddhiś ca puṣṇanty annena nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0878: tejo balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca sattvaṃ rūpaṃ dyutir dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0879: jñānaṃ medhā tathāyuś ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0881: sarvakālaṃ hi sarveṣām anne prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0882: annaṃ prajāpate rūpam annaṃ prajananaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0884: annenādhiṣṭhitaḥ prāṇa apāno vyāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0885: udānaś ca samānaś ca dhārayanti śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0889: annād bhavanti rājendra sṛṣṭir eṣā prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0891: annād yasmāt pravartante tasmād annaṃ paraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0892: devā rudrādayaḥ sarve pitaro 'py agnayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0893: yasmād annena tuṣyanti tasmād annaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0894: yasmād annāt prajāḥ sarvāḥ kalpe kalpe 'sṛjat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0895: tasmād annāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0896: yasmād annāt pravartante dharmārthau kāma eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0897: tasmād annāt paraṃ dānaṃ nāmutreha ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0898: yakṣarakṣograhā nāgā bhūtā daityāś ca dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0899: tuṣyanty annena yasmāt tu tasmād annaṃ paraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0900: parānnam upabhuñjāno yat karma kurute śubham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0910: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālān naraloke dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0911: agrabhikṣāṃ ca yo dadyād daridrāya dvijātaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0912: ṣaṇmāsād vārṣikaṃ śrāddhaṃ tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0914: tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti naro vai nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0916: pracchādyaiva svayaṃ nītvā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0917: kapilānāṃ sahasrais tu yad deyaṃ puṇyam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0918: tat sarvam akhilaṃ prāpya śakraloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0921: agrānnaṃ yas tu vai dadyād dvijāya niyatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0931: yācate 'nnaṃ na dadyād yo vidyamāne dhanāgame
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0932: sa lubdho narakaṃ yāti kṛmīṇāṃ kālasūtrakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0935: tasmāc ca narakān muktaḥ kālena mahatā hi saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0936: daridro mānuṣo loke caṇḍāleṣv api jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0939: pṛcchan vai hy annadātāraṃ gṛham abhyetya yācayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0940: taṃ pūjayet tu yatnena so 'tithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0941: tasmiṃs tuṣṭe naraśreṣṭha tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0942: na tathā haviṣā homair na puṣpair nānulepanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0943: agnayaḥ pārtha tuṣyanti yathā hy atithipūjanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0945: na tat phalam avāpnoti yat phalaṃ viprabhojanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0953: ye prayacchanti viprebhyo nopasarpanti te yamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0954: viprātithye kṛte rājan bhaktyā śuśrūṣite 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0955: devāḥ śuśrūṣitāḥ sarve trayastriṃśad bhavanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0957: tayoḥ pūjāṃ dvijaḥ kuryād iti paurāṇikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0959: pūjitas tena rājendra bhavāmīha na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0967: pitaras tasya nāśnanti daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0968: varjitaḥ pitṛbhir lubdhaḥ sa devair agnibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0969: nirayaṃ rauravaṃ gatvā daśa varṣāṇi pacyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0970: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha cocchiṣṭabhug bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0971: vaiśvadevāntike prāptam atithiṃ yo na pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0972: sa caṇḍālatvam āpnoti sadya eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0974: patitas tatkṣaṇād eva jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0975: narake raurave ghore varṣakoṭiṃ sa pacyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0976: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0977: śvā vai dvādaśa janmāni jāyate kṣutpipāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0981: sa caṇḍālatvam āpnoti daśa janmāni pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0982: nirāśam atithiṃ kṛtvā bhuñjāno yaḥ prahṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0984: moghaṃ dhruvaṃ prorṇayati mogham asya tu pacyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0985: mogham annaṃ sadāśnāti yo 'tithiṃ na ca pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0986: sāṅgopāṅgāṃs tu yo vedān paṭhatīha dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0987: na cātithiṃ pūjayati vṛthā bhavati sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0989: ye yajanti na cārcanti gṛheṣv atithim āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0990: teṣāṃ yaśobhikāmānāṃ dattam iṣṭaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0991: vṛthā bhavati tat sarvam āśayā hi tayā hatam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0992: deśakālaṃ ca pātraṃ ca svaśaktiṃ ca nirīkṣya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0993: alpaṃ samaṃ mahad vāpi kuryād ātithyam ātmavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_0996: hitaḥ priyo vā dveṣyo vā mūrkhaḥ paṇḍita eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1001: annaṃ prāṇo manuṣyāṇām annadaḥ prāṇado bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1002: tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1003: annadaḥ sarvakāmais tu sutṛptaḥ suṣṭhv alaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1005: sevyamāno varastrībhir mama lokaṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1006: krīḍitvā tu tatas tasmin varṣakoṭiṃ yathāmaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1007: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1009: yathāśraddhaṃ tu yaḥ kuryān manuṣyeṣu prajāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1012: sarvātithyaṃ tu yaḥ kuryād varṣam ekam akalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1014: devān iva svayaṃ viprān arcayitvā pitṝn api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1016: varṣeṇaikena yāvanti piṇḍān aśnanti vai dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1017: tāvad varṣāṇi rājendra mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1018: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1020: sarvātithyaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād yathāśraddhaṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1029: daśa janmāni vipratvam āpnuyād rājapūjitaḥ bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1032: yaḥ prayacchati viprāya bhūmiṃ ramyāṃ sadakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1037: yāti yānena divyena mama lokaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1039: kāmagaḥ kāmarūpī ca krīḍaty apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1040: yāvad bibharti lokān vai bhūmiḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1041: tāvad bhūmipradaḥ kāmaṃ mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1042: na hi bhūmipradānād vai dānam anyad viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1043: na cāpi bhūmiharaṇāt pāpam anyad viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1046: brāhmaṇāya daridrāya bhūmiṃ dattāṃ tu yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1047: na hiṃsati naravyāghra tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1049: sa śailavanadurgāḍhyā tena dattā mahī bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1053: sarvadānāni vai rājan dadāti vasudhāṃ dadan
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1054: sāgarān saritaḥ śailān samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1058: dharmaṃ kāmaṃ tathārthaṃ ca vedān yajñāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1061: na tat phalaṃ labhante te bhūmidānasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1062: śrotriyāya mahīṃ dattvā yo na hiṃsati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1063: tad dānaṃ kathayiṣyanti yāval lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1065: sasyapūrṇāṃ mahīṃ yas tu śrotriyāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1067: mama rudrasya savitus tridaśānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1068: prītaye viddhi rājendra bhūmir dattā dvijāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1069: tena puṇyena pūtātmā dātā bhūmer yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1070: mama sālokyam āyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1071: yat kiṃ cit kurute pāpaṃ puruṣo vṛttikarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1073: māsopavāse yat puṇyaṃ kṛcchre cāndrāyaṇe 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1075: sarvatīrthābhiṣeke ca yat puṇyaṃ samudāhṛtam yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1077: devadeva namas te 'stu vāsudeva sureśvara bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1078: gokarṇasya pramāṇaṃ vai vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1081: pratyak prāg api rājendra tat tathā dakṣiṇottaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1082: gokarṇaṃ tadvidaḥ prāhuḥ pramāṇaṃ dharaṇer nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1083: savṛṣaṃ gośataṃ yatra sukhaṃ tiṣṭhaty ayantritam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1084: savatsaṃ kuruśārdūla tac ca gokarṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1085: kiṃkarā mṛtyudaṇḍāś ca kumbhīpākāś ca dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1086: ghorāś ca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1087: nirayā rauravādyāś ca tathā vaitaraṇī nadī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1088: tīvrāś ca yātanāḥ kaṣṭā nopasarpanti bhūmidam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1089: citraguptaḥ kaliḥ kālaḥ kṛtānto mṛtyur eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1090: yamaś ca bhagavān sākṣāt pūjayanti mahīpradam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1091: rudraḥ prajāpatiḥ śakraḥ surā ṛṣigaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1092: ahaṃ ca prītimān rājan pūjayāmo mahīpradam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1094: bhūmir deyā naraśreṣṭha sa nidhiḥ pāralaukikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1097: yathā hi dhātrī kṣīreṇa putraṃ vardhayati svayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1098: dātāram anugṛhṇāti dattā hy evaṃ vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1099: yathā bibharti gaur vatsaṃ sṛjantī kṣīram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1102: tathā kāmāḥ prarohanti bhūmidasya dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1103: yathodayas tu sūryasya tamaḥ sarvaṃ vyapohati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1105: dātā daśānugṛhṇāti yo hared daśa hanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1107: āśrutya bhūmidānaṃ tu dattvā yo vā haret punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1108: sa baddho vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ kṣipyate pūyaśoṇite
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1109: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo hareta vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1110: na tasya narakād ghorād vidyate niṣkṛtiḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1111: brāhmaṇasya hate kṣetre hanyād dvādaśa pūrvajān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1112: sa gacchet kṛmiyoniṃ ca na ca mucyeta jātu saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1113: dattvā bhūmiṃ dvijendrāya yas tām evopajīvati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1114: gavāṃ śatasahasrasya hantuḥ sa labhate phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1117: iha loke bhavet sa śvā śatajanmāni pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1118: dattvā bhūmiṃ dvijendrāṇāṃ yas tām evopajīvati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1119: sa mūḍho yāti duṣṭātmā narakān ekaviṃśatim
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1120: narakebhyo vinirmuktaḥ śunāṃ yoniṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1122: atha vā sodakā deyā daridrāya dvijātaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1124: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti manasā cintitāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1125: bahubhir vasudhā dattā dīyate ca narādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1126: yasya yasya yadā bhūmis tasya tasya tadā phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1127: yaḥ prayacchati kanyāṃ vai surūpāṃ śrotriyāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1128: sa brahmadevo rājendra tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1130: yat phalaṃ labhate rājan kanyādānena tat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1131: gavāṃ śatasahasrasya samyag dattasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1132: tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti yaḥ prayacchati kanyakām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1135: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke sa jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1142: tataḥ kālāvatīrṇaś ca sosmiṃl loke hi jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1144: yaś ca rūpyaṃ prayacched vai daridrāya dvijāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1151: viśeṣeṇa daridrāya tasyāpi śṛṇu yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1153: tat puṇyaṃ samanuprāpya tatkṣaṇād virajo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1154: yathā tvaco bhujaṅgo vai tyaktvā śuddhatanur bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1155: tathā tilapradānād vai pāpaṃ tyaktvā viśudhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1161: śrotriyāya daridrāya śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1164: tilānāṃ kuḍavair yas tu tiladhenuṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1168: madbhaktyā madgatātmā vai tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1170: tat puṇyaṃ samanuprāpto mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1173: gāṃ tu yas tu daridrāya śrotriyāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1175: yat kiṃ cid duṣkṛtaṃ karma tasya pūrvakṛtaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1176: tat sarvaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva vinaśyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1179: yāvanti caiva romāṇi tasyā gos tu narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1181: golokād avatīrṇas tu loke 'smin brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1183: tilaṃ gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ cāpy annaṃ kanyā vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1186: tarpayed vidhivad rājan sa nidhiḥ pāralaukikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1187: āhitāgniṃ daridraṃ ca śrotriyaṃ ca jitendriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1189: āhitāgniḥ sadā pātram agnihotraś ca vedavit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1190: pātrāṇām api tat pātraṃ śūdrānnaṃ yasya nodare
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1191: yac ca vedamayaṃ pātraṃ yac ca pātraṃ tapomayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1192: asaṃkīrṇaṃ ca yat pātraṃ tat pātraṃ tārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1193: nityaṃ svādhyāyaniratās tv aprakīrṇendriyāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1203: brāhmaṇo yas tu madbhakto madyājī matparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1204: mayi saṃnyastakarmā ca sa vipras tārayed dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1208: avitṛptas tu dharmeṣu keśavaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1210: na vidyate suraśreṣṭha mama tṛptir hi mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1212: tat phalaṃ kathayasveha tava bhaktasya me 'cyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1213: yāni cānyāni dānāni tvayā noktāni kāni cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1214: tāny ācakṣva suraśreṣṭha teṣāṃ cānukramāt phalam bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1220: dhuraṃ dhārayate kṣipraṃ datto viprāya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1223: yaś ca dadyād anaḍuhau dvau yuktau ca dhuraṃdharau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1225: tasya yat puṇyam ākhyātaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1227: tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti yāti lokān sa māmakān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1228: yāvanti caiva romāṇi tayor anaḍuhor nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1231: varṣāṇāṃ hi taṭākeṣu phalaṃ naiva payodhiṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1232: yas tu dadyād anaḍuhaṃ daridrāya dvijātaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1240: dadyāt sadakṣiṇaṃ yas tu tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1241: devāḥ pitṛgaṇāś caiva agnayo ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1243: tena gacchec chriyā yukto brahmalokam anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1250: tat puṇyaṃ tam anuprāpya pitṛloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1252: yaḥ prayacchati viprāya tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1254: tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti yas tu vidyāṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1257: caturyugāni vai triṃśat krīḍitvā tatra devavat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1258: iha mānuṣyake loke vipro bhavati vedavit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1259: viśrāmayati yo vipraṃ śrāntam adhvani karśitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1260: vinaśyati tadā pāpaṃ tasya varṣakṛtaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1261: atha prakṣālayet pādau tasya toyena bhaktimān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1263: ghṛtena vātha tailena pādau tasya tu pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1266: tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti yas tv evaṃ vipram arcayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1267: svāgatena ca yo vipraṃ pūjayed āsanena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1268: pratyutthānena vā rājan sa devānāṃ priyo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1280: iha rājā bhaved rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1288: dadāti cepsitaṃ sarvaṃ manasā yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1289: yāvanti tasya patrāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1293: sthāpayitvā tu madbhaktyā yo matpratikṛtiṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1294: ālayaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā pūjākarma ca kārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1295: svayaṃ vā pūjayed bhaktyā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1298: na jāne nirgamaṃ tasya mama lokād yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1300: prajvālayati yo dīpaṃ tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1306: catvare vā catuṣke vā rātrau vā yadi vā divā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1309: tasya devā naraśreṣṭha pitaraś cāpi harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1311: sa ca tena vimānena yāti devapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1315: catvare vā sabhāyāṃ vā vistīrṇe vā sabhāṅgaṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1317: tatrāgniṃ caturo māsāñ jvalayed yas tu bhaktimān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1318: samāpteṣu ca māseṣu pauṣyādiṣu tato dvijān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1321: evam agniṃ tu yaḥ kuryān nityam evārcayaṃs tu mām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1322: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yad vai tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1323: tenāhaṃ śaṃkaraś caiva pitaro hy agnayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1324: yāsyāmaḥ paramāṃ prītiṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1326: so 'smat prītikaraḥ śrīmān mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1327: mama lokāvatīrṇaś ca so 'smiṃl loke mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1329: yaḥ karoti naraśreṣṭha bharaṇaṃ brāhmaṇasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1331: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yad vai tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1337: krīḍitvā māmake loke tatra devair abhiṣṭutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1338: mānuṣyam avatīrṇas tu vedavid brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1339: karakaṃ kuṇḍikāṃ vāpi mahad vā jalabhājanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1340: yaḥ prayacchati viprāya tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1341: brahmakūrcena yat pīte phalaṃ proktaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1346: pānīyaṃ yaḥ prayacched vai jīvānāṃ jīvanaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1347: grīṣmakeṣu ca māseṣu tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1353: krīḍitvā mānuṣe loke caturvedī dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1355: subhago rūpavāñ śūraḥ paṇḍitaś ca bhaved dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1358: upānahau ca chattraṃ ca yo dadāti narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1365: kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ vāpi guḍaṃ madhurasaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1366: ye prayacchanti viprebhyaḥ parāṃ bhaktiṃ gatā narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1371: tataḥ kālāvatīrṇāś ca jāyante tv iha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1376: ye prayacchanti viprebhyas teṣāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1379: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha rājā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1380: tasminn eva dine viprān bhojayitvā sadakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1384: tato 'vatīrṇāḥ kālena te cāsmin mānuṣe punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1386: anantarāśī yaś cāpi vartate vratavat sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1388: sa vimānena divyena yāti śakrapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1390: krīḍitvā mānuṣe loke jāyate vedavid dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1391: ekabhuktena yaś cāpi varṣam ekaṃ tu vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1393: sa vimānena divyena yāti śakrapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1395: iha mānuṣyake loke brāhmaṇo vedavid bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1397: vartate caikavarṣaṃ tu tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1399: yāti yānena divyena sa mahendrapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1401: tato dvādaśakoṭiṃ sa samāḥ samyak pramodate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1403: bhaved vai brāhmaṇo vidvān kṣamāvān vedapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1404: ṣaṣṭhakāle tu yo 'śnāti varṣam ekam akalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1408: sa yāti mama lokān vai divyanārīniṣevitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1409: tatra sādhyair marudbhiś ca pūjyamāno yathāsukham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1410: paśyann eva sadā māṃ tu krīḍaty apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1412: samāpte tu vrate tasmiṃs tarpayec chrotriyān dvijān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1414: dyotayan prabhayā vyoma mama lokaṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1415: sa tatra modate kāmaṃ kāmarūpī yathāsukham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1417: iha mānuṣyake loke pūjanīyo dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1418: trayāṇām api vedānāṃ sāṅgānāṃ pārago bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1419: yaś ca māsopavāsaṃ vai kurute madgatātmanā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1427: tataḥ kālāvatīrṇaś ca so 'smiṃl loke dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1441: sa vimānena divyena yāti lokān anāmayān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1442: svargāt svargaṃ mahātejā gatvā caiva yathāsukham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1445: so 'pi yānena divyena mama lokaṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1446: tataḥ sarvaguṇopetaḥ paśyann api sa māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1449: karṣaṇaṃ sādhayan yas tu māṃ prasannaḥ śucivrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1452: mama lokaṃ samāsādya ṣaṭkoṭiṃ tu pramodate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1453: mama lokāvatīrṇaś ca so 'smiṃl loke nṛpo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1456: siddhair brahmarṣibhiś caiva devalokaiś ca pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1458: praviśet sa mahātejā māṃ vā śaṃkaram eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1461: hanyante ye tu rājendra śakralokaṃ vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1465: janmaprabhṛti yad dattaṃ sarvaṃ naśyati bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1469: tāṃs tān kāmān svargaloke ca bhuṅkte
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1470: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ dravyaṃ nyāyenopārjitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1471: tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1473: adattvā kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca daridro nāma jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1474: dānaṃ yat tat phalaṃ naiti śrotriyāya na dīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1475: śrotriyā yatra nāśnanti na devās tatra bhuñjate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1476: śrotriyebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti paramaṃ daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1477: nidhānaṃ cāpi rājendra tasmāc chrotriyabhojanāt yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1478: viprayoge śarīrasya sendriyasya viśeṣataḥ bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1481: na tu sarvasya bhūtasya pañcatvaṃ vāpi vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1483: teṣāṃ pañca mahāyajñān ye kurvanti dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1485: na jāyate na mriyate puruṣaḥ śāśvataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1486: prāyeṇa maraṇaṃ nāma pāpinām eva pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1487: yeṣāṃ tu na gatiḥ puṇyā teṣāṃ maraṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1489: kṛtakṛtyāḥ pratīkṣante mṛtyuṃ priyam ivātithim yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1490: pañca yajñāḥ kathaṃ deva kriyante 'tra dvijātibhiḥ bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1491: teṣāṃ nāma ca deveśa vaktum arhasy
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1495: nṛyajñaṃ pitṛyajñaṃ ca pañca yajñān pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1498: pitṝn uddiśya yat karma pitṛyajñaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1499: hutaṃ cāpy ahutaṃ caiva tathā prahutam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1501: vaiśvadevādayo homā hutam ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1502: ahutaṃ ca bhaved dattaṃ prahutaṃ brāhmaṇāśitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1505: ke cit pañca mahāyajñān pākayajñān pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1508: bubhukṣitān brāhmaṇāṃs tu yathāśakti na hāpayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1509: ahany ahani ye tv etān akṛtvā bhuñjate svayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1510: kevalaṃ malam aśnanti te narā na ca saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1511: tasmāt snātvā dvijo vidvān kuryād etān dine dine yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1512: ato 'nyathā tu bhuñjan vai prāyaścittīyate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1513: devadeva namas te 'stu tvadbhaktasya janārdana bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1514: vaktum arhasi deveśa snānasya ca vidhiṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1515: śṛṇu pāṇḍava tat sarvaṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1516: snātvā yena vidhānena mucyante kilbiṣād dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1517: mṛdaṃ ca gomayaṃ caiva tilān darbhāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1518: puṣpāṇy api yathānyāyam ādāya tu jalaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1519: nadyāṃ satyāṃ na ca snāyād anyatra dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1520: sati prabhūte payasi nālpe snāyāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1523: bahiḥ prakṣālya pādau ca dvir ācamya prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1524: pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskuryāt tu taj jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1525: na ca prakṣālayet tīrtham adbhir vidvān kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1526: na ca pādena vā hanyād dhastenānyena taj jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1528: tasmāt tās tu na hantavyās tv adbhiḥ prakṣālayet sthalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1529: kevalaṃ prathamaṃ majjen nāṅgāni vimṛjed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1530: tat tu tīrthaṃ samāsādya kuryād ācamanaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1531: gokarṇākṛtivat kṛtvā karaṃ triḥ prapibej jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1532: dvis tat parimṛjed vaktraṃ pādāv abhyukṣya cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1533: śīrṣaṇyāṃs tu tataḥ prāṇān sakṛd eva tu saṃspṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1534: bāhū dvau ca tataḥ spṛṣṭvā hṛdayaṃ nābhim eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1535: pratyaṅgam udakaṃ spṛṣṭvā mūrdhānaṃ tu punaḥ spṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1536: āpaḥ punāntv ity uktvā ca punar ācamanaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1537: soṃkārā vyāhṛtīr vāpi sadasaspatim ity ṛcam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1538: ācamya mṛttikāḥ paścāt tridhā kṛtvā samālabhet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1540: ālabhya vāruṇaiḥ sūktair namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1542: majjed om ity udāhṛtya na ca prakṣobhayej jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1543: gomayaṃ ca tridhā kṛtvā jale pūrvaṃ samālabhet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1544: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ ca japet punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1546: āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhir darbhapūtena vāriṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1547: tathā tarat samandībhiḥ siñcec catasṛbhiḥ kramāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1552: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā tato japet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1553: ā śvāsamokṣāt praṇavaṃ japed vā mām anusmaran
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1554: utplutya tīrtham āsādya dhaute śukle ca vāsasī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1555: śuddhe cācchādayet kakṣe na kuryāt paripāśake
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1556: pāśe nibaddhakakṣyo yat kurute karma vaidikam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1557: rākṣasā dānavā daityās tad vilumpanti harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1558: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kakṣyāṃ pāśe na dhārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1559: tataḥ prakṣālya pādau ca hastau caiva mṛdā śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1560: ācamya punar ācāmet tataḥ sāvitriyā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1561: jale jalagataḥ śuddhaḥ sthala eva sthale sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1565: sahasrakṛtvaḥ sāvitrīṃ śatakṛtvas tu vā japet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1566: samāpte tu jape tasmin sāvitryā cābhimantrya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1574: ūrdhvabāhus tato bhūtvā sūryam īkṣet samāhitaḥ
