GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1576: ud u tyaṃ ca japen mantraṃ citraṃ taccakṣur ity api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1577: sāvitrīṃ ca yathāśakti japtvā sūktaṃ ca māmakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1578: manmayāni ca sāmāni puruṣavratam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1579: tataś cālokayed arkaṃ haṃsaḥ śuciṣad ity ṛcā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1581: tatas tu tarpayed adbhiḥ brahmāṇaṃ māṃ ca śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1582: prajāpatiṃ ca devāṃś ca tathā devamunīn api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1583: sāṅgān api tathā vedān itihāsān kratūṃs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1584: purāṇāni ca divyāni kulāny apsarasāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1586: bhūtagrāmāṃś ca bhūtāni saritaḥ sāgarāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1588: tarpayed upavītī tu pratyekaṃ tṛpyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1589: anvārabhya ca savyena pāṇinā dakṣiṇena tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1590: nivītī tarpayet paścād ṛṣīn mantrakṛtas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1592: prācīnāvīty athaitāṃs tu tarpayed devatāḥ pitṝn
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1593: tatas tu kavyavāḍ agniṃ somaṃ vaivasvataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1594: tataś cāryamaṇaṃ cāpi agniṣv āttāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1595: somapāṃś caiva darbhais tu satilair eva vāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1596: tṛpyadhvam iti paścāt tu svapitṝṃs tarpayet tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1599: tathā pitṛṣvasṝś caiva mātṛṣvasṝs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1600: mātaraṃ cātmanaś caiva tathā mātāmahīm api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1601: mātur mātāmahīṃ caiva gurum ācāryam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1606: atarpayitvā tān pūrvaṃ snānavastraṃ na pīḍayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1607: pīḍayec cet purā mohād devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1608: pitaras tu nirāśāś ca śaptvā yānti yathāgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1609: prakṣālya tu mṛdā pādāv ācamya prayataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1610: darbheṣu darbhapāṇiḥ san svādhyāyaṃ tu samārabhet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1612: yad adhīte svayaṃ śaktyā tat svādhyāyaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1613: ṛcaṃ vātha yajur vāpi sāmagāthām athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1615: utthāya ca namaskṛtvā diśo digdevatā api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1616: brahmāṇaṃ ca tataś cāgniṃ pṛthivīm oṣadhīs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1617: vācaṃ vācaspatiṃ caiva māṃ caiva saritas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1618: namaskṛtvā tathādbhis tu praṇavādi ca pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1619: tato namo 'dbhya ity uktvā namaskuryāt tu taj jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1620: ghṛṇiḥ sūryas tathādityas tān praṇamya svamūrdhani
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1621: tatas tv ālokayann arkaṃ praṇavena samāhitaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1622: tato mām arcayet puṣpair matpriyair eva nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1623: tvatpriyāṇi prasūnāni tvadadhiṣṭhāni mādhava bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1626: kumudaṃ karavīraṃ ca caṇakaṃ campakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1631: tasmāt padmaṃ tathā rājan padmāt tu śatapatrakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1632: tasmāt sahasrapatraṃ tu puṇḍarīkaṃ tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1634: bakapuṣpaṃ tatas tasmāt sauvarṇaṃ tu tato 'dhikam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1635: sauvarṇāt tu prasūnāc ca matpriyaṃ nāsti pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1636: puṣpālābhe tulasyāstu patrair mām arcayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1638: śiphālābhe mṛdā tatra bhaktimān arcayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1640: kiṅkiṇī munipuṣpaṃ ca duttūraṃ pāṭalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1644: kakubhāḥ kovidārāś ca vaibhītakam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1646: aṅkolaṃ girikarṇī ca nīlāny eva ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1650: anyais tu śuklapatrais tu gandhavadbhir narādhipa yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1651: avarjyais tair yathālābhaṃ madbhakto māṃ samarcayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1652: kathaṃ tvam arcanīyo 'si mūrtayaḥ kīdṛśās tu te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1653: vaikhānasāḥ kathaṃ brūyuḥ kathaṃ vā pāñcarātrikāḥ bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1657: vaidikair atha vā mantrair mama sūktena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1658: sthāpitaṃ māṃ tatas tasminn arcayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1659: puruṣaṃ ca tataḥ satyam acyutaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1660: aniruddhaṃ ca māṃ prāhur vaikhānasavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1661: anye tv evaṃ vijānanti māṃ rājan pāñcarātrikāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1662: vāsudevaṃ ca rājendra saṃkarṣaṇam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1664: etāś cānyāś ca rājendra saṃjñābhedena mūrtayaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1665: viddhy anarthāntarā eva mām evaṃ cārcayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1666: tvadbhaktāḥ kīdṛśā deva kāni teṣāṃ vratāni ca bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1669: mām eva śaraṇaṃ prāptās te madbhaktāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1673: svasthas tu na divā svapyān madhumāṃsāni varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1674: pradakṣiṇaṃ vrajed viprān gām aśvatthaṃ hutāśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1675: na dhāvet patite varṣe nāgrabhikṣāṃ ca lopayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1677: grāsamuṣṭiṃ gave dadyād dhānyāmlaṃ caiva varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1679: aniveditaṃ ca yad dravyaṃ tat prayatnena varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1682: sāttvikā rājasāś cāpi tāmasāś cāpi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1683: mām arcayanti madbhaktās teṣām īdṛgvidhā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1684: tāmasās timiraṃ yānti rājasā raja eva tat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1685: sāttvikāḥ sattvasaṃpannāḥ sattvam eva prayānti te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1686: ye siddhāḥ santi sāṃkhyena yogasattvabalena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1689: etasmin dehanagare rājasas tu sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1691: caturvedavidaś cāpi dehe ṣaḍ vṛṣalāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1692: kṣatriyāḥ sapta vijñeyā vaiśyās tv aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1694: kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca mohaś ca mada eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1695: mahāmohaś ca ity ete dehe ṣaḍ vṛṣalāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1696: garvaḥ stambho hy ahaṃkāra īrṣyā ca droha eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1697: pāruṣyaṃ krūratā ceti saptaite kṣatriyāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1698: tīkṣṇatā nikṛtir māyā śāṭhyaṃ ḍambho hy anārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1699: paiśunyam anṛtaṃ caiva vaiśyās tv aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1700: tṛṣṇā bubhukṣā nidrā ca ālasyaṃ cāghṛṇādayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1701: ādhiś cāpi vivādaś ca pramādo hīnasattvatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1702: bhayaṃ viklabatā jāḍyaṃ pāpakaṃ manyur eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1704: āśaucaṃ malinatvaṃ ca śūdrā hy ete prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1705: yasminn ete na dṛśyante sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1706: yeṣu yeṣu hi bhāveṣu yatkālaṃ vartate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1708: prāṇān āyamya yatkālaṃ yena māṃ cāpi cintayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1709: tatkāle vai dvijo jñeyaḥ śeṣakālo hy athetaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1710: tasmāt tu sāttviko bhūtvā śuciḥ krodhavivarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1711: mām arcayet tu satataṃ matpriyatvaṃ yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1714: manaś ca vācaṃ ca nigṛhya cañcalaṃ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1717: teṣāṃ śrāddheṣu tṛpyanti tena tṛptāḥ pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1718: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayati nānṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1719: kṣamā jayati na krodhaḥ kṣamāvān brāhmaṇo bhavet vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1722: yā caiṣā kapilā deva pūrvam utpāditā vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1724: sā kathaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo hi deyā kasmin dine 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1726: kati vā kapilāḥ proktāḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1727: kair vā deyāś ca tā deva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1729: abravīt kapilāsaṃkhyāṃ tāsāṃ māhātmyam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1730: śṛṇu pāṇḍava tattvena pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1731: yac chrutvā pāpakarmāpi naraḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1736: bhuñjate kapilāṃ ye tu śūdrā lobhena mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1737: patitāṃs tān vijānīyāc caṇḍālasadṛśā hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1738: na teṣāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cid gṛhe kuryāt pratigraham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1740: sarvakālaṃ hi te sarvair varjitāḥ pitṛdaivataiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1741: te sadā hy apratigrāhyā hy asaṃbhāṣyāś ca pāpinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1742: pibanti kapilāṃ yāvat tāvat teṣāṃ pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1744: kapilāyā ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi takram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1745: ye śūdrā upabhuñjanti teṣāṃ gatim imāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1746: kapilopajīvī śūdras tu mṛto gacchati rauravam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1748: rauravāc ca paribhraṣṭo viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate krimiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1751: brāhmaṇaś caiva yas teṣāṃ gṛhe kuryāt pratigraham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1752: tataḥ prabhṛti tasyāpi pitaraḥ syur amedhyapāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1753: na tena sārdhaṃ saṃbhāṣen na cāpy ekāsanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1754: sa nityaṃ varjanīyo hi dūrāt tu brāhmaṇādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1755: yas tena saha saṃbhāṣed ekaśayyāṃ vrajeta vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1756: prājāpatyaṃ caret kṛcchraṃ sa ca tenaiva śudhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1758: prāyaścittaṃ bhavet tasya viprasyaitan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1759: brahmakūrcaṃ tu kurvīta cāndrāyaṇam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1760: mucyate kilbiṣāt tasmād etena brāhmaṇo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1761: kapilā hy agnihotrārthe yajñārthe ca svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1762: sarvatas teja uddhṛtya brahmaṇā nirmitā purā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1763: pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1765: tapasāṃ tapa evāgryaṃ vratānāṃ vratam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1766: dānānāṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ nidānaṃ hy etad akṣayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1767: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni puṇyāny āyatanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1773: kṣīreṇa kapilāyās tu dadhnā vai saghṛtena vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1775: kapilāyā ghṛtenāpi dadhnā kṣīreṇa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1777: pūjayanty atithīṃś caiva parāṃ bhaktim upāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1782: brahmaṇā pūjyamānās tu modante kalpam akṣayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1783: evaṃ hi kapilā rājan puṇyā mantrāmṛtāraṇiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1786: brahmaṇo hi niyogena nivasanti dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1788: cyutā āpas tu śīrṣeṇa prayato dhārayec chuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1791: mūtreṇa kapilāyās tu yas tu prātar upaspṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1792: snānena tena puṇyena naṣṭapāpaḥ sa mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1794: prātar utthāya yo bhaktyā prayacchet tṛṇamuṣṭikam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1795: tasya naśyati tat pāpaṃ triṃśadrātrikṛtaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1796: prātar utthāya madbhaktyā kuryād yas tāṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1799: daśarātrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tasya tan naśyati dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_1800: kapilāpañcagavyena yaḥ snāyāt tu śucir naraḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2122: dvārarodhaṃ na kurvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2123: vaivāhikaṃ tu kanyānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ ca ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2124: kārayanti ca kurvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2125: rasānām atha bījānām oṣadhīnāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2127: kṣemākṣemaṃ ca mārgeṣu samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2128: arthināṃ ye ca vakṣyanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2133: dharmādharmau ca kathitau bhūyaḥ kiṃ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2134: idaṃ me tattvato deva vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2135: hiṃsām akṛtvā yo martyo brahmahatyām avāpnuyāt bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2137: brūyān nāstīti yaḥ paścāt tam āhur brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2139: vṛttiṃ harati durbuddhis tam āhur brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2141: utpādayati yo vighnaṃ tam āhur brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2142: yaḥ pravṛttāṃ śrutiṃ satyāṃ śāstraṃ vā munibhiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2143: dūṣayaty anabhijño yas taṃ vidyād brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2144: āśrame vā vane vāpi grāme vā nagare 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2145: agniṃ yaḥ prakṣipet kruddhas tam āhur brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2146: cakṣuṣā vāpi hīnasya paṅgor vāpi jaḍasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2147: hared vai yas tu sarvasvaṃ taṃ vidyād brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2148: krodhād vā yadi vā dveṣād ākruṣṭas tarjito 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2149: ṛtau striyaṃ vā nopeyāt tam āhur brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2150: yāvat sāro bhaved dhīras tannāśe yasya duḥsthitiḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2151: tat sarvasvaṃ hared yo vai tam āhur brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2152: sarveṣām api dānānāṃ yat tu dānaṃ viśiṣyate bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2153: abhojyānnāś ca ye viprās tān bravīhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2155: annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2156: annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke annāt prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2157: abhojyānnān imān rājan vakṣyamāṇān nibodha me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2161: ugrānnaṃ sūtakānnaṃ ca śūdroccheṣaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2162: dviṣadannaṃ na bhoktavyaṃ patitānnaṃ ca yac chrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2167: sūtānāṃ śauṇḍikānāṃ ca vaidyasya rajakasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2170: vandino dyūtakartuś ca tathā dyūtavidām api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2171: parivittasya yac cānnaṃ parivettus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2173: tayor apy ubhayor annaṃ rājñaś cāpi vivarjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2179: teṣāṃ tvagasthiromāṇi bhuṅkte yo 'nnaṃ tu bhakṣayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2180: amātyānnam athaiteṣāṃ bhuktvā tu triyahaṃ kṣipet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2181: matyā bhuktvā sakṛd vāpi prājāpatyaṃ cared dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2182: dānānāṃ ca phalaṃ yad vai śṛṇu pāṇḍava tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2183: jaladas tṛptim āpnoti sukham akṣayam annadaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2184: tiladas tu prajām iṣṭāṃ dīpadaś cakṣur uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2185: bhūmido bhūmim āpnoti dīrgham āyur hiraṇyadaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2188: anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ juṣṭāṃ godaś ca bradhnaviṣṭapam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2191: sarveṣām eva dānānāṃ brahmadānaṃ viśiṣyate hiraṇyabhūgavāśvājavastraśayyāsanādiṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2193: yo 'rcitaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāty arcitam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2194: tāv ubhau gacchataḥ svargaṃ narakaṃ ca viparyaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2195: anṛtaṃ na vaded iṣṭvā tapas taptvā na vismayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2196: nārto 'py apavaded viprān na dattvā parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2199: ekaḥ prajāyate jantur eka eva pramīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2202: vimukhā bāndhavā yānti dharmas tam anuvartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2206: dharmeṇa hi sahāyena tamas tarati dustaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2208: sabhāś ca kūpāś ca pratiśrayāś ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2209: annapradānaṃ madhurā ca vāṇī yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2211: anekāntaṃ bahudvāraṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2212: kiṃlakṣaṇo 'sau bhavati tan me brūhi janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2214: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2217: maryādāyāṃ sthitiś caiva śamaḥ śaucasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2219: vārdhakye maunam ātiṣṭhet sarvadā dharmam ācaret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2220: brāhmaṇān nāvamanyeta gurūn parivaden na ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2221: yatīnām anukūlaḥ syād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2222: yatir gurur dvijātīnāṃ varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇo guruḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2226: durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā jñānino 'jñānino 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2228: ekadaṇḍī tridaṇḍī vā śikhaṇḍī muṇḍito 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2230: apūjito gṛhasthair vā tathā cāpy avamānitaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2232: tasmāt tu yatnataḥ pūjyā madbhaktā matparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2234: praharen na dvijān prājño gāṃ na hanyāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2236: nāgniṃ mukhenopadhamen na ca pādau pratāpayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2237: nādhaḥ kuryāt kadā cit tu na pṛṣṭhaṃ paritāpayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2239: ucchiṣṭo na spṛśed agnim āśaucastho na jātu cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2241: sarvadevamayo vahnis tasmāc chuddhaḥ sadā spṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2242: prāptamūtrapurīṣas tu na spṛśed vahnim ātmavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2243: yāvat tu dhārayed vegaṃ tāvad aprayato bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2244: pacanāgniṃ na gṛhṇīyāt paraveśmani jātu cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2245: tena pakvena cānnena yat karma kurute śubham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2246: tac chubhasya phalasyārdham agnidasya bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2248: pramādād yadi vājñānāt tasya nāśo bhaviṣyati yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2249: gṛhṇīyāt tu mathitvā vā śrotriyāgārato 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2250: kīdṛśāḥ sādhavo viprāḥ kebhyo dattaṃ mahat phalam bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2251: kīdṛśebhyo hi dātavyaṃ tan me brūhi janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2253: tādṛśāḥ sādhavo viprās tebhyo dattaṃ mahat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2255: sarvabhūtahitā maitrās tebhyo dattaṃ mahat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2257: svadharmaniratā ye tu tebhyo dattaṃ mahat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2258: sāṅgāṃś ca caturo vedān yo 'dhīyīta dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2259: śūdrānnaṃ yasya dehe na tatpātram ṛṣayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2261: tārayet tat kulaṃ sarvam eko 'pīha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2262: gām aśvam annaṃ vittaṃ vā tadvidhe pratipādayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2263: niśamya ca guṇopetaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sādhusaṃmatam yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2264: dūrād āhṛtya satkṛtya taṃ prayatnena pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2266: bhīṣmavākyāt sārabhūtaṃ vada dharmaṃ sureśvara bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2267: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ jagad etac carācaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2268: annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nāsti saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2271: vipram adhvapariśrāntaṃ bālaṃ vṛddham athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2272: arcayed guruvat prīto gṛhastho gṛham āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2276: na pṛcched gotracaraṇaṃ nādhītaṃ vā kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2277: caṇḍālo vā śvapāko vā kāle yaḥ kaś cid āgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2278: annena pūjanīyaḥ sa paratra hitam icchatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2279: pidhāya tu gṛhadvāraṃ bhuṅkte hy ekaḥ prahṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2281: pitṝn devān ṛṣīn viprān atithīṃś ca nirāśrayān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2282: yo naraḥ prīṇayaty annais tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2283: kṛtvāpi pāpaṃ bahuśo yo dadyād annam arthine

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2287: annaṃ hy amṛtam ity āhur annaṃ prajananaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2291: ādatte hi rasaṃ sarvam ādityaḥ svagabhastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2292: vāyus tasmāt samādāya rasaṃ megheṣu dhārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2293: tat tu meghagataṃ bhūmau śakro varṣati tādṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2294: tena digdhā bhaved devī mahī prītā ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2295: tasyāṃ sasyāni rohanti yair jīvanty akhilāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2297: evaṃ sūryaś ca pavano meghaḥ śakras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2298: eka eva smṛto rāśir yato bhūtāni jajñire
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2299: bhavanāni ca divyāni divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2305: vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpā dīrghikāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2306: ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny atha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2309: prāsādāḥ pāṇḍarāḥ śubhrāḥ śayyāś ca kanakojjvalāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2310: annadās tatra tiṣṭhanti tasmād annaprado bhavet

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2312: bhojanasya vidhiṃ vaktuṃ devadeva tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2314: snātaḥ śuciḥ śucau deśe nirjane hutapāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2317: ārdrapādas tu bhuñjīyāt prāṅmukhaś cāsane śucau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2318: pādābhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ spṛṣṭvā pādenaikena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2319: naikavāsās tu bhuñjīyān na cāntardhāya vā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2320: na bhinnapātre bhuñjīta parṇapṛṣṭhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2322: nānyad ālokayed annān na jugupseta tatparaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2324: pāṇinā jalam uddhṛtya kuryād annaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2325: apeyaṃ tad vijānīyāt pītvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2326: pariveṣajalād anyat peyam etat tu mantravat

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2328: yathā rasaṃ na jānāti jihvā prāṇāhutau nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2330: viditvānnam athānnādaṃ pañca prāṇāṃś ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2331: yaḥ kuryād āhutīḥ pañca teneṣṭāḥ pañca vāyavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2334: vaktrapramāṇān piṇḍāṃś ca grased ekaikaśaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2335: vaktrādhikaṃ tu yat piṇḍam ātmocchiṣṭaṃ tad ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2336: piṇḍāvaśiṣṭam anyac ca vaktraniḥsṛtam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2337: abhojyaṃ tad vijānīyād bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2338: svam ucchiṣṭaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte yo bhuṅte muktabhojanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2339: cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2341: abhojyaṃ tad vijānīyād bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2342: pītaśeṣaṃ tu tan nāma na peyaṃ pāṇḍunandana

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2344: pānīyāni pibed yena tat pātraṃ dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2345: anucchiṣṭaṃ bhavet tāvad yāvad bhūmau na nikṣipet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2346: maunī vāpy atha vāmaunī prahṛṣṭaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2347: bhuñjīta vidhivad vipro na cocchiṣṭaṃ pradāpayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2348: sadā cātyāśanaṃ nādyān nātihīnaṃ ca karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2349: yathānnena vyathā na syāt tathā bhuñjīta nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2350: udakyām api caṇḍālaṃ śvānaṃ vā rurum eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2351: bhuñjāno yadi vā paśyet tad annaṃ ca parityajet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2352: bhuñjāno hy atyajan mohād dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2354: abhojyaṃ tad vijānīyād bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2355: utthāya ca punaḥ spṛṣṭaṃ pādaspṛṣṭaṃ ca laṅghitam

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2357: rākṣasocchiṣṭabhug vipraḥ sapta pūrvān parān api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2359: tasminn ācamanaṃ kuryād yasmin pātre sa bhuktavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2360: yady uttiṣṭhaty anācānto bhuktavān āsanāt tataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2363: ikṣoḥ somasamudbhūtiṃ vaktum arhasi mānada bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2364: pitaro vṛṣabhā jñeyā gāvo lokasya mātaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2365: tāsāṃ tu pūjayā rājan pūjitāḥ pitṛmātaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2366: sabhā prapā gṛhaṃ cāpi devatāyatanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2367: śudhyanti śakṛdā yāsāṃ kiṃ pūtam adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2368: grāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2369: akṛtvā svayam āhāraṃ vrataṃ tat sārvakālikam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2370: gāvo me mātaraḥ sarvāḥ pitaraś caiva govṛṣāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2372: ity uktvānena mantreṇa sāvitryā vā samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2374: yat kṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ tena jñānato 'jñānato 'pi vā

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2377: tilāñ śrāddhe praśaṃsanti dānam etad anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2378: tilān dadyāt tilān bhakṣyāt tilān prātar upaspṛśet

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2380: krītāḥ pratigṛhītā vā na vikreyā dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2381: bhojanābhyañjanād dānād yo 'nyat tu kurute tilaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2382: kṛmir bhūtvā śvaviṣṭhāyāṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha majjati

GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2388: brahmahatyām avāpnoti brāhmaṇo yantrapīḍakaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2390: samuccayaṃ tu dharmāṇāṃ bhojyābhojyaṃ tathaiva ca bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2391: śrutaṃ mayā tvatprasādād āpaddharmaṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2395: akṛtānnaṃ ca yat kiṃ cid gṛhṇīyād ātmavṛttaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2396: āturo duḥkhito vāpi bhayārto vā bubhukṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2397: bhuñjann avidhinā vipraḥ prāyaścittīyate na ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2398: nimantritas tu yo vipro vidhivad dhavyakavyayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2399: māṃsāny api ca bhuñjānaḥ prāyaścittīyate na ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2400: aṣṭau tāny avrataghnāni āpo mūlaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2402: aśakto vidhivat kartuṃ prāyaścittāni yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2404: anṛtāv ṛtukāle vā divā rātrau tathāpi vā yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2405: proṣitas tu striyaṃ gacchet prāyaścittīyate na ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2406: praśasyāḥ kīdṛśā viprā nindyāś cāpi sureśvara bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2407: aṣṭakāyāś ca kaḥ kālas tan me kathaya suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2408: satyasandhaṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānād vepati bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2409: eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā yāti brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2410: kulīnaḥ karmakṛd vaidyas tathā cāpy ānṛśaṃsyavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2411: hrīmān ṛjuḥ satyavādī pātraṃ sarva ime dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2412: ete cāgrāsanasthās tu bhuñjānāḥ prathamaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2413: tasyāṃ paṅktyāṃ ca ye cānye tān punanty eva darśanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2415: tān paṅktipāvanān viddhi pūjyāṃś caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2416: nindyāñ śṛṇu dvijān rājann api vā vedapāragān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2419: yatra kutra tu bhuñjānas taṃ vidyāt paṅktidūṣakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2421: ahaṃ cāpi na jānāmi gatiṃ tasya narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2423: japato juhvato vāpi gatir ūrdhvā na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2424: āhitāgniś ca yo vipraḥ śūdrānnān na nivartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2425: pañca tasya praṇaśyanti ātmā brahma trayo 'gnayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2427: bhūmāv annaṃ pradātavyaṃ śvasṛgālasamo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2428: pretabhūtaṃ tu yaḥ śūdraṃ brāhmaṇo jñānadurbalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2430: trirātre tu tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gatvā samudragām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2432: anāthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pretaṃ ye vahanti dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2433: pade pade 'śvamedhasya phalaṃ te prāpnuvanti hi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2434: na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cit pāpaṃ vāśubhakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2436: śūdraveśmani vipreṇa kṣīraṃ vā yadi vā dadhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2437: nirvṛtena na bhoktavyaṃ viddhi śūdrānnam eva tat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2439: yo vighnaṃ kurute martyas tato nānyo 'sti pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2440: sarve ca vedāḥ saha ṣaḍbhir aṅgaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2441: sāṃkhyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca kule ca janma
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2459: iha cāmutra caikasya nāmutraikasya no iha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2471: teṣām ayaṃ caiva paraś ca lokaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2472: ye naiva vidyāṃ na tapo na dānaṃ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2475: teṣām ayaṃ caiva paraś ca nāsti yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2477: śrotum icchāmi kārtsnyena dharmasārasamuccayam bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2480: agnicit kapilā satrī rājā bhikṣur mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2481: dṛṣṭamātrāḥ punanty ete tasmāt paśyeta tān sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2482: gaur ekasyaiva dātavyā na bahūnāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2483: sā gaur vikrayam āpannā dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2484: bahūnāṃ na pradātavyā gaur vastraṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2485: tādṛgbhūtaṃ tu tad dānaṃ dātāraṃ nopatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2486: ākramya brāhmaṇair bhuktam anāryāṇāṃ tu veśmani
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2487: gobhiś ca puṇyaṃ tat teṣāṃ rājasūyād viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2488: mā dadātv iti yo brūyād gavyagnau brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2490: brāhmaṇasvaṃ tu devasvaṃ daridrasya ca yad dhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2491: guroś cāpi hṛtaṃ rājan svargastham api pātayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2494: ā samudrāc ca yat pūrvād ā samudrāc ca paścimāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2500: kurukṣetraṃ ca matsyāś ca pāñcālāḥ śūrasenayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2503: svaṃ cāritraṃ tu gṛhṇīyuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvamānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2504: himavadvindhyayor madhyaṃ yat prāg viśasanād api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2505: pratyag eva prayāgāt tu madhyadeśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2506: kṛṣṇasāras tu carati mṛgo yatra svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2507: sa jñeyo yajñiyo deśo mlecchadeśas tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2508: etān vijñāya deśāṃs tu saṃśrayeyur dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2509: śūdras tu yasmin kasmin vā nivased vṛttikarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2510: ācāraprabhavo dharmo hy ahiṃsā satyam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2511: dānaṃ caiva yathāśakti niyamāś ca yamaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2513: kāryaḥ śarīrasaṃskāraḥ pāvanaḥ pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2516: mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2517: dharmārthau yatra na syātāṃ śuśrūṣā vāpi tadvidhā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2518: vidyā tasmin na vaptavyā śubhaṃ bījam ivoṣare
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2519: laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vāpi tathādhyātmikam eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2520: yasmāj jñānam idaṃ prāptaṃ taṃ pūrvam abhivādayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2521: savyena savyaṃ saṃgṛhya dakṣiṇena tu dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2524: adhyāpayati caivainaṃ sa vipro gurur ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2526: sakalpān sarahasyāṃś ca sa copādhyāya ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2527: sāṅgāṃś ca vedān adhyāpya śikṣayitvā vratāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2531: tasmāt teṣāṃ vaśe tiṣṭhet tacchuśrūṣāparo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2532: avamānād dhi teṣāṃ tu narakaṃ syād asaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2535: śapatā yat kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ śapyamānaṃ tu gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2537: nāstikyaṃ vedanindāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca kutsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2538: dveṣaṃ ḍambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca krodhaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ ca varjayet yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2539: bhagavaṃs tava bhaktasya mama dharmajanapriya bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2540: dharmaṃ puṇyatamaṃ deva pṛcchataḥ kathayasva me
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2541: yad etad agnihotraṃ vai sṛṣṭaṃ varṇatrayasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2542: mantravad yad dhutaṃ samyag vidhinā cāpy upāsitam yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2544: kathaṃ tad brāhmaṇair deva hotavyaṃ kṣatriyaiḥ katham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2545: vaiśyair vā devadeveśa kathaṃ vā suhutaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2546: kasmin kāle 'tha vā kasya ādheyo 'gniḥ surottama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2547: āhitasya kathaṃ vāpi samyag ācaraṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2548: katy agnayaḥ kim ātmānaḥ sthānaṃ kiṃ kasya vā vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2549: katarasmin hute sthāne kiṃ vrajed āgnihotrikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2551: katham evātha hūyante prīyante ca surāḥ katham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2552: vidhivan mantravad bhaktyā pūjitās tv agnayaḥ katham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2553: kāṃ gatiṃ vadatāṃ śreṣṭha nayanti hy agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2555: kim āhitāgneḥ kurvanti duścīrṇā vāpi keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2556: utsannāgnis tu pāpātmā kāṃ yoniṃ deva gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2557: etat sarvaṃ samāsena bhaktyā hy upagatasya me bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2558: vaktum arhasi sarvajña sarvāvāsa namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2559: śṛṇu rājan mahāpuṇyam idaṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2560: yat tu tārayate yuktān brāhmaṇān agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2563: yasmād agre sa bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ nirmito mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2565: yasmāt tu sarvakṛtyeṣu pūrvam asmai pradīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2567: yasmāc ca nayati hy agryāṃ gatiṃ viprān supūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2568: tasmāc ca nayanād rājan vedeṣv agnīti kīrtyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2569: yasmāc ca durhutaḥ so 'yam alaṃ bhakṣayituṃ kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2571: sarvabhūtātmako rājan devānām eṣa vai mukham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2572: prathamaṃ manmukhāt sṛṣṭo lokārthe pacanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2573: sṛṣṭamātro jagat sarvam attum aicchat purā khalu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2574: tataḥ praśamitaḥ so 'gnir upāsyaiva mayā purā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2576: āhutiḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ tasmin vasati so 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2578: tasmin pañca mahāyajñā vartante yasya dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2583: tasmin pañca mahāyajñā vaiśvadevaś ca vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2584: sthālīpāka ca gārhaṃ ca sarve hy asmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2585: gṛhyakarmavaho yasmāt tasmād gṛhapatis tu saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2587: āhur brahmavidaḥ ke cin matam etan mamāpi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2590: gṛhāṇāṃ hi patitvaṃ hi gṛhapatyam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2592: yajamānaṃ tu yasmāt tu dakṣiṇāṃ tu gatiṃ nayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2593: dakṣiṇāgniṃ tam āhus taṃ dakṣiṇāyatanaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2596: yas tv āvasathyaṃ juhuyān mūlāgniṃ vidhivad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2597: āvasathyaṃ tu ye cāgniṃ pacanāgniṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2598: teṣāṃ sa bhāgato vahniḥ sabhya ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2599: āvasathyas tu yo vahniḥ prathamaḥ sa prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2600: brahmā ca gārhapatyo 'gnis tasmād eva tu so bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2601: dakṣiṇāgnis tv ayaṃ rudraḥ krodhātmā caṇḍa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2602: aham āhavanīyo 'gnir ā homād yasya vai mukhe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2603: sabhyo 'gniḥ pañcamo yas tu skanda eva narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2606: vṛtto hi gārhapatyo 'gnir yasmād vṛttā ca medinī
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2607: ardhacandrākṛtiḥ khaṃ vai dakṣiṇāgnis tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2608: caturaśraṃ tataḥ svargaṃ nirmalaṃ yan nirāmayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2610: juhuyād gārhapatyaṃ yo bhuvaṃ jayati sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2611: juhoti dakṣiṇāgniṃ yaḥ sa jayaty antarikṣakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2612: pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ca divaṃ carṣigaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2613: jayaty āhavanīyaṃ yo juhuyād bhaktimān dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2614: ābhimukhyena homas tu yasya yajñeṣu vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2616: ā homād yo 'gnihotreṣu yajñe vā yatra sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2617: yasmād asmin pravartante tato hy āhavanīyatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2618: yas tv āvasathyaṃ juhuyān mūlāgniṃ vidhivad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2620: yaś cāpy upāsate sabhyaṃ vidhivat prayatātmavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2621: jayet sa vāṅmayaṃ sarvaṃ tathā tv ṛṣisabhām api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2622: agnīnām atha vāgnes tu yasya homaḥ pradīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2623: iṣṭo bhavati sarvāgner agnihotraṃ ca tad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2625: ho ity eva viṣādo vai viṣādo duḥkham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2626: duḥkhaṃ tāpatrayaṃ proktaṃ tāpaṃ hi narakaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2627: tasmād vai trāyate duḥkhād yajamānaṃ huto 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2628: tasmāt tu vidhivat proktam agnihotram iti śrutau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2629: tad agnihotraṃ sṛṣṭaṃ vai brahmaṇā lokakartṛṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2630: vedāś cāpy agnihotrārthaṃ jajñire svayam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2636: vasanto brāhmaṇaḥ prokto vedayoniḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2637: agnyādheyaṃ tu yenātha vasante kriyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2638: tasya śrīr brahmavṛddhiś ca brāhmaṇasya vivardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2639: kṣatriyasyāgnir ādheyo grīṣme śreṣṭhaḥ sa vai nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2640: yenādhānaṃ tu vai grīṣme kriyate tasya vardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2641: śrīḥ prajāḥ paśavaś caiva vittaṃ tejo balaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2643: śaradrātraṃ svayaṃ vaiśyo vaiśyayoniḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2644: śarady ādhānam evaṃ vai kriyate yena pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2645: tasyāpi śrīḥ prajāyuś ca paśavo 'rthaś ca vardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2646: paśavaḥ sarva evaite tribhir vedair alaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2647: agnihotrāt pravartante yair idaṃ dhriyate jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2648: grāmyāraṇyāś ca paśavas tathā vṛkṣās tṛṇāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2649: phalāny oṣadhayaś cāpi hy agnihotrakṛte hi tāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2650: rasāḥ snehās tathā gandhā ratnāni maṇayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2653: dharmaśāstraṃ ca tat sarvam agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2654: chandaḥ śikṣāś ca kalpāś ca tathā vyākaraṇaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2655: śāstraṃ jyotir niruktaṃ cāpy agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2658: yac caitasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hi kiṃ cid asti carācaram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2659: tat sarvam agnihotrasya kṛte sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2663: kālasya vedanārthaṃ tu jyotirjñānaṃ kṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2674: vedyarthaṃ pṛthivī sṛṣṭā saṃbhārārthaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2675: idhmārtham atha yūpārthaṃ brahmā cakre vanaspatim
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2677: mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaṃ ca proṣitā śrāvaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2679: udgātṝṃś caiva sāmnāṃ vai baliprasthānam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2683: nāvabudhyanti ye viprā nindanti ca paśor vadham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2684: te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ tamasāvṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2687: yūpās tu mantrasaṃskārair eṣāṃ vai paśavas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2689: yāvat kālaṃ hi yajvā vai svargaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2690: tāvat kālaṃ pramodante paśavo hy adhvare hatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2691: vṛkṣā yūpatvam icchanti paśutvaṃ paśavas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2693: somatvaṃ ca latāḥ sarvā veditvaṃ vai vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2695: tasmāt paśuvadhe hiṃsā nāsti yajñeṣu pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2696: ahiṃsā vaidikaṃ karma brahmakarmeti tat smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2697: vedoktaṃ ye na kurvanti hiṃsābuddhyā kratuṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2698: sadyaḥ śūdratvam āyānti pretya caṇḍālatām api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2699: gāvo yajñārtham utpannā dakṣiṇārthaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2700: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ caiva pātrī kumbhārtham eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2701: darbhāḥ saṃstaraṇārthaṃ tu rakṣasāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2702: yajanārthaṃ dvijāḥ sṛṣṭās tārakā divi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2704: śuśrūṣārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ tu śūdrāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2705: evam etaj jagat sarvam agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2706: nāvabudhyanti ye caitan narās tu tamasā vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2707: te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ nāma viśrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2708: rauravād vipramuktās tu krimiyoniṃ vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2709: yathoktam agnihotrāṇāṃ śuśrūṣanti ca ye dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2710: tair dattaṃ suhutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ dattam adhyāpitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2711: evam iṣṭaṃ ca pūrtaṃ ca yad vipraiḥ kriyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2712: tat sarvaṃ samyag āhṛtya cāditye sthāpayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2713: mayā sthāpitam āditye lokasya sukṛtaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2714: dhārayet tat sahasrāṃśuḥ sukṛtaṃ hy agnihotriṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2715: yāvat kālaṃ tu tiṣṭhanti loke cāpy agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2716: tāvat teṣāṃ hi puṇyena dīpyante raviṇāmbare
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2717: svarge svargaṃ gatānāṃ tu vīryād bhavati vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2718: tatra te hy upayuñjanti hy agnihotrasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2720: vṛthāgninā ca ye ke cid dahyante hy agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2721: na te 'gnihotriṇāṃ lokaṃ manasāpi vrajanti vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2725: hotavyaṃ vidhivad rājann ūrdhvam icchanti ye gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2727: na tyājyaṃ kṣaṇam apy etad gṛhītavyaṃ dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2728: vṛddhatve 'py agnihotraṃ vai gṛhṇanti vidhivad dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2731: dvikālam atithīṃś caiva pūjayanti ca bhaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2733: mama loke pramodante dṛṣṭvā māṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2736: bālāhitāgnayo ye ca śūdrānnād viratāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2744: ity eṣā hy āhitāgnīnāṃ vibhūtiḥ pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2745: ye ca devaśrutiṃ ke cin nindamānā hy abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2746: pramāṇaṃ na ca kurvanti te yānti hy akṣayaṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2747: pramāṇam itihāsaṃ ca vedān kurvanti ye dvijāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2750: cāndrāyaṇavidhiṃ puṇyam ākhyāhi bhagavan mama bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2752: pāpino yena śudhyanti tat te vakṣyāmi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2753: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vaiśyo vā caritavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2754: yathāvat kartukāmo yas tasyeyaṃ prathamā kriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2755: śodhayet tu śarīraṃ svaṃ pañcagavyena yantritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2757: śuddhavāsāḥ śucir bhūtvā mauñjīṃ badhnīta mekhalām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2762: āghārāv ājyabhāgau ca praṇavaṃ vyāhṛtīs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2763: vāruṇaiś cāpi pañcaiva hutvā sarvān yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2765: viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyaḥ prajāpataya eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2767: tataḥ samāpayed agniṃ śāntiṃ kṛtvātha pauṣṭikam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2768: praṇamyāgniṃ ca somaṃ ca bhasma dhṛtvā tathātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2769: nadīṃ gatvā viviktātmā somāya varuṇāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2775: nārāyaṇaṃ vā rudraṃ vā brahmāṇam atha vāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2776: vāruṇaṃ mantrasūktaṃ vā prāgbhojanam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2777: vīraghnam ṛṣabhaṃ vāpi tathā cāpy aghamarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2778: gāyatrīṃ mama vā devīṃ sāvitrīṃ vā japet tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2779: tataś cāṣṭādaśaṃ vāpi sahasram atha vāparam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2780: tato madhyāhnakāle vai pāyasaṃ yāvakaṃ hi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2782: pātraṃ tu susamādāya sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tu vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2783: tāmraṃ vā mṛnmayaṃ vāpi audumbaram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2784: vṛkṣāṇāṃ yājñiyānāṃ tu parṇair ārdrair akutsitaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2785: puṭakena tu guptena cared bhaikṣaṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2786: brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhāṇāṃ tu saptānāṃ nāparaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2788: na hasec ca na vīkṣec ca nābhibhāṣeta vā striyam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2789: dṛṣṭvā mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca caṇḍālaṃ vā rajasvalām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2790: patitaṃ ca tathā śvānam ādityam avalokayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2791: yo hi pādukam āruhya sarvadā pracared dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2793: tatas tv āvasathaṃ prāpto bhikṣāṃ nikṣipya bhūtale
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2794: prakṣālya pādāv ā jānvor hastāv ākūrparaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2795: ācamya vāriṇā tena vahniṃ viprāṃś ca pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2796: pañca saptātha vā kuryād bhāgān bhaikṣasya tasya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2798: brahmaṇe cāgnaye caiva somāya varuṇāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2799: viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyo dadyād annaṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2802: aṅgulībhis tribhiḥ piṇḍaṃ prāśnīyāt prāṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2803: yathā ca vardhate somo hrasate ca yathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2804: tathā piṇḍāś ca vardhante hasante ca dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2805: trikālaṃ snānam asyoktaṃ dvikālam atha vā sakṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2806: brahmacārī sadā vāpi na ca vastraṃ prapīḍayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2807: sthāne na divasaṃ tiṣṭhed rātrau vīrāsanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2808: bhavet sthaṇḍilaśāyī vāpy atha vā vṛkṣamūlikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2809: valkalaṃ yadi vā kṣaumaṃ śāṇaṃ kārpāsakaṃ tu vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2812: brāhmaṇān bhojayed bhaktyā dadyāc caiva ca dakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2813: cāndrāyaṇena cīrṇena yat kṛtaṃ tena duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2814: tat sarvaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva bhasmībhavati kāṣṭhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2817: evam anyāni pāpāni pātakīyāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2819: anirdaśāyā goḥ kṣīram auṣṭram āvikam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2823: ākāśasthaṃ tu hastastham āsanasthaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2826: parivettus tathā cānnaṃ parivittānnam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2827: kuṇḍānnaṃ golakānnaṃ ca devalānnaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2829: surāsavaṃ viṣaṃ sarpir lākṣā lavaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2830: tailaṃ cāpi ca vikrīṇan dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2831: ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte dinamadhyagato 'pi yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2832: bhinnabhāṇḍe tu yo bhuṅkte dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2833: yo bhuṅkte 'nupanītena yo bhuṅkte ca striyā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2834: yo bhuṅkte kanyayā sārdhaṃ dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2835: ucchiṣṭaṃ sthāpayed vipro yo mohād bhojanāntare
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2836: dadyād vā yadi saṃmohād dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2838: chattrākaṃ laghunaṃ caiva bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2840: vipakvaṃ ca tathā māṃsaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2841: udakyayā śunā vāpi caṇḍālair vā dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2842: dṛṣṭam annaṃ tu bhuñjāno dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2843: etat purā viśuddhyartham ṛṣibhiś caritaṃ vratam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2845: etena vasavo rudrāś cādityāś ca divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2846: etad ādyaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2847: yathoktam etad yaḥ kuryād dvijaḥ pāpapraṇāśanam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2849: keśavenaivam ukte tu cāndrāyaṇavidhikrame yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2850: apṛcchat punar anyāṃś ca dharmān dharmātmajo nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2852: sarvabhūtahitaṃ dharmaṃ sarvajña kathayasva me bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2855: kārttikādyās tu ye māsā dvādaśaiva prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2857: kārttike yas tu vai māse nandāyāṃ saṃyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2858: ekabhuktena madbhakto māsam ekaṃ tu vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2859: jalaṃ vā na piben māse nāntaraṃ bhojanāt param
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2861: vratānte bhojayed viprān dakṣiṇāṃ saṃpradāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2866: mārgaśīrṣaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhuktena vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2867: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca parityajya yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2869: japann eva tu gāyatrīṃ māmikāṃ vāg yataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2870: māse parisamāpte tu bhojayitvā dvijāñ śucīn
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2871: tān arcayati madbhaktyā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2872: agnihotre kṛte puṇyam āhitāgnes tu yad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2875: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād dharivarṣeṣu jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2876: tatra prakāmaṃ krīḍitvā rājā paścād bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2877: pauṣamāsaṃ kṣaped evam ekabhuktena yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2880: evaṃ yuktasya rājendra śṛṇu yat phalam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2884: tatra sthitvā ciraṃ kālam asmin vipro bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2885: māghamāsaṃ tathā yas tu vartate caikabhuktataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2887: māmikām api gāyitrīṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ tu japed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2888: dattvā tu dakṣiṇām ante bhojayitvā dvijān api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2894: tataś cyutaś caturvedī vipro bhavati bhūtale
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2895: yaḥ kṣapet phālgunaṃ māsam ekabhukto jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2896: namo brahmaṇyadevāyety etan mantraṃ japet sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2899: vimānaṃ sārasair yuktam ārūḍhaḥ kāmagāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2901: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālāt ketumāleṣu jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2902: tatra prakāmaṃ krīḍitvā mānuṣeṣu munir bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2903: caitramāsaṃ tu yo rājann ekabhuktena vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2904: brahmacārī tu madbhaktyā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2908: bhuktvā kāmāṃs tatas tasminn iha rājā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2909: vaiśākhaṃ yas tu vai māsam ekabhuktena vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2910: dvijam agrāsane kṛtvā bhuñjan bhūmau ca vāgyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2912: vratānte bhojayed viprāṃs tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2914: tat puṇyaṃ phalam āsādya devaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2916: tatra prakāmaṃ krīḍitvā vipraḥ paścād bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2917: jyeṣṭhamāsaṃ tu yo rājann ekabhuktena vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2918: vipram agrāsane kṛtvā bhūmau bhuñjan yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2921: cīrṇe cāndrāyaṇe samyag yat puṇyaṃ samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2924: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2927: vipram agrāsane kṛtvā bhūmau bhuñjan jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2930: guḍodanena vā rājaṃs tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2934: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha vipro bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2935: śrāvaṇaṃ yaḥ kṣapen māsam ekabhuktena vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2936: namo brahmaṇyadevāyety uktvā mām arcayet sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2937: vipram agrāsane kṛtvā bhūmau bhuñjan yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2942: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālāt kuśadvīpe prajāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2943: tatra prakāmaṃ krīḍitvā vipro bhavati mānuṣe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2944: yas tu bhādrapadaṃ māsam ekabhuktena vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2948: tilān vāpi ghṛtaṃ vāpi vratānte dakṣiṇāṃ dadat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2952: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālāj jāyate dhanadālaye
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2953: tatra prakāmaṃ krīḍitvā rājā bhavati mānuṣe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2954: yaś cāpy āśvayujaṃ māsam ekabhuktena vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2956: dvisaṃdhyaṃ vā trisaṃdhyaṃ vā śatam aṣṭottaraṃ tu vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2958: vratānte bhojayed viprāṃs tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2960: tat puṇyaphalam āsādya mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2961: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālāc chvetadvīpe prajāyate yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2962: tatra bhuktvā mahābhogān atra vipraparo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2963: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇam ekabhuktena yaḥ kṣipet bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2964: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yad vai tan mamācakṣva keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2965: śṛṇu pāṇḍava satyaṃ me vacanaṃ puṇyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2966: yad akṛtvātha vā kṛtvā naraḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2967: ekabhuktena varteta naraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2971: saṃdhyayos tu japen nityaṃ madgāyatrīṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2972: namo brahmaṇyadevāyety asakṛn māṃ praṇamya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2973: vipram agrāsane kṛtvā yāvakaṃ bhaikṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2974: bhuktvā tu vāgyato bhūmāv ācāntasya dvijanmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2975: namo 'stu vāsudevāyety uktvā tu caraṇau spṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2976: māse māse samāpte tu bhojayitvā dvijāñ śucīn
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2977: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe dadyāt tu vratadakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2978: navanītamayīṃ gāṃ vā tiladhenum athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2980: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ rājan kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2981: daśajanmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ jñānato 'jñānato 'pi vā yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2982: tad vinaśyati tasyāśu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2983: sarveṣām upavāsānāṃ yac chreyaḥ sumahat phalam bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2984: yac ca niḥśreyasaṃ loke tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2985: śṛṇu rājan yathāpūrvaṃ yathā gītaṃ tu nārade
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2987: yas tu bhaktyā śucir bhūtvā pañcamyāṃ me narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2988: upavāsavrataṃ kuryāt trikālaṃ cārcayaṃs tu mām yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2990: bhagavan devadeveśa pañcamī nāma kā tava bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2992: parvadvayaṃ ca dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇaṃ ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2993: tat pañcamīti vikhyātā matpriyā ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2996: dvādaśyām eva vā kuryād upavāsam aśaknuvan
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_2999: upoṣya pūjayed yo māṃ so 'śvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3000: dvādaśyāṃ puṣyamāse tu nāmnā nārāyaṇaṃ tu mām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3001: upoṣya pūjayed yo māṃ vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3002: dvādaśyāṃ māghamāse tu mām upoṣya tu mādhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3004: dvādaśyāṃ phālgune māsi govindākhyam upoṣya mām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3005: arcayed yaḥ samāpnoti hy atirātraphalaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3006: dvādaśyāṃ māsi caitre tu māṃ viṣṇuṃ samupoṣya yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3007: pūjayaṃs tad avāpnoti pauṇḍarīkasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3009: upoṣya pūjayed yo māṃ so 'gniṣṭomasya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3010: dvādaśyāṃ jyeṣṭhamāse tu mām upoṣya trivikramam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3011: arcayed yaḥ samāpnoti gavāṃ medhaphalaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3012: āṣāḍhe vāmanākhyaṃ māṃ dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3014: dvādaśyāṃ śrāvaṇe māsi śrīdharākhyam upoṣya mām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3016: māse bhādrapade yo māṃ hṛṣīkeśākhyam arcayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3021: upoṣya pūjayed yas tu sarvakratuphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3023: yat phalaṃ pūrvam uddiṣṭaṃ tasyārdhaṃ labhate phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3024: śravaṇe 'py evam evaṃ māṃ yo 'rcayed bhaktimān naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3025: mama sālokyam āpnoti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3026: māse māse samabhyarcya kramaśo mām atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3029: avighnam arcayānas tu mama sālokyam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3030: arcayet prītimān yo māṃ dvādaśyāṃ vedasaṃhitām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3031: sa pūrvoktaphalaṃ rājaṃl labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3032: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ patraṃ vā phalam eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3033: dvādaśyāṃ mama yo dadyāt tato nānyo 'sti matpriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3034: etena vidhinā sarve devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3036: evaṃ vadati deveśe keśave pāṇḍunandanaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3043: lokātmaṃl lokakṛn nātha lokāvāsa namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3045: bhaktapriya namas te 'stu bhaktavatsala te namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3046: brahmāvāsa namas te 'stu brahmanātha namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3048: pañcayajña namas te 'stu sarvayajña namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3049: kṛṣṇapriya namas te 'stu kṛṣṇa nātha namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3050: yogāvāsa namas te 'stu yoganātha namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3051: hayavaktra namas te 'stu cakrapāṇe namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3052: pañcabhūta namas te 'stu pañcāyudha namo namaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3054: gṛhītvā keśavo haste prītātmā taṃ nyavārayat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3055: nivārya ca punar vācā bhaktinamraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3056: vaktum evaṃ naraśreṣṭhaṃ dharmaputraṃ pracakrame bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3057: anyavat kim idaṃ rājan māṃ stauṣi narapuṃgava yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3058: tiṣṭha pṛccha yathāpūrvaṃ dharmān eva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3059: bhagavaṃs tvatprasādāt tu smṛtvā smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3060: na śāntir asti deveśa nṛtyatīva ca me manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3061: idaṃ ca mama saṃpraśnaṃ vaktum arhasi mādhava bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3063: śṛṇu rājan yathātattvaṃ tat sarvaṃ kathayāmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3064: phalaṃ tu kṛṣṇadvādaśyām arcanāyāṃ phalaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3065: ekādaśyām upoṣyātha dvādaśyām arcayet tu mām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3066: viprān api yathālābhaṃ bhojayed bhaktimān naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3067: sa gacched dakṣiṇāmūrtiṃ māṃ vā nātra vicāraṇā vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3070: papraccha dānakālasya viśeṣaṃ ca vidhiṃ nṛpa yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3071: deva kiṃ phalam ākhyātaṃ dānasya viṣuveṣu ca bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3072: sūryendūpaplave caiva datte dāne ca yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3074: vyatīpāte 'yane caiva dānaṃ syād akṣayaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3076: samarātraṃ dine tatra saṃdhyāyāṃ viṣuve nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3077: brahmāhaṃ śaṃkaraś cāpi tiṣṭhāmaḥ sahitāḥ sakṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3079: asmākam ekībhūtānāṃ niṣphalaṃ tat paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3080: tan muhūrtaṃ paraṃ puṇyaṃ rājan viṣuvasaṃjñitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3081: tad evādyākṣaraṃ brahma paraṃ brahmeti kīrtitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3082: tasmin muhūrte sarve 'pi cintayantaḥ paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3083: devāś ca pitaro rudrā vasavaś cāśvinau tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3084: sādhyā viśve ca gandharvāḥ siddhā brahmarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3085: sūryādayo grahāś caiva sāgarāḥ saritas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3087: ete cānye ca rājendra viṣuve saṃyatendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3089: annaṃ gāvas tilān bhūmiṃ kanyādānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3090: gṛham ācchādanaṃ dhānyaṃ vāhanaṃ śayanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3091: yac cānyac ca mayā proktaṃ tat prayaccha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3094: vardhate 'har ahaḥ puṇyaṃ tad dānaṃ koṭisaṃmitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3095: viṣuve snapanaṃ yas tu mama kuryād dharasya vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3096: arcanaṃ ca yathānyāyaṃ tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3100: sa yāti māmakaṃ lokaṃ rudralokam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3103: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3104: caturṇām api vedānāṃ pārago brahmavid bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3105: candrasūryagrahe vāpi mama vā śaṃkarasya vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3106: gāyatrīṃ māmikāṃ vāpi japed yaḥ śaṃkarasya vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3108: kārayet tu dhvaniṃ bhaktyā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3110: durbalo 'pi bhaved rāhuḥ somaś ca balavān bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3113: mahāpātakayukto 'pi yady api syān naro nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3114: nirlepas tatkṣaṇād eva tena dānena jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3117: yāvad ṛkṣāṇi tiṣṭhanti gagane śaśinā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3118: tāvat kālaṃ sa rājendra somaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3119: tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke yudhiṣṭhira yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3121: bhagavaṃs tava gāyatrī budhyate tu kathaṃ nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3122: kiṃ vā tasyāḥ phalaṃ deva mamācakṣva sureśvara bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3124: ayane śravaṇe caiva vyatīpāte tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3126: japtvā tu mama gāyatrīm atha vāṣṭākṣaraṃ nṛpa yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3127: ārjitaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ tasya nāśayen nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3129: etat kathaya deveśa paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3131: aśvattho na sthito yatra nāhaṃ tatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3132: yatrāhaṃ saṃsthito rājann aśvatthaś cāpi tatra vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3133: yas tv enam arcayed bhaktyā sa māṃ sākṣāt samarcati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3134: yas tv enaṃ praharet kopān mām eva praharet tu saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3135: tasmāt pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryān na chindyād enam anvaham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3136: vratasya pāraṇaṃ tīrtham ārjavaṃ tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3139: narāṇāṃ poṣaṇaṃ tīrthaṃ gārhasthyaṃ tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3140: ātitheyaṃ paraṃ tīrtham atithis tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3141: brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tretāgnis tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3142: mūlaṃ dharmaṃ tu vijñāya manas tatrāvadhāryatām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3143: gaccha tīrthāni kaunteya dharmo dharmeṇa vardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3144: dvividhaṃ tīrtham ity āhuḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3148: gurutīrthaṃ paraṃ jñānam atas tīrthaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3150: kṣamā tu paramaṃ tīrthaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3151: kṣamāvatām ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś caiva kṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3153: ākṛṣṭas tarjito vāpi kṣamāvāṃs tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3154: kṣamā damaḥ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā tapaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3156: kṣamā dayā kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamayaitad dhṛtaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3157: kṣamāvān prāpnuyāt svargaṃ kṣamāvān prāpnuyād yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3158: kṣamāvān prāpnuyān mokṣaṃ tasmāt sā tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3161: ātmā tu yajñaḥ satataṃ manyate vai
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3165: jñānāmbunā snāti ca yo hi nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3167: bhagavan sarvapāpaghnaṃ prāyaścittam aduṣkaram bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3168: tvadbhaktasya suraśreṣṭha mama tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3173: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca triḥ kuryāt punar aṣṭākṣareṇa tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3174: tena tuṣṭo naraśreṣṭha tat pāpaṃ kṣapayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3175: yatra kṛṣṭāṃ varāhasya mṛttikāṃ śirasā vahan
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3179: salilena tu yaḥ snāyāt sakṛd eva ravigrahe
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3180: tasya yat saṃcitaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva naśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3182: gomūtreṇāpi yaḥ snāyād rohiṇyā mama vā dine
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3184: namasyed yas tu madbhaktyā śiṃśumāraṃ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3187: śiro dharmo hanur brahmā pucchāv uttaradakṣiṇau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3188: hṛdayaṃ tu bhaved viṣṇur hastau syātāṃ tathāśvinau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3189: agnir madhyaṃ bhaved rājaṃl liṅgaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3191: tataḥ paścād bhaved indras tataḥ paścāt prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3192: abhayaṃ ca tataḥ paścāt sa eva dhruvasaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3194: pibet tu pañcagavyaṃ yaḥ paurṇamāsyām upoṣya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3195: tasya naśyati tat sarvaṃ yat pāpaṃ pūrvasaṃcitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3196: tathaiva brahmakūrcaṃ tu samantraṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3197: māsi māsi pibed yas tu tasya pāpaṃ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3198: pāpaṃ ca brahmakūrcaṃ ca śṛṇu mantraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3199: pālāśaṃ padmapatraṃ vā tāmraṃ vātha hiraṇmayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3200: sādayitvā tu gṛhṇīyāt tat tu pātram udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3202: āpyāyasveti ca kṣīraṃ dadhikrāvṇeti vai dadhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3203: tejo 'si śukram ity ājyaṃ devasyeti kuśodakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3204: āpo hi ṣṭheti saṃgṛhya yavacūrṇaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3205: brahmaṇe ca yathā hutvā samiddhe ca hutāśane
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3207: uddhṛtya praṇavenaiva pibet tu praṇavena tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3209: bhadraṃ na iti yaḥ pādaṃ paṭhed ṛksaṃhitāṃ yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3211: mama sūktaṃ japed yas tu nityaṃ madgatamānasaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3213: kīdṛśā brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhāvaśuddhāḥ sureśvara bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3214: yat karma saphalaṃ neti kathayasva mamācyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3215: śṛṇu pāṇḍava tat sarvaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3216: saphalaṃ niṣphalaṃ caiva teṣāṃ karma bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3220: sarvāṇy etāni vai mithyā yadi bhāvo na nirmalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3221: agnihotraṃ vṛthā rājan vṛthā vedās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3222: śīlena devās tuṣyanti śrutayas tatra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3224: tam agryaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manye śeṣāḥ śūdrā iti smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3226: upavāsaratān dāntāṃs tān devā brāhmaṇān viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3227: na jātiḥ pūjyate rājan guṇāḥ kalyāṇakāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3228: caṇḍālam api vṛttasthaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3231: pañcasv eteṣu śauceṣu hṛdi śaucaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3232: hṛdayasya tu śaucena svargaṃ gacchanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3235: yasya vedaśrutir naṣṭā karṣakaś cāpi yo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3236: vikarmasevī kaunteya sa vai vṛṣala ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3237: vṛṣo hi dharmo vijñeyas tasya yaḥ kurute layam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3238: vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devā nikṛṣṭaṃ śvapacād api
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3239: stutibhir brahmapūtābhir yaḥ śūdraṃ stauti mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3240: na ca māṃ stauti pāpātmā sa mām ākrośayed bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3241: śvadṛtau tu yathā kṣīraṃ brahma vai vṛṣale tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3242: duṣṭatām eti tat sarvaṃ śunā līḍhaṃ havir yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3244: dharmaśāstraṃ purāṇaṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3245: yāny uktāni mayā samyag vidyāsthānāni bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3247: tasmāt tāni na śūdrasya spraṣṭavyāni yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3248: sarvaṃ tac chūdrasaṃspṛṣṭam apavitraṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3250: śvā ca śūdraḥ śvapākaś cety apavitrāṇi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3252: pañcaite syur amedhyāś ca spraṣṭavyā na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3253: spṛṣṭvaitān aṣṭa vai vipraḥ sacelo jalam āviśet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3257: avamatya patanty eva raurave narake narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3258: mama bhaktasya bhakteṣu prītir abhyadhikā nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3261: urdhvām eva gatiṃ viddhi kiṃ punar jñānināṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3262: patraṃ vāpy atha vā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vā jalam eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3263: dadāti mama śūdro 'pi śirasā dhārayāmi tat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3264: viprān evārcayed bhaktyā śūdraḥ prāyeṇa matpriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3265: teṣāṃ tenaiva rūpeṇa pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3267: mām arcayanti te viprā matsāyujyaṃ vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3270: āsām anyatamāṃ mūrtiṃ yo madbhaktyā samarcati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3272: mṛdā ca maṇiratnaiś ca tāmreṇa rajatena vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3273: kṛtvā pratikṛtiṃ kuryād arcanāṃ kāñcanena vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3276: vaiśyo vā dhanakāmas tu śūdraḥ puṇyaphalapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3277: sarvakāmāḥ striyo vāpi sarvān kāmān avāpnuyuḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3278: kīdṛśānāṃ tu śūdrāṇāṃ nānugṛhṇāsi cārcanam bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3279: udvegas tava kasmāt tu tan me brūhi sureśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3282: nanv ahaṃ śaṃkaraś cāpi gāvo viprās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3283: aśvattho mama rūpāṇi satyam etad yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3284: etat trayaṃ hi madbhakto nāvamanyeta karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3285: avamānitam etat tu dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3286: aśvattho brāhmaṇā gāvo manmayās tārayanti ha yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3287: tasmād etat prayatnena trayaṃ pūjaya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3288: brāhmaṇenaiva dehena śūdratvaṃ katham āpnuyāt bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3289: brahma vā naśyati kathaṃ vaktuṃ deva tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3290: kūpasnānaṃ tu yo vipraḥ kuryād dvādaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3291: sa tenaiva śarīreṇa śūdratvaṃ yāty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3293: sa śūdratvaṃ vrajed vipro vedānāṃ pārago 'pi san
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3294: pattane nagare vāpi yo dvādaśasamā vaset
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3295: sa śūdratvaṃ vased vipro nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3296: utpādayati yaḥ putraṃ śūdrāyāṃ kāmato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3297: tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3298: madyapī strīmukhaṃ mohād āsvādayati yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3299: tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3300: yaḥ somalatikāṃ vipraḥ kevalaṃ bhakṣayed vṛthā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3301: tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3302: maithunaṃ kurute yas tu jihvāyāṃ brāhmaṇo nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3303: tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3305: vināśayanti ye tat tu tāñ śocāmi yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3307: jātibhraṃśakaraṃ karma na kuryād īdṛśaṃ dvijaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3310: śrūyatām āhitāgnes tu tathā bhūtasya saṃskriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3312: trīṇi ṣaṣṭiśatāny āhur asthīny asya narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3314: aśītyardhaṃ śirasi ca grīvāyāṃ daśa eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3315: bāhvoś cāpi śataṃ dadyād aṅgulīṣu punar daśa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3316: urasi triṃśataṃ dadyāj jaṭhare cāpi viṃśatim
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3317: vṛṣaṇe dvādaśārdhaṃ tu śiśne cāṣṭārdham eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3318: dadyāt tu śatam ūrvos tu ṣaṣṭhyardhaṃ jānujaṅghayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3319: daśa dadyāc caraṇayor eṣā pretasya niṣkṛtiḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3321: bhaktānāṃ tāraṇārthaṃ vai vaktum arhasi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3323: satyasya vacanaṃ tīrtham ahiṃsā tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3324: tapas tīrthaṃ dayā tīrthaṃ śīlaṃ tīrthaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3326: saṃtuṣṭo brāhmaṇas tīrthaṃ jñānaṃ vā tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3328: yatayas tīrtham ity eva vidvāṃsas tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3329: śaraṇyaḥ puruṣas tīrtham annadas tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3330: trailokye 'smin nirudvigno na bibhemi kutaś cana
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3331: na divā yadi vā rātrāv udvegaḥ śūdralaṅghanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3332: na bhayaṃ devadaityebhyo rakṣobhyaś caiva me nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3333: śūdravaktrāc cyutaṃ brahma bhayaṃ tu mama suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3334: tasmāt sapraṇavaṃ śūdro mannāmāpi na kīrtayet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3335: praṇavaṃ hi paraṃ brahma nityaṃ brahmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3337: tena gacchanti te svargaṃ cintayanto hi māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3340: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca pāruṣyaṃ ca nṛśaṃsatā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3344: abuddhitā ca nāstikyaṃ bhayam ālasyam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3345: aśaucaṃ cākṛtajñatvaṃ ḍambhatā stambha eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3346: nikṛtiś cāpy avijñānaṃ jātake śūdram āviśet
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3347: dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaḥ śūdram abhibhūtaṃ tu tāmasaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3350: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3351: tad ahaṃ bhaktyupahṛtaṃ mūrdhnā gṛhṇāmi śūdrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3352: antyajo vāpi yaḥ kaś cit sarvapāpasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3353: yadi māṃ satataṃ dhyāyet sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3355: mayi bhaktiṃ na kurvanti caṇḍālasadṛśā hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3356: vṛthā dattaṃ vṛthā japtaṃ vṛthā ceṣṭaṃ vṛthā hutam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3357: vṛthātithyaṃ ca tat tasya yo na bhakto mama dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3358: yat kṛtaṃ ca hutaṃ cāpi yad iṣṭaṃ dattam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3359: abhaktimat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ rākṣasā eva bhuñjate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3362: ānṛśaṃsyam ahiṃsā ca dayā satyam athārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3363: adrohaś caiva bhūtānāṃ madbhaktānāṃ vrataṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3364: nama ity eva yo brūyān madbhaktaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3366: kiṃ punar ye yajante māṃ yājakā vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3367: madbhaktā madgataprāṇāḥ kathayantaś ca māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3369: nāsau padam avāpnoti madbhaktair yad avāpyate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3370: mām eva tasmād rājendra dhyāhi nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3371: avāpsyasi tataḥ siddhiṃ drakṣyase paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3373: na śūdrā bhagavadbhaktā viprā bhāgavatāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3375: acchidraḥ pañcakālajñaḥ sa vai bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3376: ṛgvedenaiva māṃ hotā yajuṣādhvaryur eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3379: stuvanti satataṃ ye māṃ te 'pi bhāgavatāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3380: vedādhīnāḥ sadā yajñā yajñādhīnās tu devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3381: devatā brāhmaṇādhīnās tasmād viprās tu devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3383: rudraṃ samāśritā devā rudro brāhmaṇam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3384: brahmā mām āśrito rājan nāhaṃ kaṃ cid upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3385: mamāśrayo na kaś cit tu sarveṣām āśrayo hy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3386: evam etan mayā proktaṃ rahasyam idam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3387: dharmapriyasya te rājan nityam evaṃ samācara
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3388: idaṃ pavitram ākhyānaṃ puṇyaṃ vedena saṃmitam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3389: yaḥ paṭhen māmakaṃ dharmam ahany ahani pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3390: dharmo vivardhate tasya buddhiś cāpi prasīdati
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3391: pāpakṣayam upaity eva kalyāṇaṃ ca vivardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3392: etat puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca pāpanāśanam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3393: śrotavyaṃ śraddhayā yuktaiḥ śrotriyaiś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3394: śrāvayed yas tv idaṃ bhaktyā prayato 'tha śṛṇoti vā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3395: sa gacchen mama sāyujyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3396: yaś cedaṃ śrāvayec chrāddhe madbhakto matparāyaṇaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3398: śrutvā bhāgavatān dharmān sākṣād viṣṇor jagadguroḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3400: ṛṣayaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva praṇemus taṃ janārdanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3401: pūjayām āsa govindaṃ dharmaputraḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3403: bhūtā yakṣā grahāś caiva guhyakā bhujagās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3407: śrutvā tu paramaṃ puṇyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ dharmaśāsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3408: vimuktapāpāḥ pūtās te saṃvṛttās tatkṣaṇena tu
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3409: praṇamya śirasā viṣṇuṃ pratinandya ca tāṃ kathām
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3410: draṣṭāro dvārakāyāṃ vai vayaṃ sarve jagadgurum
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3412: sarve ṛṣigaṇā rājan yayuḥ svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3413: gateṣu teṣu sarveṣu keśavaḥ keśihā tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3414: sasmāra dārukaṃ rājan sa ca sātyakinā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3418: pibantaḥ satataṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nocur ārtatarās tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3419: kṛṣṇo 'pi bhagavān devaḥ pṛthām āmantrya cārtavat
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3420: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca gāndhārīṃ viduraṃ draupadīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3421: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsam ṛṣīn anyāṃś ca mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3426: anvāruroha cāpy enaṃ premṇā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3433: dadhāra tarasā bhīmaḥ chattraṃ tac chārṅgadhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3435: pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ mā śabda iti harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3436: triyojane vyatīte tu pariṣvajya ca pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3437: visṛjya kṛṣṇas tān sarvān praṇatān dvārakāṃ yayau
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3438: tathā praṇamya govindaṃ tadā prabhṛti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:096.015d-004_3442: yudhiṣṭhiras tu dharmātmā hṛdi kṛtvā janārdanam
